Chioma Chukwujindu "CiCi" Onyekwere a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 28 n'ọnwa Juunu, n'afọ 1994 bụ nwaafọ Naijiria a mụrụ na Lansing,dị na Michigan n'Amerịka,na-eme egwuregwu ị tụ diskus.Ọ sọọla mpi shọtpuutu na diskus na kọleeji nakwa mba ndi ozo ebe ọ nọchitere anya Naijiria.
Ọ nwere nrite onye nke kachasị mma nke mita 61.38 maka diskus ọ tụrụ na 2019 World Athletics Championship.
A mara ya maka mmuta ya na agụmakwụkwọ dị ka nwa akwụkwọ na-eme egwuregwu na Mahadum nke Maryland n'afọ afọ anọ site na Big Ten na ACC mgbe ọ na-eje ozi dị ka otu n'ime ndị isi ndị otu egwuregwu.
Nsọpụrụ ndị kọleeji ya gụnyere All-American recognition, All-Big Ten honors, All-Academic Big Ten, 5 Big Ten Conference Medals, na onye natara onyine Solomon Eye Terp of the Week .
O ritere ihe nrite ọla edo maka diskus na asọmpi iko mba Afrịka nke afọ 2018 n’Asaba,na Naijiria.
O ritere ihe nrite ọla edo ọzọ maka diskus na asọmpi Afrịka nke afọ 2019 na Rabat,dị na Moroko.
Ndụ onwe ya.
A mụrụ ya nye Chima &amp; Scholar Onyekwere ya na ụmụnne ejima atọ Chidinma na Chima na ụmụnne ya ndị tọrọ Emeka na Kay.
Onyekwere tolitere na Naijiria ma kwaga Fairfax,nke Virginia n'afọ 2002 ya na ezinụlọ ya.
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na A. James Clark School of Engineering na Mahadum nke Maryland na Winter afọ 2016 na nzere bachelọ nke sayensị na Mechanical Engineering.
Ọrụ.
Tupuu Kọleejị.
Onyekwere gara James W. Robinson High School na Fairfax, VA. Ọ sọrọ mpi n'okpuru nduzi nke onye na-atụburu Maryland diskus bụ Beau Fay.
Onyekwere abụghị naanị onye mmeri distrikti ọtụtụ oge mana ọ bụbukwa onye jidere ọkwa okaibe ugboro abụọ na shọt-puutu.
O ritere ọkwa ọkaibe mpaghara ahụ n'afọ 2011 ma n'afọ 2012, onye nke 3 na steeti n'afọ 2011 na 2012, ma onye nke 5 na Nationals n'afọ 2012.
Mahadum nke Maryland.
Chioma debara aha na Mahadum nka Maryland na Fall afọ 2012 ebe o sonyeere ndị otu egwu Track na Field nke onye bụbu US Olympia Andrew Valmon kụziri .
N'afọ 2015, Onyekwere meriri nrite kọleeji mbụ ya na agba nke mbụ Maryland n'egwuregwu Big Ten Conference.
N'asọmpi 2015 Big Ten Indoor Track and Field Championship, Onyekwere nwetara ọla ọcha na Shọtpuutu na oke elu ya nke 16.06 mita (52 '8.25 ”).
E nyere ya ogo nke abụọ na Team All-Big Ten maka agba nke ime ụlọ.
Nchịkwa ya na shọtpuutu bufere n'ime agba nke èzí dị ka o ritere ọla nchara na Big Ten Outdoor Track &amp; Field Championships site n'akara akara nke 16.10 mita (52 '10 ").
Ọ gbakwunyere na ngwụcha Top 10 Conference a site na ị bụ onye nke 7 na ị tụ diskus.
Onyekwere nwetara mmeri ikpeazụ ya na Big Ten Indoor Track &amp; Field Championship n'afọ 2016 site na ị nweta ọla ọcha na Weight Throw.
Akara nrịba ama ya kachasị elu nke 21.17 mita (69 '5.5 ”) abụghị naanị nke onwe ya kachasị mma, mana o kachapụrụ akara nke kwụbu kemgbe afọ 14.
O gbatara onye nke 6 n'asọmpi shọtpuutu na nzukọ a. Tinyere i nweta ọkwa nke 2 na Team All-Big Ten n'afọ nke abụọ n'esote, ọ akara ya ahụ kachapụrụ akara kwụbu mekwara ka o ruo agba nkw 2016 NCAA Division I Indoor Track &amp; Field National Championship.
Omume ya n'asọmpi a dị mma ka bụ na e nyere ya onyinye dị ka onye ọkwa nke 2 na Team All-American Indoor nke afọ 2016.
Ọchịchị ya gara n'ihu ka agba nke ikpeazụ ọ na-aga n'èzí na-aga n'ihu.
Na UVA Quad Meet na Charlottesville, VA, Onyekwere mebiri akara ụlọ akwụkwọ dị afọ 34 na diskus na ọtụtụ nke 52.4 mita (171 '11 ”).
Ọ ga-aga n'ihu iji degharịa akara diskus a na Big Ten Outdoor Track and Field Championship na ịtụba 54.43 mita (178 '7 ”).
Ihe ọtụtụ a wepụtara ihe nrite nke ọla nchara.
Onyekwere tụrụ shọtpuutu nke kachasị mma nke 16.85 mita (55 '3.5 ”) na-enweta ọla ọcha,nke 5 ya na Big Ten, na 2nd Team Big-Ten Honors ọzọ Ọ gara n'ihu ị sọ mpi na NCAA East Regional Championship maka shọtpuutu na diskus ebe ọkwa nke 11 na shọtpuutu mere ka o ruo maka NCAA Outdoor T&amp;F Championship.
Na ngwụch agba a, e nyere ya onyinye nkwanye ugwu dị ka All-American Honorable Mention for the 2016 Outdoor Season.
Ka ọ gụchara Kọleeji.
Dịka onye otu Nigerian Senior National Track and Field Team, a kpọrọ Onyekwere ka o sonye n'asọmpi African Championship nke afọ 2016 na Durban,dị na Saụt Afrịka.
Ọ ga-aga n’ihu i rite ọla nchara abụọ n ’egwuregwu ndị a. O nyeere aka mezuo ikpo mmeri nke Naijiria site na i nweta ọkwa nke 3 na diskus na ọtụtụ nke 53.91 n'azụ ndi otu yNwanneka Okwelogu na Chinwe Okoro .
Ọ nwetakwara ọkw nke atọ na shọtpuutu site na i nweta akara nke 15.71 mita.
N'asọmpi n'Asaba, nke Naijiri, Onyekwere kpebiri i tinye uche ya na sọọsọ diskus.
Nke a kwụrụ ụgwọ ka ọ na-egosi ihe ngosi maka obodo ya, na-enweta ọla edo na diskus na nsonye akara kachasị mma nke 58.09 mita.
A kpọrọ Onyekwere ka ọ nọchite anya Team Africa na 2018 IAAF Continental Cup nke e mere na Ostrava,na Czech Republic.
O mechara n'ọkwa nke anọ n'isi ọtụtụ mita 56.68 were nwee akara kachasị atụ nke onye ọ bụla tụrụ si n'Afrịka n'asọmpi a. 
N’afọ 2019, o ritere ihe nrite ọla edo n’egwuregwu African Games nke afọ 2019 na Rabat, dị na Moroko.
Ihe mmeri ya nke mita 59.91 bụkwa akara kachasị na African Games n'egwuregwu diskus.. Onyekwere sonyekwara n'asọmpi IAAF World Athletics Championship nke afọ 2019 na Doha.
Ọ tụtara akara kachasị mma nke 61.38m na agba nke ntozu ma mechaa n'ọkwa nke 13, otu nkeji fọdụụrụ ya ịga n'ihu ruo njedebe.
Asọmpi mba ụwa.
Mara: Naanị ọnọdụ na ntọanya dị na njedebe ikpeazụ ka a na-egosi, belụsọ na e kwuru ya.
(q) pụtara onye na ome egwuregwu erughị agba nke ikpeazụ, ya na ọkwa ya na ntọanya ya n'ogo ntozu e gosiri.
Chioma Elizabeth Toplis bụ nwaafọ Naijiria na-eme ihe nkiri na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri Naijiria (nke a kpọrọ "Nollywood" ).
O mere oru mbu ya n'afọ 2004 n'ime ihe nkiri "Stolen Bible" tinyere Kate Henshaw mana ọ buụrụ onye a ma ama mgbe ọ putara n’ime ihe nkiri afọ 2005 a kpọrọ "Trinity" na otutu ndi ozo a ma ama na Naijiria 
Mbido ndụ.
Toplis, onye aha bekee bu Elizabeth, bu onye obodo Umuahia,dị n'Abia Steeti, na mpaghara ndida Naijiria .
Ya na onye "Nollywood" ọzọ na-eme ihe nkiri na onye isi oche gara aga nke Actors Guild nke Naijiria, bụ Ejike Asiegbu bụ ụmụnna.
Site n'afọ 1979 ruo n'afọ 1985, ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị ya n’ọtụtụ ụlọ akwụkwọ: St Michaels Primary School Umuahia, Orji Town Primary School Owerri, Umuhu Central School, Umuahia na 67 Infantry Battalion Primary School Faulks Road, Aba .
Site n'afọ 1985 ruo n'afọ 1990, ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Ohuhu Community Secondary School Amaogwugwu, Umuahia.
Mgbe ọ hapụrụ Naijiria were bie ọtụtụ afọ na Lọndọn, ọ malitere na Valentine High School ịmụ asụsụ Bekee were mesịa debanye aha na Barking and Dagenham College n'afọ 2003 iji mụọ maka Social Healthcare.
Ndụ ezinụlọ.
Chioma Toplis a lụọla di ma nwee ụmụ atọ.
O nwere ulo na Lọndọn, United Kingdom na Victoria Island, ebe di elu na Legos, Naijiria .
O nwere mmasi n'ọrụ ebere ma sonye n'ọrụ Home For The Elderly
Ndụ azụmahịa.
Chioma Toplis bụkwa nwanyị na-azụ ahịa nwere mmasi na akwa na ihe ịchọ mma, ma nwee ọtụtụ ụlọ ahịa na Legos na Lọndọn.
Ihe nkiri.
Toplis malitere ọrụ ya mgbe ọ pụtara n'ihe nkiri nke afọ 2004 gara nke ọma bụ "Stolen" "Bible" .
Ngosipụta ya na ihe nkiri n'afọ 2005 bụ"Trinity" ya na Hanks Anuku, Val Nwigwe na onye na-eme ihe nkiri "Oge Okoye", natara nlezianya dị mma, a na-ahụkwa ya dị ka mmepe ụzọ Toplis n'ime nnukwu oge na Nollywood .
Stella Oduah Ogiemwonyi ( nee Oduah; amụrụ ya na ụbọchị nke ise n'ọnwa Jenụwarị n'afọ 1962), bụ onye ọrụ Sineti ya bụ nnukwu ụlọ ọme iwu "(Senate) nke" Nigeria na onye isi na mbụ na Naijiria gburugburu na-elekọta ihe niile gbasara ụgbọelu (Minister nke Aviation) .
E duru ya iyi ọrụ dị ka otu onye Mịnịsta na ụbọchị nke abụọ n'ọnwa Julaị n'afọ 2011 ma ziga ya ka ọbụrụ onye isi na ngalaba ihe niile gbasara ụgbọelu na ụbọchị nke anọ otu ọnwa na afọ ahụ.
Agbanyeghị nke a, a'na puru ya ọrụ dị ka Mịnịsta nke ụgbọ elu na ụbọchị iri na abụọ n'ọnwa Febụwarị n'afọ 2014.
Ọ nọkwa na otu ndị hụrụ maka ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke onye bụbu onye isi ala Goodluck Jonathan, ebe o jere ozi dị ka onye isi mgbasa ozi nke Nchịkwa Ego.
Na afọ 2013, ọ bụ otu onye n'ime ndị nnọchi anya nke Onye isi ala ndị ahọpụtara ka ha gaa nraranye nke Pope Francis Ndị ọzọ sokwa na otu ahụ bụ David Mark, Onye isi oche nke Senate na Viola Onwuliri, Mịnịsta Ofesi.
N’abalị iri abụọ na atọ nke ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2017, akwụkwọ akụkọ Punch na- kọrọ na ejikpara ego ụlọ ọrụ ya anọ n’ihi ebubo ịkwụ ụgwọ gbasara nnukwu ego bụ $16,412,819.06 na N100,493,225.59 nke ụlọikpe ukwu dị na Lagos mere.
Akụkọ kọrọ na ndị ụlọ ọrụ anọ ya bụ Sea Petroleum na Gas Company Limited, Sea Shipping Agency Limited, Rotary Engineering Services Limited, na Tour Afrique Company Limited nwere ego na ụlọ akụ iri abụọ na otu.
O tinyela aka n'ọtụtụ esemokwu sitere na nzụta nke ụgbọ ala BMW dị oke elu na-agbasoghị usoro kwesịrị ekwesị ya'na ebubo na Stella Oduah-Ogiemwonyi gha ụgha banyere otu o si nweta akara nmụta nke MBA na aka ndị St Paul College.
Ma-na, webusaiti News, ndị nke SaharaReporters, gbara ama na ọnwa Jenụwarị na ụbọchị isii n'afọ 2014 ma kwuo okwu ndị isi nke Mahadum St. Paul, ebe Oriakụ.Oduah kwuru na ya gụrụ akwụkwọ maka nzere bachelọ na nke Masters, na-asị na ha enyeghị ịkịke inye asambodo MBA maka na onweghị oge ọbụla mahadum ahụ jiri nwee ụlọ akwụkwọ ma ọ bụ mmemme maka inye asambodo MBA 
Ọrụ Senate.
Na afọ 2015, a hoputara ya ije Senate nke Naijiria ka ọ nọchite anya Anambra North Senatorial District .
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị asaa a họpụtara ka ha bata n'ime ụlọ omeiwu nke asatọ ahụ.
Ndị ọzọ bụ Rose Okoji Oko, Uche Ekwunife, Fatimat Raji Rasaki, Oluremi Tinubu, Abiodun Olujimi na Binta Garba .
Eweputara Oduah ọzọ nke ugboro abụo na Senate na afọ 2019.
Akụkọ onwe onye.
Nna Oduah bụ Igwe D. O. Oduah nke Akili-Ozizor, Ogbaru LGA na Anambra State.
Amuru ya na ụbọchị ise na ọnwa nke Jenụwarị n’afọ 1962.
Oduah-Ogiemwonyi natara ya nzere ọmumu nke Bachelors na mgbakọ na nwepu (Accounting na asụsụ bekee) na asambodo nke Masters na nchịkwa azụmahịa nke bu Business Administration asụsụ bekee) na obodo United States.
Ọ laghachitere Naịjirịa n'afọ 1983 ma nwete ọrụ na Nigerian National Petroleum Corporation .
N’afọ 1992, ọ hapụrụ NNPC guzobe Sea Petroleum &amp; Gas Company Limited (SPG),nke nwe onwe ya azụmahịa ihe mmanụ ala na Naijiria.
Ọ lụrụ onye bụbu Mịnịsta na-ahụ maka Ọrụ, Engr.
Chris Ogiemwonyi ma nwee ụmụ.
Success Chioma Wogu (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 28 n'ọnwa Jenụwarị n'afọ 1999) bụ nwafọ Naijiria na=agbara ndị FC Minsk bọọlụ na Belarusian Premier League .
Ọ na-apụtakwa maka egwuregwu na Naijiria.
Ọ pụtra mdụ ị gba bọọlụ na mgbe ọ dị afọ 17.
Ọrụ.
Wogu bụ onye kachasị nye goolu (goolu isii) n'otu Confluence Queens na asọmpi , bụ nke mbụ ya ị pụta n'asọmpi ahụ.
N’egwuregwu 2017 Nigeria Women Premier League n’etiti Rivers Angels na Heartland Queens, Wogu nyere goolu mere ka ndị Rivers Angels jidesie ọkwa a ike.
Mgbe o gosipụtara ọmarịcha egwuregwu n'ụlọ, Wogu tufuru ohere nke butere ngwụcha mmeri egwuregwu iri nke ndị Rivers Angels.
Agbanyeghị na o so na egwuregwu maka Naịjirịa ị banye n'asọmpi , onye isi nchịkwa, Edwin Okon wepụrụ Wogu n'akwụkwọ aha nke ikpeazụ.
Agbanyeghị, n'agba nke afọ 2016, o so ndị otu egwuregwu, na-enye aka site na benchi na egwuregwu mbụ ya na Mali.
Nkiru Doris "NK" Okosieme (amụrụ ya ụbọchị mbụ na ọnwa Machị, na afọ 1972) bụ onye bụbu onye isi ndị otu egwu bọọlụ nke ụmụ nwanyị Naịjirịa (Super Falcons).
Ọ gbara bọọlụ maka otu egwuregwu bọọlụ nke ụmụ nwanyị Naịjirịa na asọmpi nke iko mba niile ndị FIFA ugboro anọ (1991, 1995, 1999 na 2003), ya na ọtụtụ asọmpi Iko nke Mba Ndị Afrịka na 2000 Summer Olympics .
A na- akpọ Okosieme "Onye isi ụlọ ọrụ" maka omume ya iji isi were nye goolu ya bụ ihe mgbaru ọsọ ndị dị mkpa.
Ọrụ.
Okosieme bu onye isi ndị Nigeria egwu bọọlu ụmụ nwanyị gara 1991 FIFA Women's World Cup mgbe ọ ka dị afọ iri na ụma.
Ọ gwuri egwu bọọlu oge zuruezu nke bụ nkeji iri asatọ niile na egwu bọọlu atọ nke emeriri Nigeria.
Na oge ahụ ọ nọ otu ndị SC Imo State club.
Mgbe ọ jere1999 FIFA World Cup, Okosieme nọ otu nd egwuregwu bọọlu Rivers Angels .
Tupu asọmpi ahụ o kwupụtara: "Anyị enweghịzị mgbagwoju anya iche na anyi bụ ndị ọbere mmadu".
Ọ nyere goolu atọ n'ime egwuruegwu anọ nke mere ka Naịjirịa ruo nkeji iri na ise na agba asọmpi ahụ.
Brazil meriri haa ọkpu anọ asara nani atọ (4-3).
Okosieme nwere obi uto igwu egwu bọọlu na America nke ukwuu nke na o sonyere Charlotte Lady Eagles nke USL W-League wee debanye kwa aha na mahadum, ebe ọ gbara bọọlụ nke kọleji .
W-league bụ ọkwa kachasị elu maka bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị na US taa.
N’afọ 2001, “NK” bụ onye nke abụọ kachasị nweta goolu na NCAA Div II.
Ọ nweta nmeri dị ka Peach Belt Conference Player nke Afọ na oge ahụ na ndị otu egwu bọọlu ụmụ nwanyị na mpaghara niile maka afọ anọ.
Ọ bụkwa onye enyere onyinye dị ka NSCAA niile-America.
Okosieme sonyere ma tinye aka na "Super Falcons" maka nmeri iko ụmụ nwanyị Africa, ugboro atọ n'afọ 1998, 2000 na 2002.
Nwanne ya nwoke bụ Ndubuisi Okosieme bụkwa onye egwuregwu bọọlụ mba ofesi.
Chigozie Stephanie Alichi (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 23 n'ọnwa Disemba nke afọ1993), onye amara aha ya bụ Chizzy Alichi, bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na Naịjirịa .
Ndụ.
Chizzy Alichi sitere na Ezza Nkwubor Nike n'Enugu East, okpuru ọchịchị ime obodo nke Enugwu steeti, nke di na South East (Nigeria) .
Ọ bụ nwa ikpeazụ nwere ụmụnne abụọ.
O mere isi akụkọ mgbe o wuru ulo nne na nna ya n'afọ 2017.
O bi n'Asaba,na Delta .
Ọrụ.
O sonyeere Nollywood n'afọ 2010 na mberede.
O sonyeere ndị , tinye akwụkwọ maka i so n'ihe nkiri were nweta ohere nke mbụ dịka onye ome ihe nkiri na ihe nkiri a kpọrọ "Magic Money" nke gosipụtara Mercy Johnson na Bob-Manuel Udokwu .
Oge mgbanwe nke ọrụ ya bịara na ihe nkiri "Akaraoku," nke pụtara " hot akara", n'afọ 2016, nke Yul Edochie duziri.Ihe nkiri vidio ahụ malitere ị ba ụba na soshal midia mgbe ndị mmadụ chere na onye omeejije ahụ bụ onye na-ere akara.
O gosiputara na ihe nkiri ndi ozo n'afọ 2017 maka nkea.
Cleopatra Tawo, nke a na-akpọkarị Cleo Tao (nwụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 1 n'ọnwa Disemba nke afọ 2017) bụ onye ọrụ redio na Planet FM 101.1 n'Uyo,dị n'Akwa Ibom Steeti, na Naijiria .
Ọ bụ onye nhazi nke emume redio nke a kpọrọ "DayBreak on Planet" na "AutoMania" .
Tupu Tawo abanye na Planet FM, Tawo rụrụ ọrụ na Rhythm FM 93.7 na Port Harcourt, dị na Rivers Steeti, ebe o mere ihe emume dịka "Morning Drive", "Afternoon Drive", "Sunday and Rhythm" na "Midnight Caller" .
Mbido ndụ.
A zụlitere Tawo na Port Harcourt, isi obodo Rivers Steeti, nke Naijiria.
O tolitere n'ezinụlọ Katọlik nke sitere na Boki, n'agbanyeghị na ndị mụrụ ya na-ebi ndụ mnwere onwe nke na-akwado ntụrụndụ n'ụlọ ha.
Ọrụ.
A zụrụ Tawo dị ka onye ọka ikpe tupu ọ banye na mgbasa ozi redio n'afọ 2000.
Ọrụ mbụ ya bụ onye ọrụ nhazi iheomume redio na Rhythm FM 93.7 ndị Silverbird na Port Harcourt.
N'ebe ahụ, ọ haziri ọtụtụ ihe omume gụnyere "Morning Drive", "Afternoon Drive", "Sunday at the Rhythm" na "Midnight Caller".
E mechara nye ya ọrụ na Planet FM 101.1 Uyo, ebe ọ na-akwado ihe omume dịka "Daybreak on Planet" na "AutoMania" .
Tawo bụkwa onye isi ọdụ mmemme n'ụlọ ọrụ ahụ.
Okwu gbasara iwu.
N’ụbọchị nke 19 n'ọnwa Disemba nke afọ 2005, ndị ọrụ nchekwa obodo (SSS) jidere ya na onye otu ya Klem Ofuokwu.
E boro ha ebubo na ha na-agbasa ozi agbagọrọ nke ọma gbasara ọdịda akwa mmiri na Rhythm 93.7 FM Port Harcourt .
Ọkaiwu na Rivers steeti bụ Henry Ajumogobia wepụrụ ebubo a ụbọchị nke abụọ nke ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2006.
Ha anọọla izu ụka abụọ tupu a gbapụta ha.
Ọnwụ.
Na ngwụsị ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2017, Tawo bidoro ịrịa ọrịa iku ume, e were nabata ya n'ụlọọgwụ.
N'ụbọchị nke 1 n'ọnwa Disemba afọ 2017, ọ nwụrụ na .
A nabatara Tawo na ngalaba nlekọta mberede ngwa ngwa UUTH.
Tupu ọ nwụọ, o tinyela ọkwa na akaụntụ facebook ya na "[ọ] nwere nsogbu iku ume, a na m a nara ọgwụgwọ.
A ga m apụta n’oge na-adịghị anya.
Ndewo maka ekpere ọma gị ".
Precious Uzoaru Dede (onye amụrụ na 18 Jenụwarị 1980 na ) bụ nwaanyị onye na-eche nche bọọlụ nke Naijiria lara ezumike nka, o gbaara ọtụtụ klọb gụnye , Ibom Queens na , tinyekwara ịpụta ugboro iri itoolu maka otu .
Ọrụ klọb.
Dede kwetara ibanye na klọb nke di na Norway site na 30 March 2009 ruo otu afọ.
A kpọbatara Dede mgbe onye otụ ha bụ merụrụ aru.
Ọrụ mba ụwa.
Dede esonyela na-ọtụtụ ndị egwuregwu bọọlụ Naịjirịa n'afọ ndị gara aga, gụnye asọmpi Iko ụwa niile nke umu nwaanyi emere na , , , , nke , na , na asọmpi iko asọmpi nke , , na , na-emeri ya ugboro abụọ ( , ).
Ịla ezumike nká.
Na mbu, mgbe ọ gbachara bọọlụ ụmụnwanyị Afrika, ọ nwara ịla ezumike nka bọọlụ mba uwa mana ndị otu ya mere ya nọgide site na asompi mba ụwa nke afo 2015.
Mgbe emechara asọmpi ahụ, ọ lara ezumike nká ya na Machị 2016.
Ọ bụ onye bọọlu nọrọ ogologo oge na ndị otu bọl ahu n'agbanye na ewepụrụ aha ya na asọmpi Olympic nke .
O kpebiri igaa ezumike egwuregwu na Ọktoba n'afọ 2016. ọ siri na "Enwere m obi ụtọ igba bọọlụ na ọkwa klọb ma na inọchiri ndi obodo m, ọ bụ ekpere chukwu zaraam.
Enwere m ekele na m nọrọ ihe karịrị afọ iri n'ịgba bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị, eji m ụgwọ dị ukwuu maka egwuregwu kachasị mma n'ụwa.
"
Collette Nwadike (onye a mụrụ Collete Kosisochukwu Barbara, n'ụbọchị nke 6 n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 1991) bụ onye ngosi ihe nlere anya uwe nke Naijiria, eze nwanyị nma na onye na-eme ihe nkiri na Nollywood .
Ọ nọchitere anya Naịjirịa na Exquisite Face of the Universe Pageant na Sao Tome were pụta onye mmeri, bụrụ onye Afrịka mbụ mere nke a. N'afọ 2014 ọ bụ onye mmeri nke Miss Tourism nke Naijiria.
Otu ọnwa o merichara makwa mee njem nkwanye ugwu, e mere ya S.A nke Gọvanọ nke Anambra Steeti bụ Chief Willie Obiano .
Ọ bụ onye nnọchianya nke akara Miss Tourism Nigeria.
Mbido ndụ.
A mụrụ Collette n'ụbọchị nke 6 n'Eprel afọ 1991 na Makurdi,dị na Benue Steeti, n'ezinụlọ Maazị na Oriakụ Simon na Angelina Nwadike.
O nwere ụmụnne nwanyị ise na nwanne nwoke ma bụrụkwa nwa nwanyị ikpeazụ na nwa nke abụọ.
N’agbanyeghi na ọ bụ nwaafọ Nise di na Awka -South Local Government Area, n'Anambra Steeti, Nwadike tolitere na Makurdi n’etiti Naijiria, ebe ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị na nke junịọ sekọndịrị tupu ya agaa Legos iji mechaa ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya.
N'ajụjụ ọnụ ya na Nwadike kwuru, o kwuru, sị: "Dịka nwata nwanyị na-etolite etolite, a na-ahụkarị onwe m dịka eze nwanyị mara mma mgbe m dị afọ atọ.
A nọ m na-elekwasị ndị dị ka Bianca Odumegwu-Ojukwu, Regina Askia-Williams anya .
A hụrụ m otú ha si maa mma na otú ha si a muke.
E chere m ị dị ka ndị a otu ụbọchị!
Nke a bụ nrọ m rọgoro ogologo oge.
Ọ dịkwa ka m na-ebi nrọ m ugbu a.
" Ọbụnadị ka nwatakịrị, o nwere ọchịchọ nke ịbụ eze nwanyị mara mma ; a kpọrọ ya adaeze n’etiti ndị ezi na ụlọ na ndị enyi ya.
O nyeere ya aka n'afọ 2001 mgbe o lechara Agbani Darego, .
[ "see okwu dị mkpa" ]
Mmụta.
Collette gara God's Heritage Nursery and Primary School, Makurdi,na Benue Steeti (1993-1995) na Holy Ghost Nursery and Primary School, Makurdi,na Benue Steeti n'afọ 2000.
O mechara gaa Anglican Secondary School, Makurdi, Benue Steeti site n'afọ 2001 ruo afọ 2006, were gụchaa O'Level na Caro Secondary School, Olodi-Apapa, Legos Steeti .
Mgbe ọ gbara afọ iri na isii n’afọ 2007, a nabatara ya na mahadum nke Nnamdị Azikiwe dị n’Awka ebe ọ gụrụ asụsụ bekee na agụmagụ n’okpuru prọfesọ Joy Chinwe Eyisi na Rems Umeasiegbu dịka ndị nkuzi a ma ama.
N'ajụjụ ọnụ Collette Nwadike banyere kọọsụ ọ gụrụ na mahadum, o kwuru, sị, "E nwetara fọọmụ ya na onwe m, m were denye Asụsụ Bekee na Agụmagụ n'oge mbụ, ma mgbe enyeghị m ya, m nwetara fọọmụ ọzọ ma denyekwa kọọsụ ahụ nke ugboro abụọ.
Mmasị m nwere n’asụsụ Bekee bụ n’agụmagụ n'ezie.
E nwere m mmasị n'ịgụ akwụkwọ,nke ahụ bụ otu n'ime ihe mere m ji gaa ị gụ kọọsụ a. E nwere m mmasị na akwụkwọ agụmagụ ndị Naijiria.
" 
Ọrụ.
Ngosi uwe na pajentịrị.
Tupu Nwadike a bụrụ eze nwanyị mara mma, ọ gụpụtala ma sonye n'asọmpi ụdị dị iche iche ma gosipụta ya n'ọtụtụ ihe ngosi uwe.
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ, ya na ụfọdụ ndị ọkachamara a maara ọfụma n'eyimeyi na ndị staịlisti na Naijiria.
Nwadike e kpebiela ọtụtụ asọmpi ị ma nma, ya na asọmpi eyimeyi na ngosi uwe gụnyere Miss Tourism Nigeria 2015 na Mr. Universe Nigeria 2015.
Collette Nwadike e sonyela n’asọmpi ị ma mma dị iche iche dịka Miss Global Nigeria na Miss Earth Nigeria, ebe ọ bụ onye osote.
N'afọ 2014,e kpuwere Nwadike okpu mmeri Miss Tourism Nigeria, e mere n'ọnwa Mee na Legos Steeti, na Naijiria .
Ọ nọchitere anya Anambra steeti, n’ime ndị asọmpị iri atọ na ise ndị ọzọ na-anọchite steeti ha.
Mgbe e mechara nyocha, e nyere Nwadike okpu mmeri n’abalị ahụ; anya ya juputara na anya mmiri nke obi uto.
Otu ọnwa ka e kpnyechara ya okpu mmeri Miss Tourism nke afọ 2015, ọ gara njem nkwanye ugwu i leta Gọvanọ nke Anambra Steeti bụ Chief Willie Obiano .
Ha gagharịrị na steeti i ji hụ ebe nlegharị anya dị iche iche.
Na nleta ya, akpọpụtara ya ị bụ Onye ndumodu Gọvanọ maka njem.
Kemgbe ahụ, Nwadike na-arụ ọrụ na Gọọmentị Steeti gụnyekwa ọrụ ọzọ ọ na-arụ.
N'ọnwa Disemba afọ 2015, ọ nọchitere anya Naịjirịa na Exquisite Face of the Universe nke e mere na Sao Tome and Principe, nke metụtara ihe karịrị ndị asọmpi iri ise sitere mba dị iche iche nke ụwa.
O meriri were nweta okpueze nke mere ka ọ bụrụ nwanyị ojii mbụ meriri n'asọmpi ahụ.
Ị me ihe nkiri.
Ya na ndị ome ihe nkiri ochie na Nollywood arụkọọla ọrụ, dị ka Obi Emelonye, Ikechukwu Onyenka, Kasvid Movies, SimonPeaceMaker, Ndave David Njoku dgz.
Ọ bụ onye isi ụlọ ọrụ nke Screen Goddess Global Productions ma nwee ọganihu na usoro ihe nkiri ya bụ African Beauty nke e gosipụtabeghi na ihe onyonyo 
Ndaghachi azụ na ihe ịga nke ọma.
Dịka nwata,ọtụtụ ndị ngosi uwe mara mma na ndị na-eme ihe nkiri nwere uwe mara mma na-amasị ya.
Ọ gara maka asọmpi ịma mma nke izizi ya ebe ọ sonyere na 2010 Miss National Association of Students of English and Literary Studies (NASELS), Unizik Chapter, mana ọ dara.
Mgbe ahụ, ọ nọ n'afọ mbụ ya na mahadum .
Ọ gara n’ihu ịzọ ọkwa Miss (UNIZIK) Mahadum nke Nnamdi Azikiwe ma daa.
O chere maka ị nwale asọmpi na-bụghị asọmpi ụlọ akwụkwọ were gaa (MBGN), mana ọ dị mwute na ọ gafeghị nnyocha ahụ.
O gafere nnyocha nke Port Harcourt mana ọ kwụsịrị na nke Legos .
Mana ọ daghachighị azụ, ọ gara Miss Earth Nigeria, ebe ọ banyere n'ogige ha dị na Lekki,na Legos ma mee nke ọma n'ogige ahụ n'agbanyeghị na ọ pụtaghị otu n'ime ndị meriri n'ikeazụ.
E mere mmemme a na "Incubator".
E nyere ya nrite Miss Earth Photogenic.
Ọsọ ya ịbụ eze nwanyị mara mma gara n'ihu n'afọ 2012 mgbe ọ zọrọ asọmpi Miss Global Nigeria.
Nkwado nke nne ya gbara ya ume,o were chọpụta na ọ pụghị ị kwụsị, ị chọ i weta obi ụtọ na i me ka nrọ ya bịa na mmezu.
Ọ zọrọ ọkwa Most Beautiful Girl in were pụta onye nke atọ n'afọ 2013.
N’afọ 2014,ọ hụrụ ihe omume Miss Tourism nke Naịjirịa na ntanetị.
Ọ gara nnyocha n'Owerri,nke Imo Steeti .
Ọ nọchitere anya Anambra steeti.
E mere ihe omume a n'ụbọchị nke 17 n'ọnwa Mee nke afọ 2014 ma mee ya na Ruby Gardens.
Nkechi Francis Anayo-Iloputaife bụ onye obodo Naịjirịa, onye ụkọchukwu na onye mgbasa ozi ụka.
Na afọ1985, ya na di ya, hibere Chọọchị Christian Victory .
Ọ nọgidere na-abụ otu n’ime ndị isi ụka ahụ ruo mgbe e gburu di ya, onye bụ onye isi ụka ahụ.
Mgbe ọ nwụsịrị na afọ 1995, ọ malitere ọrụ dị ka onye nlekọta ọrụ niile na ụka ahụ.
Ọ na etinye kwa aka na ọrụ enyemaka na ọrụ ebere.
Ndị Ghana tụnyere ọrụ ya n'ọchịchị n'ụlọ ụka were si na ọnwere "mmụọ onye ndu nke nwoke".
Na afọ 2014, ndị akwụkwọ akụkọ "Nation" kọwara ọchịchị ya na nhazi ụka dị ka ihe akaebe na "ihe nwoke nwere ike ime, nwanyị nwekwara ike ime, ọbụlagodi mee karia mgbe ụfọdụ".
Ndụ ya.
Tupu ezute di ya, Nkechi bụ onye okpukperechi Katọlik .
Ọ lụrụ Harford Anayo Iloputaife ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ na ọnwa February n'afọ 1995.
O boro ebubo na gọọmentị nwere ike ịnwe ụfọdụ ihe ga-eme ka ọ nwụọ, n'ihi ọna ekwu okwu megide atumatu ndị n'ọchịchị na Nigeria n'oge ahụ.
Ọ na-ele di ya nwụrụ anwụ anya dị ka onye ndụmọdụ ya, na-akọwa ya dị ka "onye nnọchi anya kachasị nso nke oyiyi Kraist n'ụdị mmadụ" na ajụjụ ọnụ "Daily Sun" ndị akwụkwọ akụkọ Kemgbe ọ nwụrụ, Nkechi abụrụla onye isi ụlọ ụka ahụ, bụ nke ọ gbara akaebe na di ya kwuputara ya dịka "onye ọhụụ" na afọ 1985.
Ka onye ntaakụkọ "Daily Independent" na-ajụ ya etu o siri nwee ike idu ụmụ nwoke ụka ya, Nkechi kọwara na ya "... na-eso ha emekọ ihe dịka nne na onye ndu ime mmụọ ha".
N’ikwu okwu banyere ụdị ejiji ya, Nkechi kọwara na ihe aha ya pụtara bụ “ịke ekịke na ịma mma”, ebe ọ na-akọwa ọdịdị ya dị ka nke “dị mfe ma dịkwa mma”.
Na ịma olile anya ya-na ịlụ di ọzọ, onye nkwusa okwu ụka a dị ike ọrụ gwara ndị akwụkwọ akụkọ Daily Independent na mkparịta ụka ọzọ dị iche na "Ee e, alụm di na nwunye adịghị n'arụmụka m ma ọlị, ihe gbasara njikọ alụm di agafeela, alụọla m Jesus.
Naanị ihe m na-arịọ bụ ka amara ya baram uba maka ihe ndị ọzọ ọ tinye n’aka m ka m mee ma rịọkwa ya ka ọ gbaa m ume ka m nwee ike rụchaa ọfụma.
O tinyela aka na onyinye nke ihe maka ụlọ akwụkwọ na ọrụ ebere ndị ọzọ.
Chinyere Almona bụ onye isi nke Africa Corporate Governance Advisory Program nke ndị International Finance Corporation (IFC).
Priscilla Mbarumun Achapka bụ onye Naijiria na-agba mbọ ihu na gburugburu anị di otu ọkwesịri ịdị.
Ọ bụ onye guzobere ma bụrụ onye isi oche otu ụmụ nwaanyị n'edozị gbugburu (WEP).
Mmalite ndu na mmụta.
Achakpa lụrụ di mgbe ọ gbara afọ iri na isii muo ụmụ atọ.
mana ugbua, obu onye di ya nwuru n'oge n'erughi eru.
Ezinaụlọ di ya chụpụrụ ya, ọ debanyere aha ya n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ebe o nwetara nzere mmụta n'ihe ọmụmụ mmepe, nchịkwa azụmahịa na njikwa.
Achakpa nwetara nzere mastas na Njikwa ma Njikwa azumahia, yana ọmụmụ mmepe obodo.
Ọ gụsịrị Ph.D. site na mahadum Banja Luka yana asambodo ọrụ site na .
Ọrụ.
Site n'afọ 1989 ruo afọ 2001, Achakpa rụrụ ọrụ na ụlọ akụ nke bụ Savannah bank ebe ọ bido mmụta ihe gbasara gburugburu anyi maka ọrụ o ga-arụ dika onye ndozị gburugburu.
Isi ọrụ ya na-eleba anya na ọ dị mkpa itinye okwu ihe gbasara nwoke na nwanyị n'ime atụmatụ na nhazi okwu mmiri.
Ọ rụọla ọrụ dị ka onye nnọchi anya ndị Naijiria maka ndị isi ọgbakọ ụmụ nwanyị na mmekorịta gbasara umu nwaanyị na-ogbako UN.
Emere ya onye nyemaka ọgbakọ ụmụ nwaanyị nke bụ "Women's Major Group".
Ọ bu onye isi oche ogbakọ ndi Abaagu maka nhazi ndi ntorobịa n'okwu mmekorita niime obodo ha.
Ọ bụ onye guzobere ma buru onye isi WEP nke (WEP) nke metụtara ụmụ nwanyị site na ịnye ezigbo ndumodu banyere otu esi edozi nsogbu nke uwa.
Ha nwere ulo oru na Naijiria, Burkina Faso, Togo na US.
N'afo 2012 o sonyere na mkparịta ụka na obakọ nke (Rio+20) 
O kwuola okwu na nzukọ UN na Nairobi banyere mkpa okwụ ụmụ nwanyị na ihe gbasara ndozi gburugburu anyi.
Apchaka na-ejidekwa ọkwa nke National Coordinator na Naijiria nke (WSSCC), otu alaka nke bụ (UNOPS).
N'afo 2015, ode akwukwo nke bụ "" dee banyere ya na otu edemede ha na ọgbakọ ebe a matara na ọ bụ otu nwaanyị nime ụmụ nwaanyị iri atọ bu ndi oganịhụ.
Nsọpụrụ na Onyinye.
Achakpa bụ kemgbe afọ 2013.
Ụlọ ọrụ ndị Germany nke bu Deutsche Welle na ‘Channels Television’ Naịjirịa kpọọrọ ya ‘’ Eco Hero ’’.
Ndi Deutsche Welle nyere ya onyinye maka mbọ ọ na-abga iji dozie gburugburu anyi.
Ndi otu bụ gosipụtara Achakpa dịka onye n'agba ezigbo mbọ ihu na-edoziri otụtụ ihe.
Chioma Omeruah, onye amara aha ya dị ka Chigul bụ nwaafọ Naịjirịa n'eme ihe nkiri ịkpa ọchị, bụrụ ọbụ abụ, na onye amaara site na ákpárámàgwà ịkpalí mmụọ ọchị ya na ụda asụsụ ya
Ndụ na ọrụ.
Á mụrụ Omeruah na Lagos mana nne na nna yá bụ ndị Igbo .
Ọ pụrụ n'ụlọ mgbe ọ ka bụ nwata.
Ọ bụ nwa nke abụọ n'ime ụmụ anọ nke Air Commodore Samson Omeruah .
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndịrị abụọ nke ndị Air Force ,otu bụ na Jos ma nke ikpeazụ bụ na Ikeja, Lagos.
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndịrị, ọ banyere Mahadum Abia State (ABSU).
Ọ gara ABSU ọnwa atọ.
Na 1994, ọ hapụrụ ABSU gaa Delaware State University,ka ọ gụọ maka iwu gbasara mpụ dị ka nna ya siri chọọ .
Mana ọ hapụrụ ya ka afọ abụọ gasịrị n'ihi na nke ahụ agagharia nke ọma mana ọ nọ na Mahadum Delaware nweta mmụta asụsụ French.
Omeruah bụ onye na-asu ọtụtụ asụsụ ,ọ́ n'asụ asụsụ ise nke oma.
Ọ laghachitere Naijiria mgbe afọ iri na abụọ gasịrị na America.
Na mbụ ọ bụ onye na-abụ abụ n'okpuru aha C-Flow mana ákpárámàgwà omee buturu nke a nke isi ya bụ Chigul.
Chigul na-asụ olu Igbo siri ike.
Á nụrụ olu Chigul nke mbụ na ndekọ egwu "Kilode" nke Omeruah zigara ndị enyi ya mana e zigharịrị ụda ahụ na Naịjirịa.
Chigul lụrụ di mana ha gbasara n'enweghị ụmụ ha mụtara.
Omeruah nwere akparamagwa iri na abụọ mana a maara ya dịka "Chigul" ka ó mepụtara ihe ọhụụ.
Ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi agbaala ya ajụjụ ọnụ ma too ya.
O nyegoro okwu TEDx ma pụta dịka omee n' ihe nkiri Nollywood, bụ Road to Yesterday.
Na 2015 ọ pụtara dịka ọbịa na otu "Karishika" nke Falz .
Na Mee 2020, Omeruah pụtara na Vijual kolabọretiv eletrọnik katalọgụ, na mbipụta a na-akpọ "TwentyEightyFour", ó gosipụtara n'otu a,gbakwunyere Dakore Akande, Oliver Nakakande na Coppé .
Ramatu Tijjani Aliyu (a mụrụ na 12 Juun 1970) bụ onye ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị Naịjirịa si steetị Kogi.
Ọ bụ onye Minịsta FCT nke onye isi ala Nigeria, , họpụtara na August 21, 2019.
Tupu ọ bụrụ minista, ọ jere ozi dika onye isi ụmụnwaanyị otu ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị All Nigeria Peoples Party (ANPP) na (APC)
Mmalite ndụ ya na ezinụlọ ya.
Amụrụ Ramatu na Wuse, Abuja, Naijiria.
Ọ bụ nwa late Alhaji Mamman Sidi Ali bụbụ onye isi mba na steetị .
Ramata gara awkwukwo na Dawaki Primary school dị na Suleja site na 1976 ruo 1982 na Federal government college (FGC) Minna, Niger steetị ebe ọ gusịrị na 1988.
N'afo 1990, ọ banyere mahadum Zaria ebe ọ gụrụ Urban and Regional Planning.
Ka ọ gusiri na 1995, o jere ịweta nzere mastas na mahadum dị na .
Ọrụ na Ndọrọ Ndọrọ Ọchịchị.
Ramatu maliịtere ịrụ ọrụ mgbe o mechara (NYSC) ya na ụlọ ọrụ nke Federal ministry works and housing.
ọ banyere AZAH Intermediaries Nigeria Limited, ndi sịvịl injinịa ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ dịka onye isi njikwa mana o mechara laghachi mahadum ebe ọ mere nzere mastas ya ma nata Asambodo ya na ihe gbasara ịduzi ndị Isi.
N'afo 2004, onye isi oche ndi Gwagwalada nọ họpụtara Ramatu dika onye ndụmodụ gbasara ihe ụmụ nwaanyị, ndị ntọrobia na oganihụ obodo.
Na 2007, ọ gbara mbo ibanye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị maka ịnọchite anya ndị mba Kwali / Abaji na ndị nnọchi anya ụlọ nke Naijiria (NASS) mana onweghị isi, mana na 2008, emere ya onye isi oche nke otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ya nke bụ All Nigeria Peoples Party (ANPP) nke o jere ozi dika onye nlekọta North Central Zone.
N'afo 2010, enyere ya okwa dika onye isi ụmụ nwaanyị otu ha na onye isi ala Council of African Political Parties (CAPP).
Na 2014, emere ya onye isi ụmụ nwaanyị na otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị a guzobere ọhụrụ bụ (APC) ebe o jere ozi ruo 2018.
Ndụ ya nime.
Di Ramatu bụ Alhaji Ahmed Tijjani Aliyu, onye na-arụ ọrụ n'ụlọ akụ na ndị na-enyere ndị mmadụ aka.
Ha mụrụ ụmụ atọ.
Ramatu na-arụ ọrụ na NGO ma guzobe Global Women and Youth Empowerment Strategy (GLOWYES).
Remi Vaughan-Richards bụ onye na-eme ọrụ ihe nkiri na Naijiria.
Mmalite ndu na mmuta.
Amụrụ Remi na Naijiria, otu n'ime ụmụ anọ amụrụ , onye Britain na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ, na Ayo Vaughan (1928-1993), onye nọọsụ nke sitere n’ezinaụlọ Lagos a ma ama bụ onye nna nna ya bụ onye ọrụ aka America oge ochie bụ .
Ọ gụrụ akwukwo na Mahadum na dị na London.
Ọrụ.
Vaughan-Richards malitere ọrụ nkiri ya na ngalaba ihe ọsịse, ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ na fim dịka "" (1995) "na " (1999).
N'afo 2015, Remi Vaughan-Richards duziri ihe nkiri "" nke egosiri na mmemme fim the emere na .
Ndi BBC kpọọrọ ya ọrụ iduze ọtụtụ ihe nkiri dịka "Wetin Dey" na "One Small Step.
" Na 2015, "Pulse" magazin kpọrọ ya dịka otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị itoolu "ndị isi nchịkwa ihe nkiri na Naịjirịa ị kwesịrị ịma" na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri Nollywood.
Vaughan-Richards nọrọ afọ isii na-eke "Faaji Agba" (2016), ihe nkiri banyere akụkọ ihe mere eme nke ịtị egwu na Lagos, dị ka ndị na-akụ egwu ochie kwuru site na onye nwe ụlọ ahịa ihe egwu bụ Kunle Tejuoso.
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ dika onye okike na nduzi na ụlọ ọrụ ya, "Singing Tree Films".
A họpụtara ka-egosi ihe nkiri "Unspoken" na ogbako nke gbasara ndị ọrụ fim na mba Afrika (AFRIFF) emere na na Lagos.
N'afo 2019, e gosịpụtara Vaughan-Richards na ndị otu ọrụ ihe nkiri na "Polaris katalọgụ"".
"
Ndụ ya n'ime.
Vaughan-Richards bi n’ụlọ akpọrọ Alan Vaughan-Richards House na Lagos, nke nna ya Alan wuru.
Ọ nọkwa na-arụsi ọrụ ike na ichekwa ụlọ ahụ na akwụkwọ nna ya, na ihe gbasara ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ na Lagos.
Ndị nna nna ya gụnyere Yoruba, British na .
Nkechi Okoro Carroll bụ onye ode akwukwo, onye na emeputa ihe fim ma bụrụkwa onye na eso eme ihe nkiri .
Ugbu a ọ bụ onye isi ọrụ na-emepụta ihe nkiri nke CW "niile American" .
Mbido ndụ.
A mụrụ Carroll na New York, mana o biri n'ọtụtụ ebe dị iche iche mgbe ọ na-etolite, gụnyere Nigeria, Côte d'Ivoire, United States, na United Kingdom .
Ndị mụrụ ya bụ ndị Naịjirịa jere United States maka ịgụ akwụkwọ kọleji mana ha kpebiri ịnọ na obodo ahụ.
Nna ya bụ onye ọka iwu, mgbe Carroll dị afọ anọ, ezinụlọ ya kwagara Nigeria maka ọrụ nna ya.
Mgbe ọ dị afọ asatọ, nne na nna Carroll kewara, ya na nne ya kwagara Côte d'Ivoire ka ha nọdu nso ụmụ nwanne nne ya.
Mgbe ọ bi n'Africa, ọ na-ele ọtụtụ onyonyo, nke mere ka echiche ya banyere na ihe gbasara US.
Kemgbe ọ bụ nwata, ọ chọrọ ịbụ onye edemede.
E mechara ziga Carroll n'ụlọ akwụkwọ na Oxford, England ọ wee malite ịrụ na Oxford Youth Theater.
Carroll gara Mahadum Pennsylvania, ebe ọ natara asambodo BA na ndozi Akụnụba (Economics) na French na afọ 1998.
N'oge ya na Penn, ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Association Ndị Mmụta nke Pan Africa ma mee ihe ngosi na African American Arts Alliance.
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na kọleji, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ọka akụ na ụba na Federal Reserve ma rụọ ọrụ na obere ihe nkiri na oge mgbede mgbe ahụ .
Ọ na-asụ ọtụtụ asụsụ.
Carroll nwetara akara ugo mmụta na akụnụba mba ụwa na Mahadum New York .
Ọrụ.
Na 2004, Carroll na di ya hapụrụ New York wee kwaga Los Angeles iji chụọ ebum n'che Carroll maka ibụ onye edemede maka ihe nkiri na Hollywood.
Ọrụ izizi ya mbu bụ na "The Finder" .
Mgbe ihe nkiri ahụ gwụchara mgbe otu oge gasịrị, Carroll sonyeere ndị edemede na ihe nkiri nyonyo "Bones" .
Carroll rụrụ ọrụ dịka onye enyemaka onye nduzi ọrụ na "Rosewood" na "The Resident" .
Na Machị 2014, Carroll weputara otu akpọrọ "Black Women Who Brunch" nke putara ndị inyom na-eri nri ụtụtụ na nri ehihie na-anọkọ ọnụ.
Lena Waithe na Erika L. Johnson sonyere kwa na ndị bidoro otu a. Ezubere otu a iji jikọta ndị edemede ojii nwanyị na-arụ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri.
Ndị otu a na-ezukọkarị n'ụlọ Carroll.
Ha na-enye ndi otu ha ndụmọdụ na akụrụngwa maka inwete ọrụ edemede maka ihe nkiri.
"Onye nta akụkọ Hollywood" dere akụkọ banyere ndị otu ahụ na afọ 2018.
Otu ahụ nwere mmadụ iri isii na abụọ n’oge ahụ, nkemere na foto ndị "The Hollywood Reporter" sere ha bụ foto kasị nwe nmadu n'ime ya n'oge ahụ.
Na 2018, Carroll sonyeere ndị ọrụ "All American" mgbe ihe omume nke ha ji nene ma ihe nkiri ahụ agadaba gasịrị.
Ya na Eprel Blair, Greg Berlanti, na Sarah Schechtern rụkọrọ ọrụ mgbe ahụ.
N'ọnwa Ọktọba n'afọ 2018, Carroll weghaara ọnọdụ dị ka onye isi ọrụ ngosi nke ihe nkiri ahụ, nochie Blair mgbe Blair kwụsịrị n'ọchịchị n'ihi nsogbu diri ihe onwe ya.
A hoputara Carroll maka onyinye onyonyo NAACP maka "Ederede pụrụ iche na usoro ihe nkiri" maka ihe "nkiri America niile" "Hussle &amp; Motivate", mana n'ikpeazụ enwetaghị mmeri ahụ.
Chinyere Ohiri-Aniche (nwụrụ na afọ 2018) bụ onye mmụta asụsụ na onye mmụta Nigeria.
Site na afọ 2016 rue na ọnwu ya, ọbu onye isi nke National Institute maka Asusu Nigeria (NINLAN).
Ndụ.
Chinyere Ohiri-Aniche nwetara B.Sc na asụsụ French na Linguistics na Mahadum Georgetown na afọ 1975, M.Ed na Nkuzi Asụsụ na Mahadum Montreal na afọ1977, na PhD na Linguistics na Mahadum Port Harcourt na afọ 1991.
Ọ ghọrọ Ọka onye nkuzi, ọkacha mara na agụm akwụkwọ na nkuzi Igbo, na Mahadum Lagos.
E bipụtara "festchrift" nke bụ edemede maka ọrụ ya nwere mpịakọta abụọ iji kwanyere ya ugwu na afọ 2015.
Dị ka President nke otu asụsụ akpọrọ Association of Nigeria (LAN) na afọ 2014, Ohiri-Aniche dọrọ aka ná ntị na ihe karịrị asụsụ ụmụ amaala narị anọ asụsụ nke Nigeria nọ na n'ihe ize ndụ.
N’ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2016 , Onyeisiala Buhari họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi ọrụ nke National Institute for Nigerian Languages (NINLAN).
Ọ bụ onye isi nchịkwa nke atọ nke NINLAN, na-esote Ben Elugbe.
Na ngwụcha afọ 2016, ọ dọrọ aka na ntị na ihe karịrị asụsụ iri ise na Naijiria nọ na nsogbu nke ịla n'iyi.
Ọ nwụrụ n'ọnwa Septemba n'afọ 2018.
Rimini Haraya Makama, bụ onye na onye nduzi nke mmekọrịta ọha na gọọmentị na .
Ndabere na agụmakwụkwọ.
Amụrụ ya na Jos, steetị Naijiria.
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ ọkàiwu na Mahadum Jos, ma nweta nzere mastas na Mahadum Reading.
Ọrụ.
Rimini Haraya Makama bụ Onye Nchịkwa ihe gbasara gọọmentị na Microsoft MEA.
Ọ bu onye ọkachamara n'ihe metụtara gọọmentị na ịhaziri ndị ọha ihe teknụzụ na otu ojiji ya na-emetụta ndi oha.
Ọ na-ahụ maka ijikwa mmepe na mmejuputa atumatu ndị Microsoft na ngalaba obodo niile ebe ha metụtara mmekọrịta nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ.
Ọ na-eme ka mmekọrịta nke ụlọ ọrụ ya dịkwuo omimi na ndị isi gọọmentị, ndị na-achịkwa usoro iwu, ndị ome iwu, nzukọ mba na ndị agụmakwụkwọ
Tupu ọ banye na Microsoft, ọ bụ onye isi maka okwu mkparịta ụka, Africa Practice ebe ọ webatara ụfọdụ ụlọ ọrụ mba buru ibu na EMEA bata n'ahịa Naijiria ma na-enyere aka ịhazi ha dịka ndị mmekọ dị mkpa na ahia ọrụ ha ma gbaa ndị mba ọzọ ume itinye ego na n'ahia ahụ.
Ọ bụbụ onye isi na-enyere aka maka iwu na Office nke Iwu na International Criminal Police Organization - ICPO - INTERPOL na Lyon, France.
Rimini nwere LLB na Mahadum Jos, Nigeria, BL na ụlọ akwukwo ọkọaiwu nke Naijiria, LLM na International Law &amp; World Order si Mahadum Reading, UK, yana CIM Diploma na London School of Marketing.
Na 2014, Forbes matara ya dị ka otu n'ime ụmụ agbọghọ iri abụọ na-erubeghi afọ iri anọ ma si ike na mba Afrika.
Ọ bụ onye isi hụrụ maka ihe nkiri 2016 "Green White Green" nke pụtara n'ọtụtụ memme nkiri mba dị iche iche gụnyere Toronto International Film Festival.
Mmasị ya gụnyere mmepụta ihe nkiri na ụlọ ahịa ejiji.
Ihe ndị ọzọ.
Na ọnwa Disemba 2014, "" dere na Rimini Makama bụ otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị iri abụọ kachasị ike n'Africa.
Comfort Iyabo Amah Momoh, MBE (a mụrụ n'afọ 1962) bu onye na-enyere ndị dị ime aka ị mụpụta nwa nke bu onye okachamara na ọgwọgwọ nke ndi nwanyi e bere ugwu.
A mụrụ ya na Naijiria,ma Momoh bụ onye otu ndi Britain FGM national clinical group,e guzobere n'afọ 2007 iji zụọ ndi okachamara banyere otu esi a rụ ọrụ ahụ.
Ruo afọ 2017, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka ọkachamara ahụike ọha na eze na Guy and St Thomas 'NHS Foundation Trust na Lọndọn.
Ọ bụ onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke "Female Genital Mutilation" (2005).
Mmalite ndụ ya na mmuta.
A mụrụ Momoh na Legos,na Naijiria,n'ezinụlọ ndị Naijiria na Gana.
Nne nne ya nwụrụ ụbọchị ole na ole tupu ọmụmụ Momoh, ọ kachasị bụrụ nne nna ya zụlitere ya.
N'afọ 1981, ọ kwagara UK maka ọ zụzụ ị bụ nọọsụ na .
Ọ bụ na Middlesex ka ọ malitere ị mụ banyere FGM, nke ndị agbụrụ ya anaghị eme na Naijiria.
N'afọ 2002,o nwetara nzere bachelọ na nlekọta ahụike ụmụ nwanyị site na Florence Nightingale School of Nursing and Midwifery,nke King's College dị na Lọndọn .
Ọ natara agụmakwụkwọ n'efu nke Florence Nightingale Foundation n'afọ 2007 i ji mee nnyocha banyere ibi nwanyi ugwu n'Afrịka, yana n’afọ 2015 otu ahụ nyere ya njem mmụta n'efu i ji gaa Amerịka i ji mụọ ụzọ ha si e so i bi nwanyi ugwu.
Ọrụ.
N’afọ 1997, Momoh guzobere ụlọọgwụ African Well Women Clinic na St Thomas’s Hospital, nke ewepụtara maka ilekọta ụmụ nwanyị i bi ugwu metụtara.
N'ime afọ 2013, ụlọọgwụ ahụ na-eleta ihe dị ka ụmụ nwanyị 300 kwa afọ ma na-arụ ọrụ defibuleshọn abụọ kwa izu ụka, nke gụnyere ịmepe ikpu e mechiri n'ihi i be ugwu nke Type III .
Momoh rụtụrụ ọrụ dịka onye ndụmọdụ na World Health Organisation n'afọ 1999 were nọchite anya UK na United Nations Commission on the Status of Women n'afọ 2001.
Site n'afọ 2007, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka ọkachamara n'ahụike ọha na eze na Guy's and St Thomas 'NHS Foundation Trust, tupu ị la ezumike nká n'afọ 2017.
Momoh nwekwazị Global Comfort Ltd., ụlọ ọrụ ndụmọdụ.
A gụnyere ya na ndepụta nke "London Evening Standard" nke afọ 2014 nke mmadụ1000 kasị nwee mmetụta na Lọndọn.
Nrite.
Na , a họpụtara Momoh ka ọ bụrụ Member of the Order of the British Empire (MBE) maka ọrụ nlekọta ahụike ụmụ nwanyị.
E nyere ya nzere dọktọreti na Mahadum nke Middlesex n'afọ 2008.
N’afọ 2011, o ritere ihe nrite ‘Gathering of Africa’s Best (GAB).
King's College London họpụtara ya dị ka 2015 Alumna of the Year , ma n'afọ 2016, e nyere ya mkpakọrịta site na Royal College of Midwives .
Mkpesa afọ 2017.
Na Septemba afọ 2017, BBC "Newsnight" welitere ajụjụ gbasara nnyocha o pekata mpe ụmụaka ise site n'aka Momoh.
Ihe omume a nyochara ibu ndi isi ochichi Briten nyere banyere i nyocha umuaka nwanyị maka ibi nwanyi ugwu na ebubo n'ule a mere ka obi ghara iru umuaka a ala n'ihi na-ebibeghi ha ugwu.
Ezinaụlọ dị iche iche na-atụ ụjọ na a ga-ebo ha ebubo ma kewaa.
Kemgbe afọ 2012, Royal College of Paediatrics and Child Health chọrọ ka ndị dibia bekee na-enyocha ụmụaka e metọrọ bụrụ ndị ọpụrụiche.
"Newsnight" kwuru na Momoh kọwara onwe ya ka "Dọkịnta", agbanyeghị na dọktọreti ya bụ nke onyinye nsọpụrụ, na n'oge ikpe ụlọ ikpe n'afọ 2014, onye ọka ikpe, James Munby, katọrọ ihe akaebe ya dị ka ihe apụghị ịtụkwasị obi.
Momoh zara na o nweghị ihe ọjọọ o mere na o nweghi ihe ọ bụla ọ na-ezo.
Nimco Ali, onye na-emegide FGM, gwara "Times", "Comfort a rụọla ọrụ i ji kwụsị i bi ugwu ihe karịrị afọ 30 ma mee ka ndụ ọtụtụ ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụaka nwanyị baa ọgaranya.
Mgbalị iji gbuo atụmatụ ụdịrị nwanyị dị otu a bụ ihe ihere.
”
Cornelia O'Dwyer (a muru n'afọ 1984) bu onye nhazi Talk Show, onye edemede, onye isi nrụpụta na onye okike ihe ngosi vidiyo onye bi na Legos,nke Naijiria, ma n'obodo New York.
Ọ bụ onye nhazi ihe ngosi mkparịtaụka nke Ndani TV nke a kpọrọ Ndani Real Talk, na onye bụbu onye na-ahazi ihe omume ụtụtụ nke Smooth 98.1 FM nke a kpọrọ Grapevine 981.
Ọ bụkwa onye ọdee akwụkwọ nke Today's Woman Magazine (TW).
Cornelia bụ onye nhazi na onye isi nrụpụta nke Talk Show Chick Chat Live na Fox Life Africa a na-egosi na DSTV, Startimes, na Kwese TV na gburugburu Sahara Afrịka .
Ọ bụkwa Onye isi okike nke Carmarcon Media.
Mmalite ndu na mmuta.
A mụrụ Cornelia na San Francisco, were zụlite na Naijiria.
N’afọ 1998, ọ hapụrụ Naịjirịa gawa Ingland mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na anọ mgbe nne ya nwụrụ n’ihe mgbawa gaas.
N'afọ 2005, o nwetara nzere bachelọ nke nka (BA) na ihe nkiri, omenaala na agụm akwụkwọ mgbasa ozi sna Mahadum nke West nke England na Bristol.
Mgbe ọ gbara afọ iri abụọ na otu, ọ kwagara obodo New York, ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ ihe dị ka afọ asaa tupu ọ laghachite Naịjirịa n’afọ 2011.
Ọrụ.
Cornelia bụbu onye enyemaka ndị isi na Morgan Stanley, na nnukwu obodo New York site n'afọ 2005 ruo afọ 2008.
Ọ gara AIG, n'obodo New York n'afọ 2008 dị ka onye enyemaka ndị isi na onye nnyocha ọghọm, ebe ọ na-achịkwa akụkụ nke AIG na-ahụ maka ọghọm na inshooransi.
Ọ gakwara rụọ na Citi,n'obodo New York dị ka ọkachamara na nchịkwa ego,n'afọ 2011.
Cornelia laghachiri Naịjirịa ma sonyere Bestman Games dị ka onye njikwa mmepe azụmaahịa na onye enyemaka onye isi ọrụ (CEO), n'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2012.
Mgbe ọ nọ n'ọnọdụ a, ọ ghọọrọ onye njikwa kampeenu na TRACE n'ọnwa Septemba n'afọ 2014.
Ọrụ Cornelia dị ka onye njikwa mmepe azụmaahịa na onye njikwa kampeenu kwụsịrị n'ọnwa Septemba afọ 2015 na Nọvemba afọ 2015 n'otu.
N’afọ 2015, ọ ghọọrọ onye nhazi ihe omume nke Ndani TV a kpọrọ "Real Talk".
N'afọ 2017, ọ malitere "Chick Chat Live TV Show" na mmekorita ya na DZRPT TV na otu 5ive Music.
Ihe nkiri ahụ gosiri na Fox Africa .
Cynthia Uwak (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 15 n'ọnwa Julaị nke afọ 1986 n'Akwa Ibom Steeti ) bụ nwaafọ Naịjirịa na-agbara bọọlụ ugbua na Naisten Liiga na Fịnland.
Mbido ndụ.
Ahụmahụ mbụ Cynthia Uwak nwere n'ịgba bọọlụ dụ ya n'ụmụ nwoke n'okporo ámá nke obodo ya.
Nne ya kwadoro ya ị chụso ị gba bọọlụ, o were nwee ike ijikọ egwuregwu bọọlụ na agụmakwụkwọ ya.
Ọrụ ị gba bọọlụ.
Klọb.
Cynthia Uwak malitere ọrụ klọb ya n'akụkụ KMF ụmụ nwanyị Finnish, ma rụọkwa ọtụtụ ọrụ klọb ya na Scandinavia ma e wezụga nke France na Germany.
O so n'òtù Olympique Lyonnais nke meriri na Division 1 Féminine na France n'afọ 2009.
Mgbe ọ kwagara n'akụkụ Aland United nke Finnish, o meriri mmeri Naisten Liiga ọzọ n'afọ 2013, bụrụkwa onye kachasị nye goolu n'asọmpi ahụ.
Mba ụwa.
Ọ bụkwa onye otu egwu bọọlụ Naịjirịa .
Uwak gbara asọmpi nakwa .
Ọ soghị ndị otu egwuregwu nke 2010 African Women's Championship na Saụt Afrịka n'ihi mmerụ ahụ.
Onye nkuzi Eucharia Uche kwuru n'oge ahụ na nke a agaghị apụta na a ga-ahọpụ ya n'otù n'afọ na-esote.
Kaosiladị, mgbe a kpọpụtara ndị otu egwuregwu iko mba ụwa, akpọghị Uwak aha.
E nweghi ihe pụrụ iche e kwuru kpatara mwepụ ya, na nkwupụta izugbe na-ekwu "Onye nchịkwa ahụ a hụrọla ndị egwuregwu nwere ike ịme mba mpako na World Cup na Germany".
A tụlere ya maka ịlaghachi na otu egwuregwu Naijiria site n'aka onye nchịkwa Florence Omagbemi n'afọ 2016 maka Africa Women Cup of Nations na Kameruun.
Onye nkuzi a na-ele nnọchịte ndị otu egwuregwu bọọlụ na-ịgba mbọ iji bulie ohere otu ahụ n'egwuregwu ahụ.
Ndụ onwe.
Uwak ekwuola okwu megide echiche ahụ na ụmụ nwanyị niile na-agba bọọlụ bụ ndị mmekọ nwanyị na nwanyị ; "i kwu n'ụmụ nwanyị na-agba bọọlụ bụ nwanyị nwere mmasị na nwanyị bụ ihe mwute.
Ị nweghị ike ịkpọ ndị mmadụ aha dị aṅaa dabere n'echiche gị.
"
Vivian Chukwuemeka ónyé amụrụ na abalị anọ nke ọnwa Mee 1975, bụ nwaafọ Naijiria n'eme egwuregwu aka akpọrọ shot put",ma bụrụ onye gaárálá nzukọ egwuregwu Olympic ụgbọro abụọ..Ó ritere nrite ọla edo n'egwuregwu asọmpi Commonwealth nke afọ 2002 ma nwee mmeri ugboro atọ áchàghị̀ acha na All-Africa Games site n'afọ 1999 ruo 2007.
Ọ bụ ya bụ onye Afrịuka wetara mmeri na egwuregwu a na 2002, 2006 na 2008.
Ọ na-esonyekwa na asọmpi -discus throw na hammer throw ma ọ̀ bụ́ghị́ n'ogo mba ụwa.
shọt putu kachasị ya mma bụ mita 18.43,nke ọ rụrụ na Eprel 2003 na Walnut .
Nke a bụ nchịkọta Mgbalị ya nke Afrịka .
Ó sonyere na asọmpi 2000 Summer Olympics na World Championship na 2003 na 2005 ma o-rughị na njedebe.
O ritere ihe nrite ọla ọcha na 2006 Commonwealth Games .
Ọ́ gụchara akwụkwọ na mahadum nke Azusa Pacific.nke nzere bachalọ ya bụ ma bachalọ bụ maka ọrụ ọhà
Ọ́ natara mmachi afọ abụọ n'egwuregwu maka nyocha ọgwụ íkē nke kụrụ afọ n'ala na 2009 na asọmpi nke Naịjirịa.
Chukwuemeka na ndị otu egwuregwu Naịjirịa nwere ọgbaghara kpụ ọkụ n'ọnụ.
Nlereanya ọbàrà a n'eme maka nyocha a nwere ọtụtụ ihe n'edoghi anya, gúnyéré enweghị nkweko na ọnụ ọgụgụ karama,ọgbakọ gbasara ime nlele a, ya na ị́jû ịnabata onye nnọchi anya ya na nyocha nke abụọ na South Africa..ọ́ bòrò ndị ọrụ ha bụ maka nyocha ọgwụ íkê à na Naịjirịa ebubo nrụrụ aka na mmekpa ahụ gbasara mmekọahụ, na-ebokwa onye isi ala nke ọchịchị ahụ bụ Solomon Ogba ebubo ịmanye Amaka Ogoegbunam ka ọ́ kpọpụta ya dị ka onye n'ekesa ọgwụ ike a. Ndị otu mkpegharị ikpe kagburu ihe ọ na-ekwu ma mmachi afọ abụọ ya na IAAF nọkwa 
Chukwuemeka laghachìrì n'asọmpi na 2012 ma daa nyocha maka ọgwụ ike nke abụọ - maka anabolic steroid stanozolol - nke a n'eme mgbe ọfọdụrụ obere oge ka amalite egwuregwu Olympic .N'ikpeazụ, e nyere ya mmachi ịsọṅye na asọmpi ọzọ ndụ ya niile.
Nrụtụaka.

Daisy Ehanire Danjuma (onye a muru n'ụbọchị nke 6 n'ọnwa Ọgọst n'afọ 1952) bu onye ndọrọ-ndọrọ ochichi nke ala Naijiria nke bu sịnetọ nke nọchiri anya Edo South Senatorial District nke Edo steeti n'ụlọ Sịnetị nke Naijiria site n'afọ 2003 ruo afọ 2007.
Ọ zọghachikwara n'oge ntuli aka nke Naijiria n'afọ 2011, mana ihe agaghịrị ya nke ọma.
Mbido ndụ.
A mụrụ Daisy Ehanire Danjuma n'ụbọchị nke 6 n'ọnwa Ọgọst n'afọ 1952 na Benin City, nke Edo Steeti,dị na Naijiria.
Mmụta na ọrụ.
Danjuma gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị gọọmentị n'obodo Benin, n'Edo steeti, tupu ọ gụọ akwụkwọ na Mahadum nke Ahmadu Bello,na Zaria, ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ ma nweta nzere bachelọ na Iwu n'afọ 1976.
N'afọ 1977, a kpọrọ ya na Nigerian Bar dịka ọkaikpe.
Danjuma malitere ọrụ i ji otu afọ fee ala nna ya (NYSC) dịka onye ndụmọdụ steeti na Mịnịstrị nke Ikpe ziri ezi nke Legos Steeti, bụrụkwazị onye ọka ikpe nye Council of Aid Council of Nigeria.
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye enyemaka ndị isi na Nigerian Acceptances Limited (NAL), ụlọ akụ, site n'afọ 1977 ruo afọ 1978.
Ọ bụ odeakwụkwọ ulọ Ọrụ / Onye Ndụmọdụ Iwu nya Nigerian Television Authority (NTA) site n'afọ 1982 ruo afọ 1992.
A hoputara Danjuma dika onye Sịnetọ nke obodo Naijiria (2003-2007) na-anọchite anya Edo South.
Ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị.
Na 2003 Nigerian parliamentary election, a hoputara Danjuma ka o buru onye nnọchite anya Edo South nke Edo Steeti n'ụlọ nzuko omeiwu nke Naijiria site n'afọ 2003 ruo afọ 2007 n’okpuru Action Congress Party (AC).
Dika onye omeiwu, o jere ozi dika onye isi oche, ndi otu kọmitii sịneti na-ahụ maka ụmụ nwanyi na mwulite ndi ntorobia, onye otu komiti sineti na-ahụ maka, ahụike, agụmakwụkwọ, ego, na njem ụgbọala.
Ị bụ sinetọ si Naịjirịa nyere Danjuma ohere ị bụ onye otu Commonwealth Parliamentary Association (CPA).
O jeekwala ozi dị ka Onye isi oche, Women and Child Right Committee nke Economic Community of West African States (ECOWAS Parliament).
Danjuma zọrọ ọkwa nke abụọ ya maka ọfịs ndị omeiwu na ntuli aka nke afọ 2011 mana o mrghi ọfụma mere Ehigie Edobor Uzumere jiri merie ya ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ okpukpu abụọ nke votu ya; site na vootu 135,346 na 70,725.
Nke a gosiri Uzamere ihe ịga nke ọma maka ntuli aka ọzọ na ntuli aka Eprel afọ 2011 maka Edo South Senatorial District.
Mgbe a rịọchara arịrịọ ugboro ugboro, n'ọnwa Juunu afọ 2009, ụlọ ikpe mkpegharị kwuru na n'eziokwu na-ahọpụtara Uzamere n'ụzọ kwesịrị ekwesị.
Ndụ onwe.
Danjuma lụrụ onye bụbu onye isi ọchịagha Naịjirịa na mịnịsta na-ahụ maka nchekwa nke Naịjirịa, Theophilus Yakubu Danjuma onye guzobere ụlọ ọrụ nchọpụta mmanụ, South Atlantic Petroleum.
Ha abụọ nwere otu nwa.
Uchechukwu Deborah ukeh (a mụrụ n;ụbọchị nke 12 n'ọnwa Nọvemba nke afọ 1996) bu onye Naijiria na-egwu egwuregwu badimịntịn .
N’afọ 2014, o sonyere n’egwuregwu , were rite ọla edo abụọ n’ime asọmpi ụmụnwaanyị gbara abụọ na nke otu.
N'afọ 2016, ọ bụ nwanyị gbatara onye nke abụọ na Ivory Coast International, were merie na nke a gbara abụọ abụọ ya na Gideon Babalola mere.
N’afọ 2017, ya na Babalola ruru agba nke ikpeazụ na Ivory Coast International, mana ha ritere ọkwa nke abụọ.
Ukeh bụkwa onye nke abụọ na Benin International tournament n'asọmpi otu otu ụmụnwaanyị na nke ị gba abụọ.
Na mmemme ahụ, Ukeh bụ onye nọchitere anya Edo Steeti bụ onye ritere ọkwa nke abụọ n'asọmpi otu otu nke ụmụnwaanyị na nke ị gba abụọ n'asọmpi Katsina Golden Star Badminton.
Mmezu.
Egwuregwu Afrịka.
"Women's doubles"
Asọmpi n'Afrịka.
"Women's doubles"
Egwuregwu ndị ntorobịa Afrịka.
"Girls' doubles"
"Mixed doubles"
BWF International Challenge / Series (Ọkwa mmeri 2,osote onye mmeri 5 ).
"Women's singles"
"Women's doubles"
"Mixed doubles"
Deola Sagoe bụ nwaafọ Naijiria na-ewu ewu bụ onye na-emepụta eyimeyi,nke si Ondo Steeti, na Naịjirịa.
Mbido ndụ na Mmụta.
A mụrụ Adeola Sagoe (nke a mụrụ dịka Ade-Ojo) n'afọ 1966 dị ka nwa mbụ nke Chief Micheal Ade-Ojo, onye guzobere Mahadum nke Elizade na nwunye mbụ ya, Mrs. Elizabeth Wuraola Ade-Ojo.
Ndị mụrụ ya sitere n’obodo Ilara-Mokin,dị na Ondo Steeti .
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum nke Miami na Mahadum nke Legos ma nweta nzere masta na ego na njikwa.
[ "see okwu dị mkpa" ]
Ọrụ.
Sagoe malitere i mepụta eyimeyi n'afọ 1989 ma nweta mmata mba ụwa maka ụdị ọmarịcha eyimeyi dị icheiche o mepụtara.
N'oge na-adịbeghị anya, a họpụtara ya ị nọchite anya Naịjirịa na kampeenu mba ụwa ọhụrụ nke United Nations World Programme haziri.
Mgbasa ozi a, nke akpọrọ “Catwalk the World: Fashion for Food.”, bidoro na Naịjirịa n’ọnwa Eprel afọ 2006 were mee mmemme na Gana n’oge na-adịbeghị anya nke wetara ndị a ma ama dịka Damon Dash, nwunye ya, onye mmepụta aha ya bụ Rachel Roy, na onye mmepụta a mụrụ na Gana bi na Lọndọn bụ Ozwald Boateng .
Ebumnuche kampeenu a bụ ị kpata ego i ji belata ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị agụụ na-agụ n'ụwa, ọkachasị ụmụaka, tupuu afọ 2015 eruo.
Sagoe na-egosiputakrị nchịkọta eyimeyi ya na Cape Town Fashion Week ma bụrụ onye ọbịa a kpọrọ na New York Fashion Week n'oge gara aga.
Sagoe kpughere mkpokọta Komole ya n'afọ 2018, ọ bụ nhọrọ nke agbamakwụkwọ na uwe nke oge na-adọrọ n'ọnọdụ na nkwenye nke sitere n'ezinụlọ eze.
Sagoe e ritela “Africa Designs” na MNET / Anglo Gold African designs 2000 nke Andre Leon Tally, onye editọ US "Vogue" họpụtara ya 
Ọrụ ndị ọzọ.
Deola pụtara n'ihe nkiri nke afọ 2014 bụ "October 1" ebe e gosipụtara ya dị ka Funmilayo Ransome-Kuti .
[ "see okwu dị mkpa" ]
Ndụ onwe.
Deola Sagoe lụrụ Kofi Sagoe n'agbanyeghị na di na nwunye ahụ kewara n'ihi esemokwu na-ekweghị mkpezi.
O nwere ụmụ nwanyị atọ, Teni, Aba na Tiwa.
[ "see okwu dị mkpa" ]
Rita Akarekor (amụrụ na 13 Febuwarị 2001) bụ onye ọgba bọọlụ na-agbaara ndi na asompi bọọlụ nke ụmụ nwaanyi di na .
Ọ na-agba dika onye na-eche nche bọl.
N'afo , ha kwuru na Rita bụ ọgba bọl kachasi mma na asompi bọọlụ ụmụ nwaanyị.
Ọrụ bọọlu.
Klọb.
N'oge , Akarekor nyere goolu abụọ nke meriri Adamawa Queens.
Ọ kọwara na ọ teela ọchọrọ inye goolu na udịrị asọmpi ahụ.
N’ọnwa Eprel 2017, Akarekor sonyeere ndị meriri Saadatu Amazons, 2-1.
Otu goolu ndi Amazons nyere na asompi ahu mebiri ndeko ya.
N'onwa Julaị 2017, na-egwuregwu tupu nke ikpeazu, Akarekor mere ndekọ bọọlụ ọhụrụ n'aka ndi Adamawa Queens.
O nweghi goolu obula banyere na nke ya.
Mba.
Akarekor gbaara na egwuregwu bọl mba Afrịka nke ụmụnwaanyị n'afo nke ha meriri.
Didi Akinyelure bụ onye nta akụkọ nwetara ihe nrite bụ nwaafọ Briten na Naijiria.
Ọ bụ onye nwetara nzere bachelọ na kemịkal injinịarịn na Mahadum nke Nottingham .
N’ọnwa Julaị afọ 2016, o nwetara ihe nrite BBC World News Komla Dumor .
N'afọ 2018, Didi natara Special Excellence Alumni Laureate Award nke Mahadum nke Nottingham .
Didi bụ ihu nke ihe ngosi ụtụtụ nke CNBC Africa a kpọrọ Open Exchange, West Africa.
Ihe ndabere, agụmakwụkwọ na ọrụ.
Didi Akinyelure bụ onye nta akụkọ nwetara ihe nrite bụ nwaafọ Briten na Naijiria.
N’afọ 2016, ọ nwetara ihe nrite BBC World News Komla Dumor.
N'ọnwa Disemba afọ 2018, Didi natara Special Excellence Alumni Laureate Award nke Mahadum nke Nottingham .
Didi bu onye oru nta akuko nke nwere otutu ihe omuma na aru oru na telivishọn, redio, ederede na dijitalụ na BBC, CNBC na Reuters News Agency.
O gosipụtara iheomume usoro nke CNBC Europe na mgbanwe dijitalụ nke akpọrọ 'I.O.T: Powering the Digital Economy' na ihe omume usoro nke BBC World Service banyere mgbanwe ihu igwe 'Living on the Edge'.
O gosiputara, meputa ma dezie ihe onyonyo, redio na ihe dijitalụ nke BBC News n'elekere 10, BBC World News, BBC World Service, BBC Focus on Africa, BBC Business Daily, BBC Newsday, na BBC Radio 4 .
E depụtara akụkọ ya banyere azụmaahịa ụmụ nwanyị na ndepụta nke World Bank Women Entrepreneurship reporting category mmemme nrite n'afọ 2018.
E dere maka ya na magazin Forbes Africa ma tinye ya na ndepụta nke ndị nta akụkọ azụmahịa kachasị nwee mmetụta n'ụwa.
Ọ bụ onye ọchụnta ego Midia, mepụtara ihe omume nke telivishọn ya, nke a kpọrọ "A Place in Africa", ihe ngosi TV nke Afrịka gbaa gburugburu.
Akinyelure malitekwara ụlọ ọrụ REAP, na-emepụta ihe gbasara mgbasa ozi, njikwa aha na usoro nkwukọrịta.
Didi ewuola ọmarịcha ọrụ dịka Onye Nlekọta Ihe Omume na Ọkà Okwu.
N'ọnwa Mee afọ 2019, ọ chịrị mkparịta ụka dị elu ya na ndị oke uche na United Nations na Geneva.
Ndị a gụnyere Dame Wendy Hall, Nobel Laureate, Prof. Carlo Rubbia na Prof. Jurgen Schmidhuber .
N'afọ 2018, ọ chịrị mkparịta ụka nke United Nations na Sir Roger Penrose na Nobel Laureate Jacques Dubochet .
O dozikwara otu paneel n'ọgbakọ ndị isi ala Afrịka, ma hazikwaa oriri abalị ihe onyinye nrite ndị Africa CEO .
O lebara anya na ndị na - ahụ maka achụmnta ego na London Business School Africa Summit na ihe ngosi Future Energy Africa na ọgbakọ na Cape Town, Saụt Afrịka.
Onye isi oche nke Africa Construction Week na Munik,Jamini, haziri ndi otu paneel minista na Africa Oil Week na Cape Town, otu paneel na Access Bank International Women Day Conference, WimBiz, na Africa Women Innovation and Entrepreneurship Forum.
Tupu ihe a, o wepụtara arụmarụka BBC Africa na Fake News in Malawi na BBC Women in Digital Journalism panel na Social Media Week na Legos .
O hazikwara Africa Summit nke Mahadum nke Nottingham, Future Energy Exhibition and Conference, West Africa Property Investment Summit, the ‘Lagos at 50’ International Conference nakwazị ‘Lagos Kano Economic Summit’
N'ọnwa Septemba afọ 2017, kpọrọ Didi ka ọ gbaa ndị bịara nnọkọ mkparịta ụka na UN Convention to Combat Desertification in Ordos, China ajụjụ ọnụ.
Didi a gbala ndị a ma ama n’ọchịchị na ndị isi azụmaahịa ụwa ajụjụ ọnụ.
Tupu ọ bido ọrụ nta akụkọ, Akinyelure rụrụ ọrụ na Barclays Wealth na Lọndọn.
Ọbá akwụkwọ National nke Naịjirịa malitere ịdị n'etiti afọ 1960, site na iwu nke National Library Act nke afọ 1964 bụ nke mechara dochie ya site na Iwu Nke iri abụọ nke afọ 1970.
Tupu etie iwu nke Ọbá akwụkwọ National Library, emere otụtụ nzukọ ihe ọmụmụ Ịbada, nke agbakwasiri ụkwụ were hazie obere Ọbá akwụkwọ nke esitere na ego ochịchị goomenti were na akwado nke mekwara ka ngwa akwụkwọ rue ndị ọha Naịjirịa aka.
Emechara Mepụta Kọmitii ndụmọdụ goomenti n'ihi Mkpa ọ dị maka mmepe nke ebe nchekwa mpaghara ihe ọmụmụ.
Echere Kọmitii ahụ aka mgba ịchọta ụzọ iji nyere goomenti aka ịmepụta ntọala ọgụgụ isi nke amụma ya, ịmepụta ụlọ ọrụ akwụkwọ ọgụgụ nke obodo anyị na ikeputa ogige maka nkwalite ihe amụma .
Kọmitii ahụ bụ ndị mbụ kwadoro ka enwe Ọbá Akwụkwọ Mba dika akụkụ nke ntụnye ya .
Goomenti nabatakwara atụmatụ Kọmitii ndụmọdụ ahụ wee mee ihe ndị dị mkpa iji wuo Ọbá Akwụkwọ Mba.
Akụkọ na nhazi.
Nkpakota nke oba akwukwo a bidoro n'afo 1962 ma meghee ya bu ọnwa iri na otu n'afo1964.
Ebupụtara isi ụlọ ọrụ ahụ site na Lagos gaa Abuja n'afo 1995.
Iwu Ọbá akwụkwọ ahụ nke Ndị ochichi Nnọchiteanya nke Naịjirịa tiri nyere nkwado ego maka ọrụ ahụ, Iwu ahụ nyekwara ndokwa maka ọzụzụ nke ndị ọrụ na ịmepụta otu ndị isi oche nke ndị okachamara nọ nimeya .
N’ikwekọ na ihe ndị otu ala Naịjirịa na ọgbakọ choro, otu ndị ọrụ oba akwụkwọ iri na ise a zụrụ azụ ka ahọrọ na ọrụ iji huna eniri Ọbá akwụkwọ ahụ na osisi sirike .
E hiwere otu ndị nlekota ụlọ ọrụ na ọnwa anọ n'afo 1966 site na goomenti ndị agha ọhụrụ.
Ọ bụ ndị ọrụ goomenti mejupụtara ndị ọrụ nlekota ahu Kama ndị okachamara dị ka edere na mbụ ahụ.
Agbanyeghi nkea , ndị nlekota ahu, gbalịrị imeziwanye ebumnobi mbụ nke oba akwụkwọ ahụ.
Mana agha obodo Naijiria mebiri inweta ego na goomenti emeghị ihe rue n'afo 1970.
Na n'afo 1970, atọrọ iwu ọhụụ ọhụrụ na ịmepụta iwu Ọbá Akwụkwọ Mba, etinyere iwu ahụ na ndụmọdụ nke Kọmitii ahụ chọrọ ịgbasa oba akwụkwọ gaa n'isi obodo steeti ndị ọzọ iji mepụta netwọọdụ ebe nchekwa.
Ozi.
Aka mgba nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ gụnyekwara ịnye ISBN na ISSN maka ndị na-ebipụta akwụkwọ, usoro nke na-esiri ike na enweghị usoro teknuzu na-arụ ọrụ na mpaghara mpaghara mana ọ na-adịwanye mfe ugbu a site na ịmatakwu na ịmụrụ nke teknụzụ mkpanaka.
Ọbá akwụkwọ National nke Naịjirịa nwere aka mgba na-egbochi ya imezu ebumnuche ejiri hiwe ya.
Dolapo Adeleke, onye a makwaara dị ka LowlaDee bụ onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri na Naịjirịa .
Mmalite ndu na mmuta.
A mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 6 n'ọnwa Septemba, afọ 1990 na Steeti Kano, Adeleke bidoro i de ihe na nwata, bipụta akwụkwọ ọgụgụ abụọ tupu ọ malite mahadum.
Adeleke gụrụ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Dansol High School,dị na Legos Steeti .
O nwetere nzere bachelọ sekọnd klas ọpa na Mass Communication na Mahadum nke Covenant n'afọ 2011.
Ọrụ.
Na mkparịtaụka ya na Busayo Adekoya nke akwụkwọ akụkọ "ThisDay", o kwuru na ọ malitere i mepụta ihe nkiri n'afọ 21.
N'afọ 2012, e tinyere ya na ndepụta Vanguard nke ndị na-eto eto bụ ndị Naijiria na-enwe mmetụta dị egwu, were hụ ya na ọ meriri Onye edemede kachasị mma nke afọ nke Angles Magazine maka i de "Flesh and Blood" na "Little White Hen" .
Site na mgbasaa obere ihe nkiri ya Brave, nke Adesua Etomi na Wole Ojo nọ na ya, a họpụtara ya n'okpuru ngalaba Onye mmepụta Kachasị Mma nke Nigerian Entertainment Awards (NEA 2015).
Ihe nkiri ahụ dị mkpirikpi gara n'ihu merie Best Short film na Best Of Nollywood Awards ma họpụta ya na ngalaba abụọ na African Magic Viewers Choice Awards (AMVCA) maka Best Short film na Best Actor in a Drama.
N'afọ 2015, ọ gara n’ihu mepụta ihe nkiri izizi ya nke telivishọn a kpọrọ A Place Called Happy nke ndị ihe nkiri ndị Naijiria na ndị Gana pụtakọrọ na ya.
N'afọ 2016, o weputara Mini Series nke mbụ ya a kpọrọ This Is It na YouTube Platform jikọtara ndị ihe nkiri Naijiria na ndị Kenya.
Ọ nwetara nnabata n'otu ntabi anya karịrị nde mmadụ asatọ n'ozuzu ya.
Mini Series ahụ malitere nke ọma na ọdụ mgbasa ozi telivishọn dị iche iche n'ofe Afrịka were gaa n'ihu merie Best Television Series na Africa Magic Viewers Choice Awards (AMVCA) 2018 LowlaDee dere, Duzie ma dezie agba 20 ahụ mgbe ọ na-arụ ọrụ dị ka Show Runner.
N'afọ 2016, a họpụtara LowlaDee maka EbonyLifeTV Sisterhood Awards Africa maka ‘Film Director Of The Year’ maka ihe ọ rụzuru na Mini Series, 'This is it'.
N'afọ 2017, a hoputara ya maka ihe nrite nke 'Future Awards Africa' for New Media, ma n'ọnwa Maachị afọ 2018 ka e deputara ya dika Leading Ladies Africa's ‘100 Most Inspiring Women In Nigeria.’
LowlaDee dere, Duzie ma dezie nkeji 60 ihe nkiri Valentine's Day Digital film, PLAN B, akụkọ gbasara onye Kenya na Naijiria nke gara n'ihu ngw ngwa, nke nwetara ndị nkiri karịrị otu nde n'ime izu ụka abụọ izizi ya na-enweghị mgbasa ozi ị kwụ ụgwọ.
Ọ bụ onye nwe LowlaDee Original Inc (nke a na-akpọbu Doreen Media) ma na-agba n'etiti Legos Naijiria na Nairobi Kenya.
Ndụ onwe.
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na isii,n'ụbọchị nke 20 n'Ọgọstụ, afọ 2007, ka ọ na-aga i ji weta akwụkwọ ụfọdụ, ka a nabatachara ya Mahadum nke Covenant, Adeleke nwere ihe mberede nke okporo ụzọ n'ihi mmebi breeki moto ya nke butere ọtụtụ ịwa ahụ na ọnya n'egedege ihu ya.
Nke a mere o ji e ji fringe na bangs edozi isi.
Dịka o si kwuo, ọ bụhnị naanị ntutu isi mana ọ na-enye ya ike ibuli onwe ya ikarị obi mmafụ na ihe ndị ọzọ so ihe mberede ahụ.
N'ime ozi instagram ya, LowlaDee kpughere na ya na ịda mba gbsiri mgba ike ma ị na-ele onye nhazi ihe nkiri American-Indian TV na Actress Mindy Kaling's TV show, The Mindy Project, nyere ya ọṅụ ma kpọtee akụkụ egwuregwu ya na-emepụta nka.
Njikọ a mụrụ Romcom web series This is it.
Ngozi Ukazu bụ onye America na eji foto ede edemede ọ dị kwa ka akwukwọ.
Na afọ 2013, o dere webcomic "Check, Please!
", nke mechara ghọọ akwụkwọ akụkọ "New York Times" họọrọ dị ka nke kachasị mma.
Mmalite ndu na mmuta.
Ukazu toro na Houston, Texas .
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Bellaire, ebe oso na ndị na ede edemede na akwụkwọ akụkọ ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ, "The Three Penny Press", dịka onye editọ egwuregwu.
Nne na nna ya bụ ndị Naijiria .
Ọ mụrụ sayensị kọmputa, ma nweta nzere na Computing na The Arts na Mahadum Yale na afọ 2013 yana nzere masters na Sequential Art na Savannah College of Art and Design na afọ 2015.
Ọrụ.
Ukazu malitere "Lelee, Biko!
" dị ka webcomic na afọ 2013 mgbe o dechara ihe ngosi banyere Eric "Bitty" Bittle, nwoke nwere mmasị nwoke na mahadum ma bụrụ kwa onye mmeri na ihe gbasara egwuregwu a'na akpọ skating na asụsụ bekee ma sonyere kwa ndị otu hockey.
Ukazu mepụtara mkpọsa Kickstarter na afọ 2015 iji bipụta mpịakọta mbụ nke akwụkwọ ndị na-atọ ọchị; Mgbasa ozi a rụpụtara ọrụ dị ka nke kachasị nweta ego dị elu na Kickstarter.
Na afọ 2018,ndị mbiputa akwụkwọ a'na akpọ First Second Books weputara "nkebi izizi" nke "Check, Please!
: #Hockey".
Ihe nke abụọ akwụkwọ ahụ, "Check, Please!
: Sticks and Sones," bụ akwụkwọ akụkọ kacha mma nke New York Times na ọnwa Mee n'afọ 2020.
Rita Chikwelu (amụrụ na 6 March 1988) bụ one ọrụ egwuregwu bọọlụ na Naijiria.
Ọ gbaara ndi klọb .
Tupu, ọ gbaara na klọb na .
O bụkwa onye otu ndi na-anọchitere anya Naijiria na asọmpi egwuregwu bọọlụ bu Super Falcons.
Ọrụ klọb.
Site na 2006 rue 2009 Chikwelu gbaara na na nke ndi .
Ọ bụ onye kachasị nweta goolu na egwuregwu bọọlụ ndị nwanyị na 2009.
Chikwelu nyere goolu iri abụọ na abụọ.
Chikwelu nọrọ oge asaa na site na 2010 rue 2016, mana ọ hapụrụ haa wee sonye na nkwekọrịta afọ abụọ.
Ọrụ mba ụwa.
Chikwelu sonyere na egwuregwu bọọlụ nke FIFA site na 2004 ruo 2008 mana na 2017 ọ nọchitere anya Naịjirịa na egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụnwaanyị FIFA.
Ọ bụ onye otu ndị otu egwuregwu Olimpik nke Nigeria nke sonyere na asọmpi Olympic nke na China na onye otu ndị otu Naịjirịa na 2011 asọmpi mba uwa FIFA.
Jumoke Odetola bụ nwaafọ Naịjirịa na-eme ihe nkiri.
Ọ malitere ọrụ ime ihe nkiri Nollywood na sinima asụsụ Bekee, tupu ọ sonye ime ọtụtụ ihe nkiri asụsụ Yoruba.
Mmalite ndụ na mmụta.
Odetola gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndịrị na Abeokuta Grammar School .
O nwetara akara ugo mmụta mbụ ya na Mahadum Ajayi Crowther, ka ọ nwetachara nzere mmụta bachalọ na Infọmeshọn na kọmunikashon Tekunọlọji gbakwunyere kọmputa sayensị ,ọ gafee Federal University of Agriculture, Abeokuta, wee gụcha akwụkwọ na nzere masters na Computer Science.
Ọrụ.
Site na ajụjụ ọnụ Punch gbara ya, Odetola mere ka a mata na mkpebi ya ịsonye ime ihe nkiri megidere uche ndị mụrụ ya.
Ma mmezu/ntozu oke ya na ụlọ ọrụ ntụrụndụ mere ka ha nakwere ọrụ ọ họọrọ.
Ọ kọwakwara akparamagwa ya n' ihe nkiri "somewhere in the dark"ihe nkiri nke gosipụtara Gabriel Afolayan dịka ọrụ ọ kacha nwee ihe ịma aka.
Ọ họọrọ Majid Michel na Omotola Jalade Ekehinde dịka ndị ọ n'elegara anya oge ọ malitere dịka onye na-eme ihe nkiri ebe Abiodun Jimoh bụ onye nduzi ọ họtara kachasị na azụmahịa ihe nkiri.
Ihe Nrite.
Na 2015, o meriri mkpughe nke otu afọ na BON Awards.
Ọzọkwa, na 2016 na 2017 Africa Magic Viewers Choice Awards, Odetola meriri nturu ugo maka ihe nkiri "asụsụ ụmụ amaala kachasị mma" maka ọrụ ya na "Binta Ofege na somewhere in the dark.
" Ọ jigidere ihe nrite ahụ ruo agba nke ise nke emume ahụ site na "somewhere in the dark".
O nwetakwara ńríte onye kachasị dị ka onye ndu ákpárámàgwà asụsụ (Yoruba) na 2017 Best of Nollywood Awards na Ogun State .
Ihe nrịba ama nke 2017 City People Movie kwadoro Odetola ka o nweta nhọpụta maka onye nkwado kacha mma n'ihe nkiri asụsụ(Yoruba).
Jumoke Odetola bụ Nwanyị ahọtara Kachasị Mma na City People Movie Awards,na 2018.
Blessing liman
Blessing Liman onye a mụrụ n'abali iri-na atọ n'ime ọnwa atọ n'afọ 1984, bụ onye ọchị agha nke Nigeria Air force nke a mara nke ọma dị ka nwanyị Naịjirịa mbụ bụ ọkwọ ụgbọelu ndị agha .
Ndụ.
Liman bụ agbụrụ nke mpaghara ime obodo Zangon Kataf nke Kaduna State, nke dị na mpaghara ugwu Naịjirịa.
Ọ́ bụụrụ nwa akwụkwọ nke Nigeria College of Aviation Technology,ọ debara aha na Nigerian Air Force na July 2011,è wee nye ya ọrụ na 9 Disemba 2011.
Na 27 Eprel 2012, ọ mere akụkọ ihe mere eme site na ịghọ nwanyị kwọọrọ ugbọelu ọgụ mbụ na Naịjirịa na-esochi mmemme ịchọ mma baajị nke ndị isi iri atọ na-efe n'elu site n'aka Chief of Air Staff, Air Marshal Mohammed Dikko Umar.
Endurance Abinuwa amụrụ na abalị iri atọ na otu n'ime ọnwa Jụlai n'afọ 1987,bụ nwaafọ Naijiria n'agba ọsọ.
O sonyere na 2012 Summer Olimpik 
Nrụtụaka
Mahadum Federal University of Technology Owerri ( FUTO ) bụ mahadum goomenti etiti gọọmentị dị na Owerri West, isi obodo Imo Steeti.
Mahadum ndị dị n’ókèala Eziobodo, Umuchima, Ihiagwa na Obinze, na steeti Imo, Naịjirịa .
Ọ bụ mahadum nke gọọmentị etiti gọọmentị nke teknuzu na South East na South-South akụkụ nke Nigeria.
Mahadum Federal nke Owerri bụ Mahadum Kasị Ochie nke Nkà na uzụ na Nigeria ma guzosie ike na 1980 site na Executive fiat na nhazi na nhọpụta nke mbụ Council Council site n'aka onye isi oche mbụ nke Nigeria Shehu Shagari .
Ọ ghọrọ nke izizi n’ime ụlọ akwụkwọ mahadum dị otu a nke gọọmentị etiti nke Naịjirịa guzobere bụ ndị chọrọ iguzobe Mahadum Teknuzu na mpaghara ndọrọ ndọrọ ochịchị ọ bụla na ọkachasị na Steeti na-enweghị Mahadum nkịtị.
FUTO malitere site na iwere ụmụ akwụkwọ nari abụọ na iri abụọ na ndị ọrụ iri isii ( ndị nkuzi iri asatọ na ndị ọrụ nkịtị iri atọ n'abuọ ).
Dị ka mahadum nke goomenti ndị ọzọ dị na Naijiria, Onye no dika nna na FUTO (Chancellor) bụ onye eze , onye na-esote ya bụ onye isi na-ahụ maka ọrụ mahadum kwa ụbọchị.
Mahaduma nwekwara ndị oka iwu, nke bụ ndị kasị elu na ịmepụta atumatu ihe gbasara odimma akwụkwọ n'ụlọ akwukwo ahu .
Aha otutu ụmụ akwụkwọ mahadum FUTO nke karịrị puku iri abụọ na ọnụọgu bụ "Futoites" .
FUTO nwere ihe karịrị ọkammụta iri ise.
Onye isi nlekotaọ Mahadum a ugbu a bụ Ọkammụta Francis C. Eze.
Akụkọ ihe mere eme.
E hiwere Mahaduma n'afọ 1980.
O mechara kwagharịa onodu na nukwu ụlọ akwụkwọ Alvan Ikoku College of Education Owerri, were ụmụ akwụkwọ nke abụọ ahụ dika nke ya.
Ọ bụ otu n'ime mahadum teknuzu nke mbụ na odida anyanwu Africa.
Ụmụ akwụkwọ Mahadum a sitere na nganaba ebe niile si odida anyanwu Africa na ndị ozo.
Ọ bụ naanị mahadum nke teknuzu goomenti etiti dị na odida ọwụwa anyanwu nke Naịjirịa, na otu n'ime ndị kasị ochie na West Africa 
Mahadum Federal University of Technology, Owerri bụ ụlọ akwụkwọ pụrụ iche na ebumnuche, na mgbakwasi ụkwụ ya dị na agam n'ihu Siensi na Teknuzu iji zụọ ma kwadebe ndị okachamara na teknuzu dị elu maka ịnye onyinye dị ukwuu na mmepe nke ọha mmadụ na nkwalite akụ na ụba mba yana ọganihu.
Nkwupụta Ozi.
Iji rụọ ọrụ na ọzụzụ bara uru iji gbanwee akụ na ụba mba site na ndị ahịa na-atụkwasị obi na ịmepụta ihe, yana ntọala teknuzu mara mma.
Nganaba.
Mahaduma nwere Cọleji asatọ :
Instlọ akwụkwọ na Nganaba Ọrụ Nkwado Ọmụmụ.
Ọba Akwụkwọ.
Ọba akwụkwọ Mahadum FUTO bụ ihe dị mkpa nke ịchụso agụmakwụkwọ.
Emepere ya ụmụ akwụkwọ na ọdọ mmiri Nwaebere ebe Mahadum ahu nọrọ mbụ ka ọnwa iri na otu dina mkpụrụ ụbọchị itolu n'afọ 1981.
Onye isi nke mbụ Ọba akwụkwọ ahụ bụ Mazị Joseph Chike Anafulu.
Ọbá akwụkwọ ahụ nwere mbadamba atọ dị iche iche -Nhazi akwụkwọ abụọ , anọ na E-Library.
Akwụkwọ nkuzi Ntulugo.
E wetara nkuzi ntulugo ndị a na Mahadum FUTO:
Ogo na Mahadum Naijiria.
Ndi nlekota Mahadum Naijiria but National University Commission (NUC), emebeghị ọkwa gọọmentị nke mahadum Naijiria n'ime afọ iri na anọ.
Agbanyeghị nkea, agunyere FUTO na mahadum nke iri na asato kacha mma na Naijiria ugbu a, dị ka 4icu.org.ng siri gua.
Dolly Unachukwu (a mụrụ n'ọbọchị nke 1 n'ọnwa Nọvemba n'afọ 1969) bụ nwaafọ Naijiria na-eme, na-arụputa, na-ede, ma na-ahazi ihe nkiri.
Otu n'ime ndị ọsụ ụzọ nke Nollywood, o nwetara aha n'obodo dịka Fadake Akin-Thomas n'ihe nkiri ahụ a kpọrọ "Fortunes" .
Dolly Unachukwu bu otu n’ime ndi bidoro Nollywood,ezigbo onye omee, odee, na-arụpụta ihe nkiri.
Unachukwu a mụrụ n’afọ 1969 n’ezinaụlọ dị asaa, bidoro ọrụ ihe nkiri mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na isii.
Nwaafọ Amichi n'Anambra steeti, bụ onye pụtara n'ihe nkiri mbụ nke obere n’afọ 1985 dịka odeakwụkwọ.
Ka oge na-aga n'afọ ahụ, a họpụtara ya i sonye n'ihe nkiri kachasị mma oge ahụ bụ "Mirror in the Sun" dịka Prisca, mana ọ bụ ọrụ ya na "Fortunes" mere ka ọ bụrụ aha a ma n'ezinụlọ n'afọ 1993, ebe ọ zara 'Fadeke', nwanyị di ya ji ezigbo egoa na-emegbu emegbu, ezigbo nwanyị Naijiria.
Unachukwu mere onyeihe nkiri izizi ya n’ime "Deadly Affair" na "Deadly Affair II", ebe ya na ndi aka ochie nollywood dika; Emeka Ike, Sandra Achums na Jide Kosoko pụtakọrọ.
Ịsu asusu atọ Naijiria di iche na ihe nkiri a, Unachukwu pụtara n'ihe nkiri na-ese okwu bụ "Glamour Girls" dị ka onye ahịa mgbere nwanyị, ihe nkiri mechara nweta nrite ihe nkiri Naịjirịa kachasị ewu ewu n'America n'afọ 1995.
N’afọ 1997, Unachukwu meputara akuko ndu ya bu “ "Wildest Dream”" .
N'ihe nkiri ahụ, ọ kọrọ akụkọ nhụjuanya nke alụmdi na nwunye mbụ ya, nke dara n'afo 1994, mere ya nne enweghị di.
Di ya yiri egwu ịgba ya akwụkwọ n'ihi iji ezigbo aha ya eme ihe nkiri ahụ.
Unachukwu lụrụ ọzọ n’afọ 2000 ma n’ọnwa asatọ nke afọ ahụ ọ gawara isonyere di ya n’Ingland, ma ya na ya kewara n’ọdụ ụgbọelu mgbe ọ matara na ọ bụghị eziokwu ka o kwuru.
Ugbu a na Ingland, Unachukwu nwetakwara ihe ọmụma ka ọ nwetara European Computer Driving License n'afọ 2002 ma bido mmụta n'afọ na-eso ya n'ihe nkiri na Mahadum nke East London, na-ewe afọ abụọ i ji lekọta nwa ọhụrụ ya bịara n'afọ 2004.
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Juunu afọ 2008.
Unachukwu mepụtara ma duzie ihe nkiri nke ya nke a kpọrọ "The Empire" n'afọ 2005, mgbe ọ na-ahapụ mahadum.
Unachukwu gara Television College na Jọs dị na Plateau Steeti, ebe ọ natara diplọma na Television Production n'afọ 1988.
O mechara gaa ọmụmụ fọnetik n'afọ 1989 na FRCN Training School Legos ma mechaa gaa Lagos State University n'afọ 1990 were nweta diplọma na Iwu.
Doreen Amata (a mụrụ ụbọchị nke 6 n'ọnwa Mee nke afọ 1988 na Legos, Naijiria ) bụ nwanyị Naijiria na-egwu egwuregwu bụ ọkachamara na ihe omume ị wuli elu .
Amata nọchitere anya Naịjirịa na asọmpi Olimpik nke afọ 2008, rite ọkwa nke iri na isii n'ogo niile.
O ritere ọla edo maka obodo ya nke West Afrịlka na 2007 All-Africa Games .
Amata zọrọ Naịjirịa asọmpi na asọmpi Olimpik nke afọ 2016, mana o rughị agba nke ikpeazụ.
Ọ bụ onye nnọchite anya Naijiria n'emume mmechi ahụ.
Ihe omume ọ kacha mee ọfụm na ya bụ ihe omume nke mita 1.95 Ọutdoors (n'Abuja n'afọ 2008, na Daegu n'afọ 2011) na mita 1.93 (na Banska Bystrica n'afọ 2016).
Ruqayyah Ahmed Rufa'i (amụrụ na 1958) bụ onye ahọpụtara dika Minista nke n'afọ 2010 mgbe deputị onye isi ala kwupụtara ndị ya na ha ga-arụkọ ọrụ.
A mụrụ Rufai na Ringim na , Ọ nwetara digịri na nzere mastas ya na mmụta ihe mere eme na Mahadum , na 1981 na 1987.
PhD na agụmakwụkwọ na Mahadum , US, na 1991.
Ọ bụ Kọmishọna na-ahụ maka Ahụike n'ọchịchị Gen. site na 1993 ruo 1996.
A bulitere ya na prọfesọ na 2003, ma jee ozi dịka kọmishọna nke agụmakwụkwọ na sayensị na teknụzụ na .
O kwuru na ihere na-eme ya mgbe ọ bụla o chere maka ihe gbasara agụmakwụkwọ nke ụmụazi nwanyị na Jigawa Steetị, ọ na-esiri ya ike ịkọwa ihe kpatara ndị gọọmentị steeti ya enweghị ike idebanye aha ụmụazi ahụ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ.
Ọ mere iwu na ụmụaka ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị agahi eji ekwentị mkpanaaka n'ihi ọ na-adọpụ ha uche.
Ihapụ Ọfịs Ndị Ozi.
N’etiti nsogbu ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị na pati na-achị bụ "People Democratic Party" (PDP) ebe ndị gọvanọ asaa, gụnyere nke Jigawa Steeti, na ọtụtụ ndị sinetọ na ndị otu nnochite anya ndị omeiwu kewasịrị New PDP, onye isi ala bụ wepụrụ ndị minista itoolu n’ọkwa ha.
Prof. Ruqayyat so na ndị minista nsogbu ahụ metụtara.
Doris Simeon bụ nwaafọ Naijiria na-eme ihe nkiri n'asụsụ yoroba na bekee.,nke bụkw onye Edo Steeti
Mmalite ndu na mmuta.
A mụrụ Simeon na Legos,nke Naijiria .
N'ịbụ onye a zụlitere ma gụọ akwụkwọ na mpaghara Ojota nke Legos,na Naijiria, Doris bidoro ihe nkiri site n'ihe nkiri nke Nollywood nke afọ 2001 aha ya bụ Oloju Ede.
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na PEFT Institute, ebe ọ gụrụ nchịkwa mmepụta ihe nkiri.
Ọrụ ihe nkiri.
Onye na-eme ihe nkiri n'asụsụ yoroba na bekee, Simeon malitere n'ime emume atọ nke "Papa Ajasco" n'akpa ọchị.
O nwetekwzịrị ọrụ ị pụta n'ihe nkiri Nollywood bụ "Oloju Ede", "Alakada", "Ten Million Naira" na "Modupe Temi" .
Ọ pụtala n'ihe nkiri "Eti Keta" 
N'afọ 2010, ọ pụtara dika enyi nwanyị Da Grin na "Ghetto Dreamz" .
ma "sonye rụpụta Omo Iya kan" .
N'inye ya ọrụ mbụ ya site n'aka onye na-eme ihe nkiri nwụgoro bụ Yomi Ogunmola, Simeon gbagoro n'ọkwa kachasị elu n'ihe nkiri 100 gụnyere Eti Keta, Oloju Ede, Alakada, Ten Million Naira, Abani Kedun, Iseju Marun, Omo Iya Kan, Ghetto Dreams, Silence, Gucci Girls, Omo Pupa, Asiri na Modupe Temi.
[ "see okwu dị mkpa" ]
Onye a mụrụ n'ime ihe nkiri nwere ikike i me dịka onye nchịkọta mmemme nke emume na onye nchịkọ ihe ngosi onyonyo, Doris malitere ọrụ ya n'ime emume atọ nke "Papa Ajasco" n'akpa ọchị.
[ "see okwu dị mkpa" ]
Ndụ onwe.
Ọ lụrụ onye na-arụpụta na onye nduzi ihe nkiri bụ Daniel Ademinokan, onye o zutere n'ogige ebe ha na-eme ihe nkiri.
Ha nwere otu nwa nwoke David.
N'ọnwa Mee nke afọ, ha gbara alụkwaghịm.
Doris Simeon bụ nwaafọ Naijiria na-eme ihe nkiri n'asụsụ yoroba na bekee.,nke bụkw onye Edo Steering
Mmalite ndu na mmuta.
A mụrụ Simeon na Legos,nke Naijiria .
N'ịbụ onye a zụlitere ma gụọ akwụkwọ na mpaghara Ojota nke Legos,na Naijiria, Doris bidoro ihe nkiri site n'ihe nkiri nke Nollywood nke afọ 2001 aha ya bụ Oloju Ede.
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na PEFT Institute, ebe ọ gụrụ nchịkwa mmepụta ihe nkiri.
Ọrụ ihe nkiri.
Onye na-eme ihe nkiri n'asụsụ yoroba na bekee, Simeon malitere n'ime emume atọ nke "Papa Ajasco" n'akpa ọchị.
O nwetekwzịrị ọrụ ị pụta n'ihe nkiri Nollywood bụ "Oloju Ede", "Alakada", "Ten Million Naira" na "Modupe Temi" .
Ọ pụtala n'ihe nkiri "Eti Keta" 
N'afọ 2010, ọ pụtara dika enyi nwanyị Da Grin na "Ghetto Dreamz" .
ma "sonye rụpụta Omo Iya kan" .
N'inye ya ọrụ mbụ ya site n'aka onye na-eme ihe nkiri nwụgoro bụ Yomi Ogunmola, Simeon gbagoro n'ọkwa kachasị elu n'ihe nkiri 100 gụnyere Eti Keta, Oloju Ede, Alakada, Ten Million Naira, Abani Kedun, Iseju Marun, Omo Iya Kan, Ghetto Dreams, Silence, Gucci Girls, Omo Pupa, Asiri na Modupe Temi.
