[ "see okwu dị mkpa" ]
Ndụ onwe.
Ọ lụrụ onye na-arụpụta na onye nduzi ihe nkiri bụ Daniel Ademinokan, onye o zutere n'ogige ebe ha na-eme ihe nkiri.
Ha nwere otu nwa nwoke David.
N'ọnwa Mee nke afọ, ha gbara alụkwaghịm.
Ọkammụta Ikechukwu Nosike Simplicius Dozie (Amụrụ na ubochi atọ na ọnwa nke atọ , afọ 1966) bụ ọkammụta nke Microbiology ( Medical Microbiology &amp; Parasitology, onye ọkammụta n'ihe gbasara ahụike ọha na eze, onye nkuzi na okachamara n'ihe gbasara ahụike obodo na-eje ozi ugbua na Nganaba Ahụike Ọha, Mahadum Federal nke Teknuzu Owerri, Naijiria.
Ọ bụ onye otu American Society of Tropical Medicine &amp;amp; Hygiene (ASTMH).
Dozie bụ onye ndụmọdụ n’ Organizationtù Ahụ Ike Worldwa ; Usoro WHO nke Afrika maka Onchocerciasis.
Ọ bụ Nhazi, Njikọ na Ọganihu, Federal University of Technology Owerri.
Amụrụ Professor Dozie n’Umuokisi Amuzi, ochịchị obodo Ahiazu Mbaise nke Imo Steeti, Naịjirịa.
O nwetere akwụkwọ nzere nke mbụ nke ụlọ akwụkwọ si na Agbani Road Primary School, Enugu, Enugu Steeti .
Ọ gara Mbaise Secondary School, Aboh-Mbaise, Imo State wee nweta asambodo ụlọ akwụkwọ West Africa na Division One n'afọ 1980.
Dozie nzere BSc jikọtara nganaba ọgụgụ Microbiology / Biochemistry na nzere nke abụọ Mahadum na ngalaba ọgụgụ Medical Microbiology si Mahadum Nigeria, Nsukka na okachamara mahadum na ahụike ọha na eze na ụmụ ahụhụ anaghị ahuanya na Mahadum nke Jos.
Ọchịchọ ya inwekwu nkà na nlekota agụmakwụkwọ dị elu mere ka ogaa ebe omụmụ Galili International Management Institute (GIMI) Israel n'afọ 2010 na 2014.
Ọrụ ọkachamara.
Dozie malitere ọrụ nkuzi ya n'afọ 1992 dị ka onye enyemaka onye nkuzi na Mahadum Imo State Owerri, Naijiria ebe a buliri ya n'ọkwa ọkammụta n'afọ 2005.
O tinyere aka dika onye ọkammụta nleta Mahadum Federal University of Technology Owerri, Naijiria site n'afọ 2007 rue n'afọ 2010 mgbe ono na ezumike wezuga onwe na Mahadum Imo State Owerri .
Ọ bụ onye isi , mbadamba ebe nkuzi ahụike ọha na eze ; Onye isi , Nukwu Mbadamba ebe nkuzi ahụike ọha na eze teknuzu, Otu onye n'ime ndị no na isi ochichi Kansul nke iri na otu nke Mahadum Federal University of Technology Owerri .
Olu Dozie na ọha obodo gụnyere l onye njikwa oge na Panel nke abụọ nke Nkwalite Ọkwa Nzụkọ (HLM) nke GlobalPower Women Network Africa (GPWNA) nke goomenti Naijiria na African Union na na nkwado nke UNAID haziri na isi obodo Naijiria bu Abuja site na ubochi iri asaa rue na ubochi iri abụọ na asatọ nke ọnwa isii n'afọ 2013; Onye nhazi, Usoro ntụnye aka maka ndị nnọchi anya-ndị ahọpụtara site n’aka Mịnịstrị nke okwu Ofesi na Naịjirịanke ọnwa iri na abụọ site na ubochi itolu rue na ubochi iri na ato , n'afọ 2013; Onye nyocha ,n'afọ 2014 Commonwealth Scholarship and Fellowship Plan (CSFP) Nhọrọ Ajụjụ, Federal Ministry of Education Federal Scholarship Board, Nanet Suites Abuja, Ubochi nke mbụ rue na nke ise ọnwa iri na abụọ n'afọ 2014 burukwazia Otu Imo State Transition Technical Committee (Eprel, 2019).
Dozie bu onye otu otutu otu ọgụ akwụkwo na ndi okacha-amara.
Ndị a gụnyere American Society of Tropical Medicine &amp; Hygiene (ASTMH); Otu International AIDS Society (IAS); Lọ Ọrụ Zoological nke Nigeria "(Life Member)" (ZSN); Societytù Na-ahụ Maka Microbiology nke Nigeria (NSM); Parasitology na Ahụike Ọha na Ọha nke Nigeria (PPSN); Biotechnology Society nke Nigeria (BSN); Council for Intellectual Cooperation of Nigeria (COFICON); Kansụl nke Ndị Ọkammụta Ochịchị nke Nigeria (CODES); Ike mmeghari na Alternative Energy Society of Nigeria (RAESON).
A họpụtara ya, onye otu Council Council, Parasitology and Public Health Society of Nigeria (PPSN) dika onye South East Zonal Coordinator nke (2011- 2016).
Nnyocha.
N'oge gara aga, omere nnyocha ihe gbasa onchocerciasis (ìsì osimiri), lymphatic filariasis, Guinea worm (dracunculiasis).
Ugbu nnyocha ndị na amasi ya bu ndị gbasara ecology, Epidemiology, socioeconomic akụkụ na ịchịkwa ọrịa na nke ebe okpomọkụ nhọpụta akpan akpan, ụkwara nta, HIV / AIDS, ịba, cryptosporidiosis, akara filariasis, onchocerciasis (Osimiri isi), schistosomiasis, dracunculiasis (Guinea worm), loiasis wediri gaba ; Ọrịa na-ebute site na mmekọahụ (STI) na nsogbu ahụike ọmụmụ; Idebe gburugburu ebe obibi, ịdị ọcha na njikwa ịrịa ọrịa ; Chọgharị iji usoro ọgwụgwọ ahịhịa dị iche iche dị ka otito maka ọgwụ mgbochi ịba.
O tinyela aka na mbọ sayensi mba na mba na ụfọdụ gụnyere nke Council for the Development of Social Science Research na Africa (CODESRIA) site na (35 / T96) Grant Grant na: "Ọnọdụ Mmekọrịta ọha na eze na akụ na ụba nke Onchocercal dermatitis na Imo River basin nke South East Nigeria;"  ; UNDP / WORLD BANK / WHO Mmemme Pụrụ Iche Maka Nnyocha na Ọzụzụ na Ọrịa Tropical, (TDR) (Nke 970533) Onyinye Nchọpụta Na: "Onchocerciasis na Mmekọrịta Socioeconomic ya na Osimiri Imo, South East Nigeria;" TDR Geneva Director's Initiative Fund (DIF ID: 931087) na: "Lymphatic filariasis na Onchocerciasis na Rainforest nke Nigeria: Mmetụta Ọha nke Mmekọ Mmekọahụ n'etiti Nwanyị dika onye na-enyocha mkpụrụ ego" ; National Onchocerciasis Control Programme (NOCP) Nigeria, Consultant on Rapid Epidemiological Mapping of Onchocerciasis (REMO) in Nigeria (Team Leader to Taraba, Katsina &amp; Akwa-Ibom States during REMO refinement exercise in Nigeria (November-December, 2000); and World Health.
Organizationtù / Mmemme Afrịka maka Onchocerciasis Control (WHO / APOC), Onye Ndụmọdụ Nwa Oge na Rapid Epidemiological Mapping of Onchocerciasis (REMO) na South Sudan (February 28-March 28, 2003).
Onu na Ude.
Ọkammụta Dozie nwetere ọtụtụ nsọpụrụ na onyinye.
Ha gụnyere :
Ruth Modupe Lawanson (amụrụ Septemba 27, 1963 na Naijiria) bụ onye isi koochi otu egwuregwu volleybọl nke Mahadum .
Ọ gbara maka Fresno State na ndị otu egwurewgu mba , nweta otu ọla nchara na .
Ọrụ volleybọl.
Kọleji.
Lawanson gbaara otu egwuregwu nke Fresno State, akpọọrọ ya aha MVP n'afo 1982, 1983,na 1984.
N'afo 1984, ọ duru ndị Bulldogs gaa ebe nke ise na asọmpi NCAA, akpọrọ ya aha NorPac onye na-agba bọl kacha mma.
A kpọkwara ya 1984-85 nwaanyị ọgba volleybọl kacha mma na Fresno state maka afọ 1984 na '85.
Lawanson bụ nwaanyị egwuregwu mbụ mgbe ọ ka nọ na-ụlo akwukwo.. Ọ sonye na-otu ndị egwurewgu Fresno state na asopụrụ.
Mba.
Lawanson gbaara ndị otu mba U.S afọ anọ.
O meriri nrite ọla nchara na asọmpi mba ụwa nke 1990, na 1991, na olimpik nke1992.
Ọkachamara.
Lawanson gbara nnụkwu klọb Volleybọl nke na site na 1987 ruo 1989.
A kpọrọ ya aha MVP nke njikọ volleybọl ahụ na 1988.
O mechara gbaa na Italy ma na France site na 1992 ruo 1995.
Ọrụ koochi.
Lawanson rụrụ ọrụ dika koochi na-enyere aka na Mahadum maka afọ anọ, ma na Fresno Steetị maka afọ isii, ma na-ụlọ mmuta ndị maka afọ abụọ ma na Mahadum Nevada maka otu afọ.
Ọ bubụ onye isi koochi na maka afọ egwurewgu atọ ebe o kere ọtụtụ ndeko dị iche ịche.
Mechara bụrụ onye isi koochi ndi Nevada na 2011.
N’ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2014, ọ hapụrụ ọkwa ahụ.
Ndụ ya n'ime.
A mụrụ Lawanson na Septemba 27, 1963, na , ọ dị sentimita 5’8 n’ogologo.
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na "Fresno State" nweta digiri na nchịkwa azụmahịa na 1987.
Ọ rụọla ọrụ dịka onye otu ndị isi oche .
Lawanson lụrụ Shawn Kenan na 2002.
Mana ha mere nkewa na 2015.
Nwanne ya bụ , gbakwara egwuregwu volleybọl nke mba U.S.
Nneka Isaac Moses bụ onye mgbasa ozi Naịjirịa, onye na-emepụta ejiji.
Ọ bụkwa onye na-akwado ihe gbasara omenala nke mere oji bụrụ sokwa onyeisi nchịkwa nke ngosi ọdịnala Africa a'na akpọ, Goge Africa .
Ndụ mbido.
Nneka gara mahadum nke Lagos site na afọ 1987 ruo n'afọ 1990 ebe ọ nwetara akara mmụta bachelor na asụsụ Bekee na akwụkwọ nke kpọrọ "English and Literature" na bekee.
Ọ bidoro ma tọọ ntọala Akenn.
G Limited, ụlọ ejiji na Surulere, Lagos ebe ọ na-azụ ahịa uwe maka ndị na-eme ihe nkiri, mkpọsa ahia na onyonyo na ndị chọrọ uwe maka ihe ma ọbụ oge pụrụ iche.
Goge Africa.
Nneka hibere Goge Africa na afọ1999, ya na di ya Isaac, na afọ atọ ka ha lụ di na nwunye .
Emere mmemme nke izizi Goge Africa n’abalị mbụ nke ọnwa Ọktoba, ka ọ dabara n’ụbọchị nnwere onwe Naịjirịa.
Ihe karịrị nde mmadụ iri anọ na-ele ya na ụzọ iri na ise eji agbasa ozi na nyonyo.
Ndị otu Goge Africa agala gburugburu ihe karịrị mba iri atọ na abụọ n'Africa.
Ndụ onwe.
Nneka lụrụ Isaac n’afọ 1996.
N'ajụjụ ọnụ o nyere "Naij.com" ọ kọwara n'oge mbụ ha zutere na ọ mara ya ụra mgbe ọ nwara isutu ya ọnụ ka ha na eme ihe ngosi nke ihe nkiri.
Ọ mechara bia na-arịọ ka ya na ya kpakọrịta ma rịọ ya mgbaghara.
Ha na abụọ site n'oge ahụ wee ghọọ enyi.
Ọ mụrụ nwa ya nwoke Kamamra ka afọ iri na atọ gachasi ka alụchara di.
Ọ nweta nmeri dị ka Onye Ntorobịa Maka Udo na afọ 2011.
Ruth Ogbeifo (amụrụ 18 Eprel 1972) bụ onye Naịjirịa ejiri egwuregwu ibu arọ mara .
Na nke afọ 1999 na katigory 75kg, o meriri ọla nchara na , , na "overall".
O sonyere na-izọọ mpị nke n’egwuregwu Olimpik n'afọ wee rite nrite ọla ọcha.
Ruth Lade Okediji (amụrụ n'afọ 1963) bụ Prọfesọ mmuta Iwu na Mahadum ọkaiwu nke ma bụrụ onye nduzi na .
Prọfesọ Okediji bụ ọkachamara ama ama n’ụwa niile ma bụrụkwa ọkà mmụta n’ihe gbasara ọgụgụ isi, azụmahịa na mmepe.
N’afọ 2017 ka ahọpụtara ya dika onye otu .
Mmụta.
Okediji nwetara  LL.M.
na S.J.D.
site na ụlọ akwụkwọ ọkaiwu nke Harvard.
Tupu mgbe ahụ, ọ nwetara LL.B.
site na Mahadum .
Ọrụ.
Okediji rụrụ ọrụ nkuzi ogologo oge tupu ya bịa na Harvard Law na 2017.
Site na 2003 ruo 2017, ọ kuziri ihe na Mahadum ọkaiwu nke ebe ọ bụ William L. Prosser Prọfesọ mmuta iwu.
Ahọpụtara ya dịka Prọfesọ nke McKnight.
Tupu ọ bịa Minnesota, ọ bụbụ Edith Gaylord Prọfesọ mmuta iwu na Mahadum okaiwu nke .
Ọ na gara ọtụtụ ndi Mahadum ọkaiwu ọrụ dika Mahadum , Mahadum Haifa, Mahadum , Mahadum Tilburg.
Saidat Adegoke (amụrụ 24 Septemba 1985 na , ) bu onye n’agba bọọlụ nke ala Naijiria.
Ọrụ.
Adegoke n'afọ 2007 gbaara ndi Remo Queens bọọlụ na Nigeria, na Italian Serie A ọ gbaara ACF Trento.
Mgbe ọ gbachara ACF Trento ebe o nyelu goolu atọ, ya gaa ACF Milan na 2008.
Na Milan, o nyelu goolu iri na itoolu mecha banye na .
Mba.
Kemgbe afọ 2010 ka ọ nọ n'otu ndị ụmụnwaanyị n'agbaara Naịjirịa bọl.
Anthonia Kehinde Fatunsin bụ onye Naịjirịa na-eme ihe banyere ihe ngwupụta ochie.
A na-ahụta ya dịka nwanyị mbụ na-amụ banyere ihe mgbe ochie na Naịjirịa, bụrụkwa nwanyị mbụ chịrị Naịjirịa National Museum, Ibadan .
Ọrụ ya bụ nke gbadoro ukwu karịa n'ụdị akpụmakpụ yoruba, ọkachasị ndị obodo Owo .
Òmị̀mị̀ ihe ochie.
N’afọ 1981, Fatunsin bidoro ngwupụta n'ala Igbo’laja na nke Ijebu-Owo dị n’ime obodo Owo ịmata ihe a maara dịka Owo terracotta.
Babasehinde Ademuleya si Mahadum Obafemi Awolowo kwuru na nyocha ya bụ nke ugboro abụọ a na-eme ngwupụta na obodo ahụ ka Ekpo Eyo bịachara na 1976.
Otú ọ dị, a na-ahụ Fatunsin ịbụ onye mbụ na-enye nkọwa zuru ezu banyere njirimara nke ihe ọkpụkpụ.
Ọrụ Museolọgikal.
Fatunshin edegola banyere oru ndi mgbe ochie na ulo ihe mgbe ochie nke Naijiria na otu o si metuta ihe nketa omenala n’ala a.
A nabatala ya dị ka onye ọsụ ụzọ nke echiche na nkọwa ihe mgbe ochie na Africa.
Mayowa Nicholas nwaafọ Naịjirịa amụrụ na abalị iri abụo na abụo n'ime ọnwa Mee n'afọ 1998, bụ onye n'eji ejiji nlereanya.
Ọ bụ onye ejiji nlereanya Naịjirịa mbụ nke chawapụtara na ngósìpụ̀tà Dolce &amp;Gabbana, Saint Laurent, na Calvin Klein .
Ọrụ.
Mayowa Nicholas bụ onye mmeri ikpeazụ na asọmpi Elite Model Look 2014 (ya na onye nlereanya ejiji nke Italian bụ Greta Varlese ).
Na oge mbụ ya, na 2015, ọ pụtara na ihe ngosi maka Balmain, Calvin Klein, Kenzo, Hermes, na Acne Studios gunyere ndị ọzọ.
N'oge na-adịbeghị anya, ya na ndị na-emepụta ọkwa dị elu dịka Prada, Miu Miu, Versace, Chanel, Michael Kors na Oscar de la Renta rụkọrọ ọrụ .
O tinyekwara aka na ngósìpụ̀tà Dolce &amp;Gabbana .
O kwesiri ka ọ́ gosipụta ejije nlereanya ya nke mbu na 2017 Victoria's Secret Fashion Show, mana Ụbọchị ole na ole tupu ihe ngosi a, anabataghi visa ya iga China, ya na otutu ndị ejiji nlereanya Russia na Ukraine, nke a gbochiri ya ije ihe ngosi a. O mere ihe ngosi nlereanya mbụ ya na 2018 Victoria's Secret Fashion Show.
Nicholas nọ ugbu a dịka otu n'ime ndị ejiji nlereanya mmadụ iri ise nọ n'ọkwa dị elu nke Models.com.
Rasheedat Ajibade onye amụrụ na abalị asatọ n'ime ọnwa Disemba n'afo1999 bụ nwaafọ Naịjirịa maara egwuregwu bọọlụ na- agbara Avaldsnes IL bọọlụ na Toppserien na otu Nigeria women's national football team .
Ajibade nọchitere anya Nigeria na asọmpi oyi ebiri, tupu ịgba asọmpi mbụ ya maka ndị otu egwuregwu na 2018 WAFU Cup na Côte d'Ivoire.
Na 2017, a họ́pụ̀tàrà ya dịka otu n'ime mmadụ iri nke ndị egwuregwu bọọlụ na-eto eto kachasị mma na mpaghara Africa site na "Goal.com" .
Ọrụ.
Ajibade anọchitela anya Naịjirịa n'ogo afọ iri na asaa, ndị na- erubeghi afọ iri abụo nakwa ndị otu egwu bọọlụ sinịọ Ọ nọọrọ-ndị òtù bọọlụ FC Robo n'egwu kemgbe oge Nigeria Women Premier League 2013 .
Na 2014, edepụtara ya dị ka otu n'ime ndị N'eto eto ụ́kwụ́ na aghọ nko na ngalaba egwuregwu a. N'ọ́nwa Septemba 2018, o meriri n'asọmpi egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụnwaanyị Naịjirịa nke ugboro abụọ áchàghị̀ acha.
Ọrụ klọb.
N'ime oge egwuregwu 2015 Nigeria Women Premier League izu nke abụọ, e depụtara aha Ajibade dịka ndị nlereanya nke izu ahụ, nke "Soccerladuma South Africa chịkọbara", n'agbanyeghị na Confluence Queens meriri ha n'oge agba egwuregwu a. N'oge 2017 Nigeria Women Premier League, emere Ajibade dịka kaptin ndị otu FC Robo .
Ajibade bụ otu n’ime ndị nyere akara ya na mmeri Robos n’ụlọ ha megide ndị Ibom Angels n’oge a. Na 13 Julaị 2017, mgbe ndị ọbịa bịara bụ Rivers Angels merichara ndị òtù ya, Ajibade bụ onye "SuperSport" hotara iji mee ka ndị otu ya nwee ike iru "Super 4", n'ihi ọdịiche dị na ákàrà na ọnụ ọgụgụ egwuregwu ole na ole fọdụrụ.
Ajibade meriri ḿbípụ̀tá mbụ nke Nigeria National Freestyle Championship, nke bụ asọmpi iji kwalite onyinye amara ònyé n'egwu bọọlụ .
Na 2017, agbanyeghị na Robo esoghị na otu egwuregwu ndị mechara, Ajibade bụ onye bọọlụ elegaara anya nke oge a ka o nyechara goolu asatọ iji zọpụta ndị otu ya.
Na Mee 2018, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye kacha mma n'egwu ball na 2017 Nigeria Women Premier League na Nigeria Pitch Awards .
Na Disemba 2018, a kọrọ na Ajibade bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta afọ abụọ na akụkụ Norwegian, Avaldsnes IL, otu egwuregwu na -agba na Toppserien .
Ọrụ mba ụwa.
N'asọmpi ndị mmeri n'Afrịka, ka ha na-aga asọmpi iko mba ụwa FIFA FIFA U-17 nke afọ 2014, Ajibade nwetara ọkpụ goolu abụọ maka mmeri mbụ Naịjirịa meriri Namibia.
ka asọmpi malitere, Ajibade nyere goolu mmeri na egwuregwu mbụ Naịjirịa na China .
N’egwuregwu bọọlụ ikpeazụ ha na Mexico, Ajibade nyere goolu na Naịjirịa, mmeri ọkpụ goolu abụọ iji kwalite ndọrọ ndọrọ ịbụ onye mmeri agba nke anọ ha na ndị Spen
A kpọrọ Ajibade na Coach Bala Nikiyu 21-man squad maka 2016 FIFA U-17 Women World Cup, ma yiri jeesi nọmba 10.
Na asọmpi a, Ajibade bụ kaptin ndị Naịjirịa, wee gwa "FIFA.com" na mkpebi nke otu a bụ ime nke ọma karịa agba nke anọ na nke ikpeazụ ha mechara n'afọ 2014.
Ajibade sokwa na ndị egwuregwu Naịjirịa na 2016 FIFA U-20 Women's World Cup, akpọrọ ya onye nwe-egwu n'otu egwuregwu nke abụọ ha na Canada .
N'egwuregwu agba mbụ emere iji chọpụta onye nnọchi anya Afrịka na 2018 FIFA U-20 Women's World Cup, Ajibade nwetara ọkpụ goolu abụọ n'asọmpi mbụ ha gbara na Tanzania, nke nyere Naịjirịa ohere ọkpụ goolu atọ tupu agbaa bọọlụ na Dar e Sallam.
Na nlọghachite ịgbagharị egwuregwu, nke emere na Ọktoba 2017, Ajibade nyere goolu abụọ nke Naịjirịa ji ọkpụ goolu isii merie ndị be ha.
Na 27 Jenụwarị 2018, Ajibade nyere goolu abụọ na mmeri isii nke Nigeria meriri South Africa, mmeri ahụ gosipụtara ntozu Nigeria maka 2018 FIFA U-20 Women World Cup na France.
Na February 2018, Ajibade n'akụkụ Joy Jegede, Osarenoma Igbinovia na ndị egwuregwu iri na asatọ ndị ọzọ họpụtara site n'aka onye isi nchịkwa, Thomas Dennerby ka ọ nọchite anya Nigeria na mbipụta mmalite nke WAFU Cup na Côte d'Ivoire.
N'egwuregwu bọọlụ nke abụọ n'asọmpi mpaghara ahụ, Ajibade gbaturu ọkpụ atọ butere Naịjirịa na ọkara-ikpeazụ ya na-agba egwuregwu mbụ.
Ajibade so na otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụnwaanyị mba 2018 Afrịcan Nations Championship Nigeria women's national football team ebe o meriri asọmpi a tinyere ndị otu ahụ.
Makida Moka bụ nwaafọ Naịjirịa n'eme ihe nkiri na ejiji nlereanya amụrụ na Egypt.
Ọ gosipụtara onwe ya dị ka Monye na 2014 na sirisi TV a kpọrò Gidi up,ma gosipụta akparamagwa onye e dinara n'ike na ihe nkiri ejije Emem Isong "nke" 2015 "nke bụ code of Silence" .
Dị ka onye nlereanya ọ bụ onye nnọchi anya ụlọ ọrụ Frankie and Co.
Mmalite ndụ na ọrụ.
À mụrụ Moka na Cairo, Egypt site na nne onye Naijiria na nna bụ agbụrụ Nigeria si Jamaica .
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Lagos, wee debanye aha na Mahadum Benin .
Ọ nwere ọchịchọ ịbụ ọkà mmụta ala, na-arụ ọrụ n'otu ụlọ ọrụ mmanụ.
Agbanyeghị na ọ toghị ogologo, ọ dabara na ịme ngosi nlereanya mma mgbe ọ meriri asọmpi "Face of Sleek Nigeria" nke emere na 2009.
Ó nwetara nkwado nlebara anya na ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi Afrika maka ejiji ya.
Dị ka ihe nlereanya ọ bụ a onye nnọchiteanya nke ụlọ ọrụ Frankie na Co. 
Ọrụ nkiri.
Na 2015,Moka gosipụtara akparamagwa onye ndị otu dinara n'ike na "Code of Silence",nke ọ bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ime obodo na ndị enyemaka ya dinara ya.
ọ́ hụrụ ígósìpụ̀tà èbùmnúchè Ihe nkiri a dịka ihe siri ike nke mere ya ịbụ anya mmiri n'anaya na nkeji ọbụla.
Na 2016, nchawapụta ọrụ Moka na "Taste of Love", telenova Afrịka a na-egosi kwa izu na Africa Magic, Silverbird Television na Africa Independent Television wetere ya ńríté dịka nwanyị kachasi mma ígósìpụ̀tà ákpárámàgwà èbùmnúchè na 2016 Nigerian Broadcasters Merit Awards.
Na 2017, Moka gosipụtara dị ka "Melanie" sirisi n'egosiputa mpụ site na ihe nkiri ikpa -ọchị nke akpọrọ "Inspector K" ; akparamagwa ya na Siris a bụ onye na-eto eto nke ghọrọ onye na-enye mgbasa ozi ụgha na ịntanetị n'etiti igbu ọchụ.
Agbanyeghị, ozi nnabata si n'aka onye na - ede blọgụ mere ka ọtụtụ ndị na - ege ntị na ntanetị na - enweta nkasi obi ya.
Usoro ntanetị natara agwakọta na nyocha na-adịghị mma, "Pulse na-" akpọ ya "unfunny", " ọ gwụrụ ike nkiri na "ndakpọ olileanya".
Ọ katọkwara ime ihe, mmepụta, mkparịta ụka na ịkpa nkata.
O nwetara ogo pacenti iri ise site na "Ezi Akụkọ Nollywood" , ndị kwetara na mgbalị sinimatografi na ụda ya.
"Culture Custodian" kpọrọ ya nyochaa "Inspektọ K na-akwụ ụgwọ maka mgbasa ozi mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya Mana harịpụ ya na "Xplore Nollywood na-" akọwa ngalaba ikpeazụ dịka ihe ijuanya Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka onye Ninja India na ihe nkiri ịhụnanya karịrị nke mmadụ, Banana Island Ghost.
Emesiri gosipụta na agwa ya nwere nsogbu site na njirimara ya na odidi ya.
Juliet Itoya onye amụrụ n'abalị̀ iri na asaa n'ime ọnwa asatọ n'afọ 1986, bụ nwaafọ Naijiria amụrụ na Spanish na-eme egwuregwu ma bụrụ ọkachamara Long Jump O meriri nrite ọla edo na 2014 Ibero-American Championship .
Ogo kacha amasị ya na ihe omume ahụ bụ mita 6.79 n’èzí (+ 1.4 m/s, Salamanca 2016) na 6.47 mita n'ime (Madrid 2016).
Asọmpi mba ụwa.
Nrụtụaka1.RFEA Profile
2.￼￼Juliet Itoya at World Athletics
Eucharia Anunobi, (onye a mụrụ ụbọchị iri abụọ na ise na ọnwa nke May n'afọ 1965) bụ onye Nigeria, na-eme ihe nkiri, na emeputa ihe nkirm, na bụrụ kwa onye ukọ chụkwụ ụka agbara ọhụrụ akpọrọ pastọ na olu bekee.
A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri "Abuja Connection.
" "A hoputara ya na 2020 Africa Magic Viewers' Choice Awards maka Onye ihe nkiri nwanyi kacha mma kwado na ihe nkiri ma ọ bụ ihe nkiri Igwe onyonyo na ga n'ihu na usoro nke bekee kpọrọ Best Supporting Actress in a Movie or TV Series.
"
Mmalite ndụ na ọrụ.
A mụrụ Eucharia na Owerri, Imo Steeti, n'ebe bi wee gụchaa ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị na nke sekọndrị tupu ọ gawa Institute of Management Technology, Enugu ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ nke diplọma National na Mass Communication.
Ọ nwekwara nzere bachelọ nke nka mgbe ọ mụsịrị Asụsụ Bekee na Mahadum nke Nigeria, Nsukka .
Eucharia bịara pụta ìhè dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri maka ọrụ ya na usoro ihe nkiri "Glamor Girls" na afọ 1994.
Ọ gaa n'ihu na ime ihe nkiri dị iche iche karịa iri itoolu gụnyere "Abuja Connection" na "Letters to a Stranger" .
Ọ na-eje ozi ugbu a dịka onye nkwusa ozioma n'otu ụka dị na Egbeda, Lagos Steeti .
Otu nwa nwoke Eucharia mụtara, Raymond, onye ọ kọwara dị ka ezigbo enyi ya nwuru n'ihi nsogbu sitere na ọrịa sickle cell anemia na ọnwa August, n'ụbọchị iri abụọ na abụọ na afọ 2017.
Ọ dị afọ 15 wee la n'mụọ.
Titilayo Fatima Azeez onye amụru n'abalị̀ iri atọ na otu n'ime ọnwa Disemba afọ 1992, bụ onye egwuregwu badminton nke Nigeria .
N’afọ 2010, ó sonyere asọmpi ogo ndị ntorobịa Summer, na Singapore .
N’afọ 2011, o ritere ọla nchara ọkpụkpụ abụọ ụmụ nwanyị na All-Africa Games na Maputo, Mozambique.
Mmezu.
Egwuregwu niile n'Afrika.

BWF Nsogbu / Usoro.
"Women's singles"
Salamat Ahuoiza Aliu bụ dọkịta na-arụ ọrụ ka Sọjọn na Naịjirịa.
Mmalite ndu na mmuta.
Amụrụ Salmat Ahuoiza Aliu na n'afọ 1980, mana ọ bụ onye , .
Ọ guru akwụkwọ na ụlọ ọgwụ Mahadum nweta dịgịrị mbụ ya.
Azụrụ ya azụ dika onye na Mahadum n'aka Prof. BB Shehu.
Ọrụ ahụike.
Aliu bụ nwanyị mbụ dọkịta na-arụ dika sọjọn na West Afrika.
Ọ bụkwa nwaafọ nwanyị izizi azụrụ azụ ka sọjọn na Nigeria.
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ n'ụlọ ọgwụ nke Mahadum Illorin.
Onyinye na nweta.
A kacha mara ya maka ọrụ ya pụrụ iche dịka dibia bekee na omume ịgba ụmụ nwanyị ume isonye na ọmụmụ ọgwụ.
Aha Aliu sonyere na mmadụ 100 kachasị nke afọ site n'aka otu ndị ọha na-eze nke Arewa na 2016.
Ndụ ya n'ime.
Aliu lụrụ di ma mụọ ụmụ.
Florence Kikelomo Ajayi bụ onye na - agbachitere Naịjirịa eguregwu bọọlụ, na-agbakwa bọọlụ ugbu a na Dínamo Guadalajara na ngalaba nke abụọ nke Spanish.
Ọrụ.
Ajayi bidoro ọrụ ya na maka Koko Queens, Rivers Angels, Jagede Babes na Pelican Stars.
Mgbe ọ gbachara 1999 World Cup ọ bịanyere aka na 1.FFC Niederkirchen na German Bundesliga, ebe ọ nọrọ oge abụọ.
Mgbe ọ laghachiri Naịjirịa, ọ gbara bọọlụ maka ndị uwe ojii na Bayelsa Queen ruo n’afọ 2008 mgbe ọ kwagara na Tianjin Teda nke na otu ndị Super League .
Na 2010, ọ laghachiri na European leagues mgbe otu afọ gachara, nọrọkwa na-egwuri egwu na-aga nke ọma maka Krka Novo Mesto na Slovenia, Pogoń Szczecin na Poland na Dínamo Guadalajara na ọkwa nke Spanish abụọ.
International.
Dika otu onye n'ime ndi , onwetara mmeri ise na African Championship site n’agbata 1998 na 2006, ma sorokwa na 1999 na 2003 World Cups na 2000 na 2008 .
Ọ jere ozi dị ka onyeisi ndị otu egwuregwu umunwanyị nke Nigeria .
Salamatu Hussaini Suleiman bụ onye ọkaiwu nke na-eje ozi ugbu a dị ka Kọmishọna n'ihe gbasara ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị, Udo na Nchekwa.
Tupu okwa a, a họpụtara ya dịka Mịnịsta na-ahụ maka na Disemba 2008.
Ọ hapụrụ ọfis na Machị 2010 mgbe Onye isi ala gbanwere ụlọ ọrụ ya.
Mmalite ndụ.
A mụrụ Salamatu Hussaini Suleiman na , na-obodo na-azụ azu na Steeti .
Nna ya bụ onye ọka-ikpe na-ụlọ ikpe mpaghara, nne ya si n'ezinụlọ ọchịchị ama ama bụ .
A zụlitere ya na na .
Na 1972, o banyere ụlọ akwụkwọ nke .
Ọ gaara mahadum , Zaria ebe ọ nwetara nzere na iwu.
O mechara gaa Mahadum maka ebe o nwetara nzere mastas na mmuta iwu.
Ọrụ mbụ ya dị ka onye ọkaiwu na Mịnịstrị na-ahụ maka ikpe na steeti nke ochie.
O mechara rụọ ọrụ afọ asaa na Continental Merchant Bank, Lagos, ma rụọ ọrụ obere oge na NAL Merchant Bank tupu ọ gaa na Aluminium Smelter Companị, ebe ọ bụ odeakwụkwọ ụlọ ọrụ / onye na-enye ndụmọdụ iwu.
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Securities &amp; Exchange Commission tupu a họpụta ya Minista na Naijiria.
Mịnịsta na-ahụ maka ihe gbasara ụmụ nwanyị.
Onye isi ala họpụtara Suleiman ka ọ bụrụ Mịnịsta na-ahụ maka ihe metụtara ụmụ nwanyị na 17 Disemba 2008.
Na Septemba afọ 2009, Suleiman mere mkpesa na gọọmentị ekweghi ka ụmụnwaanyị sonye na ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị Naịjirịa.
O kwuru na ime ihe ike na nwoke ịkpa-ike juru ebe niile na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, yana enweghị ego, mere ụmụ nwanyị ole na ole nwere ike ịzọ ọchịchị.
Na nzukọ a na-enwe na October 2009 nke na Mịnịstrị ihe gbasara ụmụ nwaanyị haziri, Suleiman kwuru na ebumnuche ya bụ ije ozi dị ka ụgbọ-ala mba maka ọnọdụ na ọganihu na ahụike nke ụmụ nwanyị Naijiria, na iji hụ na nchekwa na ịzụlite nke ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụaka bara uru.
Ọ gwara ndị steetị gọọmentị ka ha nye ụmụ nwanyị ohere na ihe ịzọ ọchịchị na nhọpụta, opekata mpe 30%.
Na onwa disamba, ọ mere mkpesa na gọọmentị ekwebeghi ka emepụta nkwekọrịta nke (CEDAW)
Hụ kwa.
Ọ bụkwa Họnọrable Minista nke steetị II n'ahu maka okwu mba ụwa na Naijiria, 2010 ruo 2011.
Salawa Abeni Alidu (onye amuru na 5 Mee 1961) bu onye Naijiria na-eti egwu.
Nwaanyị si Ijebu Waterside, na , ọ malitere ọrụ aka ya na mgbe ọ wepụtara recọrd mbụ ya nke akpọrọ, "Late General Murtala Ramat Mohammed", na 1976, na Leader Records.
Nke a bụ record mbụ nke nwanyị mere na-asusu Yoruba na-ere ihe karịrị otu nde na Naijiria.
Abeni gara n'ihu na-emepụta ọrụ na Leader Records ruo 1986, mgbe ọ hapụ mmekọrịta ya na onye nwe ahụ bụ Lateef Adepoju.
Ọ lụrụ ma sonye na ụlọ egwu ya ruo 1994. 
 , Alaafin kpọọrọ ya aha: "Queen of Waka Music" na 1992.
Waka bụ ụdịri egwu ọdịnala ndị Alakụba, nke ọdịnala .
mere ka ọ na-ewu ewu; ọ bụ ụdị egwu kara nka karịa na .
Esemokwu.
Mgbe ọ na-agwa nke Naiiria, Abeni kere ọgbaghara mgbe ọ dụrụ ndị egwu ibe ya ọdụ ka ha "zere mmekọ nwoke na nwoke", n'ihi na-odi ka addictionụ nke ọgwụ ike.
Ndị na-eme ihe nkiri kpọrọ ya okwu "ngosipụta nke amaghị ihe", Agbanyeghị, onye nlere anya na Nigeria bụ gosipụtara okwu ya ọzọ a na vidiyo YouTube ya Olajumoke Sauce 7: Trends and Acceptance nke Febụwarị 2018.
N’iwu nke gbadoro ụkwụ na ọchịchị ndị , mmekọ nwoke na nwoke ka bụ mpụ, onye ejidere ga aga ntaramahụhụ kachasị sitere na mkpọrọ afọ iri anọ ruo ọnwụ.
Sekinat Adesanya Akinpelu (amụrụ na 25 Julaị 1987) bụ nwaafọ Naijirịa nke n'gbara ha ọsọ n’egwuregwu .
Oge n'ọsọ egwuregwu kachasị mma ya bụ 52.48sekọnd, nke o nwetara n'oge asọmpi mba ụwa .
Becky UzoAmaka Umeh nwaafọ Naịjirịa bụ onye ntuziaka nka, onye nhazi egwu, ọgụ egwú, ome ejiji, mana agbakwa egwu.
Akụkọ gbasara Ònwé.
Á mụrụ Umeh na Anambra State, Naijiria.
Mana o toro na Lagos site mgbe ọ gbara afọ ise.
Na 1992, onwetara nchawapụta nke mba ya dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri na Nigerian Television Authority "children's drama Tales nke Moonlight" .
O sonyekwara na ihe nkiri "Jezebel", "Twist of Fate", "Living Ghost", "Amazon na" ndị ọzọ.
Site na 1994 rue 1998, Umeh gụrụ maka egwu ọdịnala na nke oge a nke gbasatara Afrika, na agụmakwụkwọ nturu ugo ọzụzụ efu, na "Ivory Dance Academy", nke onye otu "National Troupe nke Naịjirịa" bụ Steve James hiwere.
Mgbe ọ na-agụ akwụkwọ, ya na ndị otu ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ a na-akpọ "Ivory Ambassador mere njehari" ma mee nyocha n'ọhịa banyere egwu ọdịnala dị n'ime obodo Naịjirịa.
Na Naịjirịa, malite 1998 rue 2002.
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, Umeh jere ozi dị ka Onye isi egwu nke "Ivory Dance Troupe" ruo afọ ise, na-atuzi ma na -emepụta ihe ngosi maka Guinness, Mobile, Chevron, seven-up bottling company, wdg.
Kà ọ lotachara obere njem ọ mere gaa Ghana, ọ gara Paris n'oge 1998 FIFA World Cup ya na ndị otu bọọlụ nke Naịjirịa.
Becky Umeh kwalitere ọrụ ịbụ abụ ya wee hiwe otu egwu ya, nke ha jikọrọ aka mepụta afere egwu ọkpọrọ"Aiye".
Site na 1998 rue 2001, Umeh kwadoro ndị ngosi ihe nkiri onyonyo a na-akpọ "Dance Jam Competition" .
Na 2002, na nsote mmepụta fiesta "Afrifest", ebe o jikọtara ndị otu egwu nke Africa ọnụ, Umeh jere ozi dị ka osote onye na-ahazi egwu maka asọmpi ịma mma Miss Nigeria nke onye mmeri ghọrọ Miss World 2002.
Ebe Becky Umeh rụrụ gụnyere: French Cultural Center, Goethe-Institut, "Nigeria Music Awards", na isi obodo etiti Abuja.
Ọ nọ n'ọrụ na-agba mbọ̀ ka Gọọmentị Naịjirịa nye ndị omenkà ezi nkwado nke na-esoghi ebumnuche mgbasa ozi nke Gọọmentị.
United States, 2002 ruo ugbu a.
Kemgbe ọ kwagara Washington, DC na 2002, Umeh esonyela ndị na-emepụta ihe dịka Hugh Medrano, Nancy Havlik (onye nhazi nkwago) na George Faison (choreographer New York) rụkọọ ọrụ.
O gosipụtala ụfọdụ ndị òtù akwụ ụgwọ ihe nkiri dịka Red Cross, ndị nnọchi anya ndị Naijiria, na ọtụtụ ebe ọdịbendị, mahadum, na ụka.
Na 2005, Umeh so Toby Foyeh na "Orchestra Africa" kpaharia North na South Carolina, Massachusetts, na Ememme Syracuse nke New York.
Site na 2004 rue ugbu a, Umeh gara n'ihu igosipụ̀ta egwu na ịrụ ọrụ na Malcolm X Drum Ensemble nke Doc Powel duziri, wee wepụta onwe ya dịka Onye Nlekọta Ọha na UAA Foundation,otu n'abụghị maka ichụ ego nke ebumnuche banyere ya bụ agha imegide ihe ike megide ụmụ nwanyị www.
UAAfoundation.org.
N’afọ 2006, Umeh dekọtara ihe nkiri The Lion king.
nke Metropolitan Fine Arts na Virginia kwadoro.
Na 2009 Umeh guzobere ọgbakọ egwu Zomema, nke na-arụ ọrụ egwu ọdịnala na nke oge a n’Afrika na ntuziaka ya.
N'afọ 2011, o dere ma bipụta usoro egwuregwu izizi ya "Legend of Abiku Zombeh".
Umeh ka etinyere aka dị ka onye nhazi asụsụ na onye na-ahụ maka nhazi emume na Mahadum Richmond na mmemme ha nke seasonal Stage Production Things Fall Apart nke onye ode akwụkwọ ma bụrụ ode abụ Naịjirịa bụ Chinua Achebe dere .
Semira Adamu (amụrụ na 1978 ma nwụọ 1998) bu bụ onye gbara afọ iri abụọ si Naịjirịa ma nwụọ n'aka mmadu pọlis abụọ na Belgium mgbe ha chọọrọ ime ya .
O bu ụzọ gbapụ na Naijiria n'ihi esemokwu .
Na 12 Disemba 2003, ejidere mmadu pọlis anọ maka ihe a merenụ, ozugbo ka ikpe ha sochiri.
E nyere gọọmentị Belgium iwu ịkwụ ndị ezinụlọ Semira ụgwọ.
Ọnwụ Adamu kpalitere nnukwu esemokwu na Belgium ma katara ka-eke ndekọ nke banyere omume nke ịchụpụ.
Na Septemba 1998 , onye Mịnịsta na-ahụ maka ime obodo nke Belgium, gbara arụkwaghịm mgbe ọtụtụ ngagharị iwe nke ọha na eze malitere maka ọnwụ Adam.
Dunni Olarewaju (a mụrụ n'ụbọchịnke 2 n'ọnwa Disemba, nke afọ 1960), nke a mara aha ya dịka "Opelope Anointing" bụ onye Naijiria na - agụ egwu ụka,na-ede egwu,ma bụrụkwa onye na - agbasa oziọma n'ihe onyonyo.
Mbido ndụ.
A mụrụ Opelope Anointing na Akinyele, nke dị na okpuru ọchịchị ime obodo dị na Ọyọ Steeti, na Saụt-westen Naịjirịa n’ezinaụlọ ndị otu Kristi nke Isaiah nwụgoro anwụ na Deaconess Elizabeth Olaniyi.
Ọ gụrụ ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị ya n'otu obodo a na-akpọ Sannu tupu o mechaa gaa Elekuro Secondary Modern School na Ibadan, mana ọ hapụrụ ya gaa Ejigbo High School na Legos Steeti, bụ ebe o mechara kwụsị maka i lekwasị anya n'egwu ụka.
E wepụtara abọm mbụ ya nke akpọrọ "Adun-Igbeyawo" n'afọ 1998 mana ọ bụ onye a ma ama n'ihi aha egwu ahụ bụ "Opelope Anointing", egwu o depụtara were gụọ n'otu ụbọchị.
O nwetara aha ya, "Opelope Anointing" site n'abọm a. O hiwere abọm nke iri abuo ya n'ụbọchị nke 26 n’onwa iri nke afọ 2014,nke ndị bịara bụ ndị na-agụ egwu ụka na Naijiria dịka, Joseph Adebayo Adelakun, Tope Alabi, Bola Are na Funmi Aragbaye N’afọ 2010, o guzobere “Opelope Anointing Foundation (OPAF), ihe enyemaka nke ndị ọrụ ebere, ndị na-abụghị ndị gọọmentị.
Ndụ onwe.
N’ọnwa Mee afọ 2013, nwa ya nwaanyị bụ Ibironke lụrụ Olawunmi ma e mere agbamakwụkwọ ahụna Isolo dị na Legọs steeti .
Ndị ọbịa bịara ya bụ Bola Are, Funmi Aragbaye na Mega 99 bụ onye gụrụ egwu na mmemme ahụ.
JJ Bunny bụụrụ onye Ome ihe nkiri Nollywood US bi na United States.
Ọ bụ omenka Ndekọ́, na onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri ma gosipụta n'ihe nkiri mbụ ya nke a kpọrọ " Caged " na 2009.
O ruola n'ógó dị elu na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri Nollywood na Gollywood .
Seun Adigun (amụrụ na 3 Jenụwarị 1987 na ) bụ onye na-agba ọsọ egwuregwu nke .
O zoro asọmpi na , mana o tozughi oke na otu ya.
N’afọ 2016, ọ guzobere otu egwuregwu aha ya bụ .
Ọ nọchitere anya Nigeria na na ngalaba nke ụmụ nwaanyị.
Na asọmpi Afrika niile nke afọ 2010 na Nairobi, ọ pụtara ọkwa nke mbụ.
Ndụ ya n'ime.
Ọ bụ nwa nwanne nwanyị n'agbabụrụ ndị Amerika basketbọọlụ.
Ebere Orji (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 23 n'ọnwa Disemba nke afọ 1992) bụ nwaafọ Naijiria n'agba bọọlụ na mba ụwa nke na-agbara ndi Linköpings bọọlụ ugbu a na Damallsvenskan nke mba Swidin .
Ọ gbabuuru ọtụtụ klọb bọọlụ na Naijiria, Swidin na Họngarị mana nke a kachasị mara bụ Ferencváros na nke mba Họngarị na Rivers Angels na Nigeria Women Premier League nke obodo ya.
Ọ nọchitekwala anya Naijiria n'ọkwa mba ụwa dịka akụkụ nke otu egwuregwu n'agba nke ikpezụ 2011 FIFA Women's World Cup, yana Under 20 na Under 17 World Cup.
Ọrụ klọb.
Ya na ndị Rivers Angels, otu mgbe o meriri site n'inye goolu ugborougboro megide COD United Ladies na mmeri 6-1 n'ụzọ ha i ji merie Federation Cup n'afọ 2014.
N'afọ 2015 ya na Ferencváros, o nwetere mmeri n'asọmpi nke Họngarị ( Női NB I ) na Hungarian Cup.
N'oge a gbara agba nke afọ 2016-17, Orji mechara bụrụ onye kachasị nye goolu na Női NB I site n'inye goolu iri abụọ na asaa.
N'afọ 2019, Orji nwetara ihe nrite na Umeå IK, site n'inye goolu iri na otu n'ime egwuregwu iri abụọ na isii.
Ọrụ mba ụwa.
Mgbe ọ dị afọ 15, Orji mere bidoro asọmpi ya na mba ụwa na na mmepe U-17 Women's World Cup n'afọ 2008 na mmeri 1-2 nke Saụt Koria n'egwuregwu nke otu.
Orji nyere goolu mbụ ya na mba na Under-17s na otu ndorondoro a na goolu 2-2 ha na Brazil ., ma "o wutere ya" ka e mesịrị chụpụ ya n'otu egwuregwu ahụ.
Ka ụbọchị iri na asaa a chụpụchara ya na egwuregwu ha na mba Brazil gasịrị, Orji nọchitekwara anya Naịjirịa ọzọ, na nke ugbu a ọ nọ n'ogo Under-20 na .
Orji nyere goolu na mpụta mbụ ya, ha na ndị Ingland gbara 1-1 ma nyekwazie goolu abụọ karịa dịka Frans mechara gbapụ ndị Falconets na nkeji nke atọ site na mmeri 2-3.
N'afọ abụọ ka nke a gasịrị, a kpọghachiri Orji ka o soro ndị otu Under-20 maka asọmpi 2010 U-20 Women's World Cup were hụ ihe ịga nke ọma dị ka otu n'ime nke otu ahụ meriri ndị na-agbachitere Amerịka na nkeji nke atọ ma mesịa ruo na ngwụcha nke asọmpi a, jiri obere dapụ site na mmeri 2-0 Jamini ndị a sọrọmpi na be ha meriri ha.
Orji nọ n'otu egwuregwu a mgbe niile,ma nyekwa goolu abụọ n'asọmpi ahụ, otu mgbe bụ naanị goolu ya nyere Naijiria mmeri na nkeji ha meriri Kolombia tupu nkeji ikpeazụ asọmpi ahụ .
Orji pụtara otu sinio mbụ ya n'asọmpi enyi na enyi Naịjirịa gbara megide Jamini, kosiladị a gbanwere ya mgbe nkeji iri abụọ na iteghete gachara, were merie Naịjirịa 8-0.
Orji so na ndị otu Naịjirịa nke meriri n'asọmpị.
O pụtakwara na .
Oge mbu ọ pụtara na World Cup bụ na 2011 Women's World Cup, bido na egwuregwu atọ nke ndị otu.
Naịjirịa emerighị n'egwuregwu ndị otu a.
N'afọ 2012, Orji nọchitere anya ndị na-erubeghị afọ iri abụọ na , nke pụtara dịka onye nnọchite n'egwuregwu niile nke Naịjirịa ruo mgbe Amerịka chụpụrụ ha n'ọkara nke ikpeazụ.
Orji chịkọtara egwuregwu iri na ise na Naijiria n'okpuru otu ndị na-erubeghị afọ 20 n'etiti afọ 2008 n'afọ 2012, ma nye goolu 5.
Eseohe Arhebamen ma ọ bụ Eseohe Arhebamen-Yamasaki, nke a makwaara dị ka Edoheart (nke a mụrụ ka Obehioye Eseohe Ikhianose Oghomwenyenmwen Cleopatra Anne Arhebamen ), bụ onye na-ede abụ, onye na-agba egwu, onye na-agụ egwu, onye na-agụ egwú, onye na-arụpụta egwu, onye na-eme ihe nkiri n'ihu ọhaneze, na onye na-ese eserese.
A mụrụ Eseohe na Zaria,nke Naijiria ma bụrụ onye ezinụlọ nke alaeze ukwu Benin .
Nne nne Eseohe Arhebamen bụ Princess Theresa Maria Nodumwenben Osazuwa, adaeze ndị Edo .
Nna nna ochie Eseohe Arhebamen bụ Osazuwa Eredia, nna adaeze bụ Theresa Osazuwa, bụbu Oba N'Ugu na Enogie nke Umoghumwun, nke mere Eseohe Arhebamen nwa eze na adaeze.
"Ntọala alaeze Ugu, ya na isi obodo ya dị na Umoghumwun a bụrụla nke achọpụtara isi na Okparaeze Idu, bụ ọkpara Oba Eweka I. 
Mbido ndụ.
Eseohe Arhebamen bụ nwa nke mbụ nke ụmụnne ise ma na-arụkarị ọrụ nne na nna na nzụlite ha.
Mgbe ọ dị afọ asaa ezinaụlọ Eseohe kwagara n'Amerịka were biri na Detroit,na Michigan .
Mgbe ọ dị afọ 17 ọ debara aha na Mahadum Michigan na Residential College.
Agbanyeghị na a gbara ya ume ịchụ mmụta medịsịn dị ka ụzọ ọrụ, Eseohe gbasoro agụụ ya maka uri, asụsụ na nka.
Dị ka nwa akwụkwọ n'ogo bachelọ, Eseohe lekwasịrị anya n'ụzọ edemede na ime ihe nkiri n'ihu ọhaneze dị ka ụzọ isi metụta mgbanwe mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya.
Mgbe ọ nọ na Mahadum nke Michigan, Eseohe nwetara akara nrite dị ebube maka edemede ya ma sonye na ndị nrite University of Michigan Anthology of Hopwood Award.
Ọrụ.
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na itoolu, Eseohe nwetara ọkwá dịka Writer-in-Residence nnke InsideOut Literary Arts Project na Detroit,dị na Michigan, ma soro ụmụaka rụkọọ ọrụ ụlọ akwụkwọ ime obodo dara ogbenye iji gbasaa nka agụmagụ ha.
Mgbe ọ kwagachara New York n'afọ 2003, Eseohe guzobere ụlọ ọrụ EdoHeart edekwara dịka Edoheart nke ghọọrọ aha arụmọrụ ya.
Eseohe Arhebamen na Edoheart bụ otu.
Eseohe natara nzere bachelọ nke nka na Mahadum nke Michigan na Creative Writing na Literature n'ọnwa Ọgọst,afọ 2005, were gaa nara nzere nke nka na Studio Art ya na maịnọ na asụsụ bekee na .
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum nke New York nke nzere masta na Performance Studies, nke a kọwara dị ka ọ na-esite n'ọmụmụ pefọmịn aat, antropọlọji na soshịọlọji, echiche edemede, na agụmagụ maka iwu.
Eseohe gụsikwara ị gba egwu Butoh na Yukio Waguri ike.
Mpaghara ndị nyere mmasị na ọrụ nnwale Eseohe Arhebamen bụ ihe okike echepụtara maka gburugburu ọzọ, yana abụ na olu okwu dị ka isi mmalite maka mmegharị.
Ọ gbaala ma kuzie ma obu duzie n'ọgbakọ ọmụmụ nke gunyere ebe ndi a o nwere mmasi na The Living Theater na Columbia University 's Teacher's College.
Eseohe Arhebamen a pụtala na televishọn na akụkọ ndị Koria na Amerịka,ma n'akwụkwọ akụkọ Amerịka, Estonia na Latvia.
N’afọ 2011, onye na-ese ihe Kalup Linzy họpụtara ya ka ọ pụta n’otu ihe nkiri gbasara ndị omenkà na New York.
Eseohe Arhebamen na-apụtakwa na teepu vidio a gụnyere n'akwụkwọ abụ Anne Waldman a ma ama nke Special Collections Library zụtara.
Ihe nkiri abụ Butoh.
Eseohe Arhebamen bụ onye amaala na nwa afọ a mụrụ Afrịka nke mbụ na-eme ihe ngosi butoh n'ihu ọhaneze.
Na mgbakwunye, Eseohe Arhebamen bụ onye mbụ na-eme ihe nkiri n'ihu ọhaneze na-agbakọta egwu butoh na ịbụ abụ, ikwu okwu, mudra, asụsụ ogbi, okwu ọnụ, na nnwale olu mgbe ụdị egwu ọdịnala nke ndị Edo nke West Afrịka gachara.
Ọ na-akpọ ụdị egwu a Ihe nkiri abụ Butoh.
Ụdị ihe nkiri abụ Butoh nke Eseohe Arhebamen na-esite na ọrụ ya na uri, egwu na ihe nkiri ọdịnala Edo nke ndị na-eme egwuregwu na-agba egwu ma na-abụ abụ n'otu oge, na nkwupụta nkwenye ya gosipụtara n'otu akụkọ asụsụ dị n'etiti ndị Edo nke Naijiria na ndị Japaan. . N'ụbọchị nke 26 n'ọnwa Septemba afọ 2010, Eseohe mere ihe nkiri na Yukio Waguri Intensive Workshop na-egosipụta ụdị ya nke ihe nkiri abụ Butoh nke ọ na-agba egwu butoh mgbe ọ na-abụ abụ nke Willy Wonka &amp;amp; Chocolate Factory .
Kaarel Kressa kọwara ihe nkiri Eseohe mere nke ọma n'oge njem nke Fifth Diverse Universe dị ka nke gosipụtara ịdị mma na ịdị mma nke nwanyị; ji uri, ị gba egwu na abu ndi meriri obi ndi mmadu.
Akpọọla ọrụ Eseohe "powerful ritual".
Alụmdi na nwunye.
N’afọ 2006, Eseohe lụrụ obi ụtọ kemgbe ya bụ Seth Yamasaki, nwa Taro Yamasaki onye na-ese foto nwetara ihe nrite Pulitzer Prize, na nwa nwa nke Minoru Yamasaki, onye omenkà bụ onye Japaan nakwa Amerịka a ma ama maka i se World Trade Center .
Ha abụọ bi na Brooklyn,na New York .
Aisha Jummai Al-Hassan, onye a maara dị ka Mama Taraba bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Niajirịa bụ onye a mụrụ na abalị iri na isii nke ọnwa Septemba 1959 na Jalingo, Taraba State .
Ọ gbara arụkwaghịm dị ka Mịnịsta na-ahụ maka ihe metụtara ụmụ nwanyị na Naịjirịa na July 27, 2018.
A họpụtara ya na 2015 ka ọ bụrụ onye isi oche nke President Muhammadu Buhari mgbe ahọpụtara ya.
Ọ bụbu onye omeiwu, na-anọchite anya mpaghara ugwu nke Taraba State, Nigeria nke o meriri n'okpuru nke ndị Peoples Democratic Party (PDP).
O mechara banye n’otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị All Progressive Congress (APC) wee bụrụ onye ga-azọ ọkwa gọvanọ nke pati ahụ na steeti Taraba maka ntuliaka nke afọ 2015.
E meriri ya na ntuli aka nke emere na 25 Eprel 2015, mana na 7 November 2015 ikpe -wepụru Gọvanọ Taraba, Darius Ishaku, na-ekwupụta Aisha Alhassan nke All Progressives Congress onye mmeri nke Eprel 11, 2015, emechara gbanwee ya,site na akwụkwọ Mkpegharị ikpe na Appeal ya na Supreme courts of 
Nigeria.
Mmalite ndụ na ọrụ.
Aisha Jummai Al-Hassan bụ onye Fulani.
Onye ọka iwu site na ọzụzụ, ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ a họpụtara ka ọ bụrụ Attọnị jenera na kọmishọna ikpe ziri ezi na Taraba Steeti.
Ọ bụ Nwanyị mbụ a họpụtara ka ọ bụrụ onye odeakwụkwọ judịshia kansul nke FCT ma mesịa họpụta ya dịka onyeisi na-edeba aha nke ụlọikpe Kasị Elu nke Federal Capital Territory, Abuja na 17 Disemba 2003.
Mgbe ọ lara ezumike nká, ọ malitere izu ahịa.
Ọrụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị.
Sineti.
Na ntuli aka nke PDP na Jenụwarị 2011, Jummai meriri onye omeiwu nọ n’ọchịchị ugbu a, onye bụbu onye nnọchi anya mba Manzo Anthony .
Na ntuli aka nke Eprel 9, 2011, Jummai meriri vootu 114,131, Jolly Nyame nke Action Congress of Nigeria (ACN) n'eso nwetere votu 92,004.
Ọ bụ otu n’ime ụmụ nwanyị anọ a họpụtara na tiketi PDP, ndị ọzọ bụ Nkechi Nwaogu (Abia Central), Helen Esuene (Akwa Ibom South) na Nenadi Usman (Kaduna South).
Mgbe ntuli aka ahụ gasịrị, a sịrị na ọ nọ na-asọ mpi maka oche onye isi oche nke Sineti
Ntuli aka gọvanọ.
Alhassan zọrọ nhọpụta ndị ọchịchị na 2015 n’okpuru Parti nke All Progressive Congress (APC).
Onye otu onye People's Democratic Party (PDP) bu Darius Ishaku meriri ya .
N’ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2015, akpọpụtara ya dịka onye meriri na ntuli aka gọvanọ steeti Taraba nke Eprel nke afọ 2015, wee bụrụ nwanyị izizi na Naijiria ịbụ Gọvanọ.
E mechara gbanwee mkpebi a site na ụlọ Mkpegharị Appeal, nke kwuru na APC enweghị ikike na primaries nke PDP.
N'oge na-adịbeghị anya, ọ gbara arụkwaghịm na ọkwa Federal ya wee bànyé otu UDP ka ọchịchị APC nyochara ya ma depụ aha ya maka ịzọ ọkwa Gọvanọ .Ha jikọtara kwado ya dịka onye ga azọ ọchịchị gọvanọ nke steeti Taraba na UDP, ebe ndị ọzọ wepụrụ aka.
O mechara kwuputa nlọghachi ya na PDP mgbe ntuli aka nke gọvanọ gachara, nke Darius Ishaku nọ Peoples Democratic Party meriri ọzọ, dị ka Gọvanọ nke Taraba State .
A maara ya nke ọma dịka "Mama Taraba", n'ihi na ọ na-abawanye n'ọchịchị na steeti ya.
Ndụ onwe.
Nwanne nwoke Aisha Jummai nke okenye bụ onye bụ Abdulazeez Ibrahim bụbu Sinetọ site na 1999-2007.
Ọ na-akwado ọtọ egwuregwu bọọlu Taraba ,
Kehinde Fadipe onye amụrụ na abalị iri na asaa n’ime onwa isii n'afo 1983 bụ onye omee Britain.
Ndụ.
A mụrụ Kehinde Fadipe na ụlọ ọgwụ St Mary London na 1983.
O nwetara BA (Hons) na English Literature &amp; Language tupu ọ gụọ akara nke abụọ na Royal Academy of Dramatic Art nke ọ gụchara na 2009.
Ọrụ mbụ ya bụ na 2009 mgbe ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri ejije Lynn Nottage bụ "Ruined" nke meriri nrite Pulitzer .
Akụkọ Nottage gbakwasara ukwu n'ikpali mmekọahụ n'ike na Democratic Republic of Congo .
Na 2011 o sonyere na akụkọ gbasara mpụ nke BBC televishon bụ "The Body Farm" nke gbadoro ụkwụ na akwụkwọ Patricia Cornwell na 1994 The Body Farm.
O sonyeere usoro nke atọ nke ihe nkiri ụmụaka na-eto eto Misfits ebe ọ gosipụtara dị ka Melissa onye bụ nwanyị nwere otu akparamagwa dị ka nke nwoke bụ Curtis.
Nathan Stewart-Jarrett gosipụtara akparamagwa curtis.
N’afọ 2013 alụm dị na nwunye nke ya na Wole Olufunwa bụ nke channels Tv Metro file bipụtara ma Kesaa.. 
Ọ́ nwere ụmụ abụọ
Zainab Elizabeth Donli, onye a maara dị ka Lady Donli, bụ onye egwu Naịjirịa.
Ọ bụkwa onye egwu ọzọ na R&amp;B, hip hop bụrụkwa ọzọ na jazz na onye na-agu egwuAfrobeat ya na onye na-ede egwu.
Biography.
A mụrụ Lady Donli na Cleveland, Ohio.
Ọ bụ ọdụdụ nwa n’ime ụmụaka isii.
Na mbido ndụ ya dika nwata o biri na Abuja na Kaduna, ebe nna ya si.
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị, ọ kwagara United Kingdom ebe ọ nwetara akara mmụta onye Ọkaikpe na Mahadum, nke Surrey.
Mmetụta egwu mbụ Donli nwere bụ na bụ ebe ewuzoro otu abụ otuto pụrụiche.
Ọ nwekwara mmetụta site na egwu , , na Brenda Fassie, Angelique Kidjo, Aṣa na tinyere ndị ọsụ ụzọ na-ewu ewu na egwu pop nke Naịjirịa.
Donli so na akụkọ nke egwu amaara maka ịgwakọta ụda sitere n'ọtụtụ egwu dị iche iche, gụnyere Afrobeats, R&amp;B, na soul.
O weputara oru ya nke mbu, nke nwere abu egwu iri na abuo "Love or War", n’afo 2014.
Donli arụọla ọrụ, yana ndi egwu agbara ọhụụ dị ka , , Tomi Thomas, , , SDC, , Ayuu, Odunsi the engine, na Tay na ọtutu ndị ọzọ.
Na 2018, Donli gbaziri ọtụtụ ọrụ.
O jikọtara ọnụ, ya na onye egwu Naijiria bụ Boogey on 'Motion na 'Motion' na ọkaibe MC Terry Tha Rapman na 'Open Letter'.
Ya na rụkọkwara ọrụ na albọm ya ọzọ bu, 'Life is Eazi Vol.2', tinyere akara ngosi ' albọm.
Na 2019, Donli wepụtara albọm izizi ya, "Enjoy Your Life.
"
Idara Otu (amụrụ n'abalị ise n'onwa Julaị n'afọ 1987, na Atlanta, US ) bụ onye Naijiria na-agba ọsọ.
Ọ sọrọ mpi na egwuregwu na .
Ọ bụkwa onye bidoro Let Girls Read, Run, Grow Foundation, nke na-enyere ụmụ agbọghọ na ewerọ ego ma ọbu ọnye eyeme aka iga n'ihu na ndụ site na agụmakwụkwọ, egwuregwu na ọrụ ugbo ma nwee olile anya izụpụta ndị ga abu ndị ọchịchị na ụwa.
Angela Atede (amụrụ n'abalị asatọ nke onwa Febụwarị n'afọ 1972) bụ nwaafọ Nigeria na-eme egwuregwu, onye na asọkarị mpi na .
Ihe mmeta ya kachasị mma bụ 12.72 sekọnd, nke o nwetara n'afọ 1998.
Ndekọ Asompi.
Afọ Asọmpi Ebe Ihe ọ gbara Emume Ndetu
Helen Olaye 
Nkọwa Onwe
Nwaamala - Nigerian
Afọ ọmụmụ - 30 Ọgọstụ 1946 (afọ iri asaa na anọ)
Egwuregwu
Egwuregwu - ịgba ọsọ
Emume - 200 mita
Helen Olaye (amụrụ n'abalị iri atọ nke onwa ọgọstụ n'afọ 1946) bụ onye Naijiria na-agba ọsọ.
Ọ sọ mpi na egwuregwu na .
Simidele Adeife Omonla Adeagbo (amụrụ na Julai 29, 1981 na , Ontario, Canada) bụ onye Naijiria nke Canada na-eme egwuregwu ọsọ zọrọ asọmpi na .
Ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ na Nigeria ma na Africa na-eme egwuregwu skeleton.
Ọ bu nwaanyị oji nke mbụ zọrọ asọmpi Olympik maka egwuregwu a. Tupu ọ zọọ mpi skeleton, ọ zọrọ mpi egwuregwu nke ikpeazu na 2008.
Ndụ mmalite.
A mụrụ Adeagbo na , na , Canada, nne na nna ya bụ ndị Naijiria; ma ọ laghachiri Naịjirịa mgbe ọ ka bụ nwa ọhụrụ, nọrọ ebe ahụ ruo afọ isii.
Ọrụ.
Adeagbo jere ozi dịka onye na-anochite anya na ihe nkiri Nike kere.
Adeagbo bu onye njikwa ahia Nike na South Africa kemgbe 2012.
Na August 18, 2018, Adeagbo na ndị ọzọ ama ama okwu n'oge ihe mmeme "" nke emere na .
Ya na onye ọkaiwu , onye teknuzu, , onye nhazi ihe osise na onye mgbasa ozi bụ .
ya na ndị ọzọ.
Ọrụ egwuregwu.
Adeagbo malitere egwuregwu ọsọ na-ubi mgbe ọ na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekondarị.
Ọ lara ezumike nká na June 2008.
N'oge ahụ, ekweghị ya ka ọ gaa Olimpik n'ihi na ogo ya foro 8-inch.
ọ bụ onye na-ejide ọtụtụ ihe ndekọ gụnyere onye egwurewgu kachasị mma ụgbọrọ anọ yana ndekọ nke eguregwu iwụli elu maka Mahadum Kentucky.
Adeagbo nwere mmasị n’egwuregwu nke skeleton n’ọnwa Disemba afọ 2016, mgbe ọ nụrụ banyere otu ndị otu egwuregwu na Naijiria na-achọ iru eru maka asọmpi Olimpik.
Ọ malitere "skeleton" na Septemba 2017.
Nike bụ ndị na-akwado ya maka egwuregwu a.
Adeagbo sonyere na-asọmpi egwuregwu mbụ ya na na egwuregwu , dịka onye otu Naịjirịa bụrụ onye Naịjirịa izizi na-esonye na asọmpi Olymik a. Ọ bụ onye nnọchi anya Naijiria na .
Ndụ ya n'ime.
Na Disemba 2017, Adeagbo ka bi na , , kemgbe afọ 2012.
Nnenna Njoku (amụrụ na 18 Maachị 1955) bụ nwaafọ Naịjirịa, onye egwuregwu nwere 163 cm / 57 na mmesho.
Mmezu.
Nnenna sooro na asọmpi nke nke ọ nọchitere anya Naịjirịa na mita 4 × 100, Relay, ụmụ nwanyị, nakwa
Marion Barron onye amụrụ na abalị iri-abụọ na asatọ nke onwa atọ n'afo 1958, bụ Omee nke Scottish.
A maara ya nke ọma maka igosipụ̀ta akparamagwa n'ihe omume dịka nwunye onyeisi na Ihe omume BBC Sitcom, keeping Up Appearances-site na 1990 ruo 1995.
Ọrụ ndị ọzọ amaara gụnyere "Dont Wait Up" (1983) na "Screen Two" (1985).
Mmalite Ndụ.
Á mụrụ Marion Barron n'abalị̀ iri abụọ na asato nke ọnwa Maachị 1958 na British Naịjirịa.
O tolitere na Dumfries, Scotland.
Ọrụ.
Ihe ngosi mbu nke Barron bụ dị ka onye nnabata na ụlọ nkwari akụ na sitcom "Don't wait Up", nke gosipụtara Nigel Havers, Tony Britton na Dinah Sheridan ma Harold Snoad meputara ma nye ntuzi aka ya, mana ngosipụta akparamagwa akachasị mara nke kpụ ọkụ n'ọnụ bụ Nwunye Vika ya na Patricia Routledge, Josephine Tewson, Clive Swift na Judy Cornwell nọ na "BBC Sitcom, keeping Up Appearances" (ọ bụkwa nke Harold Snoad mepụtara ma duzie) site na 1990 ruo 1995.
Ọ pụtakwara na "Screen Two" na "The Bill" .
Ndụ onwe.
Marion lụrụ Simon ma ha nwere ụmụ abụọ.
Ogo Barron dị 5 '5 "(1.65 m).
Nwakaego Ihenacho Ogbaro, a maara nke ọma dịka Ego, bụ onye na-agụ na onye na-ede egwu na Naijiria.
A mụrụ ya na Imo steeti, a maara ya nke ọma dịka onye na-agụ egwu n'otu egwu Lagbaja nke akpọrọ Africano.
Ego e dego egwu dika "Konko Below", "Nothing for You" na "Never Far Away".
Ya na Lagbaja na-agakarị njem ị ga mba ụwa dị iche iche maka ị gụ egwu.
Ego hapụrụ Africano iji chụọ ọrụ naanị ya n'afọ 2007.
O mechara mepụta otu akpọrọ Indigo.
Kemgbe ọ hapụrụ ndị otu Lagbaja, ya na ndị ọgụegwu dịka Sunny Nneji, Djinee, Tosin Martins, Ayanbirin na Blaise, tinyere ndị ọzọ a gụkọọla egwu.
O sorogokwa Weird MC, Aṣa, Cobhams Asuquo na Yinka Davies gụọ egwu.
O weputara "I Believe", isi adụ bụkwazị otu n'ime abọm studiyo izizi ya.
E debara ya dika onye nnochite anya Globacom n'afọ 2008.
Mmụta.
Ego gara ụlọ akwụkwọ Central Primary na Ikeja High School, dị na GRA na Legọs.
Ego bụ nwa akwụkwọ kacha elu na Ikeja High School.
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị n'afọ 1991.
Nrite.
Ego enwetala ọtụtụ onyinye site na ụlọ ọrụ dị iche iche gụnyere:
Ejiro Amos Tafiri bụ nwaafọ Naijiria na-emepụta eyimeyi .
Ọ bụ ya malitere Ejiro Amos Tafiri (E.A.T) akara bụ nke e guzobere i gbo mkpa eyimeyi nke nwaanyị agba ọhụrụ.
Mmalite ndụ na ọrụ.
Ejiro bu onye Delta steeti, a muru ya na obodo Legọs .
Ịhụnanya ya maka eyimeyi malitere mgbe ọ dị obere afọ atọ site na mmetụta nke nne nne ya bụ onye na-akwara ya akwa mgbe ahụ.
Ndị mụrụ ya tụrụ anya ka ọ gụọ maka ị bụ dibia bekee ma ọ họọrọ clothing na design na Yaba College of Technology .
Ejiro bidoro akara ya n'afọ 2010.
N’afọ 2015, akara E.A.T a kpọrọ “The Madame”, nchịkọta ihe eyimeyi o mere gosipụtara na Native &amp; Vogue Port Harcourt Fashion Week ma na Dakar Fashion Week na Kenya Fashion Week n’otu ụzọ ahụ.
Safiya Hussaini Tungar Tudu onye amụrụ n'afọ 1967 bụ nwaanyị Nigerian a màrà ikpe ọnwụ n'ihi akwam iko Onye lụrụ di na 2002.
Ọ mụrụ otu nwa na-alụghị di na Sokoto, steeti Naijiria nọ́ n'okpuru iwu Sharia .
A mara ya ikpe ịtụ ya nkume, mana ewepụrụ ya na ebubo ya niile na Maachị 2002 ka emechara ya .
Ndabere.
A mara Hussaini ikpe ọnwụ itugbu ya na Ọktoba 2001 maka ebubo na ya na onye agbata obi ya lụrụ nwanyị dinara.
Ọ mụrụ nwa ahụ mgbe ọ gbachara alụkwaghịm.
Hussaini kwuru na nwoke ahụ bụ onye dakwasịrị ya n'ike ugboro ugboro, ndị ụlọ ikpe Sharia achọpụtaghị na ọ dara ikpe n'ihi enweghị akaebe.
N'oge ikpe ahụ, Hussaini enweghị onye nnọchite iwu ọ bụla ma agwaghị ya ikike onwere ụlọ ikpe Sokoto kpochapụrụ akaebe ya wee maa ya ikpe na 12 Ọktoba 2001.
Amamíkpé a bụ nke mba ụwa katọrọ ma dee akwụkwọ maka mgbapụta ya.Halima Abdullahi, onye ntụziaka nke otu abụghị nke gọọmenti hiwere bụ Help Eliminate Loneliness and Poverty(HELP) kwutọkwara amam ikpe a.N'okwu ya ọ sịrị na nke a bụ ihe ihere nyere otu Muslim nke Naịjirịa.
Otú a kwuru na ikpe a ezighị ezi n'ihi amara Safiya ikpe onye nọ na di ma ọ gbala alukwaghịm .
Nke ọzọkwa mmadụ anọ kwesịrị ịbụ ndị aka ebe dịka iwu Islam si dị bụ ndị ahughị .Halima kwuru na nke a bụ n'ihi enweghị ọnụ,ma kpọkwa nke a nkewa n'ógó dị elu enwere ebe nwoke na nwanyị nọ.Otua gara n'ihu ịkpọku Gọvanọ Attahiru Bafarawa ka ọ tiyee ọnụ n'izọpụta ndụ Safiya.￼
Hussaini rịọrọ, ndị ọka iwu ya na-arụ ụka na di mbụ nke Hussaini bụ nna nwa ya nwanyị dị otu afọ bụ Adama na nwanyị ahụ kwuru okwu mbụ ya n'okpuru nrụgide.
N'ịga n'ihu, ha rụrụ ụka na ịkwa iko a na-ebo ebubo ewerela ọnọdụ tupu etinye iwu Sharia na steeti ahụ.
E guzobere iwu sharia zuru oke na Sokoto na Jun 2000, otu ọnwa ka amụchara Adama.
Onye gbachitere ya bụ onye ọka iwu na-ahụ maka ihe ndị ruuru mmadụ na Naịjirịa bụ Hauwa Ibrahim .
Hussaini meriri arịrịọ ya n'onwa Maachị 25, 2002 ma akagbuo ikpe ahụ.
Ụlọ ikpe mkpegharị dị na Sokoto chọpụtara na ikpe ọnwụ nke ụlọ ikpe Alakụba kpere na Oktoba, enweghị isi.
Ụlọ ikpe ahụ kpebiri na enweghị ike iji ihe ịkwa iko nke iwu Sharia nke Sokoto mee ihe ḿmegide nyere Safiya, ebe ọ bụ na ịkwa ikoa ana-ebo ebubo bụ tupu ewebata iwu Sharia na Sokoto.
Mkpesa Hussaini mèchàrà bụrụ ihe edekọrọ n'akwụkwọ akpọrọ, "Safiya Hussaini Tungar Tudu: I, Safiya" (2004).
Chief Elizabeth Adekogbe (1919 - 1968) bụ onye obodo Naijiria, onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị,onye ndú oke ụmụ nwanyị na onye ọchịchị omenala .
Ọ bụbu onye isi ndi otu Women's Movement of Nigeria nke dị na Ibadan .
N'afọ 1954, otu ahụ gbanwere aha ya zawa Council of Women of Nigeria, bụ nke sonyere Women's Improvement League n'afọ 1959 were bụrụ National Council of Women Societies, bụ ndị otu mgbagha na ndị otu na-edu ụmụ nwanyị na Naịjirịa.
Ndụ ya.
Mmalite ndu na mmuta.
A mụrụ Adekogbe n’ezinụlọ nke Ijebu-Ife n’afọ 1919.
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na St Agnes Catholic Training School nakwazị Yaba College of Technology .
N’oge na-adịghị anya ọ banyere ọrụ obodo were bụrụ osote onye isi ndị na-enyocha ọnụahịa n’oge .
Ọrụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị.
E hiwere otu Women's Movement na Ibadan n’afọ 1952.
Ebumnuche otu a bụ ịdịnotu ụwa niile, ịnabata ụmụ nwanyị na Native Authority councils, nhọpụta nke ndị otu nọ na Western House of Assembly, ị debanye aha ọtụtụ ụmụ agbọghọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, mbelata ego isi nwanyị a na-akwụ na njikwa ike nnwekọta ndị ahịa Sịrịa na Lebanọn.
Nzukọ a na-esonye na Action Group mgbe ụfọdụ.
Kosiladị, naanị ndị ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị ole na ole ma ọ bụ efu na-etinye ụmụ nwanyị ndị ga-azọ ọkwa ọchịchị na ntụliaka gọọmentị etiti oge ahụ, n'agbanyeghị na ụmụ nwanyị tụnyere nnukwu òkè na ntuli aka n'oge ahụ.
Otu ndị inyom dị iche iche a yiri naanị ihe e ji nweta vootu .
N’afọ 1953, e nwere nzukọ ụmụ nwanyị n’Abeokuta .
Nzukọ ahụ nwere nzukọ ndị isi ndị inyom niile dị na Naijiria.
Otu onye ndu ọgbakọ ahụ, Funmilayo Ransome-Kuti, bụ onye nwere ihu ọma n'ebe National Council of Nigeria and the Cameroons (NCNC), kpọrọ ọgbakọ ahụ: Federation of Nigerian Women Society.
Kosiladị, e nwere ọgụ echiche dị n’etiti ụmụ nwaanyị abụọ a ma ama n’ọgbakọ ahụ: Adekogbe na Kuti.
E meriri Adekogbe, ọ hapụ ọgbakọ ahụ.
Mgbe e mesịrị, ọ kwadoro njikọ ndị otu ụmụ nwanyị nke Action Group.
Ndụ onwe.
Dika onye isi ndi Yoruba ndi nke ya, o jidere aha Iyalaje nke Ikija.
Di ya bụ L.A.G Adekogbe bụ onye ọrụ bekee.
Adelayo Adedayo bu onye na eme ihe nkiri bekee.
Oge mbụ ya igosipụ̀ta na telivishọn bụ na "The Bill", o mekwara ihe nkiri ya nke "izizi" na "Sket" .
O mechara gosipụta dịka onye isi akụkọ,bụ Viva Bennett, na "Some girls" nke egosipụtara na BBC Three .
Kemgbe 2017, ọ pụtakwara na ITV2 sitcom "Timewasters" dị ka Lauren.
Nrụtụaka.
2.interview with...Adelayo Adelayo pride Retrieved 11 December 2012.
3.
"Adelayo Adelayo"I love Tv[where she notably started in season 3 of ITV's Some Girls]the stage[she is fresh from the two hander slippies at the southwark playhouse]and film[Gone Too far;she has also shot a small part in unlocked with Noomi Replace and orlando Bloom,],but there's something so magical about film and that's where I'm definitely headed, Screen daily.
Retrieved 5 October ￼2015
Elizabeth Ativie bụ onye ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị Naịjirịa nke na-eje ozi ugbu a dị ka osote ọnụ na-ekwuru ụlọ ome iwu nke Edo Steeti kemgbe ụbọchị nke 25 n'ọnwa Julaị afọ 2016.
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka ọnụ na-ekwuru ụlọ ome iwu site n'ụbọchị nke 9 n'ọnwa Mee afọ 2016, ruo ụbọchị nke 24 n'ọnwa Julaị afọ 2016.
Mmalite ndu na mmuta.
Elizabeth Ativie bụ nwaafọ Edo Steeti mana o toro n'ọtụtụ akụkụ ala Naịjirịa n'ihi ọnọdụ ọrụ nna ya bụ onye uwe ojii.
O nwere nzere bachelọ na Health Education na nzere nast na Sociology and Anthropology .
Ọrụ.
Elizabeth rụrụ ọrụ dị ka ọkachamara nọọsụ na Edo State Civil Service ruo n'afọ 2006 mgbe ọ lara ezumike nká dị ka Daịrektọ.
Ọrụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ya malitere n'afọ 1999.
N'afọ 1999 ma n'afọ 2003, ọ zọrọ oche maka ụlọ ome iwu Edo Steeti mana ọ rịturu n'ọkwa ugboro abụọ ahụ maka otu n'ime ndị ga-azọ ọkwa ọchịchị n'otu ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị ya.
Elizabeth zọrọ ma merie oche na State House na ntuli aka izugbe nke afọ 2007.
Ụlọ ikpe mechara kagbuo ntuli aka ahụ.
Kosiladị, mkpebi ya kwụrụ ụgwọ n'afọ 2011, mgbe ọ meriri oche ịnọchite anya mpaghara Uhunmwode na State House.
Mgbe e nwepuchara Victor Edodor n'ụbọchị nke 3 n'ọnwa Mee afọ 2016, Elizabeth ghọọrọ nwanyị izizi bụ ọnụ na-ekwuru ụlọ ome iwu Edo Steeti na-esote n'iyi e duru ya n'ụbọchị nke 9 n'ọnwa Mee, afọ 2016.
N'ụbọchị nke 25 n'ọnwa Julaị, ọ gbadara bụrụ osote ọnụ na-ekwuru ụlọ ome iwu mgbe Onye ndu ọtụtụ ndị,bụ Folly Ogedengbe kpalitere mkpesa, onye kpọpụtara "matters of urgent public importance, for a change in the leadership of the House".
Onye nọchiri ya bụ Justin Okonoboh.
Oyeronke Akindele onye amụrụ n'abalị̀ asatọ nke onwa Eprel n'afọ 1946 bụ, bụ Sprinta nke Naịjirịa .
O sonyeere na 100 nke ụmụ nwanyị na 1968 Summer Olympics .
Nrụtúaka.

Sports Reference LLC.

Retrieved 30 June 2017.
Elizabeth Ogbaga bụ onye ọka ikpe Naijiria, nọọsụ na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị.
A hoputara ya n’ime ulo ome iwu nke gọọmentị etiti Naijiria n’afo 2007 ka o nochite anya ndi Ebonyi na Ohaukwu .
A hoputara ya n’okpuru otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ndi People's Democratic Party (PDP).
Otu Kọmitii.
Hon.
Elizabeth Ogbaga bụ onye otu kọmitii ndị a:
Ulo Omeiwu.
N’ọnwa Disemba, afọ 2009, Hon Elizabeth Ogbaga gosipụtara enweghị afọ ojuju ya n’ihe ọ kpọrọ ọkwa dị ala nke mmejuputa atumatu dị n’ime bọjeti afọ 2009.
Ọ na-akwado ọtụtụ iwu na atụmatụ ma na-akatọkarị adịghị ukwụu nke ụmụ nwanyị na ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị na-ekwu na ọ metụtara ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya 
Mpaghara.
Hon.
Elizabeth Ogbaga dọtara ọrụ dị iche iche dịka- Oxygen Plants na igwe Mammogram gaa Federal Medical Centre, Abakaliki, ọrụ nlekọta nwa na-enye ndị nne dị ime site na Ebonyi / Ohaukwu Federal Constituency n'efu, iwu ọtụtụ ụlọ klas atọ, olulu mmiri-mgbapụta na Onuenyim Ishieke, Ndiofia Nkaleke, Igweledoha, Ogbala Parish, Effenyim (Na-aga n’ihu), Oterufie Nkaleke, Ndiechi-Ndiugo Isophumini, Mbeke Isophumini, St. Michael Parish Mbeke Ishieke, Nwonuewo-Effium Ohaukwu, Ogen Ohaukwu na Umugadu Community Secondary School.
O wuru National Health Care Centres na Izenyi Agbaja n'okpuru ọchịchị gọọmentị Izzi na Ohagelode (na-aga n'ihu) ma zụọ ihe karịrị ndị ntorobịa 50 na ICT yana inye ha kọmputa na akọrọngwa.
Hon.
Elizabeth Ogbaga gara n'ihu wuo akwa mmiri gafere osimiri Ebonyi na Odomoke nụzọ Ogene-Abarigwe-Ogwudu-Ano-Unum n'okpuru gọọmentị Ohaukwu.
O wuru ulo oru komputa n'ulo akwukwo nke obodo Isophumini Ishieke, weputa oche ulo akwukwo na Umugadu community Primary School (na-aga n'ihu) ma weta tebụl ụlọ akwụkwọ, tebụl na oche na Ogbaga Primary School, Ohagelode Primary School, Girls Secondary School Ndulo Ngbo na Mbeke Isophumini Primary School. . Na mgbakwunye, ọ wuru ụlọ ndị fada ụka katọlik nọ na St. Michael Parish Mbeke were nye ụlọ mposi pụrụiche n’ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị Ohagelode, Ogbaga na Umugadu.
O kwenyere na inye ndi ntorobia ike ma were kwado otutu okwu di iche-iche n'asọmpi egwuregwu bọọlụ na inye onyinye nke trofi, onyinye nke ego na nkesa jenaretọ, kilipa na akọrọngwa ha nye ndị ntorobịa a zụrụ azụ.
Gọọmentị Ebonyi Steeti.
Ka ọnwa Juun dị na mkpụrụ ụbọchị iri abụọ na atọ n’afọ 2015, Gọvanọ Dave Umahi nke steeti Ebonyi họpụtara ya dịka kọmishọna.
Ndị isi ụlọ ọgbakọ omeiwu nabatara ya ma duo ya n'iyi na ọ ga-abụ onye isi nke Mịnịstrị Azụmaahịa ba ụlọ ọrụ n'ụbọchị nke 1 n'ọnwa Julaị, afọ 2015.
Imachibundu Oluwadara Onuzo FRSL (amuru ya na afọ 1991).
Ọ bu onye ọdee akwụkwọ na Naịjirịa.
Akwụkwọ mbụ ya bụ "Nwa nwanyị Spider King", meriri onyinye Betty Trask, ka edepụtara aha maka Dylan Thomas Prize na ihe onyo Commonwealth Book Prize, ma bụrụkwa ndị tegoro aka e wepụtara aha ha maka Desmond Elliott Prize na Etisalat Nrite maka ọdee akwụkwọ.
Biography.
A mụrụ Chibundu Onuzo na Naịjirịa na afọ otu puku 1, nke ọdụdụ n'ime ụmụaka anọ nne na nna bụ ndị dọkịta, tolitere na Lagos .
Ọ gakwara England mgbe ọ dị afọ ịrị na ano, ka ọ gaa gụọ akwụkwọ na ụlọ akwụkwọ ụmụ nwanyị niile na Winchester, Hampshire, maka GCSEs, na mgbe ọ dị afọ ịrị na asaa ka ọ malitere ide akwụkwọ mbụ ya, nke Faber bịanyere aka na akwụkwọ na ya na afọ abụọ mgbe e mesịrị Faber bipụtara ya bụ akwụkwọ mgbe ọ dị afọ ịrị abụọ na ọtụ.
Ọ bụ ya bụ nwata nwanyị pekarichara mpe na ọrụ ọdee akwụkwọ nke na-ede akwụkwọ nke ndị na ebipụta akwụkwọ weghaara.
Na ntule akwụkwọ ya nke abụọ, Nnọọ na "Lagos" (afọ puku abụọ na iri na isii), Helon Habila dere na "The Guardian" : "Ngosipụta nke Onuzo banyere agwa mmadụ na-abụkarị nchekwube, echiche ya banyere ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na ọha na eze na-enwe obi ebere; obodo Lagos, ikekwe agwa kacha mma na-adọrọ mmasị.
" 
Onuzo nwetara akara ugo mmụta bachelor nke mbụ na akụkọ ihe mere eme na King's College London (afọ puku abụọ na iri na abụọ), ma gaa n'ihu inweta ugo mmụta masters na iwu ọha na eze na Mahadum College London .
N'ihe dị ka afọ puku abụọ na iri na asaa, ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ PhD na King's College London.
Ọ bụ onye ntinye aka na akwụkwọ anthology "New Daughters of" 2019, nke Margaret Busby deziri.
Ọnụ na ude.
"Nwa nwanyi Spider King" meriri onyinye Betty Trask (afọ puku abụọ na iri na atọ), ma na afo puku abụọ na iri na abụọ ka edeputara aha ndi Dylan Thomas Prize na akwukwo ndi Commonwealth .
Nke ozo bu na achọrọ akwụkwọ ọhụrụ maka Desmond Elliott Prize na onyinye Etisalat maka akwụkwọ na afọ puku abụọ na atọ.
Na Eprel afọ puku abụọ na iri na ato ka ahoputara Onuzo maka akwụkwọ ndi Hay Festival nke Afrịka iri atọ na itenanị nke ndi ode akwukwo iri ato na ato nke di Sub-Saharan ndi erubeghị afo iri ano nwere ikike ha bu iji akowaputa odi n’iru n’ederede ala Africa.
Na ọnwa Juun afọ puku abụọ na asatọ ka a họpụtara Onuzo ka ọ bụrụ onye otu ndị Royal Society of Literature na atụmatụ ya na “40 Under 40”.
Na afọ puku abụọ na iri abụọ American Black Film Festival, HBO Short Film Asọmpi nke meriri bụ "Dolapo Is Fine", nke Onuzo dekọtara ya na ya bụ nke sitere na obere akụkọ ya bụ "Sunita".
Somkele Iyamah-Idhalama bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na ihe nlere na Naijiria.
Amara ya ama maka ọtụtụ ọrụ ihe nkiri ya gunyere "" (2016), "," "(2016), na" "(2013).
" O nwetara nsọpụrụ na onyinye dị iche iche na mmemme nke bụ ma na .
Amụrụ Iyamah na mpaghara Ika () South nke Steetị, na ezinulo Andrew na Onyi Iyamah.
Ọ bụ nwa nke atọ n’ime ụmụaka anọ.
Onye nkuzi bụ Mrs. Abe, webatara ya ịgba egwu na ihe nkiri ka ọ na-aga ụlọ akwụkwọ na .
Somkele nwere nzere na site na Mahadum .
O wepụtara onwe ya n'ọtụtụ ihe ngosi maka ọrụ ebere na McMaster ma rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye nlere n'oge ezumike akwụkwọ na Nigeria.
Ọrụ.
Ọrụ ya a ma ama maka TV nọ na AMVCA ndị a họpụtara na ndị a ma ama nke ọma gụnyere, 'GIDI UP' nke NdaniTv, Amazon 'THE EXPANSE' na 'CORONER' nke CBC.
Ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri emeela ka ya na ndị Nollywood kachasị nwee mmeko dịka na Kemi Adetiba na Danny Glover nke mere ihe nkiri 93 DAYS ebe Somkele mere dika otu n'ime ndị dọkịta dị ndụ bụ ndị oria Ebola jidere na Nigeria nke Steve Gukas duziri nke mechara merie ọtụtụ onyinye na nhọpụta na ụwa niile gunyere ELOY (maka nwaanyị kachasị mma nke afọ ahụ), nhọpụta AMVCA maka onye ọsọte nwanyị kachasị mma, mmeri AMVCA, mmeri TFAA, nhọpụta AMAA na AFRIFF
Ọ bụ onye nnọchite anya ọtụtụ nkwado ụlọ ọrụ dịka Multichoice Nigeria (DSTV Ambassador), Jewel Site Lisa, na "The Access Bank Lagos City Marathon".
Ọ na-eje ozi dịka Onyeisi Mpaghara otu ejiji nke bụ Andrea Iyamah.
Ndụ ya n'ime.
Somkele na-achịkwa otu ụlọ ejiji, "Andrea Iyamah", nke nwanne ya nwaanyị nke ọ tọrọ guzobere.
Ọ lụrụ Captain Aaron Idhalama, nnukwu mmadụ na onye ọkaibe na ụlọ ọrụ na ngalaba ụgbọ elu Naịjirịa.
Salma Phillips bụ onye ọrụ TV, Odee na onye ngosi ihe omume tivi si ugwu nke Nigeria .
Aha ya bụ Ummu Salma Nabila Phillips.
A maara ya nke ọma dịka ihu ngosi nke telivishọn dị n'ebe ugwu.
O nwetara diplọma iwu na Mahadum Jos, Naịjirịa ya na BSc iwu site na Rivers State University of Science and Technology,Port Harcourt.
Olile anya ya bụ ịbụ onye nta akụkọ nke CNN .
Ndabere.
Salma bụ ọkara Fulani na ọkara Calabari si n'akụkụ ugwu nke Nigeria na onye hụrụ egwu hip hop n'anya.
Ọrụ.
Salma gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum nke Jos, Naịjirịa, ma nata BSc iwu na Mahadum Science na Teknụzụ, Port Harcourt.
Salma na Asa onye ama ama n'egwu na Naịjirịa, gara otu koleg.
Na 7 February 2016, ọ malitere ihe ngosi Salma na-elekwasị anya na isi okwu akpụ n'ọnụ.
Site na BellaNaija ọ sịrị: "Nrom bịara na mmezu bụ ịbụ onye na-egosi mkparita Uka.
Achọrọ m ịnwe ikpo okwu ebe m nwere ike ikwupụta echiche m na isiokwu m nwere mmasị na ya.
Njem a malitere afọ atọ gara aga mgbe m gosipụtara ihe ngosi, agbanyeghị nsogbu na nkụda mmụọ.
Ekpebisiri m ike inye ihe ọ bụla m ga-eme iji nwee ihe ịga nke ọma.
Obi dị m ụtọ na m mechara hụ ka ọ na-emezu.
" Ndị nlereanya ya gụnyere Oprah Winfrey, Christian Amanpour, Funmi Iyanda na Femi Oke .
Oluchi Onweagba-Orlandi onye amụrụ na abali mbụ n’onwa nke asato n'afọ 1980 ,bụ onye ihe nlere anya nke Naịjirịa.
Mmalite Ndụ.
Onweagba tolitere na ala mgbalị nke Lagos, Naijiria, ya na ụmụnne ya ụmụ nwoke abụọ na ụmụ nwanyị .
Ọ bụ nwa nwanyị nke nne ya bụ nọọsụ na nna yabụ onye ọrụ obodo.
Nchọpụta.
Mgbe ọ gbara afọ iri na asaa, enyi ezinụlọ ha gwara Onweagba ka ọ banye na nyocha mbụ nke M-Net “Face of Africa” n’ụlọ ọrụ M-Net dị na Victoria Island, Lagos.
ụlọ ọrụ ahụ zulitere ya ka ọ bụrụ otu n’ime ndị batara ọhụrụ maka asọmpi a 1998 (nke a na-akpọzi Nokia Face of Africa).
Nke a n'agbanyeghị mgbe ọ na-etolite, ọ nọgidere na-amaghị ihe banyere ejiji na ịme ngosi uwe .
Mana na nkwado nke ezinụlọ ya na ndị enyi ya, o kpebiri ka o sonye asọmpi mbipụta mbụ nke Face of Africa na 1998.
Nke a bụ asọmpi mbụ nke kọntinenti niile, nke ndị South Africa na-ahazi M-Net na mmekorita ya na Elite Model Management .
Ọ meriri n'asọmpi ahụ.
Ọrụ.
Mgbe ọ kwagachara New York City, ebe ọ ka bi, ọ malitere ịpụta na nchịkọta akụkọ maka American na Italian "Vogue", "Harper's Bazaar", "Marie Claire", Allure,Nylon na W.
O jerela Gucci, Carolina Herrera, John Galliano, Missoni, Tommy Hilfiger, Chanel, Bottega Veneta, Christian Dior, Alessandro Dell'Acqua, Jeremy Scott, Helmut Lang, Fendi, Anna Sui, Givenchy, Kenzo, Giorgio Armani, Céline, Nina Ricci, na Diane Von Furstenberg ije nlereanya Azụmahịa.
Ọ gosiputakwala na mgbasa ozi Azụmahịa nke Gianfranco Ferré, Lancôme, Ann Taylor, Clinique, Bergdorf Goodman, Nordstrom, Macy's, Banana Republic, Gap, Express, L'Oreal, Coca-Cola ,ma gaa n'ihu irụrụ Victoria's Secret maka afọ asaa na ihe ngosi ejiji Victoria Secret kwa afọ .
Ya na ndị ọrụ foto dịka Steven Meisel, Nick Knight, David LaChapelle, na Patrick Demarchelier rụkọrọ ọrụ .E wezụga ịme ihe ngosi ejiji ,Onweagba na-agba mbọ ije ozi dị ka onye nlereanya maka ndị ọzọ nwere ọnụnụ ọkụ n'obi na Naịjirịa, ọkachasị ụmụ agbọghọ.
Ọ wepụtara onwe ya na oge maka ndị otú ọrụ akwụ ụgwọ NGO dị ka LEAP Africa (ndị ọzụzụ maka akụ onwe) na NIPRO.
Ọ malitekwara agụmakwụkwọ ya dị elu, ebe ọ gụbuuru maka akara ugo mmụta dịgri na usoro agụmakwụkwọ New York City.Mgbe nkwekọrịta ya na Elite nọrọ afọ atọ bịara na njedebe, Onweagba binyere aka na DNA Model Management.
ọ gosiputala na "Sports Illustrated Swimsuit Issue" ugboro atọ.
N’afọ 2008, ọ butere ụlọ ọrụ n'ahụ maka ihe nlereanya na South Africa, OModel Africa, nwee isi ụlọ ọrụ na Johannesburg na nso nso Cape Town.
Onye mmeri nke M-Net Face nke Africa, Kate Tachie-Menson na 2008, nyere OMDel Africa nkwekọrịta mbupute US $ 50,000.  ọ bụ ugbu a onye ọbịa na onye isi ọka ikpe nke Africa Next Top Model .
Ndụ onwe.
Aha mbụ Onweagba sitere n’asụsụ Igbo ma pụtakwa “Ọlụ Chukwu”.
N’afọ 2006, Onweagba lụrụ onye Italian fashọn dizaina aha ya bụ Luca Orlandi.
Ha nwere ụmụ nwoke abụọ.
Nneka Ukuh Onye amụrụ na abali iri-abuo n’ime onwa iri na otu n’afọ 1987 bụ nwanyị Nigeria na agba ọsọ.
Ọ bụ ọkachamara na egwuregwu Hai jọmpụ ma ama ya ama nke ọma maka iritere ọla edo obodo ya West Africa ọla edo na 2003 All-Africa Games .
Amarachi Okafor onye amụrụ n'afọ 1977 bụ Omenka nke Naịjirịa ,onye ọrụ ya lekwasịrị anya n'omenala, okpukpe, akụkọ ihe mere eme, ihe gbasara jenda, mmekọahụ nke mmadụ, na ọtụtụ okwu akpụ n'ọnụ dị ka mgbasa nke Ebola virus na Afrika.
Mmalite ndu na mmụta.
Amụrụ Okafor na Umuahia .
N'afọ 2002 ọ gụrụ maka nka na Mahadum nke Naijirịa na 2007, n'otu Mahadum a, ọ nwetere nzere masta na ngalaba nka .
Ọrụ.
Okafor bụ onye òtù nke El Anatsui si Atelier na ngwụcha 1990s.
Okafor na-aru oru eserese Ọ bụ onye nlekọta na NGA (National Gallery of Art) na Abuja n'etiti 2008 na 2014.
Na 2007 o meriri ebe obibi ndị omenaala Unesco-Aschberg, ya na Commonwealth Foundation Commonwealth "Connections" na 2010.
Na 2014, ọ bụ onye mbụ na 2014 National Art Competition, wee merie ihe ngbata nke mkpebi n'afọ ahụ.
O gosipụtara na 2015 Jogja Biennale.
Doris Jacob Onye amụrụ n'abalị̀ iri na isii n'ime onwa Desemba n'afọ 1981, bụ Sprinta Nigeria ma bụrụ ọkachamara na 400 mita .
Doris mgbara onye nke asaa na mita 4 x 400 na 1997 World Championship, ya na ndị otu egwuregwu Olabisi Afolabi, Fatima Yusuf na Falilat Ogunkoya .
Isonye na egwuregwu a na 2000 Summer Olympics, ndị otu a gunyere Jacob, Afolabi, Rosemary Okafor na Charity Opara setịpụrụ akụkọ mba nke nkeji 3: 22.99 na ọṅụṅụ ọkụ Jacob nyekwara aka nweta nrite ọla nchara na 2002 Commonwealth Games .
Na ọkwa onye ọ bụla, Jekọb ritere ọla ọcha na 2003 All-Africa Games na ọla nchara na 1999 Summer Universiade, onye a n'ekwu maka ya na oge kachasị ya mma bụ 51.04 sekọnd.
Orompoto (a na-sụpekwa ya ka Oronpoto ) bụ nwanyị nke , alaeze ndị Yoruba.
Alaeze ahụ ọ chịrị dịzị ugbu a na mpaghara nke ọdịda anyanwụ na etiti-ugwu (north-central) Nigeria.
Akụkọ ihe mere eme.
Orompoto bụ nwanne nwanyị onye nke bu ya ụzọ chịa, .
Ọ bụ nwanyị izizi bụ “eze” nke Oyo n’oge ana-enwe ọchịchị alaeze, bụrụkwa nwanyị izizi kemgbe onye chịburu alaeze ahụ bụ Yeyeori.
Orompoto batara n'oche eze ahụ n'ihi na onweghị nwoke ga-anochi anya n'ime ezinụlọ ha n'oge ahụ.
O nyeere aka chụpụ ndị na Oyo n'ime afo 1555.
Orompoto biri na oge narị afọ nke iri na isii.
Orompto bụ eze Oyo nke abụọ chịrị n’isi obodo ọhụrụ nke .
Ufọdụ akụkọ ọdịnala nke ihe ndekọ a na-edeghị ede kwuru na ọ ghọrọ nwoke site na mgbagoju anya tupu ọ banye n'ocheeze ebe ahụ.
Orompoto jiri inyinya lụọ otutu agha nke ana-ekwu na o nwere ike o bụrụ na ka onwetara ha.
A kowara na ọ bụ ezigbo ọkaibe n'ịnyịnya, ma mepụta usoro pụrụ iche nke ndị agha ya jiri kwudosie ike n'okpuru .
N'ihe ahubeghi mbu, ndi agha ya bu ndi di ike a na-atu egwu, luru otutu agha megide ndi ilo nke obodo Oyo.
Dika onye agha mara nke ekwe na-aku, a sịrị na ọ goiputara ihe di iche n'ọgụ nke Illayi.
Mgbe ọ na-alụso ndi ilo ya ọgụ ahu, ndị ọchịagha atọ tufuru ndu ha n'ike.
Ha bu "Gbonkas" na Oyo.
Onye nke atọ n’ime ha ka ekwenyere na ọ dara mana ihu ya kpọchiri na ọchi na -enweghị atụ.
Ndị iro ahụ chere na ọ ka dị ndụ ma na-eme ihe ọchị.
Ma o gbogojuru ha anya mgbe ha hụrụ na ha enweghị ike ị bụ okacha mma na ebe ndi Oyo gbonkas nọ.
Ha gbahapụrụ agha ahụ na-enweghi afọ ojuju wee laa nke mere na ndi Oyo weere mmeri.
Onye nọchiri ya bụ Ajiboyede .
Uchenna Charity Onwuamaegbu bụ onye Naịjirịa na akuzi nkụzi STEM ma bụkwa onyeisi ndị otu bọọdu na ahụ maka ịtụ pụta alo na Anambra Steeti, ma bụrụkwazie onye isi oche nke EdufunTechnik 
Uchenna Charity Onwuamaegbu bụ onye Naịjirịa na akuzi nkụzi STEM ma bụkwa onyeisi ndị otu bọọdu na ahụ maka ịtụ pụta alo na Anambra Steeti, ma bụrụkwazie onye isi oche nke EdufunTechnik bụ natara Global Gold Award Medal na Teknụzụ World Code na Pitch Challenge, maka ụmụaka umunwanyi na Silicon Valley, USA .
Ọ bụkwa Mandela Washington Fellow maka ndị ndu ntorobịa Africa a ma ama ma zụọ ụmụ ụmụaka ụmụnwanyị puku ise na narị isii na ịrị na ịse n'ime ime obodo dị n'akụkụ ọwụwa anyanwụ Naịjirịa na coding, robotics na sayensị, teknụzụ, Injinịa na Mgbakọ na mwepụ, STEM, Mmụta.
O nwetara nzere bachelọ na Psychology, na Mahadum Nnamdi Azikiwe nke dị na Naịjirịa.
O tinyela aka n' ịhụ na ụmụaka ụmụnwanyị nwere nsogbu ọgụgụ isi nke obodo ya nwetara akwukwo a choro ma nweta mmuta nke ga enyere ha aka iweta mgbanwe n’obodo ha.
Ọ bụ onye na-aru ọrụ ebere ebe ọ kwara ụzọ inweta agụmakwụkwọ maka umunwanyị nwere nsogbu ọgụgụ isi.
Site na nzukọ ya ọ ahazi asọmpi kwa afọ nke na enyefe ụmụ akwụkwọ nọ n'ime ime obodo aka iwulite ihe eji eme ihe na obodo - Ngwa ngwa ngwa nke ngwa ọgụgụ na mmekọrịta ya na Google, ọ nweela ike ịkụziri ụmụ akwụkwọ, ndị nkuzi na ndị nne na nna ikike dijitalụ na nchekwa dị mmụta n'ịntanetị.
Ndidi Onukwulu bu onye ọ bụ abụ na Canadia ma na amuru ya na British Columbia.
Agbanyeghi na akuko uzo ya dika jazz na uhie uhie, Onukwulu jikọtara otutu egwu di egwu ya na egwu ndi nwere egwu egwu, egwu ndi elektrik, egwu ozioma na nke obodo.
Ọ na-agagharila na Canada ya na Europe ugboro ugboro iji kwado ihe ndekọ ya.
Ọ bụ ezie na Onukwulu enweghị ọ dị obere ma ọ tụghịuche ịrụ ọrụ dịka ọbụ abụ ruo mgbe ndị 
Ọ bụ ezie na Onukwulu enweghị mmasị ọ bụla n'egwú mgbe ọ dị obere ma ọ tụghịuche ịrụ ọrụ dịka ọbụ abụ ruo mgbe ndị enyi ya nụrụ ka ọ na-abụ abụ n'okenye ya.
Ọ kwagara New York City, ebe ọ bụrụ abụ na sekit na-emeghe emeghe.
Na oge ya na New York, ọ zutere ọtụtụ ndị na-egwu egwu hip-hop na ndị na-acha anụnụ anụnụ bụ ndị metụtara ụdị ya.
Ọzọ Onukwulu kwagara Toronto ebe mbụ ọ ghọrọ onye otu egwu egwu.
Mgbe e mesịrị, ọ banyere n'òtù electronica Kwụsị Kwụsị Resuscitate.
Ka oge na-aga, Onukwulu laghachiri n'ụdị acha anụnụ anụnụ ma malite ịrụ ọrụ na ebe ndị a ma ama gụnyere Massey Hall dị na Toronto.
Na Jenụwarị 2006 Onukwulu wepụtara album izizi ya bụ "Mba, M Abughi" .
Mbupute album ahụ sochiri njem nke mere ka ọ daa ụda na obodo ndị Canada.
Site na mgbasa ọjọọ na Disemba puku abụọ na isii, Onukwulu jiri afọ puku abụọ na asaa depụta egwu ọhụrụ.
Na mgbakwunye na ị nweta mmụta nke mmekọrịta ya, ọ nwetara amamihe pụrụ iche site na ịga n'ebe elili ozu na echepụta akụkọ maka ndị nwụrụ anwụ ndị nno n'ili ọ gara.
Onukwulu jikọtara echiche nke ọnwụ na njedebe mmekọrịta iji mepụta egwu na-atọ ụtọ nke pụtara na ọba nke abụọ "The Contradictor" .
Akwukwo a webatara uzo di iche iche nke eji mara ya ugbu a. Edebere album ahụ site na esemokwu dị n'etiti egwu na-ada ụda na isiokwu ya dị oke njọ, na mgbakwunye na njirimara nke onye ọbụ abụ.
"Onye na-emegiderịta onwe ya", nke ewepụtara ka ọnwa Juun dị na mkpụrụ ụbọchị iri na asaa na afọ puku abụọ na asatọ, bụ Steve Dawson mepụtara n'okpuru akara ndekọ Indie nke Jeriko Beach Music .
Mgbe ahụ ọ gara Europe, ebe ọ bịanyere aka ya na Universal Jazz na Classics France wee gaa dee ma dekọọ ọba egwu abụọ ọzọ "The Escape" na afọ puku abụọ na ịrị na otu na "Dark Swing" na afọ puku abụọ na ịrị na anọ.
Hụ kwa.
Madagascar Ebughibu&lt;/br&gt; Ememme Music nke Vancouver
Janet Edeme bụ nwaafọ Naịjirịa bụ ọkà mmụta sayensị na ọrụ ugbo ( ) na ihe omụmụ banyere osisi (plant biologist,) na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye Director nke Ngalaba Na-ahụ Maka Ime Obodo na Ọrụ Ugbo na (AUC / DREA), nke dị na , .
AUC / DREA bụ ngalaba n'ime , na-ahụ maka ịkwalite mmepe ime obodo na-adigide site na ọrụ ugbo na mmelite nke nchekwa nri metụtara mpaghara Afrika.
Ndabere na agụmakwụkwọ.
Edeme bụ nwaafọ Naịjirịa amụrụ, zụlite ma gụọ akwụkwọ na obodo ya.
O nwere asambodo nke Sayensị (Master of Science) na buruzie ọkachamara na Plant Pathology, nke Mahadum nke Ibadan nyere.
Ndi Mahadum nke Ibadan na Texas A&amp;amp;M University nke College Station, Texas di na United States na International Institute for Tropical Agriculture (IITA), na Ibadan jikotarara aka were nye ya akara ugo mmụta Doctor of Philosophy .
Ahụmịhe ọrụ.
Ọrụ na nyocha Edeme lekwasịrị anya na ngalaba sayensị nke oru ugbo.
O mere nyocha post-doctoral na (ILRI), na .
Ọ kụziri ihe n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ya bu mahadum nke Ibadan.
O jekwara ozi dị ka onye ndụmọdụ ọkachamara nye otutu ndị otu, nke gụnyere (UNAIDS) na (FAO).
Ihe ndị ọzọ.
Edeme bụ onye otu ndị isi ochichi nke AfricaSeeds, ndị na-ahụ maka mmekorita gọọmentị etiti, n’ime African Union, na-ahụ maka itinye n'oru atumatu ndi African Seed na Biotechnology.
Joanne Aluka (amụrụ na Eprel 26, 1979 na , ) bụ nwanyi eji egwuregwu basketball mara na Nigerian American women's basketball .
Mmalite Ndụ na Mmụta.
Amuru ya na Mississippi na United States ma nweta Citizenship ka nwa afọ Naijiria site na ndi nne na nna ya .
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Hephzibah High School na steeti Georgia nke U.S. Ọ gụru akwụkwọ na Middle Tennessee State nweta nzere bachelọ na Behavioral Science na 2001.
O gakwara n'ihu n'igu akwukwo iji mezue ogo mmụta Master na Human Performance nke gbadoro ukwu na itinye uche na Sports Management na 2003.
Ọ lụrụ Fred White ha abụọ amuta ejima: Daniel na Gabrielle.
Ọrụ.
Aluka sonyeere na egwuregwu 2004 Summer Olympics nke Nigeria women's national basketball team.
na Athens Greece.
Mgbe emechara Olimpiks, Aluka sonyere ndi egwuregwu Dallas Fury na National Women's Basketball League.
Aluka nwetara ọrụ izizi mbụ ya na nkuzi ihe banyere basketball na FIU ebe ọrụ ya gụnyere inye aka na ntinye, egwuregwu, ya na nkwalite na ogige amps. . Tupu ọ banye na n'oru nkuzi na nchịkwa basketball, ọ rụpụtara ọrụ ya nke ọma na egwuregwu na Middle Tennessee State (1997-2002).
