Oliver De Coque
Aha Oliver Sunday Akanite
Ọmụmụ April 14, 1947
Ebe osi Ezinifite, Nnewi South, Anambra Steeti,
Ọnwụ Juunu 20, 2008 (afọ 61)
Nkenụụdị Igbo haịlaịf
Aka ọrụ Ọgwụ egwu, Ọdee egwu, Ọmebe egwu, Ọkpọọ Jita
Afọ Ịrụsị Ọrụ ike 1965–2008
Labeelụ Olumo Records Nigeria Limited
Igwe (Dr.) Chiifụ Oliver De Coque (amụrụ Oliver Sunday Akanite ) bụ onye na-akpọ jita na Naịjirịa n'otu n'ime ndị nke ama ama ama na Afrika.
Kemgbe mgbe ọ wepụtara abọm izizi ya bụ Messiah na 1977, Coque edekọala ma ọ pekata mpe abọm iri iteghete na atọ n'ala nna ya.
Egwú ya na-akpali egwu "Ogene" nke haịlaịf nke Naịjirịa, nke na-agwakọta haịlaịf nke oge a na egwu ọdịnala Igbo, mepụtara ụdị egwu dịka "people's Club of Naịjirịaa", "nempi social club", "Biri Ka Mbiri," "Ana Enwe", " Nnukwu Mmanwu, "na" Identity, "bụ nke nọgidere na Redio Nigeria egwu iri nọ n'elu n'ime afọ 1981 niile.
Ịkpọ egwu kemgbe ọ dị afọ 11, Piccolo onye Congo na-akpọ jita bi na Naịjirịa kụziiri Coque ịkpọ jita.
Ọ mụrụ ọrụ n'aka Sunny Agaga na Jacob Oluwale ndị na-eti egwu "juju", Ọ bụ onye egwu ama ama na ntorobịa ya.
A na-ahụkwa Oliver dịka onye egwu Igbo na-anụ ọkụ n’obi.
Ọ dọtara uche ndị mba ụwa mgbe ọ gosipụtara akara aka ya na London na 1973, ọ kpọrọ egwu n'abọm Prince Nico Mbarga na "Sweet Mother" ka afọ anọ gachara.
Ọ bụ Igede International Band nke nwanne ya nwoke bụ Eugene na-akwado karị ya mgbe ahụ.
Ụmụ Oliver ndị nwoke bụ Edu de Coque, Safin de Coque na Solar de Coque bụkwa ndị na-eti egwu.
Ọ nwụrụ mgbe ọ dị afọ iri isi na otu (61) na 2008.
Oliver de coque lụrụ nwunye anọ ma mụta ụmụ iri na abụọ.
Empress Njamah bụ nwaafọ Naịjirịa na -eme ihe nkiri.
N'afọ 2012, a họpụtara ya n'ihe nrite "best supporting actress" na Afrika Movie Academy Awards, mana Terry Pheto meriri ya.
Ndụ onwe.
Ndị nne na nna Njamah sitere na Naijiria na Kameruun.
Ọ bụ onye nwtara nzere bachelọ n'agụmagụ Bekee na Mahadum nke Olabisi Onabanjo,dị na Ogun Steeti .
Ya na Timaya yiburu, mana mmekọrịta ahụ kwụsịrị mgbe ọ ghọọrọ isiokwu nke mkparịta ụka na soshal midia.
N’ikwu okwu banyere ọnọdụ alụm di na nwunye ya, ọ kọwara na ị nọ n’alụghị di anaghị enye ya nsogbu ebe ọ bụ na ndị ezinụlọ ya maara ihe ma ghọta na oke ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụ nwoke ahaghị.
Ọ gara n'ihu ị kọwa na alụmdi na nwunye ndị a ma ama anaghị adịgide, na ọ nweghị isi ọ bụla i mefu ego maka agbamakwụkwọ nke na-agaghị adịgide n'oge.
N'ihe gbasara "baby mama " na Nollywood, ọ kọwara "The Punch" na ọtụtụ n'ime ụmụ nwanyị na-eme ihe nkiri na-alụbeghị nwanyị nwere ụmụaka na-akwa mmakwaara maka usoro ndụ ha mana ha enweghị obi ike iji kwuo nke ahụ n'ihu ọha.
Ọrụ.
Ọ malitere i me ihe nkiri n'afọ 1995.
Dịka akụkụ nke ọrụ ya na-elekọta mmadụ, ọ malitere ntọala a na-akpọ "House of Empress", nke na-elekọta ụmụaka nwere mkpa pụrụ iche.
Ntọala ahụ mere emume ncheta afọ nke iri ya n'afọ 2016.
Emueje Ogbiagbevha bụ onye egwu bọọlụ Naịjirịa na-agbara FC Minsk bọọlụ ugbu a na Premier League nke Belarus .
Ọ gaburu bọọlụ na BIIK Kazygurt na Kazakhstani Championship, na Russian Championship mgbe ọ nọ na Rossiyanka na Energiya Voronezh .
Ọ bụ onye kachasị nweta akara goolu nke afọ 2010 n'egwuregwu ahụ mgbe ọ na-agbara ndị Rossiyanka bọọlụ, nke o meriri okpukpu abụọ.
Ọ gbabuorola ndị otu Energiya Voronezh na Kazygurt bọọlụ na Champions League, ọ bụkwa onye otu ndị otu egwuregwu bọọlụ Naịjirịa.
Nkwekorita ya na BIIK Kazygurt bịara na njedebe na ngwụch nke afọ 2012.
N’afọ 2016, Ogbiagbevha banyere otu egwuregwu FC Minsk .
N'oge egwuregwu bọọlụ afọ 2019-2020, ọ ghọọrọ nwanyị Afrịka mbụ nwetara ihe nrite (nkekọrịta) UEFA Women's Champions League topscorer.
Mgbe oge ahụ gasịrị, nkwekọrịta ya gwụchara na Minsk.
Ọrụ mmalite.
Ọ gbabuola bọọlụ na Pelican Stars FC, Nasarawa Amazons na Delta Queens FC na Nigeria Women Premier League .
Endurance Ojokolo (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 29 n'ọnwa Septemba nke afọ 1975 na Lọndọn,na United Kingdom ) bụbu onye Naijiria na-eme egwuregwu ị gba ọsọ nke puru 100 mitas .
Ene Franca Idoko (onye a muru n'ụbọchị nke 25 n’ime ọnwa Juun nke afọ1985, n'obodo Benue ) bu onye Naijiria nke na-eme egwuregwu ị gba ọsọ 100 mitas Oge ya kachasị mma karịa na 100 m bụ 11.14 sekọnsụ, o nwetere n'ọnwa Julaị afọ 2008 n'Abuja .
Oge ya kachasị mma karịa na 60 m bụ 7.09 sekọnsụ, o nwetara na Febụwarị afọ 2008 na Chemnitz .
O meriri nrite ọla nchara ndị otu egwuregwu 4 x 100 mitas nke Afrika na 2006 IAAF World Cup .
Na 60 mitas o nwetara ọkwa nke asaa na 2008 IAAF World Indoor Championship .
Na ọ gbara onye nke anọ na 100 mitas.
Na na Beijing, ọ sọrọ mpi na 100 mitas .
Na nke mbụ ya na-ekpo ọkụ, ọ gbara pnye nke anọ, na-ebutekarị mkpochapu, mana oge ya nke 11.61 sekọnsụ bụ otu n'ime oge 10 na-efu ngwa ngwa, nke nyere ya ohere na nke abụọ.
N'ebe ahụ, ọ dara iru eru maka ọkara ikpeazụ ka oge ya nke 11.66 bụ naanị oge nke asaa nke okpomọkụ ya.
Ya na Gloria Kemasuode, Agnes Osazuwa na Oludamola Osayomi sonyekwara na 4x100 mitas .
Na ikpo oku nke mbụ, ha nwetara ọkwa nke anọ n'azụ Beljọm, Briten na Brazịl .
Oge ha nke 43.43 bụ oge kachasị mma na-erughị eru na oge nke isii n'ozuzu nke mba iri na isii sonyere.
Site na ihe a ha nwetara, ha tozuru oke na nke ha ji Halimat Ismaila dochie Osazuwa.
Ha gbara ọsọ ruo oge nke 43.04 sekọnsụ, ọkwa nke atọ na ọla nchara n'azụ Rọshịa na Beljọm.
N’afọ 2016,a gbapụrụ ndị otu Rọshịa ma napụ ha ihe nrite ọla edo ha n’ihi ịda iwu ị gba ọgwụ ike nke otu n’ime ndị ọgba ọsọ Rọshịa, Yuliya Chermoshanskaya, were si otú ahụ kwalite Naịjirịa n’ọnọdụ ọla ọcha.
Eniola Badmus, (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị 7 nke n'ọnwa Septemba, afọ1983), bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na Naịjirịa .
Ọ bịara pụta ìhè n'afọ 2008 mgbe o gosipụtara na ihe nkiri ahụ "Jenifa" .
Mmalite ndu na mmuta.
A mụrụ Eniola na Legọs nke Naijiria, ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ praịmarị na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Ijebu Ode Ọ gara Mahadum nke Ibadan ebe ọ gụrụ Theater Arts na mahadum nke Lagos Steeti ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ nzere masta na Ekọnọmiks .
Ọrụ.
Ọrụ Eniola na ịbụ onye ọkaibe bidoro n’afọ 2000 ruo n’afọ 2008 mgbe ọ pụtara ihe n'ihe nkiri yoroba abụọ a kpọrọ "Jenifa" na "Omo Ghetto" .
Ihe nkiri abụọ ahụ nyere aka na ịrị elu ya na ụlọ ọrụ ntụrụndụ nke Naijiria bụ nke hụworo ya na i du ma na nkwado ndị na-eme ihe nkiri na ọtụtụ ihe nkiri yoroba na Bekee .
Asịrị Ọnwụ.
N;ụbọchị nke iri abuo nke onwa Ọktoba nke afọ 2020, ka anụrụ na Eniola ka agbagburu n’oge ogbugbu Lekki nke ndi ngagharị iwe #EndSARS Kosiladị, ọ gbaghaara asịrị ahụ na ọ nwụọla ma kwuo n'eziokwu na ya anọghị n'oge ngagharị iwe ahụ.
Ihe nkiri.
Nhọrọ ihe nkiri.
"Ndekọ ihe nkiri a ezughi ezu,i nwere ike tinye aka denye ụfọdụ"
Nkwado ụlọ ahịa.
N'ọnwa Maachị afọ 2016, ka emeputara Eniola dika onye nnochi anya nke ụlọ ọrụ nkwukọrịta Etisalat .
Onyinye na nhoputa.
Best movie actress city people 2017 Best actress 2018 (Plus size African fashion week)
Mayowa Adegbile (Mayowa Abisola Adegbile; amụrụ na 10 Septemba 1986) bụ onye Naịjirịa Philanthropist amara nke ọma dị ka otu n'ime ndị Naịjirịa atọ sonyere na mmadu iri kachasị elu na ngwụcha afọ 2014 na asọmpi Africa Connected.
Adegbile bu ụzọ jiri na-enweta ego maka ebumnuche ya, Ashake Foundation nke o chepụtara dịka ụlọ akwụkwọ azụmaahịa maka ndị nne di ha nwụrụ, inye ha ngwaọrụ ga-enyere ha aka ibi ndu ma kwado ezinụlọ ha.
Ntọala Ashake.
Adegbile malitere Ashake Foundation na 2012 na ọnụọgụ ụmụ nwanyị iri abụọ (22) ndi di ha nwugoro na umuaka iri atọ na isii (36) ma nye ha ego nkwado azụmaahịa na akụrụngwa nke mere ka ewepụrụ ha ụbiam ma kwado ụmụaka ha ilaghachi na ụlọ akwụkwọ.
Gwọ.
Na Julaị, 2017, ndị Junior Chamber International nyere Adegbile onyinye dika otu n’ime mmadụ iri na-eto eto kacha mma na Naijiria maka ọrụ Humanitarian na Voluntary Leadership.
Sophie Bosede Oluwole (Mee 12, 1935 - 23 Disemba 2018) bụ onye ọkà ihe ọmụma Afrika.
Oluwole bụ nwaanyị mbụ nwetara nzere PhD na nkà ihe ọmụma na Naijiria.
Ọ bụ onye na-arụ ọrụ na nkà ihe ọmụma , ụzọ iche echiche nke sitere na omenala ndị Yoruba na Nigeria.
Ọ na-ekwusi ike banyere ọrụ ụmụ nwanyị na nkà ihe ọmụma, na nnọchite na-ezughi oke nke ndị na-eche echiche n'Afrika na agụmakwụkwọ.
Ndụ na ọrụ.
A mụrụ Sophie Bosede Oluwole na May 12, 1935.
Nne na nna ya bụ ndị Edo.
O nwekwara ihe nketa Nupe, dịka nna nna ya bụ Tapa, okwu ndị Yoruba jiri mara ndị .
A zụlitere ya na steeti .
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ na , ma na-akatọ usoro agụmakwụkwọ nke afọ 1940, na-ekwu na atụmanya ọrụ nke nwanyị "abụghị ebumnuche gị: ọ bụ ebumnuche ndị mụrụ gị.
" Oluwole kowara na otu ihe mere mgbe ọ nọ na-ụlọ akwụkwọ, e zigara ya ụlọ ọgwụ ka o kesaa nri na ọgwụ maka ndị ọrịa na-arịa ọtụtụ ọrịa.
Ọ siri na ụjọ jidere ya, na-asị "N'ụbọchị ahụ, amaara m Agaghị m abụ nọọsụ.
"
Ọ gụrụ History, Geography na Philosophy na na Lagos, ma mesịa lekwasị anya na nkà ihe ọmụma.
Mgbe o nwetara nzere mbụ ya, e were ya n'ọrụ na UNILAG dị ka osote onye nkuzi na 1972, wee gaa mezue PhD na nkà ihe ọmụma na Mahadum nke .
Oluwole bụ nwaanyị mbụ nwetara nzere PhD na nkà ihe ọmụma na Naijiria.
Mgbe ọ ghọrọ prọfesọ, Oluwole kụziri nkà ihe ọmụma nke Afrika na UNILAG site na 2002 ruo 2008.
Nkuzi na ọrụ Oluwole banyere na-echiche amamihe nke Yoruba, nke dabere na omenala na okpukpe () nke mpaghara dị iche iche nke ala .
Dị ka Oluwole si kwuo, ngalaba echiche amamihe nke Yoruba tọ karị ọdịnala ọdịda anyanwụ, dị ka onye ọkà ihe ọmụma Afrika oge ochie bụ si tọ karụ site na atụmatụ ya.
Mmadu abuo a, ndi nnochite anya ụkpụrụ nke ọdịnala Africa na nke ọdịda anyanwụ, bụ ihe abụọ kachasị emetụta Oluwole, ọ tụnyekwara ha abụọ n'akwụkwọ ya bụ "Socrates" na "Orunmila".
Ọ nwụrụ n'ụtụtụ mbido nke 23 Disemba 2018 mgbe ọ dị afọ 83.
Stella Chinyelu Okoli (, ) (amụrụ c. 1944) bụ onye ọkà mmụta ọgwụ na ọchụnta ego.
Ọ bụ onye guzobere Emzor Pharmaceutical, ụlọ ọrụ na-emepụta ọgwụ na Naijiria.
Mmalite ndu na mmuta.
A mụrụ Stella na , n'ezinụlọ Felix Ebelechukwu na Margaret Modebelu, ndị sitere na na steeti .
Ọ malitere agụmakwụkwọ ya na 1954 mgbe ọ debanyere aha dị ka nwa akwụkwọ na All Saint Primary School, Onitsha tupu ya agaa ụlọ na 1964 na Ogidi Girls Secondary School, .
Na 1969, Stella gụrụ mmuta na Mahadum .
O nwetara nzere mastas na mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum , na 1971.
Tupu ọ guzobe Emzor Pharmaceutical, Stella rụrụ ọrụ n'ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ ọgwụ gụnyere , na Pharma-Deko.
Na Jenụwarị 1977, Stella guzobere Emzor Pharmaceutical nke nwere aha izizi "Emzor Chemists Limited" dịka obere ụlọ ahịa ahịa ọgwụ na , Steeti.
Kemgbe ahụ, Emzor Pharmaceutical abụrụla otu n'ime ndị isi ụlọ ọrụ ọgwụ na Naijiria nwere ihe karịrị ngwaahịa iri ise kemgbe a malitere ya na 1984.
Onye otu so nọ na nzukọ Economic Summit Forum na "Health Matters Advisory Board" nke Naijiria, Stella na-eje ozi ugbu a dị ka onye isi oche otu nke ndị na-emepụta ihe na Naijiria na nzuko ndị ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka azụmaahịa nke Nigeria ma ngalaba mmepụta, na ọrụ ugbo.
O jere ozi dị ka onye isi oche nke ndị na-emepụta ọgwụ na ndị na-emepụta ọtụtụ ihe dị iche iche nke Nigeria.
Ọrụ ebere.
Mgbe nwa ya nwoke Chike Okoli nwụrụ na 2005, Stella bidoro Chike Okoli Foundation n’afọ 2006 dị ka nzukọ nke na ebumnuche nke ịlụso ịda ogbenye na ọrịa ọgụ site na ime ka a mara banyere .
Ọ na-ejekwa ozi na Chike Okoli Centre maka Nnyocha Azụmaahịa.
Onyinye na nsọpụrụ.
Na nkwanye ugwu maka ihe ọ rụzuru na mgbalị ya na ngalaba ahụike na Naịjirịa, enyere Stella onyinye nke .
Na 2012, a kwanyere ya ugwu na mmemme nke 17th "Annual Awards".
O bụ onye nwetara "ECOWAS International Gold Award".
Stella Jane Thomas (mechara zaa Stella Marke) (mụrụ 1906 - nwụọ 1974) bụ onye ọkàiwu na Naijiria si ala Yoruba ma bụrụ onye nna nna ya si mba .
O nwetara nzere nke iwu na Mahadum ma na 1943 ọ ghọrọ nwanyị mbụ ọka ikpe na Naijiria.
Mmalite ndu na mmuta.
A mụrụ Stella Thomas na 1906, na , Nigeria, ada Peter John Claudius Thomas, onye ọchụnta ego si Sierra Leone nke dị na Lagos.
Nna ya bụ onye Afrika mbụ chịrị .
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ na , "ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị kacha ochie maka ụmụ agbọghọ na West Afrika.
" Nwanne ya nwoke bụ ghọrọ onye ọkwọ ụgbọ ala West Afrika mbụ enyere ọrụ na n'oge .
Nwanne ya nwoke ọzọ, Stephen Peter Thomas, bụ onye isi ọkaikpe izizi nke mpaghara Mid-West.
Mgbe ọ na-agụ akwụkwọ iwu na Oxford ma bụrụ onye otu dị na London, ọ na-arụsi ọrụ ike na nzukọ , yana otu nke , nke guzobere.
O bi na , ma sonye na mmepụta mbụ nke onye Jamaica na-ede uri , At What Price, nke e gosiri na .
Ọrụ.
Thomas bụ nwaanyị Afrika mbụ akpọrọ n'ọrụ ọkàiwu na Great Britain, na 1933.
Na 1934, ọ bụ naanị nwanyị Afrika sonyere na mkparịta-ụka nke haziri na , o were ohere ahụ ịkatọ na ọrụ ọ rụrụ na-Afrika n'ihu ndị nnukwu mmadu na-ege ntị.
Mgbe ọ laghachiri West Africa, ọ bụ nwanyị ọkàiwu mbụ na West Afrika niile.
Mgbe ọ laghachitere West Afrika, ọ debara aha ya na mbụ na ọrụ iwu nke Sierra Leone mana na Disemba 1935, ọ laghachiri Lagos wee guzobe ọrụ iwu na Kakawa Street, .
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'ọtụtụ okwu ikpe, gụnyere ikpe mpụ na nsogbu ezinụlọ, yana ndị ọka iwu Alex E. J. Taylor na Eric Moore rụkọkwara ọrụ.
Na 1943, ọ ghọrọ nwanyị mbụ ọka ikpe nke West Afrika, na-arụ ọrụ n'ụlọikpe nke nọ na nwere ikike maka mpaghara , na .
O mechara bụrụ onye ọka ikpe na ụlọ ikpe Saint Anna na Botanical Gardens nke dị na .
Ọ lara ezumike nká dị ka onye ọka ikpe na Sierra Leone na 1971.
Ndụ ya n'ime.
Na Nọvemba 1944, Stella Thomas lụrụ onye ọrụ ọka iwu ibe ya, Richard Bright Marke na Freetown.
Ọ nwụrụ na 1974, ọ gbara afọ 68.
https://ig.wikipedia.org/wiki/Agalanze
Esther Farinde (amụrụ ya na abali iri na itolu n’ime ọnwa abụọ n’afọ 1984) bụ onye na-agụ egwu na edekwa egwu uka nke eji were mara.
A makwaara ya dị ka onye na-ahụ maka nkuzi olu ukwe, onye na-eduzi ndị na-eto eto nwere mmasi igụ egwu na ndị ukwe ụka, yana site na ọrụ RM 19, nke nọ n'okpuru nlekọta ulọ .
Esther tinyekwara aka na igbasa egwu nke gbadoro ukwu na ọrụ dika otu onye n'ime ndi otu Barbican Learning na Development.
Biography.
Esther bụ nwa nke asaa n’ime ụmụ iri ndi nne na nna sitere na , na Ekiti State, di na ọdida anyanwụ Nigeria.
Esther tolitere na England, ebe ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ , na , (dịka onye ọmenka ibe ya bụ ).
N'agbata 2003 na 2006, Esther gara akwụkwọ na mahadum nke anakpọ ebe ọ nwetara nzere BA na Music na Media.
Esther malitere ịbụ abụ mgbe ọ dị afọ anọ na ụlọ uka nke nne na nna ya; ebe ha abụọ bụ ndị ọzụzụ atụrụ nke Chineke (CAC).
Kemgbe afọ iri na asatọ gara aga, o duru ndi ukwe nọ na ụka.
A họpụtara Esther Farinde ka ọ bụrụ onye mmeri nke oge 2014 nke Gospel Talent na UK.
Emere emume nhọpụta nke ikpeazụ na ịhe nkiri onyonyo nke na-eme eme sitere na na 25 Ọktoba 2014.
N’afọ 2018 ọ wepụtara egwu izizi ya bụ ‘Song Cry’ mgbe ndị otu Time2Shine bidoro gbaziwere ya itnyebere ya anya.
Onicha bụ Mpaghara Lokalu Gọọmenti nke Ebonyi Steeti dị na Naịjirịa.
O nwere mpaghara nke narị anọ na ịrị asaa na isii  kilometa ma nwee ọnụ ọgụgụ nnke puku narị abụọ na puku iri atọ na narị asatọna iri abụọ na asatọ ka ọ dị na ọnụ ọgụgụ afọ puku abụọ na isii.
Koodu nzipu ozi nke ebe a bu narị anọ na ịrị na itenanị na otu.
Isi ụlọ ọrụ ya dị n’obodo Isu.
Agbanyeghị, enwere ọtụtụ obodo na obodo nta ndị dị na Ndịda Ọwụwa Anyanwụ Nigeria nke na-eji aha ahụ "ISU".
Mana ndị mezuru ISU a bụ Agbabor, Amanator, Isu Achara, Mgbaneze, Ezekporoke, Anike, Mgbana Ukwu, Obeagu, Umuniko na ndị ọzọ nọ na Lokalu Gọọmentị Kansulu Ohaozara ruo mgbe e kere Mpaghara Kansulu Onicha.
Onicha Igbo-Eze bụ obodo dị na okpuru ọchịchị ime obodo Onicha bụ ebe e si nweta aha ọgbakọ ógbè ahụ.
Obodo ndị ọzọ dị mkpa na mpaghara Steeti ahụ n'akụkụ isi ụlọ ọrụ Isu na Onicha Igbo-Eze bụ Oshiri, Ukawu na Aba-Omege.
Agbanyeghị na aha mbụ ha bụ otu, Onicha ekwesịghị inwe mgbagwoju anya na isi obodo Onitsha dị n'akụkụ ọdịda anyanwụ na Naịjirịa.
Onicha-Igboeze bu obodo di na Mpaghara Kansulu Onicha Lokalu Gọọmenti.
Ndị kansụl ọchịchị ime obodo nwetara aha ya site n'obodo ndị a. Onicha-Igboeze bu otu obodo kwekọrịtara ọnụ.
Ụfọdụ nri ama ama ama dị na mpaghara a bụ; akpụ, ji, ede, ọpụpa, nkpuru osisi, akwụkwọ nri na ihe ubi ndi ozo.
Ruo n'oge na-adịbeghị anya, onye ọrụ ugbo na ezinụlọ ya na-eri ihe ka ukwuu n'ubi ụgbọ ha, mana enwere mmụba nke ọrụ ugbo n'ihi ụzọ ọhụụ esi emeghe obodo ahụ na obodo ndị ọzọ gbara ya gburugburu na obodo ndị dị ka Enugwu na Abakaliki.
Enwere nnukwu ihe ubi si n’obodo ndị a na-ere ihe nri si Onicha-Igboeze na obodo ndị ọzọ gbara ya gburugburu, dịka Uburu, Okposi, Ugwulangwu, Osiri, Isu.
wdg.
Obodo Onicha-Igboeze mejupụtara obodo iri na atọ bụ; Eziga, Okpoma, Anike, Isiama, Ugwu-odida, Ezekporoke, Anwutu, ndi ozo bu, Amanator, Umubo, Umudomi, umuezikwu, Amata, Amakporo wdg.
Eucharia Azodo Okwunna (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 3 n'ọnwa Nọvemba,nke afọ 1961) bụ nwaafọ Naijiria bụ onye ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị.
Ọ bụbu onye otu People's Democratic Party na ụlọ omeiwu nke gọọmentị etiti .
N'afọ 2019, o so n’ime ụmụ nwaanyị iri abụọ na otu bụbu sịnetọ na Naijiria.
Ndụ.
A muru ya n'afọ 1961.
A hoputara ya n'afọ 2003 ma weghachite ya n'afọ 2007 na ulo nzuko omeiwu nke Anambra Steeti ebe a hoputara ya dika ọnụ na-ekwuru ụlọ nzukọ omeiwu ahụ.
Ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ a họpụtara jidere ọkwa ahụ .
A họpụtara y dịka onye ndọrọ-ndọrọ otu People Democratic Party maka ụlọ omeiwu gọọmentị etiti .
A hoputara ya n'afọ 2011.
N'afọ 2015, ọ bụ otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị iri na ise na otu n'ime mmadụ iri sitere na People's Democratic Party (Naijiria) ndị ahọpụtara na 8th National Assembly .
Ọ nọchitere anya Aguata .
Ụmụ nwaanyị PDP ndị ọzọ bụ Nnenna Elendu-Ukeje, Sodaguno Festus Omoni, Nkiruka Chidubem Onyejeocha, Rita Orji, Evelyn Omavovoan Oboro, Beni Butmaklar Langtang, Omosede Igbinedion Gabriella, Stella Obiageli Ngwu na Fatima Binta Bello .
Ọ nọrọ n'ụlọomeiwu ihe ruru afọ asatọ tupu ọ kpebie ịzọ ọkwa sinetọ n'afọ 2018 ị nọchite Anambra Saụt.
Ọ bụ onye omeiwu maka otu PDP n'afọ 2019 na otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị 21 nọ na sịneti Naijiria.
Ndụ nkeonwe.
Ọ na-alụ Betrand Azodo ,ha nwere ụmụ anọ toro eto, ọ bụkwa nne nne.
Prince Nico Mbarga
Aha Ọmụmụ Nico Mbarga
Aha Otutu Prince Nico
Ọmụmụ 1 Jeụwarị 1950
Si Malite Obubra, Cross River Steeti, Naịjirịa
Nwụọ 23 Juunu 1997 (afọ 47)
Nkenụụdị Haịlaịf
Akaọrụ Iti egwu, Ọdee egwu, Onye mmepụta egwu
Afọ Keomume 1970 – 23rd Juunu 1997
Ndị egwu Mmetụta Chief Osita Osadebe
Nico Mbarga (1 Jenụwarị 1950 - 23 Juunu 1997), onye amara nke ọma dịka Prince Nico Mbarga, bụ onye na-agụ egwu haịlaịf, nne ya bụ onye Naịjirịa, nna ya bụrụ onye Cameroon.A mụrụ ya na Abakeleke, Naịjirịa.
Ọ bụ onye ama ama maka egwu ya akpọrọ "Sweet Mother", nke ọ dekọrọ abụ ya site na ndị ịgba ya bụ Rocafil Jazz, nke akọwapụtara dịka abụ kacha ere ahịa n'akụkọ ihe mere eme site n'aka onye na-emepụta egwu n'Afrịka.
Egwu.
Ọ na-akpọ zaịlofonuu, konga, Ịgba, jita bazị na jita eletiriiki.
Ọ bụ ụzọ malite egwu ịgba n'ụlọakwụkwọ.
Ọ mere akaọrụ izizi ya n'otu ịgba ụlọ ọriri na nkwari akụ, nke aha ya bụ Melody Orchestra, na 1970.
Ọrụ.
Oge mmalite.
Agbanyeghị na o dere otu egwu ama ama "Sweet Mother" na 1976, nke rere ihe karịrị nde iri na atọ (nke amatara dụka otu n'ime egwu kachasị n'Afrịka), Mbarga rụrụ oke ọrụ dị mkpa na mgbanwe nke egwu Afrịka ama ama .
Site na olu si na mkpuru obi ya nke pụtara ihe n'olu ụtọ jita ya, Mbarga mepụtara ngwakọ pụrụ iche jita ndi Naịjiria na jita ndị Congo nke na-akwalite mmụọ ma ahịrịụda haịlaịf.
O hibere otu nke ya, Rocafil Jazz, ka ọ na-eme ihe nkiri oge niile na Plaza Hotel dị na Ọnịcha nke Ọwụwa Anyanwụ Naịjirịa .
Mgbe ha wepụtasịrị egwu na-akụda mmụọ na 1973, Mbarga na Rocafil Jazz nwere ọganihu nke mbụ na nke abụọ ha, "I No Go Marry My Papa," nke bụ egwu ama ama na mpaghara.
Enweghị ike otu ịgba ndịa iwu ewu karịa gburugburu ha kpatara nkwekọrịta ndekọ egwu ha na EMI ji were kwụsị, mkpebi nke gosipụtara enweghị isi mgbe ndị otu ahụ bịanyere aka na Rogers All Stars, otu ụlọ ọrụ na-edekọ egwu na Naịjirịa nke dị na Onicha, wee dekọọ "Sweet Mother".
"Sweet Mother" bụ egwu ekwere n'asụsụ bekee agwara ọgwa.
O so na egwu kachasị ere n'akụkọ ihe mere eme na egwu ndị Naịjirịa.
N'ime afọ isii nke Mbarga na Rocafil Jazz nọgidere na Rogers All Stars, 1975 ruo 1981, ha dekọtara abọm iteghete.
Mechaa afọ.
Na njem njegharị ya na England na 1982, a bịara mara Mbarga maka ọmarịcha egwu ya, 1970s glam rock kpalite mmụọ ya na emume ngosi ya.
Mgbe ọ ka gara n'ihu ya na Rocafil Jazz, Mbarga na otu ịgba Ivory Coast na onye sonyeburu na egwu haịlaịf nke ndị London Louisiana Tilda, onye Cameroon nwere olu egwu.
N'agbanyeghị na Mbarga na-ebupụta otu ndekọ egwu ya bụ Polydor mgbe ọ laghachiri Naịjirịa, ya na ndị otu nsịnambụ ya na Rocafil Jazz kewara n'ihi nnukwu esemokwu.
Agbanyeghị na ọ mechara mepụta Rocafil Jazz Band ọhụrụ, mana Mbarga enweghịzị ike ime nke ọma ka o si mee na mbụ.
Ọ hapụrụ egwu, gaa nlekọtaba ụlọ oriri na nkwari akụ ya anya, "Sweet Mother Họteelụ" dị na obodo Ịkọm na Cross River Steeti Naịjirịa, nke dị naanị nkeji ole na ole site na ókè-ala Cameroon na Naịjirịa.
Ọnwụ.
Prince Nico Mbarga nwụrụ n'ihe mberede ọgba tum tum na 23rd Juunu 1997, Ọ hapụrụ "Sweet Mother" dịka egwu kachasị ewu ewu n'etiti ndị Naịjirịa.
Mgbe ụfọdụ a na-akpọ "Sweet Mother" "ukwe Afrịka" ndị na-agụ akwụkwọ na ndị na-ege BBC tụnyere ya vootu dịka egwu ọkacha mma na Afrịka
Igbo haịlaịf
mbido akanka Haịlaịf
egwu ọmenala Igbo
mbido ọmenala 1950, Ndịda Ọwụwa Anyanwụ Naịjirịa
Ngwa egwu Jita

Nkenụudị njikọta
Igbo rapụ
Ogene
Isiokwu ọzọ
Ndị egwu haịlaịf Igbo
Ọmenala Igbo 
Igbo haịlaịf bụ egwu ọgbara ọhụrụ nkenụụdị nke kpokọtara haịlaịf na egwu ọdịnaala Igbo ọnụ.
Ọ malitere mbụ na mpaghara ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Naịjirịa, n'oge 1950.
Nkenụụdị bụkarị egwu Jita, ya na ọbele njirimara ngwakọta nke opi na ụda olu.
A na-ekwekarị ukwe Igbo haịlaịf n'asụsụ Igbo mgbe ụfọdụ a na-etinye ya n’asụsụ Bekee a gwara ọgwa.
Otu onye n’ime ndị kachasị edee egwu mana emepụta egwu a bụ Chiifụ Stephen Osita Ọsadebe onye ọrụ ya ruru afọ iri anọ ma gafee.
Ihe nkiri Osadebe gụnyere ọtụtụ egwu ama ama gụnyere egwu "1984 "Ọsọndị Owendị" nke bugoro ya na ọkwa ụwa dịka onye mbụ bidoro Igbo haịlaịf .
Ọ kwe ukwe na ọ kpọọ jita Oliver De Coque, bụ "onye a gụnyere dịka otu n'ime ndị eji ama atụ na onye isi nkenkepụ n'egwu ọgbara ọhụrụ ama ama.
" Coque bụ onye kpatara owuwu Igbo haịlaịf na nkanka.
N'ime egwu ya ama ama bụ "Biri Ka Mbiri", "Ana Enwe Obodo Enwe", "Nnukwu Mmanwu" na "Identity", ha niile rụpụtara ọfụma na 1980 niile.
Ndị ọzọ na-eme ihe nkiri n'oge gara aga n'ụdị a bụ ndị nyere nnukwu onyinye na mmepe ya bụ, Ali Chukwuma, Bright Chimezie, Sir Warrior, Celestine Ukwu, Nico Mbarga, Oriental Brothers, Isaac Rogana Ottah, Ikem Mazeli.
Igbo haịlaịf na oge nke iri abụọ n'otu na narịafọ.
Site n'afọ 2000 gaa n'ihu, ndị na-eti egwu dịka Flavour N'abania, J Martins, Bracket na Wizboyy hụrụ ọganiihu karịa na ịja mma maka ụdị dị iche iche nke na-adịghị ka mbụ haịlaịf webatara ọtụtụ mmetụta ọgbara ọhụrụ na mpụga ọdịda anyanwụ Afrika.
Otu ihe atụ bụ N'abania "uplifted" abọm atọhapụrụ site na "Obaino Music/ 2nite Entertainment" na 2010.
Abọm ahụ gosipụtara mgbanwe na usoro egwu ma e jiri ya tụnyere mgbalị mbụ ya ka ọ na-egosipụta mmetụta nke obodo mepere emepe gụnyere ngwakọta nke hipụ họpụ, R&amp;amp;B, Tekno, rege, dansịhọlụ, na kalipso .
"Uplifted gara ahịa nke ọma n'ụwa niile.
N'Afrika, N'abania nọgidere na-achọsi ike na klọọkụ na mmemme ndị ọzọ.
Site na ụdị edemede ahụ na ịrị elu nke, ọtụtụ ndị MC na-apụta ọkachasị site na ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ na mpaghara ndị ọzọ gbara agbata obi malitere ịjikọta ụda haịlaịf.
Omume dịka Mazi Raw (nke a na-akpọbu Dat NIGGA Raw), Slow Dogg, MC Loph na 2Shotz nyere aka wulite njikọta siri ike nke di n'etiti rapụ ndi amaala, na haịlaịf ọhụrụ site na-inye ha ọtụtụ amaokwu nye ọtụtụ egwu na-ewu ewu n'ịhaya ndị Igbo na-agụ egwu okwuwe.
N'oge 2011, J Martins mere akụkọ gburugburu kọntinent na gafere mgbe ya na Cabo Snoop si Angola na Fally Ipupa si Democratic Republic of Congo rụkọtara ọrụ.
Abụ ndị akpọrọ "Good Tym" na "Kele Papa" dọbara uche nke ukwuu n'afọ ahụ, ma mesịa bụrụ onye ọkacha mmasị.
Site na 2012, J Martins aghọrọ otu n'ime ndị ama ama dị n'ọdịda anyanwụ n'ụwa niile.
Ya soukous -tinged obibia ndekọ mmepụta n'ihu nweela ya ọzọ ofufe na-esonụ na nkwanye ùgwù.
Na Machị 2014, ewepụtara abọm mmeghe nke Phyno "No Guts No Glory" .
Igosipụta ọhụrụ abụọ dị elu N'abania na-enye onyinye olu na egwu "Mee ọtụtụ" na "Authe (Ezigbo)".
Enweela nyocha dị mma n'ozuzu ya kemgbe ewepụtara ya.
O nwetara Phyno a City People Entertainment Award nomination maka Ọkaibe Abọm Rapụ.
Susan Funaya Ideh (amụrụ 5 May 1987) bụ onye egwuregwu nke si Naijiria.
Ọ zọrọ asọmpi egwuregwu obodo niile nke na , India.
Na 2015, ọ meriri ọla edo na na , Mozambiue.
Mmezu.
Egwuregwu niile nke mba Africa.
"Naanị otu nwaanyị"
"Ngwakọta nwaanyị abụọ"
"Ngwakọta mmadu abụọ"
Naanị otu nwaanyị
"Ngwakọta nwaanyị abụọ"
"Ngwakọta mmadu abụọ"
Asọmpi BWF.
Naanị otu nwaanyị
"Ngwakọta nwaanyị abụọ"
"Ngwakọta mmadu abụọ"
Evelyn Akhator (onye a muru n'ụbọchị nke 3 n’onwa Febụwarị nke afọ1995) bu onye Naijiria na-eme egwuregwu basketbọọlụ ndi nwanyi n’ihu / etiti nke otu Flammes Carolo .
Ndi Dallas Wings nke Women’s National Basketball Association (WNBA) họọrọ ya dika onye nke ato n’ozuzu nke 2017 WNBA Draft .
Ọnụ ọgụgụ Kentucky.
Isi nrụtụaka 
Ọrụ WNBA.
Dallas Wings họọrọ Evelyn dịka onye nke atọ na nhọpụta ntinye WNBA nke afọ 2017.
Ọ pụtala n'asọmpi iri na ise na oge ruki ya n'akụkụ nke Dallas ebe ọ na-enye ọnụọgụ 0.9 n'egwuregwu ọ bụla, ọnụọgụ 0.2 blocks kwa egwuregwu, ọnụọgụ 0.1 kwa egwuregwu.
Ndi Dallas Wings gbahapụrụ ya n;ụbọchị nke 13 n'ọnwa Mee nke afọ 2018.
N'ụbọchị nke 13 n'ọnwa Febụwarị nke afọ 2019, Akhator laghachiri WNBA site na ịbanye otu Chicago Sky na nkwekọrịta ọzụzụ.
Ọrụ mba ụwa.
Evelyn na-anọchite anya .
Ọ pụtara mpụta izizi ya n’otu oge asọmpi FIBA Afrobasket nke afọ 2017 na Mali.
Evelyn jiri ihe ruru ọnụọgụ 15.3 na mweghachi 9.5 kwa egwuregwu n'oge asọmpi ahụ were depụta aha ya ndị egwuregwu 5 kacha elu.
Evelyn so na ndị na 2018 FIBA Women's Basketball World Cup ebe ọ ritere ihe ruru ọnụọgụ 12.6, mweghachi 9 na mnyere aka 1.4 oge asọmpi ahụ.
Ọrụ mba ọzọ.
Akhator nwetara ọtụ na Rọshia n'otu WBC Dynamo Novosibirsk n'afọ 2017.
O nwetara ihe ruru ọnụọgụ 12.4 na mweghchi 8.5 kwa egwuregwu.
N'ụbọchị nke 22 n'ọnwa Ọgọst afọ 2018, Akhator bịanyere aka n'otu basketbọọlụ Turkish Besiktas.
O jiri akara iri na ise na mwrghachi 11 na otu egwuregwu nke asọmpi egwuruegwu Tọki, o nwetakwara akara iri na ise na mweghachi n'asọmpi Eurocup na-igwuri egwu karịrị nkeji iri atọ na mpi abụọ ahụ.
Ahkator bịanyere aka n'otu Spanish CB Avenida n'ụbọchị nke 15 n'ọnwa Mee nke afọ 2019.
N'ọnwa Nọvemba, afọ 2019, Ahkator binyere aka i sonye ndị otu basketbọọlụ nke Frans.
Ihe onyinye na nrite.
Na 2018 Nigerian Sports Award, Akhator meriri n'onyinye nke Best Sportwoman na Basketball player.
Ndụ Onwe.
Akhator sitere n'ezinụlọ nke mmadụ atọ, nne na nna ya na nwanne ya nke okenye bi na Naijiria.
Nne ya Benedicta nwụrụ n'ihe mberede okporo ụzọ.
Evelyn Omavowan Oboro (a mụrụ n'afọ 1971) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Naijiria nọ n'ụlọ omeiwu gọọmentị etiti.
Ọ na-anọchi anya mpaghara Okpe, Sapele na Uvwie nke Delta Steeti na 7th na 8th National Assembly .
A hoputara ya n’okpuru otu People's Democratic Party (PDP) 
Mmụta na ọrụ.
Ọ natara asambodo West Africa School na Alegbo Secondary School,dị na Effurum n'afọ 1988 tupu ọ tinye akwụkwọ maka agụmakwụkwọ na Mahadum nke Delta Steeti ebe ọ nwetara nzere bachlelọ n'afọ 1997.
O nwetara nzere Master of Public Administration n'afọ 2002 na nzere na Iwu n'afọ 2009 na Mahadum nke Delta Steeti.
George Edozie bụ Onye Ose ihe sitere mba Naịjirịa
Akukọ Banyere.
Amụrụ George Edozie na uboch iri na otu onwa Mee 1972.
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ elementri nke mahadum, Nsukka, si ya banye ulo akwukwo nke ncheta Washington na Ọnisha .
Edozie gụrụ "Nkà" na Mahadum nke "Obodo" Benin ebe ọ gụrụ oke nmuta na "Esem Ihe" na arọ 1996.
Obi ma na arụkwa orụ na Lagos, Naịjirịa , dika onye na emepụta ihe onyonyo oge nile.
Ihe Ngosiputa.
George Edozie esonyego na otutu ihe ngosi di iche iche n'ime Naịjirịa nakwa mba ofesi.
U"fọdụ" n'ime ha bụ: " "Ndị omenkà isii Egbeda" " Oba Ngosi Nk"à", Onikan, Lagos, 2002, ""Achomacho" " French Cultural center, Ikoyi, Lagos, 2004, "i"nwe ihu madu" " Mahadum Pan-African, Lagos, 2006, " "A kaleidoskop nke ejiji omenala Nigeria" "Abuja, 2009,
Faith Michael (aha a mụrụ ya bụ Ikidi; n'ụbọchị nke 28 Febụwarị afọ 1987) bụ onye egwuregwu bọọlụ Naijiria na-agbara klọb Damallsvenskan bụ Piteå IF na otu bọọlụ etiti ụmụ nwanyị Naijiria.
Mbido ndụ.
A mụrụ ya na Port Harcourt,nke Naijiria, Ikidi toro na Edo steeti.
[ "see okwu dị mkpa" ]
Ọrụ klọb.
N'afọ 2006, Ikidi bụ otu n’ime ndị Naịjirịa atọ ghọọrọ ndị mbụ n'Afrịka gbara bọọlụ na Swedish Championship mgbe ha nọ n'otu QBIK .
N’ọnwa Disemba afọ 2015, Ikidi binyere aka afọ abụọ na Piteå.
Ọrụ mba ụwa.
Ikidi nọchitere anya Naịjirịa na otu bọọlụ siniọ kemgbe afọ 2004.
N’ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2006, o nyeere ndị otu aka merie mmeri nke ise ha n'African Women's Championship mgbe ha mechara merie Gana 1–0.
Ugwu na onyinye.
Mba ụwa.
Naijiria
Otu"na Linköping FC"
Onye ọ bụla
Otu"na Piteå"
Ndụ onwe.
Ikidi lụrụ Nick Michael n'ụbọchị nke 12 n'ọnwa Disemba nke afọ 2015.
Faith Michael (aha a mụrụ ya bụ Ikidi; n'ụbọchị nke 28 Febụwarị afọ 1987) bụ onye egwuregwu bọọlụ Naijiria na-agbara klọb Damallsvenskan bụ Piteå IF na otu bọọlụ etiti ụmụ nwanyị Naijiria.
Mbido ndụ.
A mụrụ ya na Port Harcourt,nke Naijiria, Ikidi toro na Edo steeti.
Ọrụ klọb.
N'afọ 2006, Ikidi bụ otu n’ime ndị Naịjirịa atọ ghọọrọ ndị mbụ n'Afrịka gbara bọọlụ na Swedish Championship mgbe ha nọ n'otu QBIK .
N’ọnwa Disemba afọ 2015, Ikidi binyere aka afọ abụọ na Piteå.
Ọrụ mba ụwa.
Ikidi nọchitere anya Naịjirịa na otu bọọlụ siniọ kemgbe afọ 2004.
N’ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2006, o nyeere ndị otu aka merie mmeri nke ise ha n' mgbe ha mechara merie Gana 1–0.
Ugwu na onyinye.
Mba ụwa.
Naijiria
Otu"na Linköping FC"
Onye ọ bụla
Otu"na Piteå"
Ndụ onwe.
Ikidi lụrụ Nick Michael n'ụbọchị nke 12 n'ọnwa Disemba nke afọ 2015.
Paul Ikechukwu Obiefule (a mụrụ ya ụbọchị ịrị na ịse nke ọnwa Mee na afọ otu puku na narị itenanị na ịrị asatọ na isii na Owerri ).
Ọ bụ onye Naịjirịa lara ezumike nká na egwuregwu fotu bọọlụ.
Ọrụ klọb.
Obiefule malitere ọrụ ya na obodo ya bụ Naịjirịa na- egwuru ndị Planners FC na ndị Heartland, ebe ọ nọrọ ọnwa abụọ tupu ndị Viborg FF nke Denmark ahụ ya, onye bịanyere aka na ya na afọ puku abụọ na anọ.
N'oge ya na Viborg, ọ dọtara mmasị dị ukwuu site na ọtụtụ klọb ndị si mba ofesi mana na afọ puku abụọ na asaa ka ekwuputara na ọ bịanyela aka na nkwekọrịta otu afọ maka ụlọ ọgbakọ Norwegian klọb Lyn, na Septemba na afọ puku abụọ na asatọ ka ọ bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta ọhụrụ, nke a digidere ruo na njedebe nke afọ puku abụọ na iri na otu na ewee nyefeeya ọkwa Kapitin Band, nke a mere ya Onye Isi Ojii izizi nọ n' okwa Kapitin na Norwegian Premiership klọb, atugara Obiefule na otu ndị otu egwuregwu England na Watford bụ nke dị na Scottish Aberdeen na Norwegian Hønefoss Obiefule ji ọnụ kwenye ka ọnwa Disemba dị na mkpụrụ ụbọchị iri na anọ na afọ puku abụọ na itenanị maka nkwekọrịta afọ atọ maka Hønefoss n'ihi mmerụ nke ọ merụrụn' ikpere nke mere ka ọ ghara ịkwaga Scotland ma ọ bụ England.
Obiefule kwetara na mgbazinye ọnwa isii maka Lillestrøm na ụbọchị abụọ nke ọnwa Ọgụstụafo puku abụọ na iri na otu wee debanye ya na egwuregwu megide Tromsø n'echi ya, na ụbọchị nke atọ nke ọnwa Ọgụstụ, na-enweghị ọzụzụ na onye otu ọhụrụ ya.
Na Febụwarị puku abụọ na iri na abụọ, Obiefule bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta maka oge puku abụọ na iri na abụọ ya na ndị otu Finnish Veikkausliiga KuPS .
Na ọnwa Nọvemba afọ puku abụọ na iri na abụọ , Obiefule laghachiri ọzụzụ na Viborg FF tupu ọ mezuo ebumnuche ya bụ ị gaakwuru ndị otu ndị China amaghi.
Na ọnwa Ọgụstụ afọ puku abụọ na iri na ise, Obiefule kwetara maka nkwekọrịta ya na ụlọ ọrụ Danish Holstebro, mgbe ọ gụsịrị Møldrup / Tostrup.
Ọ lara ezumike nká na afọ puku abụọ na iri na asaa.
Ọrụ mba ụwa.
Obiefule bụ onye Naịjirịa azuru na mba ofesi ya mere ya mpụta maka Super Eagles na asọmpi LG na afọ puku abụọ na anọ.
Ọ bụ onye otu ndị otu egwu bọọlụ Super Eagles nwetere ọla nchara n’Ijipt na afọ puku abụọ na isii.
O turula ugo ugboro iri maka obodo ya.
Ndụ onwe.
Obiefule nọ na-agụ akụ na ụba ọrụ ugbo na Mahadum dị elu nke Teknụzụ nke Owerri na Naịjirịa mana ọ hapụrụ ya ịchụso ịgba bọọlụ ọkachamara.
Nwanne ya nwoke bụ Polycarp Obinna Obiefule, na-egwu egwuregwu ugbu a maka Mosta FC na Malta.
Nwanne ya nwoke Pol mere ihe tụrụ na anya maka mgbaru ọsọ kachasị elu nke emetụtara na Maltese Premier League na agbata afọ puku abụọ na iri na otu na puku abụọ na iri na ka ọ nyere ọ kpulo kpụ goolu iri atọ na anọ.
Onye bụbu onye otu Planners FC Owerri Imo Steeti nke Naịjiria.
Chelsea Eze
Ọmụmụ 15 Nọvemba 
Aha Chelsea Ada Ezerioha
Ọmụmụ 15 Nọvemba
Steeti Kano 
Aka Ọrụ Omee Onyonyo
Afọ Ịnọ Ọrụ.
2009-ugbua 
Chelsea Eze (amụrụ Chelsea Ada Ezerioha na 15 Nọvemba) bụ nwaafọ Naịjirịa na- eme ihe nkiri .
Ọ bịara bụrụ onye ama ama na Nollywood site n'ihe nkiri mbụ ya bụ "Silent Scandals" ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'akụkụ Genevieve Nnaji na Majid Michel .
Ọ tụrụ ugo mmerii na"Most Promising Actress" nke emere maka ihe nkiri o mere na "6th Africa Movie Academy Awards".
Ndụ mbido.
A mụrụ Chelsea na Kano Steeti na agbụrụ Umuahia, Abia Steeti .
Nne na Nna ya na-arụ n'ụlọ akụ.
Ọ gara akwụkwọ na Federal Government Girls College Minjibir na St.Louis Sekọndrị Sukulu, ha abụọ dị na Kano.
Ọ mụrụ asụsụ bekee na asụsụMahadum Maiduguri .
Dịka mkparịta ụka ya na "The Punch" o kwuputara na "Ntolite m bụ ihe obi ụtọ n'ihi na mgbe ahụ, Kano dị n'udo ma makwa mma".
Ọrụ.
Tupu O mee "Silent Scandals", ọ bụ onye nlereanya nke naanị ihe nkiri ọ na-eme bụ n'egwuregwu, nke o mere n'ụlọ ụka.
Onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri bụ Vivian Ejike kpọrọ ya ka ọ bịa nyocha maka ọrụ nkwado na "Silent Scandals", a họpụtara ya ka ọ pụta na onyonyo ahụ.
Ọ na-apụta na ọtụtụ ihe nkiri ndị ọzọ na-ewu ewu dịka "Two Brides and a Babyl"(2011), "Hoodrush" (2012) na "Murder at Prime Suites" (2013).
Uti Nwachukwu onye amụrụ n'abalị̀ atọ nke ọnwa asatọ n'afọ 1982, bụ onye meriri na Big Brother Africa agba nke ise
Ọrụ.
Uti bụ onye nnọchi anya si Naịjirịa gbárá afọ iri abụọ na ise na Big Brother Africa agba nke ato.Ọ bụ ya bụ onye nke atọ achụpụru n'ụlọ nke Big Brother Africa àgbà nke atọ na abalị ise nke ọnwa Oktoba 2008 (ụbọchị nke iri anọ na abụọ).
N'oge ọ́ kà nọ̀, amaara Uti dịka onye na-amasa ndị otu ya na ha n'emekọ ihe ọnụ (ọkachasị Mimi na Thami).
N’oge a na-achụpụ otu onye nnọchianya ndị Namibia bụ Lucille, Uti kparaliri n'iwe na ọ̀nụ́nụ́ ọ́ nụ̀rụ̀ na a chụpụla ya.
N'afọ 2010 Uti sonyekwara ọzọ na asọmpi nke Big Brother Africa nke ise: Arinze nke ọ nọrọ ruo ụbọchị iri itoolu na otu wee mechaa merie Munya nke votu ikpe azu nke asatọ ruo asaa.
Abalị otu narị na ụbọchị iri atọ na atọ agụkọtara ọnụ ka ọ nọrọ n'ụlọ Big Brother.
Ọ́ bụ onye Ndokwa si na Obodo Aboh n'okpuru ọchịchị gọọmenti obodo Ndokwa-East nke Delta State Naịjirịa.
Ọrụ Omee.
Uti malitere oru ime ihe ngosi ya na 2011.
E gosipụtala ya n'ọtụtụ ihe omume fim kemgbe ahụ.
Ebele Okaro Onyiuke (amụrụ na ubochi itolu nke onwa Jenụwarị) bụ nwaafọ Naịjirịa na- eme ihe nkiri na ihe onyonyo 
Mmalite ndu na mmuta.
A mụrụ Okaro na London ma otolite na steeti Enugu nke di na Naijiria.
Ọ malitere ime ihe nkiri mgbe ọ na-aga Santa Maria Primary School wee gaa n'ihu na igu akwụkwọ na ụlọ akwukwo Queen of the Holy Rosary Secondary di na Nsukka .
Mgbe ọbanyere agụm akwukwo Mahadum Calabar, Okaro nwere oke agụụ ime ihe nkiri wee nweta nzere bachelọ na Theater Arts .
Nne ya bụ onye na- arụ olụ n'ihe nkiri telivishọn ma nna ya bụ injinia onye nwere nukwu mmasị na nkà na akwụkwọ .
Ọrụ.
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, Okaro Jere ozi ife ala Nna ya na Nigerian Television Authority, ebe ọnọrọ nweta ohere maka ngosipụta na telivishọn.
Agbanyeghi, na ndakpọ ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri nke Naijiria (nke a maara dị ka Nollywood ), ọ malitere ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ ndị nnọchi anya obodo na Lagos mesikwa rụọ ọrụ na ụlọ akụ tupu ọlaghachi na-eme ihe nkiri.
N'afọ 2014, Ebele Okaro Onyiuke wepụtara ma mee ihe nkiri na "Musical Whispers", ihe nkiri nke na akpalite maka nkwado ahuanya maka ụmụaka nwere autism .
Emumea kpọtakwara ndị nwoke na Nwanyị ọzọ na-eme ihe nkiri na Naijiria, nke ndị putara ihe bụ Chioma Chukwuka na Kalu Ikeagwu .
A matala ya dika "Mama nke Nollywood" ma mee ka ndị na-akwado ya na ndị ibe ya na-akwanyere ya ùgwù.
Ndu onwe.
Ọ lụrụ di na nwunye na ezinụlọ Onyiuke.
Ntulugo.
N'afọ 2017, arụmọrụ ya na "4-1 Love" meriri Okaro ntulugo African Magic Viewers Choice Award maka Onye Nkwado Kachasị Mma.
A họpụtara ya maka ọrụ ya ihe nkiri 'Smash' na 2020 Africa Magic Viewers 'Choice Awards for Best Actress in a Comedy (Movie / TV Series).
Bhimrao Ramji Ambedkar (14 Eprel 1891 - 6 Disemba 1956), nke akpọkwara Dr. Babasaheb Ambedkar , bụ onye ọka iwu India, onye ọka iwu, onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na onye na-eme mgbanwe mmekọrịta ọha na eze.
O kpaliri òtù ndị Buddhist Dalit ma gbasaa mgbasa ozi megide ịkpa ókè ọha na eze na ndị a na-apụghị ịchọta (Dalits).
Ọ kwadokwara ikike ụmụ nwanyị na ndị ọrụ.
Ọ bụ onye India nke mbụ Iwu na ikpe ziri ezi, onye na-atụ anya iwu nke India, na nna ntọala nke Republic of India.
Na 1956, ọ malitere ntụgharị nke Dalits, gbanwee ndị Buddha na ndị 600,000.
Ọ tụgharịrị okpukpe Buddha na India.
A na-ahụ Ambedkar dịka bodhisattva, na Maitreya, n'etiti ndị Buddhist Navayana.
Na 1990, enyere Ambedkar onyinye Bharat Ratna, ihe nrite kacha elu nke ndi India.
Ihe Ambedkar mere gunyere otutu ihe ncheta na ihe osise na omenaala ama ama.
Ihe Ambedkar nyere dị ka onye ndozigharị mmekọrịta ọha na eze, nwere mmetụta miri emi na India nke oge a.
A họpụtara Ambedkar "Onye Ukwuu Indian" (The greatest Indian) na 2012 site na nghoputa nke History TV18 na CNN IBN haziri.
Ambedkar Jayanti (ncheta ọmụmụ Ambedkar) bụ emume a na-eme kwa afọ n’abalị iri na anọ nke Eprel, nke a na-eme ọ bụghị naanị na India kamakwa n’ụwa niile.
Ambedkar Jayanti na-eme ememe dị ka ezumike ọha na eze na India dum.
United Nations mere emume Ambedkar Jayanti na 2016, 2017 na 2018.
Chelsea Eze
Ọmụmụ 15 Nọvemba 
Aha Chelsea Ada Ezerioha
Ọmụmụ 15 Nọvemba
Steeti Kano 
Aka Ọrụ Omee Onyonyo
Afọ Ọnọ Ọrụ.
2009-ugbua 
Chelsea Eze (amụrụ Chelsea Ada Ezerioha na 15 Nọvemba) bụ nwaafọ Naịjirịa na- eme ihe nkiri .
Ọ bịara bụrụ onye ama ama na Nollywood site n'ihe nkiri mbụ ya bụ "Silent Scandals" ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'akụkụ Genevieve Nnaji na Majid Michel.
Ọ tụrụ ugo mmerii na"Most Promising Actress" nke emere maka ihe nkiri o mere na "6th Africa Movie Academy Awards".
Ndụ mbido.
A mụrụ Chelsea na Kano Steeti na agbụrụ Umuahịa, Abia Steeti .
Nne na Nna ya na-arụ n'ụlọ akụ.
Ọ gara akwụkwọ na Federal Government Girls Koleji Minjibir na St.Louis Sekọndrị Sukulu, ha abụọ dị na Kano.
Ọ mụrụ asụsụ bekee na asụsụ na Mahadum Maiduguri .
Dịka mkparịta ụka ya na "The Punch" o kwuputara na "Ntolite m bụ ihe obi ụtọ n'ihi na mgbe ahụ, Kano dị n'udo ma makwa mma".
Ọrụ.
Tupu O mee "Silent Scandals", ọ bụ onye nlereanya nke naanị ihe nkiri ọ na-eme bụ n'egwuregwu, nke o mere n'ụlọ ụka.
Onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri bụ Vivian Ejike kpọrọ ya ka ọ bịa nyocha maka ọrụ nkwado na "Silent Scandals", a họpụtara ya ka ọ pụta na onyonyo ahụ.
Ọ na-apụta na ọtụtụ ihe nkiri ndị ọzọ na-ewu ewu dịka "Two Brides and a Babyl"(2011), "Hoodrush" (2012) na "Murder at Prime Suites" (2013).
Vivian Aminu Yusuf (amụrụ ya na ọnwa nke asatọ n’afọ 1983) bụ judoka onye Naijiria onye gbara otu udi ọkara heavyweight O ritere ihe nrite ọla ọcha abụọ n'afọ 2007 All-Africa Games nke Algiers, Algeria.
n'afọ 2008 Judo Championship nke Agadir, Morocco, abụọ ndị Houda Miled nke Tunisia meriri n'egwuregwu ikpeazụ.
Yusuf nọchitere anya naijiria na asọmpi Summer Olimpik nke 2008 na egwuregwu nke XXIX Olympiad na Beijing, China, ebe ọ zọrọ mpi maka klas nke ọkara nke ụmụ nwanyị (78 n'arọ) .
Ọ natara a bye maka nke abụọ mbido gburugburu, onye jamani bụ Heide Wollert mechara merie ya.
onye nwere ike igbanye akpịrịka akpaka na sekọnd iri atọ na asaa. .
Lota Chukwu
Lota Chukwu na 2018
Mụrụ Ugwu Lotachukwu Jacinta Obianuju Amelia
Nọvemba 29, 1989 (afọ 30)
Nsụka, Enugwu Steeti, Naịjirịa
Ebe Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ 
University of Benin
Akaọrụ Ọmee ihe onyonyo
Afọ ọ nọ ọrụ 2014–ugbua
Ugwu Lotachukwu Jacinta Obianuju Amelia bụ onye "Naịjirịa" na-eme ihe onyonyo amaala dịka Lota Chukwu .
A maala ya mgbe ọ gbasịrị n'usoro TV Na-ewu ewu nke "Naịjirịa", "Jenifa's Diary" n'akụkụ Funke Akindele, Juliana Olayode, Falz ebe ọ mere dịka "Kiki", enyi nke onye ndu, Jenifa .
Ọ bụkwa onye "yoga" na-anụ ọkụ n'obi.
Ndụ mbido.
A mụrụ Lota na Nsụkua, Enugwu Steeti, "Naịjirịa" mana ọ nwere nzụlite nwata ya na Benin City .
Lota bụ onye ikpeazụ n’ime ụmụ anọ nne na nna ya mụrụ.
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na "Agricultural Economics na Extension Service" na Mahadum nke Benin ma mesịa mee ihe na "Royal Arts Academy" na Legọọsụ, "Naịjirịa".
Ọrụ.
Tupu ime ihe onyonyo, Lota bụ onye nlere anya ma sonye na 2011 nke "Most Beautiful Girl na Nigeria" na- anọchite ndị Yobe Steeti.
Ọ malitere ime ihe onyonyo ya na 2011 mana ọ ghọrọ onye a ma ama mgbe ọ pụtara na Jenifa's Diary ma mee dịka Kiki.
meela ihe nkiri ndị ọzọ dịka The Royal Hibiscus Hotel, Falling, Fine Girl, Arbitration, Dognapped.
E gosipụtara Lota dị ka onye ndu ihe onyonyo na Reminisce 's Ponmile "video as we as Aramide" "Why So Serious" .
Lota Takes.
N'afọ 2017, O kwupụtara mmepe ngosipụta nri ya nke ọ kpọrọ "Lota Takes", ihe nkiri a bụ I si nri na etu esi ebi ndụ nke gosipụtara Lota dịka onye ihe ụwa na I si nri na-atọ ụtọ nke ukwuu.
Ihe nkiri a egosipụtago ndị Naịjiria amaala aha ndị dịka Adekunle Gold, Tosin Ajibade, Aramide (musician) MC Galaxy
Yetide Badaki (amuru na abali iri-abuo na anọ n'onwa itolu, n'afọ 1981 ) bu onye amuru na obodo Naijiria bụ onye omee na amerịka .
A maara ya nke ọma maka ịkpọ Bilquis na usoro Starz nke "American Gods" .
Ndụ mbido.
A mụrụ Badaki na Ibadan,naijiria, tupu ọ kwaga England afọ atọ mgbe ọ dị afọ atọ, laghachi na Naịjirịa afọ isii, ma biri n'Amerịka mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na abụọ.
Ọ bụ onye gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum McGill nwere isi na Bekee Literature ( ihe nkiri) na obere na Science Environment.
Badaki nwekwara Nna-ukwu nke Ezi Arts na ihe nkiri si Mahadum nke Illinois .
Ọ ghọrọ nwa amaala United Steeti n'afọ2014.
Ọrụ.
Badaki nwetara nhọpụta onyinye nturu ugo nke Jeff 2006 maka nwanyi kacha mma n'omee na Principal Role (kpọọ) maka "Enwere M Akwụkwọ M Dị Mma Akwụkwọ Nwaanyị si Rwanda nyere m" .
Ọ nata nlele dị mma maka nkọwa Bilquis na "America God" .
Agwa Bilquis emeela ka ọrụ ya na akụkọ gbasaa maka usoro televishọn.
N'afọ 2018, Badaki kpara agwa Chi Chi ugboro ugboro na nke "This" is.
us 
Badaki edeela obere ihe nkiri akpọrọ "In Hollywoodland", nke o ji IndieGoGo nye ego.
Badaki na Karen David ga emeputa ihe ma ghaa na obere ihe nkiri ebe Jessica Sherif ga-eduzi.
na "Hollywoodland" bụ ihe ntụgharị uche nke Alice na Wonderland nke edobere na Los Angeles ugbu a .
"Na Hollywoodland" ga-ebido n'ọnwa asatọ n'afọ 2020 na ememme Nkiri Bentonville .
Wahab Dosunmu (nwụrụ na Juun 9, n'afọ 2013 ) bụ onye ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị Naịjirịa na onye otu Senate nke Lagos Steeti (1999–2003).
Cecilia Ibru (amụrụ 22 Maachị n'afo 1946) bụ onye bụbu onye isi nchịkwa na onye isi ọrụ nke Oceanic Bank .
Ibru bidoro oru ya na ndi Ibru Organization .
N'afọ 2009, e jidere ya ma kweta ikpe ebubo aghụghọ.
A tụrụ ya mkpọrọ ma maa ya ikpe ihe ruru otu ijeri euro.
Di ya nwụrụ, Michael Ibru nwụrụ na Septemba n'afọ 2016.
Mmalite ndu na mmuta.
Ọkpara Edward na Victoria Sido, Ibru gụrụ ụlọ akwụkwọ Grammar nke Saint Margaret na Ilesa site na n'afọ 1960 ruo n'afo 1965 wee gụọ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Tutorial College dị na London site n'afọ 1967 ruo n'afọ 1968.
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum London n'afọ 1971 na BS na sociology.
Ibru gbasoro akwukwo omumu ya na mahadum ma nweta Masters of Philosophy nke School of Oriental and African Studies n'afọ 1977.
Ọrụ.
N'afọ 1978, Ibru sonyeere Ibru Organization dika onye isi oru onye nduzi.
Mgbe afọ abụọ rụchara ọrụ a, Ibru gara n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye nhazi ego mba ụwa, ọkwá ọ nọrọ ruo n'afọ 1990.
Ibru bidoro ịrụ ọrụ na Oceanic Bank n'afọ 1990 dịka onye isi njikwa.
Mgbe ya na Oceanic nọrọ afọ asaa, e buliri ya n’ọkwa onye isi ọrụ.
Oceanic bidoro dị ka obere ụlọ akụ ezinụlọ nwere, mana o toro n'otu n'ime ụlọ ọrụ Naịjirịa kachasị na-ekwu okwu n'ihu ọha n'oge nlekọta Ibru.
N'ọnwa asatọ iri na atọ n'afọ 2009 Ibru so na otu onye isi ụlọ akụ ise CEOs ndị a chụrụ .
Mmadụ ise ndị gbanwere aha ya bụ Central Bank of Nigeria .
Osote gọvanọ, Sarah Alade, kwupụtara na John Aloh ga-anọchi Ibru na Oceanic.
Ndị ọzọ gbanwere n'otu ụbọchị ahụ gụnyere onye isi oche nke Union Bank of Nigeria, Dr. Bath Ebong, onye nọchiri ya Olufunke Iyabo Osibodu .
Ibru pụtara n'ụlọ ikpe tinyere ndị isi ụlọ akụ atọ ọzọ na Naịjịrịa.
Ha niile gọrọ ebubo eboro ha na ha tinyere aka n'ọgbaaghara ijeri kwuru ijeri ego.
A mara ya ikpe na 8 Ọktoba n'afọ 2010 na ikpe 25 nke aghụghọ ma nye iwu ka ọ kwụghachi 1.29bn (ihe dị ka otu ijeri Euro, ma nye ya iwu ịga mkpọrọ ọnwa isii.
Ndị uweojii na-ahụ maka nrụrụ aka wetara ebubo mpụ megide ndị isi si n'ụlọ akụ ise napụtara na ego 400bn naira ($ 2.6bn; £ 1.6bn) mgbapụta gọọmentị.
Achọpụtara na ụlọ akụ niile nwere ego dị ala n'ihi mgbazinye ego na-adịghị mma.
Ibru agbatịgo ụlọ ọrụ kredit nke ijeri NAIRA iri na isii na ụlọ ọrụ na-enweghị nkwado.
Lọ ikpe ahụ napụrụ ya ihe karịrị otu narị ihe onwunwe dị na Naijiria, Dubai na United Steeti.
Michael na Cecilia Ibru Foundation.
Ibru kere Michael na Cecilia Ibru Foundation n'afọ 2006, nke na-enye ego iji kwado ọrụ aka, nlekọta ndị agadi, mmemme ahụike, mgbochi ọrịa, na mmepụta nri.
Chidi Kwubiri (* a mụrụ ya n'afọ1966 na Umuahia, Naijiria) bụ onye na-ese ihe nkiri onye Naijiria na Jamanị (Germany) agwakọtara agwakọta.
Chidi Kwubiri bụ nwa akwụkwọ ọbịa mbụ na afọ 1993.
Na obere oge mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ ghọrọ nwa akwụkwọ zuru ezu na amụ maka ihe eserese na Kunstakademie Düsseldorf n'okpuru Michael Buthe .
Mgbe Buthe ọnwụ na afọ 1994 ọ gbanwere ma ga soro na masterclass nke AR Penck.
Ọ hapụrụ ụlọ akwụkwọ Düsseldorf Art Academy na afọ 2002 dị ka onye gara akwukwo nke ukwu na n'okpuru AR Penck.
Kamgbe afọ 2000 Kwubiri na ezinụlọ ya bi na Pulheim dị nso na Cologne, ebe o nwere ụlọ ọrụ studio ya na WALZWERK, ebe agbanwere ụlọ dị cha ochie ka ha ghọrọ ụlọ ebe ọhụrụ ebe ndị mmadu na emepụta ihe.
Chidi Kwubiri enweela ọtụtụ ngosipụta aka ọrụ ya na ụwa.
Mgbe ụfọdụ naanị ya, oge ụfọdụ na otu na otu, o gosiwo ngosi na Europe, Africa, Middle East na USA.
N’afọ 2016 o mere MISEREOR lenten veil, nke nwere ọdịnala ihe karịrị afọ iri anọ, maka MISEREOR Lenten Mgbasa Ozi 2017/2018
