Afọ 1993:
Falilat Ogunkoya (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 5 n'ọnwa Disemba nke fọ 1968 na Ode Lemo,dị na Ogun Steeti nke Naijiria ) bụ nwaafọ Naijiria na-emebu egwuregwu ị gba ọsọ.
Ogunkoya a turula ugo n'ọtụtụ asọmpi na Naijiria, gụnyere ọla edo n'afọ 1996 n'ọsọ 400 mita, ọla edo n'ọsọ 200 mita n'ọsọ 400 mita n'afọ 1998, na ọla edo ọzọ n'afọ 1999 ma n'afọ 2001 n'ọsọ 400 mita.
Na Egwuregwu Afrịka niile nke afọ 1987 na Nairobi, o ritere nrite ọla ọcha n'ọsọ 200 mita.
N’afọ 1995 n’Egwuregwu Afrịka niile na Harare, o ritere ọla ọcha n'ọsọ 400 mita, n’egwuregwu nke afọ 1999 na Johannesburg, o ritere nrite ọla edo n'ọsọ 400 mita.
Na , o ritere ọla nchara n'ọsọ 400 mita, n'azụ Marie-José Pérec nke Frans na Cathy Freeman nke Ọstrelia, n'akara kachasị mma na nke Afrịka nke 49.10, nke bụ nke iri na abụọ kachasị ọsịsọ n'oge niile.
Nnenna Nwakanma bụ onye ndọrọndọrọ FOSS nke Naịjirịa, onye nhazi obodo, ma onye ndụmọdụ mmepe obodo.
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ afọ iri na ise na United Nations dị ka onye isi na-ahụ maka amụma maka ihe gbasara World Wide Web Foundation
Ndụ.
Nwakanma rụrụ ọrụ afọ iri na ise na United Nations.
Ọ bụ onye nsote ndị bidoro otu akpọrọ Free Software na Open Source Foundation maka Africa nke ọ bụ kwa osote onye isi.
Na mbụ Nwakanma so bụ ndị isi na atu alo na Open Source Initiative .
O jikọtara aka ya na ndị ọzọ wee malite The Africa Network of Information Society Actors, na African Civil Society maka Ozi Society nke ọ na-eje ozi na ya ] .
Ọ bukwa onye nsote onye isi oche na otu "Digital Solidarity Fund".
Na mbụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ozi na-ahụ maka ozi nke Africa na Helen Keller Foundation .
Nwakanma ekwuola okwu na nzukọ maka Open Source na Free Software na isiokwu ndị ọzọ gụnyere O'Reilly's OSCON, ndị Free and Open Source Developers European Meeting (FOSDEM), Yale University 's Access to Knowledge Conference, Ghana- India Kofi Annan centre maka Ọkachamara na ICT, Open World Forum, na Nzukọ Ọchịchị ntanetị.
N'ihe dị ka n'afọ 2019, ọ bụ onye ntụzịaka Onye Nduzi nke maka World Wide Web Foundation ebe ọ na-akwado ọrụ na Alliance for Affordable Internet na Weebụ Anyị Chọrọ .
Nwakanma na asụ asụsụ Bekee, French na asụsụ ole na ole n'Afrika.
O bi na Abidjan, Côte d'Ivoire.
Ọ bi go kwa na'ebe ole na ole dịkarịa ala mba ise dị iche iche n'Afrika.
Taiwo Olubunmi Abioye bụ prọfesọ Asụsụ nke Naijiria na ọkachamara na na .
Ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ ịbụ osote onye isi ọchịchị na Mahadum .
Mmalite ndu na mmuta.
Amụrụ ya na Jenụwarị 17, 1958 na .
Nne na nna ya si steeti , Abioye nwetara nzere mbụ ya na site na Mahadum .
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na ngalaba nke abụọ dị elu na 1987.
Ọ nwetara nzere mastas na PhD site na otu Mahadum ahụ n'afọ 1992 na 2004.
Na 1982, Abioye onye akwukwo kachasị mma na ngalaba mmuta English.
Ọrụ.
Abioye bidoro ọrụ nkuzi ya dịka onye enyemaka gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum na 1988, n'ime afọ iri na-abịanụ ọ gbagoro n'ọkwa wee bụrụ onye nkuzi na ABU.
Na 2005, ọ banyere na Mahadum wee bụrụ onye osote prọfesọ na 2010, mana kita, ọ bụ prọfesọ zuru ezu.
N’ọnwa Eprel afọ 2016, ọ dụrụ ndị otu na-achị ụmụ akwụkwọ ọdụ ka ha kwekọọ n’atụmatụ ọrụ ha.
Na 2011, o bipụtara akwụkwọ nke "Language and Ideology in George Ehusani's Writings", na ndị nyocha onwe ha nabatara akwụkwọ ahụ nke ọma.
Ọ bụbu onye DVC (maka ọrụ nchịkwa) maka afọ abụọ, tupu ọ bụrụ osote onye isi ọchịchị ụlọ akwụkwọ na 2014. 
 index tinyere na-ọkwa nke mbụ edemede isiokwu e depụtara na 2009 nke akpọrọ "'Typology of as a stylistic device in writing".
' Nchọpụta a lebara anya etu ndị Naịjirịa siri were asụsụ dị iche na asụsụ nne ha, tụmadụ etu ndị asụsụ ọzọ si asụ asụsụ ndị a, na etu usoro a siri metụta onye na-asụ ya.
N'elu nke ahụ, ọmụmụ ihe ahụ mere nyocha nke isiokwu nke "rhetorical questions", ebe ọ na-atụle uru na ọghọm banyere ndị Naijiria.
Taiwo Aladefa (amụrụ na !9 disemba 1971) bụ onye ọsọ egwuregwu Naijiria lara ezumike nká.
Ọ gara Mahadum Alabama A&amp;M site na 1989 ruo 1993.
Ọ ka bụ onye na-ejide ihe ndekọ ụlọ akwụkwọ ya na ọsọ 100Mita (13.19sec) ma bụrụ "NCAA All American athlete" ugboro iri na isii.
Taiwo Aladefa so na otu ụmụ akwụkwọ kọleji ndị ojii mbụ merịrị asọmpi egwuregwu nke NCAA haziri (1992).
Ọ zọrọ mpị na asọmpi olympik nke ụmụ nwaanyị emere na .
Taiwo bụ otu n'ime ndi ọsọ egwuregwu iri kachasị ọsọ nke 100mita na Afrika.
O ritere ọla edo na egwuregwu nke mba Afrika niile emere na 1995 na ọla ọcha na na asọmpi nke ma merie Egwuregwu Africa niile na ya na ndekọ mmeri ọhụrụ nke 12.98 sekọnd.
E jiri onyinye nke "Africa Legend in Athletics" were kwanyeere Taiwo Aladefa ugo na-afọ 2011 ma tinye aha ya na Alabama A&amp;M University Hall of Fame na August 2012.
Nwanne ya nwoke bụ sonyere na-asọmpi 400mita na ma nweta ọla ọcha na ọla nchara na egwuregwu nke mba Afrika niile na ma na .
Rosaline Patricia Irorefe Bozimo (amụrụ na 1 Jenụwari 1946) bụ onye ọkaiwu Naịjirịa nke ahọpụtara dịka onye isi ọka-ikpe nke malite na Machị 23, 2003.
Ọ lara ezumike nká na 1 Jenụwarị 2011 ma Honorable Justice Abiodun Smith nọchiri ya.
Ndabere.
Amụrụ Rosaline Bozimo na mpaghara nke Delta State.
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ na St. Maria Goretti Grammar, maka agụmakwụkwọ sekọndrị ya, gakwara Urhobo College, Effurun.
N’ọnwa Septemba 1970, a nabatara ya na Mahadum , , ebe ọ nweta nzere Iwu na 1973.
O mechara gaa ụlọ akwụkwọ iwu nke Naịjirịa a wee kpọọ ya na-afọ 1974.
Mgbe ọ mechara National Youth Service (NYSC) na na , ọ ghọrọ onye ọka iwu na-afọ 1975.
Ya na di ya bụ ndị rụpụtara Broderick Bozimo &amp; Co. Ọ bụ onye otu ikpe na Bendel Steetị nke ochie dị ka onye ọka-ikpe, tupu ọ laghachite na usoro iwu nke otu onye (1978-1983).
Na December 1983, a họpụtara ya ọzọ ka ọ bụrụ Ọkaikpe nke Steeti, mechara bụrụ onye isi ndị ọkaikpe na August 1988.
Mgbe e kere Delta Steeti site na Bendel ochie na 1991, ọ ghọrọ onye isi oche mbụ nke "Tenders Board" nke ụlọ ikpe , na "Chief Registrar" nke otu ụlọikpe ahụ na Septemba nke otu afọ ahụ.
Na Disemba, ọ ghọrọ onye ọka ikpe ụlọ ikpe ukwu.
Onye isi nchịkwa ndị Delta State mgbe ndị agha na-achị, Colonel , họpụtara ya dịka onye isi oche nke "Armed Robbery and Firearms Tribunal", Effurun, Delta Steetị.
O burukwa onye isi oche, Failed Banks Tribunal , Enugu Zone.
Mgbe ọ rụsịrị ọrụ dị ka onye nlekọta na-ahụ maka nchịkwa ikpe na mpaghara Ikpe atọ, a họpụtara ya dị ka Onyeikpe Kasị Elu nke Delta steeti malite na 23 Mach 2003.
Onye isi ọka-ikpe, Delta Steetị.
Na Disemba 2003 iji dozie mkpọchi na ụlọ mkpọrọ, Rosaline Bozimo tọhapụrụ ndị mkpọrọ iri ise na-itoolu na-eche ikpe.
Ọ dọrọ ndị uwe ojii aka na ntị ka ha ghara ịtụba ndị a na-enyo enyo na ha dara iwu n'ụlọ mkpọrọ na-enweghị ezigbo mbọ iji gbaa ha akwụkwọ.
Na Septemba 2007 Bozimo chụrụ Ọkaikpe nke Agbor, Mazị Charles Maidoh n'ọrụ n'ihi na ebubo na ọ na-anakọta N5,000 maka akwụkwọ mgbapụta ọ bụla maka ọ nyere.
N’ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2007, na Nzukọ Ndị Ikpe Naịjirịa niile, o kwuru maka Ngalaba Ikpe Na-ahụ Maka Ikpe n’Ọchịchị (NJC), nke e boro ilebara anya na inyocha ndị ọka ikpe.
Mgbe o nyechara obere akụkọ banyere NJC ma kwurịtakwa banyere ọrụ ya, o nyere nyocha dị oke mma, na-ekwupụta na ụkpụrụ ikpe ugbu a na Naijiria di ezigbo mma.
N'ọnwa Ọktọba 2007 Bozimo kwụrụ okwu siri ike maka ngalaba na-ahụ maka ikpe na Delta Steeti i nọọrọ onwe ha ma rịọ maka ọnọdụ ọrụ dị mma maka ndị otu ya bụ ndị ọka ikpe nke steeti.
Na Nọvemba 2008, Bozimo na Gọvanọ Delta Steeti, kwadoro ka e hiwe ụlọ ikpe mkpanaka iji kwado ndị megidere idebe obodo ha ọcha.
N'ihi mkpesa maka nrụrụ aka na mmeme ntuli aka, Bozimo họpụtara ndị ikpe na-ahụ maka ntuli aka nke gọọmentị mpaghara maka mpaghara atọ nke steeti, ọ mere ha anọ na August 2009.
Taiwo Rafiu (onye amụrụ na 18 June 1972 na bụ nwaanyị n'agba basketbọọlụ .
Ọ gara Mahadum na mba Amerika ma sonye na nọchitere na asọmpi olympik mere na afọ .
Ijeoma Grace Agu
Amụrụ Ijeoma Grace Agu
June 16
Agụm Akwụkwọ Nnamdi Azikiwe University
Aka Ọrụ Actress
Ijeoma Grace Agu bụ nwaafọ Naịjirịa na-eme ihe nkiri.
A họpụtara ya na "Ọkachamma na-akwado ihe nkiri na "12th Africa Movie Academy Awards".
O turu ugo mmeri dịka onye ga-eme ihe nkiri nke ọma na 2014 "Best of Nollywood Awards".
Na 2007, o mere ngosi izizi ya na usoro TV nke "Eldorado" .
O so na ndị otu ọmenaala na 2012 London Olympic Games .
Ndụ onwe.
Agu bụ nwa mbụ n'ime ụmụ ise nne na nna ya mụrụ.
Dị ka akụkọ ndị "Pulse Naịjirịa siri kwuo", a zụlitere ya na Benin na Lagos Steeti .
Ọ nwere akara ugo mmụta mbụ ya na Biochemistry na Mahadum Nnamdị Azikiwe na 2007.
Ọ lụrụ di ma mụta nwa nwanyị.
Ọ na-akọwa nna ya bụ onye tinyere mụọ ime ihe nkiri n'ime ya.
Dị ka Agu si kwuo, ime ihe nkiri ya bidoro mgbe ọ dị afọ 14.
Mgbe ọ na-agwa "The Nation (Naịjirịa) okwu" gbasara mmekọ nwoke na nwoke na Nolịwudu, Agụ kọwara na omume ahụ bụ mmehie ebe ndị ụka nọ, mana ọ bụghị mmebi iwu na-achị mmadụ.
N'aka nke ọzọ, o kwuru na e ekwesịghị ị dị na-eme ha ka ndị ohi maọbụ ndị ama.
O kwuru na ọ ga-eme ihe nkiri nke na-egosi mmekọ nwanyị na nwanyị.O kwusiri ike na ya anaghị akwado ihe ọbụla ga-eme ka akwafuo ọbala ndị Naịjirịa, mgbe ajụrụ ya maka mkpamkpa maka Biafra na ịtụ Nnamdi Kanu mkpọrọ.
Tanimowo Ogunlesi (1908-2002) bụ onye na-agba mbọ maka na Naịjirịa na onye isi otu njikọ nke "Women's Improvement League".
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị ụmụ nwanyị na-eme mkpọsa nke oge ya ma guzọbere otu nke "National Council of Women Societies", otu na-ahụ maka ikike ụmụ nwaanyị na Naijiria.
Ọ ghọrọ onye isi ala nke mbụ kansụl ahụ na 1959.
O lebara anya na ikike ụmụ nwanyị ịtụ vootu na ịnweta ohere dị ka ọtụtụ ụmụ nwanyị ndị .
Ọ dịghị mgbe ọ bụla ọ jụrụ ajụjụ banyere ka nwoke ndị naijiria si akpa dike na ụlọ.
Ọ sonye na mmegharị chọọrọ ka ezinụlọ na Nigeria di ezigbo mkpa mgbe ọ mepere ụlọ akwụkwọ ọzụzụ n'ụlọ.
Tega Tosin Richard (amụrụ na 13 Novemba 1992) bụ nwaanyị na-eme egwuregwu igba-mgba.
O sonyere n'egwuregwu na 2010 ma nweta ọla nchara na mmemme nke nwanyi nke .
O nwetakwara ihe nrite ọla ọcha na mmemme nke ụmụ nwanyị "63kg freestyle" na egwuregwu mgba nke asọmpi Afrika na 2010.
Cynthia Shalom (a mụrụ ya na ụbọchị ịrị na asatọ nke ọnwa Maachị na afọ otu puku na narị itenanị na ịrị na asatọ na asatọ).
Ọ bụ nwaafọ Naịjirịa na-eme ihe nkiri, ọ bụ onye na-emeputa ihe na onye ọchụnta ego.
O meriri oge ịrị na otu1
Cynthia Shalom (a mụrụ ya na ụbọchị ịrị na asatọ nke ọnwa Maachị na afọ otu puku na narị itenanị na ịrị na asatọ na asatọ).
Ọ bụ nwaafọ Naịjirịa na-eme ihe nkiri, ọ bụ onye na-emeputa ihe na onye ọchụnta ego.
O meriri oge ịrị na otu nke ihe ngosi ihe itunanya, "Next Movie Star" .
Kemgbe ahụ ka ọ gosipụtara n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri Nollywood .
E dere ya na M-net TV n'usoro "Tinsel" .
Mmalite ndu na mmuta.
A mụrụ Cynthia Shalom na Ede, Osun Steeti, Naịjirịa.
Ọ bụ nwa nwanyị mbụ n’ime ezinụlọ nke ụmụ nwoke atọ na ụmụ nwanyị abụọ.
O gara akwụkwọ pfona sekọndrị ya na Port Harcourt ebe ya na nne na nna ya biri.
Ebe a ka ọ nwetara a róè
A mụrụ Cynthia Shalom na Ede, Osun Steeti, Naịjirịa.
Ọ bụ nwa nwanyị mbụ n’ime ezinụlọ nke ụmụ nwoke atọ na ụmụ nwanyị abụọ.
O gara akwụkwọ pfona sekọndrị ya na Port Harcourt ebe ya na nne na nna ya biri.
☃☃ Ebe a ka ọ nwetara asambodo na Management si na University nke Port Harcourt na asambodo ime ihe nkiri si na Africa International Nkiri Ememme (AFRIFF) ọgbakọ idozi akalaka, N'ajụjụ ọnụ "Vanguard Nigeria" o kwụrụ na ọ kwagara Lagos ịchụso ọrụ ihe nkiri ọ na-eme .
Ọrụ.
Shalom bụ onye mmeri nke Next Movie Star Reality Show nke afọ puku abụọ na Ona afọ puku abụọ na isii 
Shalom bụ onye mmeri nke Next Movie Star Reality Show nke afọ puku abụọ na Ona afọ puku abụọ na isii0
Shalom bụ onye mmeri nke Next Movie Star Reality Show nke afọ puku abụọ na Ona afọ puku abụọ na isii.
Nke amere ya onye izizi na Monalisa Chinda si kwuo na show akpọrọ Mụ na Gị na "Monalisa" .
Ọ gwara "The Punch" na ọjụjụ bụ otu n'ime ihe mgbochi ọ meriri mgbe ọ malitere na Nollywood .
Na puku abụọ na iri na isii , a tụbara ya na ihe nkiri mbụ ya bụ "An Hour With The Shrink" na Annie Macaulay-Idibia, Gbenro Ajibade, na Segun Arinze .
Shalom jikọtara ya na Desmond Elliot na "The Damned" na Irokotv film.
Na afọ puku abụọ na iri asatọ, Shalom malitere ụlọ ọrụ na-emepụta ihe nkiri nke a kpọrọ Cynthia Shalom Productions.
Ọrụ ya na otu n’ime ihe nkiri ya bụ nke akpọrọ Chain, nke gosipụtara Eddie Watson, Enado Odigie, Emem Ufot, nyere ya nhọpụta mmadụ abụọ; Nwanyị kacha mma na Onye Nduzi na Onye Kachasị Egwu Nwaanyị na Nkụzi Nollywood nke afọ puku abụọ na itenanị.
Lota Chukwu
Lota Chukwu na 2018
Amụrụ Ugwu Lotachukwu Jacinta Obianuju Amelia
Nọvemba 29, 1989 (afọ 30)
Nsụka, Enugwu Steeti, Naịjirịa
Ebe Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ 
Mahadum Benin
Akaọrụ Ọmee ihe onyonyo
Afọ ọ nọ ọrụ 2014–ugbua
Ugwu Lotachukwu Jacinta Obianuju Amelia bụ onye "Naịjirịa" na-eme ihe onyonyo amaala dịka Lota Chukwu.
A maala ya mgbe ọ gbasịrị n'usoro TV Na-ewu ewu nke "Naịjirịa", "Jenifa's Diary" n'akụkụ Funke Akindele, Juliana Olayode, Falz ebe ọ mere dịka "Kiki", enyi nke onye ndu, Jenifa .
Ọ bụkwa onye "yoga" na-anụ ọkụ n'obi.
Ndụ mbido.
A mụrụ Lota na Nsụka, Enugwu Steeti, "Naịjirịa" mana ọ nwere nzụlite nwata ya na Benin City .
Lota bụ onye ikpeazụ n’ime ụmụ anọ nne na nna ya mụrụ.
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na "Agricultural Economics na Extension Service" na Mahadum nke Benin ma mesịa mee ihe na "Royal Arts Academy" na Legọọsụ, "Naịjirịa".
Ọrụ.
Tupu ime ihe onyonyo, Lota bụ onye nlereanya ma sonye na 2011 nke "Most Beautiful Girl na Naịjirịa" na- anọchite ndị Yobe Steeti.
Ọ malitere ime ihe onyonyo ya na 2011 mana ọ ghọrọ onye ama ama mgbe ọ pụtara na Jenifa's Diary ma mee dịka Kiki.
Ọ meela ihe nkiri ndị ọzọ dịka The Royal Hibiscus Hotel, Falling, Fine Girl, Arbitration, Dognapped.
E gosipụtara Lota dị ka onye ndu ihe onyonyo na Reminisce 's Ponmile "video as we as Aramide" "Why So Serious" .
Lota Takes.
N'afọ 2017, O kwupụtara mmepe ngosipụta nri ya nke ọ kpọrọ "Lota Takes", ihe nkiri a bụ isi nri na-etu esi ebi ndụ nke gosipụtara Lota dịka onye ihe ụwa na isi nri na-atọ ụtọ nke ukwuu.
Ihe nkiri a egosipụtago ndị Naịjiria amaala aha ndị dịka Adekunle Gold, Tosin Ajibade, Aramide (musician) MC Galaxy
Patoranking
Patoranking
Ihe Gbasara Ya
Aha Patrick Nnaemeka Okorie
Ọmụmụ 27 Mee 1990 (afọ 30)
Ijegun-Egba, Alimosho, Lagos Steeti, Naịjirịa
Nkenụụdị Rege, dansịhọlụ
Aka Ọrụ Oti Egwu, Ọgbaa Egwu, Odee Egwu
Ngwa Ọrụ Olu
Afọ ọ nọ ọrụ 2009–ugbua
Labeelụ Amari Musiq, VP Records
Ndị na-eti egwu Wizkid, Timaya, Davido, Faze, Tiwa Savage, Elephant Man, Busy Signal, Morgan Heritage, Bera Ivanishvili
Patrick Nnaemeka Okorie (amụrụ ya na 27 Mee 1990), nke eji aha ọgbọ ya bụ Patoranking mara, bụ onye regs nke Naịjirịa - onye otii egwu na onye na-ede egwu.
Amụrụ ya ma zulite ya na Ijegun-Egba Satellite Town, Patoranking bụ onye Ọnịcha, Ebọnyị Steeti.
Ọ malitere ọrụ iti egwu ya site na-ịrụkọ ọrụ n'okpuru ndị nka dịka XProject, Konga, Slam na Reggie Rockstone .
Ọ binyere aka na ndekọ egwu na "K-Solo's Igberaga Records" na 2010.
Ọ wepụtara "Up in D Club" n'okpuru ndị ahụ.
Patoranking ghọrọ onye nkwado nke Dem Mama Records mgbe ya na Timaya rụkọchara egwu ya bụ "Alubarika".
Na Febuwarị 2014, ọ bịanyere aka na ndekọ egwu ndị Foston Musik were wepụta "Girlie O", nke mere ka ọ pụta ìhè.
Na 9 Febuwarị 2015, Patoranking kwupụtara na Instagram na ọ bịanyere aka na ụlọ ọrụ ndị VP Records .
Na Septemba 28 Patoranking wepụtara egwu aha ya bụ Abule nke ọ wepụtara tupu abọm were pụta n'oge na-adịghị anya na 2020
Ndụ na ọrụ egwu ya.
A mụrụ Patoranking ma zulite ya na "Ijegun-Egba Satellite Town", mana o nwere mgbọrọgwụ ezinụlọ na Onicha, Ebonyi Steeti .
Ọ gara "Citizen Comprehensive Koleji" na Epe, Legọọsụ ma mesịa banye na "Jibril Martin Memorial Grammar Sukulu" na Iponri.
Patoranking malitere ịrụ ọrụ nkà ya dị ka otii egwu n'okporo ámá na ịgba egwu .
N'ajụjụ ọnụ a jụrụ ya na 2012 na "Entertainment Express", ọ sịrị na aha ọgbọ ya bụ onye Jamaica nyere ya na "Alpha Beach" na Legọọsụ.
Patoranking kpọrọ Buju Banton, Bob Marley, Fela Kuti, Lucky Dube, Chaka Demus, Majek Fashek, Blackky, Blackface, Tuface na Marvelus Benjamin dị ka ndị metụtara iti egwu ya.
N'ajụjụ ọnụ ahụ ndị "Entertainment Express", ọ kọwara egwu ya dị ka ụzọ omume dị iche iche nke ịgba egwu were kwukwa na ọ na-arụtụ aka n'okwu metụtara mmekọrịta ọha na eze.
Na Mee 2012, Patoranking wepụtara otu egwu akpọrọ "Iya Bisi", nke ya na Qdot na Kbaj tiri.
Egwu akpọrọ "Drumphase" bụ ngwakọta nke dansịhọlụ na fuji.
Patoranking gwara '"Entertainment Express"' na Qdot na Kbaj nyere ya aka were dee egwu ahụ site na ha ichekorịta echiche ọnụ.
Na 12 Septemba 2013, Patoranking wepụtara ọdịyo na vidiyo maka "Alubarika" n'otu oge.
Egwu ahụ na nsụgharị n'ụzọ nkịtị pụtara "Ngọzi Chineke" ma gosipụta olu sitere na Timaya .
Ihe nkiri vidiyo "Alubarika" bụ AJE Films mepere ya.O ruru nkeji 4 na sekọnd 16.
Dika edemede nke Victor Akande nke Nation dere, Patoranking kọwara egwu a dịka nchịkọta nke ndu ya dika onye egwu ma kwuo na o meghere ya ụzọ ịnwete ndị na-eso ya nakwa ndị egwu kwudosiri ike.
Na Febuwarị 2014, Patoranking bịanyere aka na ndekọ egwu na Foston Musik wee mechie njikọ ya na Dem Mama Records.
N'oge mkparịta ụka ya na Toolz na NdaniTV's "The Juice", Timaya kwuru na Patoranking hapụrụ aha ya na ọ nweghị mgbe ọ bịanyere aka n'akwụkwọ.
Na 4 Febuwarị 2014, Patoranking wepụtara "Girlie O", egwu nke WizzyPro mepụtara.
A gbagburu vidio egwu maka abụ ahụ site n'aka Moe Musa; e wepụtara ya na 5 Febụwarị 2014.
Na vidio egwu, Patoranking napụtara onye agbata obi ya na-esote esemokwu ụlọ site na igosipụta mmetụta ebumpụta ụwa ya.
Foston Musik wepụtara "Girlie O"(ntigharị) nke Tiwa Savage nyere ya aka were tie na 19 Mee 2014.
Ọ pụtara na nke 9 na "MTV Base 's Official Naija Top 10" chaatị.
Tiwa Savage gwara Ehiz nke MTV Base n' egwu Patoranking na-amasị ya, ya mere o jiri were kpebie ịbịakwute ya ka ha were tigharịa egwu ahụ.
Moe Musa wepụtara Vidiyo egwu a ma dụzie egwu a bụ"Girlie O" (ntigharị) na London.
Joey Akan nke Pulse Nigeria kwuru, "Na ntigharị ọhụrụ ahụ, na-atụfubeghị isi sekpụ ntị nke bụ mmeri.
Ejigidere ha ma welite ha.
Ha jigidere ụda egwu, ekwem ukwe na dayamizim nakwa nnukwu ọrha tinyere na lirikis.
" 
Patoranking gosipụtara n'egwu Seyi Shay "Murda" ya na Shaydee.
Dokta Frabz mepụtara egwu a ma wepụta ya na 1 Eprel 2014.
E tinyere vidiyo egwua “Murda” na "Vevo" Meji Alabi nke "JM Films" bụ ndị nduzi.
Egwu Patoranking ndị a "Daniella Whine" na "My Woman, My Everything" pụtara na chaatịị egwu iri nọ n'elu na "MTV Base Official Naija Top 10".
Nke mbụ gbara nke anọ na ọnwa Mee ma gbakwaa nke mbụ na ọnwa Juunu, ebe nke ikpeazụ "My Woman, My everything" pụtakwara na chaatịị dịka nke abụọ.
2016: "The Voice Nigeria" na "God Over Everything".
Na Jenụwarị 2016, e mere Patoranking dị ka otu n'ime ndị ikpe maka mbipụta nke asọmpi egwu "The Voice Nigeria" .
Patoranking wepụtara abọm studio izizi ya "God Over Everything" na 1 August 2016.
O gosipụtara ndị egwu ọzọ n dịka Phyno, Wizkid, Sarkodie, Olamide, Elephant Man na Wasiu Ayinde Marshall .
Abọm ahụ nọ nke 4 na chaatịị "Billboard 'Reggae Albums".
Patoranking "ALU Scholarship".
Patoranking etinyela aka n'usoro ihe ọmụmụ maka ụmụaka Afrịka ndị na-enweghi ike inweta agụma akwụkwọ kwesịrị ekwesị.
Na-agbanyeghị mmata a matara ya n'ụwa niile, onye na-eti egwuka a ka nwere mmasị n'ebe agụmakwụkwọ dị.
Na 2019, O zutere onye guzobere mmemme agụmakwụkwọ ALU, ebe ọ bidoro mmemme iji zụọ ụmụaka iri obi na-anụ ọkụ ọkachasị na Ebute-Metta ebe ọ nọ were tolitere na ndị ọzọ enweghị ego ha nwere maka agụm akwụkwọ.
Nsidee.
Onyinye na ihe Mmeta
Ọnọchiri 
Sean Tizzle (2013) Next Rated Award
2014 nochie ya
Tochukwu Oluehi (amụrụ na 2 Mee n'afọ 1987 ) bụ onye Naijiria nke na agba bọọlụ na-egwuri egwu dika onye nche nke ndi Spen Segunda División Pro klọb CD Pozoalbense na ndi otu ụmụnwaanyị Naijiria .
Ọrụ.
Klọb.
Oluehi gbara bọọlụ Bobruichanka Bobruisk n'afọ 2013–14 UEFA Champions League .
N’ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 2016, Oluehi na onye agbata obi ya bụ Cecilia Nku hapụrụ Rivers Angels iji sonye ọgbakọ Norwegian Toppserien Medkila IL .
O gwuru Medkila egwuregwu iri abụọ na otụ tupu ọ laghachite na Rivers Angels ma kemgbe afọ 2017 ọ bụ onye isi otu egwuregwu, nke Angel.
Mba.
O gwụọla egwu ugboro atọ nke FIFA World Cup na otu oge egwuregwu Olimpik maka ndị otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị naijiria .
Antionette Oyedupe Payne, nke a maara dika Toni Payne (amụrụ n'afọ 1995) bụ onye n’agba bọọlụ Amerika-Naijiria .
Ọ na egwụ egwure dị ka a na-atụ maka Sevilla FC .
Ndụ.
A mụrụ Toni Payne na Birmingham, Alabama, site n'aka nne na nna abụọ si Naijiria, ma too na United States .
Payne na-egwu egwu maka ndị otu n’okpuru United States na-erubeghị afọ iri na asaa, ma nọrọ na otu ndi meriri n'afọ2012 CONCACAF Women U-17 Championship Site n'afọ 2016 rue n'afọ 2018 ya na AFC Ajax gwụrụ egwu.
N'afọ 2018 jụụne o sonyeere Sevilla na nkwekọrịta otu afọ, nke agbatịkwu maka afọ abụọ ọzọ n'afọ 2019.
N'afọ 2019, o kwupụtara ebumnuche ya iji gaa n'ihu na ọrụ ya na mba Naijiria .
Ugochi Opara (amụrụ n’abalị iri abụọ na asaa n’ọnwa Mee afọ 1976) bụ onye ọgba bọọlụ Naijiria gbara bọọlụ dịka onye na- eche nche n’egwuregwu ụmụnwaanyị Naịjirịa Ọ bụ akụkụ nke otu egwuregwu na 1995 FIFA Women's World Cup na 2003 FIFA World Cup .
Tara Fela-Durotoye (amụrụ 6 Maachị 1977) bụ onye ọchụnta ego na ịchọọ mma nke Naijiria.
Onye mbụ na ọrụ edozi mma nwanyị na Naịjirịa, ọ dere akwụkwọ ndekọ maka jikere alụ nwanyị ọhụrụ na 1999, guzobe ụlọ ọrụ jikere ụmụ nwaanyị wee guzobe ụlọ akwụkwọ mbụ maka ịma mma ụmụ nwanyị na Naijiria.
Ọ bụ onye guzọbere House of Tara International ma meputa Tara Orekelewa Beauty range, senti na ngwaahịa H.I.P.
A na-ahụta ya dị ka onye ikike dị ukwuu na obodo achụmnta ego ụmụ nwanyị nke Nigeria nke mepụtara azụmaahịa mmetụta dị iche nke nyerela ọtụtụ ụmụ nwaanyi ndị ọchụnta ego maka ịchọọ mma site na atụmatụ "Tara Beauty entrepreneur".
Ọ natala ọtụtụ onyinye nsọpụrụ dị iche iche maka ọrụ ya dị mkpa na alaka azụmaahịa na onyinye nke; 'Most Outstanding Business Woman of the Year 2018' site na African Economy Builders Awards Abidjan.
Na 2018, Tara natara akara ngosi nke Afrika site na Ghana Makeup Awards yana 'Leadership for Entrepreneurship' site na Harvard Business School Association of Nigeria.
N’afọ 2007, e nyere Tara Fela-Durotoye onyinye nsọpụrụ nke Africa SMME na Ọchunta ego na South Africa.
Na 2013, depụtara aha ya dịka otu n'ime nwaanyi iri abụọ siri ike na Afrika.
Ọ bụ onye gụsịri akwụkwọ na Lagos Business School Chief Executive Program, INSEAD Abu Dhabi, Mahadum Yale, Stanford SEED Transformation Programme, na Harvard Kennedy School ebe omechara Global Leadership and Public Policy na 21st century, Ọ bụ onye otu nzukọ nke France / Nigeria Investment club nke Onye isi ala France Emmanuel Macron mepere na 2018.
Malite ndụ.
Amụrụ Tara Fela-Durotoye n'ụlọ ọgwụ na-ezinulo John Ejegi Sagay, onye kọmishọna na na Felicia Omaghomi.
Ndị mụrụ ya kewara alụmdi mgbe ọ dị naanị ọnwa asatọ, ya, Modupe Agnes Sagay zụlitere ya.
Ọ malitere agụmakwụkwọ ya na Command Children School, wee gawa Nigeria Navy Secondary School, Ojo, ebe o bi n'ime ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ.
Emere ya onye nlekọta na idebe ihe ọcha na ọdịmma nke ụmụ akwụkwọ.
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum , nweta nzere na wee malite "House of Tara International.
"
Ndụ ya n'ime.
Tara lụrụ , onye ọkachamara maka azụmaahịa na onye isi ụlọ ọrụ nke Visible Impact.
O nwara ịzọ ọkwa onyeisiala Naijiria n'ụbọchị 22 Febụwarị 2018, site na-otu ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị nke Alliance for new Nigeria.
Ha nwere umu nwoke ato, Mobolurin, Demilade &amp; Morolaoluwa.
Farida Mzamber Waziri (onye a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 7 n'ọnwa Julai nke afọ 1949) bu onye Naijiriabụ teknokrat, onye mmanye iwu na onye bụbu onye isi oche ndi (EFCC) nke Naijiria.
Ọ nọchiri Nuhu Ribadu n'ọkwa a.
Ndabere.
A mụrụ Farida Mzamber Waziri n'ụbọchị nke 7 n'ọnwa Julaị n'afọ 1949 ma zụlite ya na Gboko,nke Benue Steeti .
O nwetar nzere bachelọ nke iwu na Mahadum nke Legọs ma nweta nzere masta na Iwu na Lagos State University .
N’afọ 1996, o nwetara nzere masta na Strategic Studies na Mahadum nke Ibadan .
Ọ bụ onye dere "Advance Fee Fraud, National Security and the Law".
Ọrụ ndị uwe ojii.
Farida Waziri debara aha na ndị uwe ojii nke Naijiria n'afọ 1965 were rịgoro n'ọkwa osote onye isi ndị uwe ojii.
O jibu ọkwa nke osote onye isi ndị uwe ojii (Ọrụ), nnyocha na nhọpụta, osote onye isi ndị uwe ojii CID Alagbon, Legọs, Kọmịshọna ndị uwe ojii, Nchọpụta izugbe na Kọmịshọna ndị uwe ojii na-ahụ maka X-Squad.
N'ọkwa ikpeazụ a, ọ bụ ya na-ahụ maka ikpe iri ngo na nrụrụ aka n'ime ndị uwe ojii.
O jekwara ozi dị ka Kọmishọna ndị uwe ojii (ngalaba aghụghọ pụrụ iche) bụ nke o dere ndekọ ikpe mmeri mbụ maka Advance Fee Fraud na Naijiria.
O duru ndị nnọchi anya West Afrịka na Advance Fee Fraud na Lyons,nke Frans n'afọ 1996.
O duru ndị nnọchi anya Naijiria gaa Dallas,na Texas maka nzukọ ọmụmụ nke United States Secret Service haziri n'afọ 1998.
Ndụ onwe.
Ọ lụrụ Senator Ajuji Waziri, onye bụbu onye nnọchi anya gọọmentị Naijiria na Tọki nke nwụrụ n'afọ 2017.
Onye isi oche EFCC.
Mgbe ndị kọmitii Sineti na-ahụ maka nrụrụ aka na-enyocha ya maka ọrụ EFCC, ọ gọrọ na ya eguzola ka onye nchekwa gọvanọ chịburu Benue Steeti, bụ Sịnetọ George Akume mgbe e boro ya ebubo nrụrụ aka.
Onye isi ala Umaru Yar'Adua nabatara ya dịka onye isi oche EFCC n'ọnwa Mee afọ 2008, ma jụkwa ịnakwere ọkwa ya ahụ ruo mgbe ndị sịneti nabatara ya.
Nhọpụta n'ọkwa a butere esemokwu.
Obere oge a họpụtachara ya, Waziri nyochara ebe ndị EFCC na-akpọchị ndị mmadụ iji chọpụta ọnọdụ ndị a na-enyocha.
N'ọnwa Septemba afọ 2008, Waziri kwuru na e nweghị ike ịkwado ebubo nrụrụ aka onye bụbu onye isi ala Olusegun Obasanjo na ụfọdụ ndị bụbụ ndị gọvanọ steeti makana faịlụ ndị ahụ adịghị ma ọ bụ na ha efuola.
N’ọnwa Ọgọstụ n’afọ 2008, ndị EFCC nwụchiri onye osote onye isi nke PDP Bode George na Legọs ma kpụpụ ya na mmadụ anọ ndị ọzọ na ebubo 163 eboro ha maka ị gba izu, i nupụrụ iwu isi, i mebi ụlọ ọrụ na ị nye ọrụ kọntraktị ruru ijeri naira 84 n'ụzọ megidere iwu mgbe ọ bụ onye isi oche nke NPA.
N’ọnwa Ọktọba afọ 2009, a mara Bode George ikpe ma maa ziga ya mkpọrọ ọnwa 30.
N’ọnwa Eprel afọ 2009, Waziri kwuru na ndị EFCC na-akwado ị wepụta onye bụbu Mịnịsta nke Federal Capital Territory bụ Mallam Nasir El-Rufai n’aka Amerịka ka ọ zaa ebubo.
O kwukwara na Onyeisiala kwadoro mweghachi nke Nigeria Police Force Insurance Benefits nke so na ijeri naira 17 nke enwetara n'aka onye isi nke ndị uwe ojii bụ Mustafa Adebayo Balogun, n'agbanyeghị na Alhaji Tafa Balogun na-achọ ị weghachita akụ ndị a. O kwuru na ikpe ruru 200 na-echere maka nrụrụ aka, mpụ ego, igwu wayo, mgbochi mmanụ na-akwadoghị na mmebi nke okporo igwe mmanụ.
N’ọnwa Juun afọ 2009, ka ọ na-ekwu okwu na nnọkọ ogbako iji gosi afọ mbụ ya n’ọchịchị, Farida Waziri kwuru na ndị EFCC na-aga n’ihu n’ịgba mbọ iji gbaa ndị bụbu gọvanọ akwụkwọ gụnyere Dọkịnta Peter Odili nke Rivas steeti, Sịnetọ Bola Tinubu nke Legọs Steeti, Ayo Fayose nke Ekiti Steeti, Joshua Dariye nke Plato Steeti, Saminu Turaki nke Jigawa Steeti, Jolly Nyame nke Taraba Steeti na Michael Botmang nke Plato Steeti .
Ndị ọzọ a na-enyo enyo n'ọkwa dị elu gụnyere Sịnetọ Nicholas Ugbane na onye bụbụ Mịnịsta FCT bụ Nasir El-Rufai.
O gosipụtara obi nkoropụ n' igbu oge nke n'ụlọ ikpe n'okwu ndị a. O kwukwara na ya ga-ebido ị gba mgbaba n'ikpe ị nwe akụnụba n'Abuja.
Na Mee 2009, e nwere akụkọ banyere mgba Daịrektọ nke Opụreshọns nke EFCC, Maazị Tunde Ogunshaki, bụ onye Waziri chụrụ n'ọrụ, o yiri ka ọ metụtara James Ibori, Atọnị Jenara nke Naijiria, Mike Aondoakaa na Inspekta Jenara nke ndị uwe ojii Mike Mbama Okiro .
N’ọnwa Mee kwa, ndị EFCC nwudoro onye isi oche Kọmitii sịneti n'ọkụ, Sịnetọ Nicholas Ugbane, odeakwụkwọ izugbe nke mịnịstịrị na-ehụ maka ọkụ,bụ Alhaji Abdullahi Aliyu na ndị ọzọ, n’ihe gbasara aghụghọ ọrụ ijeri naira 6 maka ọkụ latrik ime obodo.
Ka oge na-aga n’afọ ahụ, EFCC nyere ndị isi nke Nigeria Labour Congress ndepụta nke ndị a ma ama dị iri ise na isii bụ ndị Naijiria e boro ebubo na ha nọ na-ezu ego obodo nke ruru ijeri naira 243.
Nchụpụ na ọrụ ngwụcha.
Onye isi ala Goodluck Jonathan wepụrụ Waziri n'ọkwa ya n'ụbọchị nke 23 n'ọnwa Nọvemba afo 2011 were tinye Ibrahim Lamorde n'ụbọchị nke 28 n'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2011 ka ọ nọchite anya ya dịka onye isi oche mgbe ahụ.
Nchụpụ ya nwere ike ịbụ maka ebubo na EFCC na-ahọrọ na nyocha ya, ma ọ bụ esemokwu ya na onye ọka ikpe-ukwu na Mịnịsta Ikpe nkwụmọtọ, Mohammed Bello Adoke maka ịkagbu ikpe a kpọtara n'ụlọ ikpe.
E boro ebubo na Waziri nwere ike i mebi nyocha nke oshi ego megide onye bụbu gọvanọ nke Bayelsa steeti, Timipreye Sylva N'ọnọdụ ụfọdụ, dịka ọ dị na ikpe megide onye bụbu gọvanọ Edo Steeti bụ Lucky Igbinedion, ụlọ ikpe ahụ nyere ntaramahụhụ na- ekwesịghị ekwesị .
Mana, ndị EFCC nwere ike i meghe ụzọ maka nkea site na i kwere ị nabata arịrịọ.
Ka ọ hapụsịrị ọrụ, akụkọ dị na Waziri na-atụle i de akwụkwọ banyere ahụmịhe ya na EFCC.
Farida Mzamber Waziri (onye a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 7 n'ọnwa Julai nke afọ 1949) bu onye Naijiriabụ teknokrat, onye mmanye iwu na onye bụbu onye isi oche ndi (EFCC) nke Naijiria.
Ọ nọchiri Nuhu Ribadu n'ọkwa a.
Ndabere.
A mụrụ Farida Mzamber Waziri n'ụbọchị nke 7 n'ọnwa Julaị n'afọ 1949 ma zụlite ya na Gboko,nke Benue Steeti .
O nwetar nzere bachelọ nke iwu na Mahadum nke Legọs ma nweta nzere masta na Iwu na Lagos State University .
N’afọ 1996, o nwetara nzere masta na Strategic Studies na Mahadum nke Ibadan .
Ọ bụ onye dere "Advance Fee Fraud, National Security and the Law".
Ọrụ ndị uwe ojii.
Farida Waziri debara aha na ndị uwe ojii nke Naijiria n'afọ 1965 were rịgoro n'ọkwa osote onye isi ndị uwe ojii.
O jibu ọkwa nke osote onye isi ndị uwe ojii (Ọrụ), nnyocha na nhọpụta, osote onye isi ndị uwe ojii CID Alagbon, Legọs, Kọmịshọna ndị uwe ojii, Nchọpụta izugbe na Kọmịshọna ndị uwe ojii na-ahụ maka X-Squad.
N'ọkwa ikpeazụ a, ọ bụ ya na-ahụ maka ikpe iri ngo na nrụrụ aka n'ime ndị uwe ojii.
O jekwara ozi dị ka Kọmishọna ndị uwe ojii (ngalaba aghụghọ pụrụ iche) bụ nke o dere ndekọ ikpe mmeri mbụ maka na Naijiria.
O duru ndị nnọchi anya West Afrịka na Advance Fee Fraud na Lyons,nke Frans n'afọ 1996.
O duru ndị nnọchi anya Naijiria gaa Dallas,na Texas maka nzukọ ọmụmụ nke United States Secret Service haziri n'afọ 1998.
Ndụ onwe.
Ọ lụrụ Senator Ajuji Waziri, onye bụbu onye nnọchi anya gọọmentị Naijiria na Tọki nke nwụrụ n'afọ 2017.
Onye isi oche EFCC.
Mgbe ndị kọmitii Sineti na-ahụ maka nrụrụ aka na-enyocha ya maka ọrụ EFCC, ọ gọrọ na ya eguzola ka onye nchekwa gọvanọ chịburu Benue Steeti, bụ Sịnetọ George Akume mgbe e boro ya ebubo nrụrụ aka.
Onye isi ala Umaru Yar'Adua nabatara ya dịka onye isi oche EFCC n'ọnwa Mee afọ 2008, ma jụkwa ịnakwere ọkwa ya ahụ ruo mgbe ndị sịneti nabatara ya.
Nhọpụta n'ọkwa a butere esemokwu.
Obere oge a họpụtachara ya, Waziri nyochara ebe ndị EFCC na-akpọchị ndị mmadụ iji chọpụta ọnọdụ ndị a na-enyocha.
N'ọnwa Septemba afọ 2008, Waziri kwuru na e nweghị ike ịkwado ebubo nrụrụ aka onye bụbu onye isi ala Olusegun Obasanjo na ụfọdụ ndị bụbụ ndị gọvanọ steeti makana faịlụ ndị ahụ adịghị ma ọ bụ na ha efuola.
N’ọnwa Ọgọstụ n’afọ 2008, ndị EFCC nwụchiri onye osote onye isi nke PDP Bode George na Legọs ma kpụpụ ya na mmadụ anọ ndị ọzọ na ebubo 163 eboro ha maka ị gba izu, i nupụrụ iwu isi, i mebi ụlọ ọrụ na ị nye ọrụ kọntraktị ruru ijeri naira 84 n'ụzọ megidere iwu mgbe ọ bụ onye isi oche nke NPA.
N’ọnwa Ọktọba afọ 2009, a mara Bode George ikpe ma maa ziga ya mkpọrọ ọnwa 30.
N’ọnwa Eprel afọ 2009, Waziri kwuru na ndị EFCC na-akwado ị wepụta onye bụbu Mịnịsta nke Federal Capital Territory bụ Mallam Nasir El-Rufai n’aka Amerịka ka ọ zaa ebubo.
O kwukwara na Onyeisiala kwadoro mweghachi nke Nigeria Police Force Insurance Benefits nke so na ijeri naira 17 nke enwetara n'aka onye isi nke ndị uwe ojii bụ Mustafa Adebayo Balogun, n'agbanyeghị na Alhaji Tafa Balogun na-achọ ị weghachita akụ ndị a. O kwuru na ikpe ruru 200 na-echere maka nrụrụ aka, mpụ ego, igwu wayo, mgbochi mmanụ na-akwadoghị na mmebi nke okporo igwe mmanụ.
N’ọnwa Juun afọ 2009, ka ọ na-ekwu okwu na nnọkọ ogbako iji gosi afọ mbụ ya n’ọchịchị, Farida Waziri kwuru na ndị EFCC na-aga n’ihu n’ịgba mbọ iji gbaa ndị bụbu gọvanọ akwụkwọ gụnyere Dọkịnta Peter Odili nke Rivas steeti, Sịnetọ Bola Tinubu nke Legọs Steeti, Ayo Fayose nke Ekiti Steeti, Joshua Dariye nke Plato Steeti, Saminu Turaki nke Jigawa Steeti, Jolly Nyame nke Taraba Steeti na Michael Botmang nke Plato Steeti .
Ndị ọzọ a na-enyo enyo n'ọkwa dị elu gụnyere Sịnetọ Nicholas Ugbane na onye bụbụ Mịnịsta FCT bụ Nasir El-Rufai.
O gosipụtara obi nkoropụ n' igbu oge nke n'ụlọ ikpe n'okwu ndị a. O kwukwara na ya ga-ebido ị gba mgbaba n'ikpe ị nwe akụnụba n'Abuja.
Na Mee 2009, e nwere akụkọ banyere mgba Daịrektọ nke Opụreshọns nke EFCC, Maazị Tunde Ogunshaki, bụ onye Waziri chụrụ n'ọrụ, o yiri ka ọ metụtara James Ibori, Atọnị Jenara nke Naijiria, Mike Aondoakaa na Inspekta Jenara nke ndị uwe ojii Mike Mbama Okiro .
N’ọnwa Mee kwa, ndị EFCC nwudoro onye isi oche Kọmitii sịneti n'ọkụ, Sịnetọ Nicholas Ugbane, odeakwụkwọ izugbe nke mịnịstịrị na-ehụ maka ọkụ,bụ Alhaji Abdullahi Aliyu na ndị ọzọ, n’ihe gbasara aghụghọ ọrụ ijeri naira 6 maka ọkụ latrik ime obodo.
Ka oge na-aga n’afọ ahụ, EFCC nyere ndị isi nke Nigeria Labour Congress ndepụta nke ndị a ma ama dị iri ise na isii bụ ndị Naijiria e boro ebubo na ha nọ na-ezu ego obodo nke ruru ijeri naira 243.
Nchụpụ na ọrụ ngwụcha.
Onye isi ala Goodluck Jonathan wepụrụ Waziri n'ọkwa ya n'ụbọchị nke 23 n'ọnwa Nọvemba afo 2011 were tinye Ibrahim Lamorde n'ụbọchị nke 28 n'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2011 ka ọ nọchite anya ya dịka onye isi oche mgbe ahụ.
Nchụpụ ya nwere ike ịbụ maka ebubo na EFCC na-ahọrọ na nyocha ya, ma ọ bụ esemokwu ya na onye ọka ikpe-ukwu na Mịnịsta Ikpe nkwụmọtọ, Mohammed Bello Adoke maka ịkagbu ikpe a kpọtara n'ụlọ ikpe.
E boro ebubo na Waziri nwere ike i mebi nyocha nke oshi ego megide onye bụbu gọvanọ nke Bayelsa steeti, Timipreye Sylva N'ọnọdụ ụfọdụ, dịka ọ dị na ikpe megide onye bụbu gọvanọ Edo Steeti bụ Lucky Igbinedion, ụlọ ikpe ahụ nyere ntaramahụhụ na- ekwesịghị ekwesị .
Mana, ndị EFCC nwere ike i meghe ụzọ maka nkea site na i kwere ị nabata arịrịọ.
Ka ọ hapụsịrị ọrụ, akụkọ dị na Waziri na-atụle i de akwụkwọ banyere ahụmịhe ya na EFCC.
Jidenna
Jidenna na-egosipụta na 2015
Ihe Gbasara ya
Aha Jidenna Theodore Mobisson (Black Ranga)

Roman GianArthur
Website jidenna.com
Jidenna Theodore Mobisson (a mụrụ ya na Mee 4, 1985).
Ọ bụ sọọsọ Jidenna ka, eji mara ya.Ọ bụ onye Naịjirịa ma bụrụkwa Amerịkan rapa, na-agụ egwú, Odee egwu, na onye mmepụta ndekọ egwu.
Na 2015, Jidenna wepụtara egwu abụọ, "Classic Man " na "Yoga",nke na-akwalite lebeelụ Jane lle Monáe Wondaland nchịkọta ndekọ egwu EP "The Eephus" ya naEpic Records .
E wepụtara abọm mbụ ya, "The Chief" na Febuarị 17, 2017 nke bụ nọmba 38 na Billboard 200 .
Mmalite ndụ na agụm akwụkwọ.
A mụrụ Jidenna Theodore Mobisson na Mee 4, 1985 na Wisconsin Rapids, Wisconsin.
Nna ya bụ Tama Mobisson bụ onye na-ahụ maka ego ebe nne ya bụ Oliver Mobisson, bụ onye mmụta Igbo na Naịjirịa .
Jidenna tolitere nwantịtị oge na Naịjirịa, ebe nna ya na-aru ọrụ dịka onye nkuzi nke sayensi kọmputa na Enugu State University .
Mgbe Jidenna dị afọ isii, ezinụlọ ya laghachiri United Steeti.
Na 1995, ezinụlọ kwagara Norwood, Massachusetts, wee mesịa gaa Milton, Massachusetts, na 2000.
Nna ya nwụrụ na 2010.
Na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndịrị ọ chọpụtara ngalaba otu rapụ nke akpọrọ Black Spadez, ọ were malite imepụta, ịhazi na ide ihe.
Jidenna wepụtara abọm mbụ ya nke ya na Black Spadez tiri dịka ọrụ ikpeazụ ha na Milton Academy, ebe Jidenna gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 2003.
Na 2008, mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Bachelor of Arts na Comparative Studies in Race and Ethnicity na Mahadum Stanford, ọ gbasoro ọrụ egwu ya mgbe ọ na-arụ ọrụ dịka onye nkuzi, na-agagharị na obodo ndị a ; Los Angeles, Oakland, Brooklyn na Atlanta, tupu ọ banye na nkwekọrịta ya na onye na-ede ihe ndekọ Janelle Monáe's Wondaland Records.
Ọrụ.
Jidenna binyere aka na Janelle Monáe 's Wondaland Records ma kesaa ya site na Epic Records .
Ya na ọtụtụ ndị na-eti egwu na labeelụ ha bụ Roman GianArthur, St Beauty, Deep Cotton na Janelle Monáe etikọla egwu.
Ọ malite ịdekọba egwu ise nke mbido egwu mbụ ndị (EP), nke akpọrọ "Eephus" .
Na Febụwarị 2015, Jidenna wepụtara egwu izizi ya, nke akpọrọ " Classic Man " nke gosipụtara GianArthur.
Egwú ahụ na-atụgharị ntụgharị dị egwu na United Steeti niile, o were pụta na nọmba 49 na "chaatị Billboard" Hot R &amp;amp; B / Hip-Hop Airplay .
Na March 31, 2015, Janelle Monáe na Jidenna wepụtara egwu nke abụọ nke sitere na EP - "Yoga".
A họpụtara egwu ya bụ "Classic Man" maka Best Rap / Sung Collaboration na 58th Grammy Awards .
Na ọnwa Juunu nke otu afọ ahụ, Jidenna na Monáe gosipụtara egwu ha na BET Awards .
Jidenna natakwara onyinye maka onye ọhụụ kachasị mma na 2015 Soul Train Music Awards na Nọvemba.
Jidenna bụ onye guzobere ọgbakọ mmekọrịta "Fear &amp; Fancy", nke bidoro na California n'afọ 2006.
Otu a bụ mkpokọta mba nke ndị ọchụnta ego, ndị na-eme ihe nkiri, ndị nkuzi, ndị ọkà mmụta sayensị, na ndị nka na-akwado nnọkọ maka egwu, oriri nke nri abalị, na ihe ngosipụta na-echeta enyemaka ndị mmadụ na klọbụ obi ụtọ nke New Orleans.
Na Juunu 2016, ọ wepụtara egwu a "Chief Don't Run".
na February 17, 2017, Jidenna weputara "The Chief", egwu studiyo abọm ya izizi.
Azụ abọm ya nye gara nnukwu nsọpụrụ n'ebe Boz Scaggs' "Middle Man" abọm nọ.
E wepụtara egwu nke na-ebu ụzọ bụ "Sufi Woman" and "Tribe" na Julaị 26, 2019 ọ ga-apụtakwa na studiyo abọm ya nke abụọ bụ 
"85 to Africa".
Na 2019 Jidenna wepụtara egwu nke abụọ ya bụ "85 na Africa".
Ụdịrị ya.
Jidenna kwuru na isi ọrụ metụtara n' ụdịrị egwu ọ na-eti gụnyere KRS-One na Big Daddy Kane, ya na ụdị egwu Naịjiria Highlife .
Kemgbe ọtụtụ afọ, onye otii egwu a, zulitere otu o si ebi ndụ ya na koleeji, ebe ahụ ka ọ nọrọ mụọ maka ihe gbasara ejije n'aka ọkammụta akparamàgwà mmadụ aha ya bụ Philip Zimbardo ..N'aka nke ọzọ, ọ gaghị anabata ụdịrị ejije dandy tupu o ruo mgbe nna ya nwụrụ na 2010.
Jidenna kọwara "ọdịdị m bu Harlem Renaissance kpalitere m nke ukwu na obele ihe ọdịnala nke ọdịda anyanwụ West Afrịka ," ya na "obi ụtọ alụm di na nwunye nke ndị Europe na ndị Afrịka na-enye.
" Jidenna bi ugbu a na East Flatbush, Brooklyn.
Mpụta dị na mgbasa ozi ama ama.
Na Septemba 2016, e gosipụtara Jidenna na otu ihe ọmụme nwere nkeji na Netflix nke aha ya bụ Luke Cage .
Na oge mbu nkeji ise bu "Just to get a Rep", meghere ebe Jidenna na-egosipụta egwu ya bụ "Long Live the Chief" n'ebe e mere dịka obi Eze Harlem.
O gosiputara egwu ya bụ" Long Live the Chief" na "Little Bit More" na ndị otu egwu zuru ezu na "The Daily Show na Trevor Noah" na Ọktoba 2016.
Jidenna pụtakwara na ihe ọmụme nkeji na "Insecure" ndị gụnyere "Thirsty as Fuck," na "Shady as Fuck," nke emere na Nọvemba 2016.
E mere ọbele " Classic Man" na Academy Award mmeri 2016 fiim Moonlight .
Awards and nominations.
Onyinye Grammy.

Afọ nhọpụta ọrụ Awọdụ rịzọọtụ
