Bọọlụ ụmụnwọke
1996 Atlanta Otu Asọmpi
Sunday Ọgọchukwu Oliseh (amụrụ ya na 14 Septemba1974) bụ onye nlekọta anya ndị Naịjirịa na-agba bọọlụ na kwa onye na-agbabu bọọlụ.
Mgbe ọ na-agba bọọlụ, ọ bụ n'etiti ka ọ na-agba.
Ọrụ Ịgba Bọọlụ.
Ọ bụ onye kwudosiri ike ma nwekwa nka na-ịgba n'ọnọdụ nchekwa n'etiti.
Oliseh na-agbala ndị klọb ama ama na ụwa dịka AFC Ajax, Borussia, Dortmund na Juventus FC.
Oliseh gbara bọọlụ ozurumba ma nye ọkpụ atọ na Naịjirịa ma gbakwaa na iko mba ụwa na 1994 na 1998.
Oliseh sonyere na egwuregwu Olimpiki nke ọlaedo ya na 1996.
Ndị CAF tụnyere Sunday Oliseh dịka onye nke atọ kacha agba bọọlụ na Afrịka na 1998.
A na-echetakarị ya maka ọkpụ mmeri ọ nyere na gurupu staji nke ọ nyere ndị spain na iko mba ụwa na 1998 nke Naịjirịa gbara 3-2.
A tụpụtara bọọlụ na ọgbọ, Oliseh were ọsọ wee gbaa bọọlụ ahụ 25 yadị, nke ochee ọkpụ bụ Andoni Zubizarreta na-atụghị anya.
N'agbanyeghị na ọ bụ onye isi ndị otu ya na iko mba Afrịka na 2002, e wepụrụ ya na-isonye ndị otu ya, gbaa asọmpi iko mba ụwa maka mgbazi enyere ya maka ihe ọjọọ, ọ mere.
Oliseh gara ezumike nka na Juunu 2002 maka anaghị akwuzị ya ụgwọ ruru ya.
Na Machị 2004, a chụpụrụ Oliseh na Borussia Dortmund maka isi ọ tara onye otu ya bụ Vahid Hashemian mgbe ọ nọ mbinyelụ na Vfl Bochum maka o kparịrị ndị ojii.
Na jenuwarị 2006, afọ 31, Oliseh gara ezumike nka na fuutubọọlụ mgbe ọ gbachara ọkara sizen ndị K.R.C Genk na Belgian.
Ọrụ nchekwa.
Oliseh malitere ọrụ koochi ya na Belgium, ya na ndi otu Belgians nke atọ Verviers, ndị na-erughi afọ iri na iteghete.
Ọ gụchara na tiim nke mbụ dịka onye isi koochi 2014-15.
E mere ya onye isi koochi na onye nchekwa klọb na RCS VISE Belgium nke atọ.
Na 2015-16, " Naịjirịa Futubọọlụ Federechọn" (NFF) mere ya onye isi koochi nke otu Naịjirịa (Super Eagles of Nigeria) ebe ọ mere nke ọma; egwuregwu 14 sọọsọ abụọ ka ọ dara, ọkpụ 19 ka ọ nyere, enye sọọsọ 6.
Ọ kpọrọ ndị Naịjirịa gaa ndọrọndọrọ CHAN na Rwanda, Mekwaa Naịjirịa ha etozue ị gaa asọmpi iko mba ụwa nke grupu na kwa egwuregwu mbụ ya dịka onye isi koochi ndị Naịjirịa na AFCON, ha na Tanzania gbara jiiji.
Ọ kwụsịrị ọrụ onye isi koochi Naịjirịa na 26 Febuwarị 2016, nke otu ọnwa na-abia mgbe ha na Egypt ga-agba na AFCON.
Ọ nọghi rue ọnwa asatọ, n'ihi akwadoghị nke ọma, akwụ ụgwọ na ihe nrite ndị ọzọ enyeghị ya na ya onwe ya.
Na 27 disemba, emere Oliseh onye nchekwa Fortuna Sittard.
A chụpụrụ ya 14 febuwarị 2008, nke o kwuru na ọ bụ maka osoghị ha mee ihe na-ekwesịghị na klọb
Ọ nọrọ afọ abụọ na-enweghị klọb.
Na Machị 2020, Oliseh kwuru na ọ jụrụ ọrụ abụọ nke ndị Belgian klọb, na ọ na-eche ezigbo ọrụ.
Ụdịrị Egwuregwu ya.
N'agbanyeghị na Oliseh na-agba n'etiti na ọrụ egwuregwu ya niile, Jonathan Wilson kwuru n'edemede ya na "The Guardian" nke 2013, na ọ bụ onye mbụ na-akọwa ọrụ bọọlụ ya nke ọma, onye na-elebakarị anya ijide bọọlụ karịa ị na-achọ ọnwụnwe azụ.
Gbasara ndụ ya.
Ụmụ nwanne ya nwoke ndị obele bụ Azụbuike na Egutu, bụkwa ndị na-agba bọọlụ, nwanne ya ọzọ bụ Churchill Oliseh na nwa nwanne ya bụ Sekou Oliseh.
Ngozi Sylvia Oluchi Ezeokafor (nke a na-akpọ Sylvya Oluchy) bụ nwaafọ Naịjirịa na- eme egwuregwu.
O nwetara ihe nrite kachasị di elu dịka ọrụ nwere nnukwu olile anya n'afọ 2013 nke akpọrọ 
Ndụ mbido.
A mụrụ Sylvia Oluchi na Lagos ma o tolitere na Abuja .
Ọ gụrụ ihe nkiri Arts na Mahadum Nnamdị Azikiwe dị n'Awka, Anambra Steeti .
Ọrụ.
Dị ka o siri kwuo, ọ chọghị ịbụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri ma mgbe nne ya gwara ya sị "ị ga-abụ ezigbo onye na-eme ihe nkiri" mgbe ọ hụrụ ikike pụrụ iche etu o siri ejije ndị nkuzi ya na ụlọ akwụkwọ ya.
Na 2011, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dịka Shaniqua na usoro egwuregwu "Atlanta" TV a ma ama.
N’oge a gbara ya ajụjụ ọnụ nke akwụkwọ akụkọ "'Best of Nollywood Magazine’" na ‘ "YES International Magazine’" Sylvia gbara isi akụkọ mba mgbe a jụrụ ya ma o nwere oke ma ọ bụ ihe mgbochi n'ebe ọrụ ejije ya no, ọ zara “enweghị m oke maka na ahụ m bụ laptọọpụ m. Ndị ọzọ nwere laptọọpụ ha na faịlụ, ihe m nwere bụ ahụ m na olu m, ọbụlagodi echiche ịgba ọtọ, enweghị m nsogbu ọ bụla e tu ọbụla odị... "
Pericoma bụ ụdị nke nla ijiji na ezinụlọ .
Toyin Abraham (onye aha ọmụmụ ya bụ Olutoyin Aimakhu ) bụ nwaafọ Naijiria na - eme ihe nkiri, onye nduzi na onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri.
Mmalite Ndụ.
A mụrụ Aimakhu na Auchi, obodo di na Edo Steeti na ndida anyanwu nke Naijiria, mana o biri mmalite ndụ ya na Ibadan, isi obodo Oyo State nke dị na ndida-anyanwu Naijiria.
Ọ gara akwụkwọ na Osun State Polytechnic Iree ; malite n'afọ 2005 ruo n'afọ 2007, ebe onwetara akara nzere mmụta Pre-National Diploma nakwa Ordinary National Diploma.
Ọ gara n'ihu nweta asambodo nke Higher National Diploma na Marketing na Ibadan Polytechnic .
Toyin Abraham e meela ọtụtụ ihe nkiri di iche iche.
Ihe nkiri a na-akpọ "Black Val" bụ nke o mere ọhụrụ.
Ọrụ.
Ọ bidoro ime ihe nkiri n'afọ 2003, mgbe Bukky Wright, otu onye Nigeria na-eme ihe nkiri, gara Ibadan ịme ihe nkiri.
Kemgbe ọtụtụ afọ, Toyin Abraham emepụtala, duzie ma gosipụta n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri nke Naijiria, dịka "Alani Baba Labake" na "Ebimi ni" .
A họpụtara ya dika "Onye na-eme ihe nkiri kachasị na nkwado" na fiim yoruba akpọrọ "Ebimi ni" n'oge emume 2013 Best of Nollywood Awards ma tinyekwara Joke Muyiwa, onye a họpụtara dika "Onye isi na-eme ihe nkiri kachasị mma" n'ihe nkiri Yoruba akpọrọ "Ayitale" .
Site n'ọrụ ime ihe nkiri ya, ndị ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị akpọla Toyin ka ọ gwa ndị mmadụ ka ha kwado ha.
N’otu n’ime ogbakọ maka ihụ na onye isi ala Nigeria bụ Goodluck Jonathan nọgidesịrị ike n'ochichi n'afọ 2015, Toyin kwuru na ya dị njikere ịnwụ maka ndị otu People's Democratic Party (PDP) nke bụ otu ghọpụtara Jonathan ka ọzọo ochichi.
Mana o mechara rịọ ndị na-eso ya mgbaghara maka okwu a okwuru ma dụọ ndị Naịjirịa ọdụ ka ha ghara ịkwafu ọbara ha maka onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ọ bụla.
N'iga n'ihu, Toyin Abraham aduziela ma wepụtakwa ihe nkiri Nollywood ama ama nke akpọrọ, "Fate of Alakada".
N'onwa Nọvemba n'afọ 2020, Toyin Abraham na di ya bụ Kolawole Adeyemi site na soshal midia gosiri foto omarịcha ụlọ nke di na ogbe ndị ogaraya na Lagos State, nke tụrụ ndị mmadụ n'anya.E kwenyere na ụlọ ọhụrụ a bụ nke di na nwunye a, n'agbanyeghi na ha ejighi ọnụ ha kwuo ya.
Njikọ dị na mpụga.
Toyin Abraham on IMDb
Clement Annie Okonkwo onye amụrụ n' abalị iri abụọ na atọ n'ime ọnwa Mee n'afọ 1960.
A hopụtara ya dịka Senatọ nke mpaghara Anambra Sentral nke Anambra Steeti, Naịjirịa, nke o weere ọchịchị na abalị iri abụọ na itoolu n'ime ọnwa Mee 2007.
Ọ bụ onye otu ọchịchị People's Democratic Party (PDP).
A mụrụ Okonkwo n'abalị̀ iri abuo na ato n’ime ọnwa ise n’afọ 1960 n’Ojoto, dị nso na Onitsha na steeti Anambra.
O nwetara Adụvans dịpụlọma na ngalaba akwụkwọ njikwa,na Mahadum Harvard, USA (1997-1998),Adụvans dịpụlọma nke Iwu Azumahia na Omume, na Mahadum Lagos (1995-1997) na Adụvans Dịpụlọma na Eremahia,na mahadum Lagos (1994 - 1995).
ịbanye azụmahịa, ọ wuru otu ụlọ ọrụ ejikọtara aka, na-ewe ihe karịrị mmadụ puku asaa nke gụnyere ụlọ ọrụ dịka Reliance Telecomm, Clemco Industries, modern Communications (satellite TV Network), MacClemm Marketing Comñ
Maureen Eke onye amụrụ na abalị iri na itoolu n’ime onwa iri na abuo n'afọ 1986.
Ọ bụ nwaafọ Naịjirịa n’agba bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị nke òtù Mba ụwa dị ka onye ọnọ n'etiti (midfielder) .
O so na otu egwu bọọlụ ụmụnwaanyị Naịjirịa .
O so n'òtù egwuregwua na 2007 FIFA Women's World Cup .
Na ogo klọb ọ na-agbara Delta Queens FC nọ na Delta State, Nigeria .
Ndidi Nwosu (Ụbọchị 6 n'ọnwa Juun afọ 1979 - Ụbọchị 1 n'ọnwa Maachị afọ 2020) bụ onye Naịjirịa na-eme egwuregwu i bu igwe dị arọ, nwere mmeri mkpalite na 2016 Summer Paralympics .
O buliri kilogram 140.
Ndidi ghọrọ onye ọkachamara i bu igwe dị arọ n'afọ 2008.
Ọ ritere ọla edo na Rio Paralympic Games n'afọ 2016.
O nwetakwara ọla edo na asọmpị Commonwealth nke afọ 2018 nke e mere n'Ọstụrelia.
O merụru ahụ n'asọmpi Commonwealth nke afọ 2018.
Ihe mmerụ ahụ metụtara ọkpụkpụ azụ ya ma mee ya ịwa ahụ dị iche iche n'Owerri, Imo Steeti, Naịjiria.
Mgbe ịwa ahụ ndị a gasịrị, ọ bụghịkwa onwe ya ọzọ, nakwa enweghị ike i sonye n'asọmpi ndị sochirinụ.
Emmanuel Nnamdị Ụba
Sinetọ Naịjirịa nke ndịda Anambra steeti
Onye nọ ugbua
Ọ banyere na
Mee 2011
Ọnọchiri Ikechukwu Obiorah
Nkọwa onwe
Ọmụmụ 14 Disemba 1958 (afọ 61)
Enugwu, Enugwu Steeti, Naịjirịa
Ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị parti All Progressives Congress (APC)
Emmanuel Nnamdị Uba, ma ọ bụ Andy Ụba (amụrụ ya 14 Disemba 1958), bụ onye ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị Naịjirịa nke ahọpụtara ka Sinatọ ndị ndịda Anambara Steeti, Naịjirịa, na Epurel 2011.
Ọ zọọ n'okpuru ndị People's Democratic Party (PDP).
Ọ gbahapụrụ PDP gaa na All Progressives Congress na Febuwarị 2017; ọgbaghara ndị ndú na-achịbu PDP nwere ike ị bụ ya kpalite ya ịkpụ.
Ọ lụrụ pastọ Faith Vedelago nke Faith Miracle Center Abuja ma nwekwa ụmụ abụọ.
Ọrụ mmalite.
A mụrụ Uba n’abalị iri na anọ n’ọnwa iri na abụọ n’afọ 1958 n’Enugwu, ma gaa ụlọ akwụkwọ ‘Boys High School’ dị na Awkunanaw.
Ndị nne na nna ya bụ ndị Ụga n'okpuru ọchịchị nke Agụata nke Anambara Steeti.
Dị ka ụfọdụ ndị si kwuo,  ]
[ "Nke?
"
 .
N'aka nke ọzọ,Mahadum Concordia gọnahụ na Emmanuel Nnamdị Ụba agụsịghị na ụlọ akwụkwọ ha.
Ha kwetara na ndekọ ha na-egosi na a nabatara otu Emmanuel Ụba n'ụlọ akwụkwọ mana ọ gụchaghị akwụkwọ ahụ.
Onye nnyemaka onye isi ala.
Mgbe ọ ka nọ na United Steeti Ụba nyeere aka na ntuli aka onye isi ala nke 1999 na Naịjirịa.
] Mgbe ntuli aka gasịrị, ọ laghachiri Naịjirịa ma ahọpụta ya dịka Onye enyemaka pụrụ iche na Ọrụ Ndị Pụrụ Iche na kwa ọrụ ime ụlọ nke Onye isi ala bụ Olusegun Obasanjo .
Na nleta nke septemba 2003, Obasanjo gara na United Steeti, a kọwara Ụba dịka onye aka nri nke Onye isi ala, yana onye nche ọnụ ụzọ maka ndị chọrọ ịgwa Onye isi ala okwu.
[ "see okwu dị mkpa" ]
Onye ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị ahọpụtara.
N’afọ 2007, Ụba zọọrọ na nhọputa PDP maka ntuli aka gọvanọ nke steeti Anambara, a ma họpụta ya na ntuli aka na Epurel 14 2007.
Mana, onye bụbu gọvanọ bụ Peter Obi gbara akwụkwọ na ntuliaka ahụ, na-ekwu na, n’ihi na ụlọ ikpe nabatara na Obi meriri na ntuli aka Epurel 2003 na 15 Machị 2006, na ọ ka nwere afọ atọ ọzọ ma ọ bụ afọ anọ ya ịchị.
Ndị ọkaikpe ahụ nakweere arụmụka ahụ, na 14 Juunu 2007, ha kwụsịrị ntuli aka nke Andy Ụba.
N’ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2009 ka akọwara na Ụba na-akwado ịzọ ọchịchị maka ọkwa gọvanọ steeti Anambara egburu ya oge na Febụwarị afọ 2010 n'okpuru Labour Pati, ka ha kpọrọ ya ka mee ya.
ikpo okwu, nke ndị otu Labour kpọrọ ya ka ọ mee njem ahụ.
Ndị isi otu Labour Pati kwuru na ha "kwenyere na ọ ga-emepụta ebumnuche na echiche nke otu ha.
" N'ikwu okwu banyere mkpebi ya ịgbanwe na pati ọzọ.
Na 31 Disemba 2009 Ụba kwuru "Labour bụ ebe obibi ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị m".
Na ntuli aka nke Febuwariị 2010, Ụba gbara nke atọ.
Ntuli aka Sineti nke 2011.
Ụba laghachiri na PDP ma ahọpụta ya dịka onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ndị PDP nke ndịda Anambara na ntuli aka nke Epurel 2011.
O ji votu 63,316, merie Chukwmaeze Nzeribe nke All Progressive Grand Alliance (APGA) nwere 43,798 na onye omeiwu nọ oge ahụ bụ Ikechukwu Obiorah nke pati Accord nwere 24,724.
Omeiwu Obiọra, onye na-azọ ọchịchị n'okpuru Accord gbaghaa ntuli aka Ụba, onye kwupụtara na Ụba ji akpụrụka asambodo ụlọ akwụkwọ nke ọdịda anyanwụ Afrịka (WASC) na enwetabeghị akara ugo mmụta mahadum ọ sị na ya gụrụ.
Akụkọ nke adịgboroja asambodo a malitere na akụkọ nke ndị nta akụkọ nyocha abụọ dere wee bipụta ya na "The News" na Disemba 2006.
Ndị ntaakụkọ na-ekwu na Concordia na Mahadum nke California Steeti kwuru na agbanyeghị na Ụba debanyere aha ya, ọ gụchaghị mahadum abụọ ahụ.
Joy Nunieh bụ onye ọkaiwu na Naijiria na onye bụbu onye isi nchikwa nke .
Onyeisi ala bụ Buhari chụrụ ya n'ọrụ n'abalị iri na itoolu nke onwa Febuwarị n'afọ 2020 ma were Kemebradikumo Pondei nọchie ya ozugbo.
Nunieh so kwado ihe nkwuto nke NDDC nke boro ebubo megide Goodswill Akpabio.
Jumoke George bụ nwaafọ Naijiria onye na-eme ihe nkiri ma na-emepụta ihe nkiri.
Aha ya niile bụ Olajumoke Amoke Olatunde George.
Ọ meela ihe nkiri ihe karịrị afọ iri anọ ma meekwa ọtụtụ ihe nkiri di iche iche na Ngalaba Yoruba na Bekee nke Nollywood.
Mmalite Ndụ na Mmụta.
A mụrụ Jumoke George n'abalị iri na asatọ nke onwa Febụwarị.
O tolitere n'ezinụlọ siri ike, ebe ya na nna ya, onye so na ndị agha nakwa nne nne ya bụ Nọọsụ ndị agha bi.
Ọ gara akwụkwọ na "Command Children School Ann's Barracks Yaba," Lagos ; Army Children School Kano; Anglican Grammar School,Orita mefa, Ibadan ma mecha gaa n'ihu igụ na Government Technical College, Osogbo ebe ọ gụrụ Business Administration.
Jumoke si n'ezinụlọ nwee nkewa.
Nne ya na nna ya kewara mgbe ọ ka dị obere ma o kpebiri ibi na nke nna ya na nne nne ya.
Ya na nne nne ya mechara nwee nsogbu nke mere ka nna ya jụ ya ma chụpụ ya n'ụlọ mgbe ọ ka na-aga ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị.
Nne ya anabataghi ya nke mere ka ọ ga biri na nke ndị enyi ya.
[ "Mgbe?
"
Ọrụ.
Jumoke George malitere ime ihe nkiri mgbe o dị afọ asatọ site n'aka enyi nna ya.
Ọ mere ihe nkiri na nkwago na National Television Authority ( NTA ), Ibadan.
E debanyere aha ya na otu ihe nkiri na NTA Ibadan site n'aka otu nwoke aha otutu ya bụ 'Water Aqua'.
O mechara zute onyeisi ya bụ Comrade Victor Ashaolu, onye kpọbatara ya n'ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri yoruba.
Comrade Victor kụziiri ya ihe nkiri n'ihe dị ka afọ iri na otu.
N'otu oge n'ọrụ ya, ọ gosighi n'ihe nkiri ọ bụla ihe dị ka afọ iri na anọ na-enwetaghi ọrụ ọ bụla n'aka ndị nduzi na mepụta ihe nkiri n'ihi na ya nwere oke nlezianya n'ebe ụmụ nwoke nke ndị ụlọ ọrụ ahụ nọ.
N’oge ezumike a si n'ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri, Jumoke bụurụ onye otu Freelance and Independent Broadcasters Association of Nigeria; (FIBAN).
Ọ kwadoro ihe omume ise nke mere ka ọ ghara inwe efe n'ime ihe nkiri.
Ihe Nkiri.
Eekan soso, 2009
The Wedding Party, 2016
Nrite.
City People Movie Matriarch Recognition Award 2018
Nancy Isime onye amụrụ n'abalị iri na asaa n'ime ọnwa Disemba n'afọ 1991, bụ nwaafọ Naịjirịa n'eme ihe nkiri, onye nlereanya ejiji na onye mgbasa ozi.
Mmalite ndụ.
Amụrụ Isime na Edo Steeti .
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na mpaghara agụmakwụkwọ Social Work afọ abụọ na Mahadum Lagos .
Ọrụ.
Ọrụ Nlereanya.
Na 2009, Isime meriri na Miss Valentine International beauty pageant,ma bụrụ onye nke abụọ na asọmpi Miss Telecoms Naịjirịa.
Dị ka onye nlere anya ọ rụrụ ọrụ "House of Marie", "Ade Bakere", "Adebayo Jones", "Zizi Cardow", "Shakara Couture", "Konga Online" na ndị ọzọ .
Isime ekwuola banyere ihe nlere anya ya si, "Na ọgwụchala inwe ike mbiahari ma jisie ike na ya ruo mgbe ịga enweta ihu ọma.
Na Naijiria, ịme ngosi uwe adịghị ka ọ dị na mba ọdịda anyanwụ ebe ịga-enweta nnukwu ihuọma izuo ike, ,N'ebe a, ị nwere ike nweta nnukwu ihuọma gị ma laghachite azụ,yabụ na ọ dị oke mkpa na ị ga-enweta nnukwu ihuọma ma gaa n'ihu na-agbasi mbọ ike ma na-aga n'ihu ịlaghachite maka ọzọ.
" 
Omume Ihe nkiri.
Isime malitere ọrụ dịka Omee na sirisi TV akpọrọ Echoes na 2011.

Jim Ovia
CON
Amụrụ November 4, 1951 (afọ 69)
Agbor, Delta Steeti
Mba Naịjirịa
Aka Ọrụ Ọchụnta ego
Nchịkọta Akụ Nde $980 
Jim James Ovia (amụrụ ya na Nọvemba 4, 1951) bụ onye ọchụnta ego nke obodo Naịjirịa na obodo Delta.
Ọ tọrọ ntọala Ụlọ akụ na 1990.
Ndụ mbido.
Jim Ovia nwere akara ugo mmụta masịta ya na nchịkwa azụmahịa na Mahadum Louisiana, Monroe, Louisiana, USA n’afọ 1979 na B.Sc.
ogo na nchịkwa azụmahịa na Mahadum Southern, Baton Rouge, Louisiana, USA (1977).
Ọ bụkwa onye gụsịrị na nke Harvard Business Sukulu (OPM)
Ọrụ.
Ọ bụ onye tọrọ ntọala ụlọ akụ Zenith, o so na ụlọakụ kacha uru na ụlọ oru nke na-ahụ ihe gbasara ego na Naịjirịa ruo na 2010, mgbe o rigoro dịka onye isi oche.
Ọ bụ onye natara onyinye nrite nke Naịjirịa.
N'ime afọ iri abụọ nke onye ndu, o nyere aka ịkwado ụlọ akụ ahụ dịka otu n'ime ndị kachasị baa uru na Afrịka.
Ovia bụ onye guzobere "Visafone Communications Limited" na onye isi oche nke ụlọ ọrụ ndị Naịjirịa nke "software Development Initiative" (NSDI) na ndị "National Information Technology Advisory Council" (NITAC).
Ọ bụ onye otu "Honorary International Investor Council" ya na "Digital Bridge Institute" (DBI).
Ọ bụ Onye isi oche nke "Cyberspace Network Limited".
Enyere ya nzere dọkịtoreti na-asọpụrụ, na emume nkpọkọta afọ iri ise nke Mahadum Legọọsụ 
Ọrụ Obiọma.
Ọ bụ onye otu Kansụl na-achị nke Mahadum Legoosu Steeti , na onye otu Bọọdụ nke Trostii, Mahadum Redeemer nke mba, Legọọsụ.
Ọ bụ onye otu Kansụl na-achị nke "Nigerian Investment Promotion Commission" (1999 - 2007) wee jee ozi na kọmitii nke Amerịkan International Sukulu, Legọọsụ [2001 -2003].
Ovia chịrị ọtụtụ ọgbakọ ndị na-abụghị ndị gọọmentị [NGO] n'oge dị iche iche gụnyere ịbụ onye isi oche mbụ nke otu Ịntanetị (2001-2003).
Ọ bụ onye guzobere na Onye isi oche nke "Mankind United to Support Total Education" (MUSTE), otu nzukọ na-ahụ maka ọdịmma mmadụ, lekwasịrị anya n'inye agụmakwụkwọ maka ndị ụwa na-atụ n'ọnụ.
Ọ bụ onye guzobere "Youth Empowerment /ICT Foundation", nke na-elekwasị anya n'ịkwalite ọdịmma mmekọrịta ọhanaeze nke ndị ntorobịa Nigeria site n'ịgba ha ume ma na-akpali ha ịnabata ozi na teknụzụ nkwukọrịta.
Joy Anwulika Alphonsus (a muru n'abalị iri ato na otu n'ime onwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1987), onye ama ama dika Joy Alphonsus bụ – .
A maara ya nke oma maka ọrụ ya dị mkpa n'ihe nkiri nturu ugo akpọrọ "Joy" .
Ndụ ya.
A mụrụ ya n'abalị iri atọ na otu n'onwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1987 na Cairo, Egypt .
Ọ bi na Austria ugbu a.
Ọrụ.
N'afọ 2018, ọ pụtara oge mbu na sinima n'ihe nkiri Austrian mara mma akpọrọ "Joy" nke Sudabeh Mortezai duziri.
N'ihe nkiri a, ọ mere dịka onye abara aha fiim ahu.
Ihe nkiri a gosiri mbu n'abalị iri atọ n'onwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2018 dịka otu nke 75th Venice Film Festival.
E mechara kpọọ ihe nkiri a na ngalaba Giornate degli Autori.
E nyochara ihe nkiri ahụ ma nye ya onyinye n'ọtụtụ emume ihe nkiri mba niile.
N’ọnwa Nọvemba nke afọ 2018, Alphonsus ritere ihe nrite dika Nwanyị na-eme ihe nkiri Kachasị Mma na Seville International Film Festival.
N'onwa Jenụwarị n'afọ 2019, e nyere ya onyinye Max Ophüls na Saarbrücken maka ọrụ ya.
N’otu afọ ahụ, ọ ritere Diagonale Acting Award ma n’afọ 2020, e nyere ya onyinye dika nwanyị na-eme ihe nkiri kachasị mma na Austrian Film Award 2020.
Uche Chukwumerije
Sinetọ ndị distriki nke ugwu Abịa
Na ụlọ ọrụ
29 Mee 2003 – 19 Epurel 2015
Ọnọchiri Ike Nwachukwu
Anọchie ya Mao Ohabunwa
Nkọwa onwe
Ọmụmụ Nọvemba 1939
Abia Steeti, Naịjirịa
Ọ nwụrụ 19 Epurel 2015 (afọ 75)
Abuja, Naịjirịa
pati ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị PDP
Uche Chukwumerije (11 Jenụwarị 1939 - 19 Epurel 2015) ka a họpụtara ka onye sinetọ nke Naịjirịa na Epurel 2003, na-anọchite distriki ugwu Abịa.
Ọrụ.
Chukwumerije rụrụ ọrụ dịka Mịnịsta na-ahụ maka mgbasa ozi na omenaala n’okpuru General Ibrahim Babangida na n’okpuru ọchịchị obere oge nke Ernest Shonekan .
[ "see okwu dị mkpa" ]
Sineti.
Na Repoblik nke anọ, a họpụtara Chukwumerije ka ọ bụrụ onye nnọchi anya Sineti na ikpo okwu nke ndị People's Democratic Party, mana ọ dabaghị n'ọbụ ndị isi otu ahụ mgbe ọ megidere Usoro ịchị nke Atọ .
Chukwumerije mechara banye na Progressive Peoples Alliance na 2006, ma ọ lọghachiri na Sineti na Epurel 28, 2007.
[ "see okwu dị mkpa" ]
A họpụtara Chukwumerije ọzọ n'ọkwa PDP na ntuli aka Epurel 2011.
Ọ nwụrụ n'ọfịs nke ọrịa kansa akpa ume na 2015.
Ezinụlọ.
Chukwumerije gbara alụkwaghịm ma nwee ụmụ asaa.
Otu n’ime ụmụ ya nwoke bụ Chika nwetara ọla nchara na asọmpi Olimpiki n’afọ 2008 na Beijing.
Nwa ya nwoke ọzọ, Dikeogu Egwuatụ Chukwumerije, bụ onye edemede na onye na-emepụta abụ.
Otu n’ime ụmụ ya nwoke bụ Kwame, nwụrụ n’ihe mberede ụgbọala ọtụtụ afọ gara aga.
Chukumerije gụrụ Ekọnọmikis na Mahadum nke Ibadan .
[ "see okwu dị mkpa" ]
Binta Sukai bụ onye n'enye ndumodu gbasara ejiji si Naijiria.
Ndị mụrụ Sukai gbara alụkwaghịm mgbe ọ ka bụ nwata.
Ọ bụ nne na nna ya ochie si zụlitere ya na United Kingdom ebe ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ, mana mgbe ụfọdụ ya na nne ya bi na Nigeria.
Ọ bịara bụrụ onye a ma ama mgbe e nyere ya okpu ọchịchị nke na 1990, mana a tụlere esemokwu na ọ bụghị onye Naịjirịa, ruo mgbe e gosipụtara na soso obere obara ndị di ya na-arụ.
Agbanyehi na akpọrọ ya onye ugwu hausa mbụ meriri Miss Nigeria (nna ya so na ndị Ham, ebo nke dị na ndịda Kaduna), mana otu onye ọzọ eruolarị mgbe enyere okpu ọchịchị nke Miss Nigeria na 1957.
Oyelude si na ugwu ndị Hausa, n’agbanyeghi na ndi be ya bụ .
Sukai nọgidere na mba ahụ afọ ole na ole mgbe ọ chịchara, tupu ọ laghachi Europe, ma debanye aha na Paris Academy of Fashion, ebe ọ mụrụ akwụkwọ ejiji na akụkọ ihe mere eme.
Na 2008, Sukai mụrụ nwa nwaanyị aha ya bụ Zara Chloe.
Ọ kwuru na ya achọghị ịlụ nna nwa ya nwaanyị, n’ihi na ụjọ na-atụ ya na ọ ga-agba ya alụkwaghịm.
Sukai emeela ọtụtụ ngosi na ngosipụta ejiji na Naijiria, ebe ọ na-abụkarị onye ọka ikpe; ụfọdụ n'ime ndị a gụnyere "Runways Dreamz" na 2007, na asọmpi nke "Young Designers Creative Design" na 2009.
Na 2009, Sukai kwuputara atụmatụ ya ịmalite ihe ngosi nke "Face of Peace".
N'ajụjụ ọnụ o kwuru na, "Afrika ma Naịjirịa karịsịa, ahụla usoro esemokwu agbụrụ na okpukperechi nke chụpụrụ ezinụlọ n'oge na-adịbeghị anya, kụtụ ụlọ ma mebie ngwwahia ndi mmadu. . . Ọ dị mkpa igbochi ihe ndi ahụ mere, ihe isi ike ma belata mmebi ma ọ bụ gbasaa, kpaliri ụdị echiche a pụrụ iche na nke mbụ iji kwado ihe na-ebute udo na Nigeria ma Afrika na ebe ndị ọzọ.
" Agbanyeghị n'ihi amaghị ihe a ka gosibe ihe ngosi ahụ.
Emerald Egwim (amụrụ 27 Novemba afọ 1995) bụ nwaafọ Naijiria n'agba ọsọ .
Ọ gbara aka na ọsọ 4 × 400 nke ụmụ nwanyị na 2017 World Championship nke Athletics .
Samuel Okwaraji
Personal information
Aha Samuel Sochukwuma Okwaraji
Ụbọchị ọmụmụ 19 Mee 1964
Ebe ọmụmụ Orlu, Naịjirịa
Ụbọchị ọnwụ 12 Ọgụstụ 1989 (afọ 25)
