Ebe ọ na-agba Midfielder
Ọrụ ntorobịa
1984–1985 AS Roma
Ọrụ okenye*
Afọ Tiimụ Apps (Gls)
1985–1986 Dinamo Zagreb 1 (0)
1986–1987 Austria Klagenfurt 14 (0)
1987–1989 VfB Stuttgart 0 (0)
1987–1988 → SSV Ulm (loan) 28 (5)
1989 Kon.Berchem Sport (BEL) 
Nachọnalụ Tiimụ
1988–1989 Naịjirịa 8 (1)
Samuel Sochukwuma Okwaraji (19 Mee 1964 - 12 Ọgụstụ 1989) bụ ọkachamara n'egwuregwu bọọlụ gbaara mba Naịjirịa na mba ofesi.
Ọ bụkwa ọkaiwu ruru eru nke nwere masịtasị na iwu mba ụwa na Mahadum Pontifical Lateran nke Rome.
Ọ dara ma nwụọ n'ihi obi mgbawa na nkeji 77 nke asọmpi egwuregwu nke Iko mba ụwa ha na Angola na ama egwuregwu Legọọsụ na Surulere, Legọọsụ Steeti na 12 Ọgụstụ 1989.
Ọrụ.
A mụrụ Ọkwaraji na 19 Mee 1964 na Orlu, Imo Steeti, Naịjirịa.
Okwaraji nwere ọrụ na Iroopu nke gụnyere ị gbara AS Roma (1984-1985), NK Dinamo Zagreb (1985-1986), Austria Klagenfurt (1986-1987), VfB Stuttgart (1987-1989) na SSV Ulm 1846 (mbite) 1987-1988) ka ọ gụchara akwụkwọ na iwu.
Na obere oge ya na Dinamo Zagreb, Samuel nyere goolu atọ n'egwuregwu enyi na enyi na NK Budućnost Hodošan.
A gbara bọọlụ a na 30 Epurel 1986, Dinamo Zagreb meriri 12-0. naanị bọọlụ Samuel gbaara ndị Dinamo na Yugoslav bụ mmadụ ka ọnọchi na 18 Mee 1986 ha na FK Priština .
A gbara ya n'ama egwuregwu Maksimir na Zagreb, agba nke iri abụọ na iteghete nke afọ 1985/86.
Dinamo Zagreb meriri 4: 3.
Ọrụ mba ụwa.
O so na ndị otu egwuregwu nke "Green Eagles" na 1988 na asọmpi nke iko mba Afrịka nke afọ ahụ, o nyere otu goolu kachasị ọsọ na akụkọ ntolite nke mmeri ha na "Indomitable Lions" nke Cameroon.
O sonyere were gbaa bọọlụ ikpeazụ, ebe Cameroon meriri "Eagles" meriri site na otu goolu
Egwuregwu ikpeazụ na ọnwụ.
Okwaraji dara nkeji iri site na njedebe nke asọmpi iko mba ụwa 1990 ha na Angola na Legọọsụ .
Ọ nwụrụ site na nsogbu nke ọrịa obi mmapụ dịka ọtọpsịị gosipụtara na nwa amadị a nwere ọrịa obi na ọbara mgbali elu .
Ihe Nketa ekpe.
Na Mee 19, 2019, ụbọchị nwesịrị ị bụ afọ iri ise na ise ncheta ọmụmụ ya.
E nyere ya nsọpụrụ site na-ịgbanwe njimara gọgụlụ ụbọchị ncheta ọmụmụ, tinye ya Ọkwaraji.
Upe Atosu (amuru na Epril 21, 1993) bụ onye egwuregwu basketbọọlụ ndi otu Naijiria na-agba maka otu basketbọọlụ umu nwaanyị nke na .
O sonyere na .
Hannah Amuchechi Rueben (amụrụ 14 Febụwari afọ1994) bụ nwaafọ Naijiria n'agba mgba a na kpọ freestyle.
N’egwuregwu Olimpik 2016, ọ gbara aka na Women’s freestyle n'arọ -69.
N’afọ 2020, o ritere nrite ọla edo n’ihe omume ụmụ nwanyị n’arọ 65 nke 2020 African Wrestling Championships .
Funmi Falana bụ onye ọrụ iwu gbasara Naijiria na onye na- alụ ọgụ maka ikike ụmụ nwanyị .
Ọ bụ nwunye Femi Falana, onye ama ama na onye ọchụnta ego Naịjirịa ; nne bụ Falz, onye na- ese ihe na Naijiria na- eme ihe nkiri .
Funmi Falana na-eje ozi ugbu a dị ka National Director of Women Empowerment and Legal Aid (WELA), otu na-abụghị nke gọvụmentị na-agbachitere ikike ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụaka.
Efioanwan Ekpo (amụrụ 25 Jenụwarị afọ 1984) bụ nwanyi Naijiria n'agba bọọlụ.
O sonyere otu egwuregwu bọọlụ nke ụmụ nwanyị Naịjirịa, Ekpo sonyere n'asọmpi 2003 World Cup, 2004 Summer Olimpik, 2006 African Championship, 2007 World Cup na 2008 Summer Olimpik . .
Maureen Nkeiruka Mmadu (amụrụ 7 Mee afọ 1975) Ọ bụ nwaafọ Naijiria bụ onye nchikwa na bọọlụ ma ọ bu bu midFielder.
Dị ka onye ọkpụkpọ ọ na-anọchi anya Avaldsnes IL n'oge na-adịbeghị anya, otu Ngalaba nke mbụ dabere na ụsọ oké osimiri ọdịda anyanwụ nke Norway .
Ọ gbaraa ọtụtụ ndị otu bọọlụ na Toppserien nke Norway ya na Linköpings FC na QBIK na Swedish Damallsvenskan .
Ọrụ.
O gwuburu ndi Klepp IL egwuregwu na Norwegian Toppserien .
Mmadu gbara Kolbotn na Oslo, Norway maka oge 2010, wee nyere ha aka i nọ n'ọkwa nke atọ na otu egwuregwu Toppserien .
Enwere ike ịhụ ya ka ọ na-egwuru Avaldsnes IL na asọmpi nke Oslo na 5 Febụwari afọ 2012 
Ọrụ mba ụwa.
Ọ bụ onye otu na-ahụ maka Naịjirịa ma mee ihe karịrị otu narị egwuregwu maka otu egwuregwu bọọlụ nke ụmụ nwanyị Naịjirịa, gụnyere ịpụta ugboro anọ na FIFA World Cups wee sọọ mpi na 2000 na 2004 Summer Olympics .
Ogonna Franca Chukwudi(amụrụ na 14 Septemba afọ 1988) bụ nwaafọ Naijiria na-agba bọọlụ na-arụ orụ di ka midfielder maka Russian klọb CSKA Moscow na otu di na Naijiria bụ inyom mba .
Ọrụ klọb.
Chukwudi gbara bọọlụ na Umeå IK .
Ọrụ mba ụwa.
Chukwudi nọchitere anya Naịjirịa na asọmpi 2011 FIFA Women's World Cup .
Clarice Ahanotu (amụrụ na 27 Julaị afọ 1939) bụ onye na- agba oso na Naijiria.
O sonyeere 100 mita nke ụmụ nwanyị na 1964 Summer Olympics .
Azụbụike Ihejirika, CFR (Amụrụ Febuwarị 13, 1956) bụ onye gara ezumike nká Amị Naịjirịa, onyeisi jenaral na onye bụbu Onye isi ọrụ Amị.
Ndabere na agụmakwụkwọ.
Amụrụ ya na 13 Febuwarị 1956 na okpuru ọchịchị Isuikwuatọ nke dị na Abịa Steeti .
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na "Williams Memorial High Sukulu" dị na Afugiri, obodo dị na Ugwu Ụmụahịa, Abịa Steeti ebe ọ nwetara "London General Certificate" na 1975 ya na akwụkwọ nyocha nke "West African Senior School" na ọkwa I. Ọ bụ otu onye na ndị 18 Regụla Kọmbatantị Kọsụ nke "Naịjirịa Defense Academy", Kaduna ma nye ya onye isi nke abụọ na Disemba 1977 n'ime ndị "Corps of Naịjiria Army Engineers" (NAE).
Ihejirika nwere BSc (Hons) na Kwontity Sovee na Mahadum Ahmadu Bello, Zaria ma bụrụkwa onye bụ isi nke ụlọ ọrụ ndị agha dịka "Command and Staff College", "Jajii" na "National War Koleji".
Ọrụ agha.
Jenaral Ihejirika nọ na ndị nduzi na "Command and Staff College", "Jajii" ma bụrụkwa onye isi na Nchekwa na Isi ụlọ ọrụ ndị Amị.
Ọ nwekwara ọtụtụ nhọpụta dị n'iwu gụnyere: 
Ahọpụtara Jenaral Ihejirika dịka onye isi ọrụ ndị Amị (COAS) na Septemba 8, 2010 site n'aka onye isi ala Goodluck Jonathan .
O jere ozi dịka COAS ruo afọ anọ ruo mgbe ọ lara ezumike nká na Jenụwarị 2014.
Ndụ mgbe ọ rụchara Amị.
Mgbe ọ lara ezumike nká dịka Onye isi ndị agha na Jenụwarị 2014, ọ laghachiri n’obodo ya, Isuikwuatọ ebe echiri ya echichi dịka, “Dike Abịa” (n’asụsụ Igbo), “Warrior of Abia” (Na asụsụ Bekee).
"Echere m na ha ga-echim echichi ma
mana ha mere m eze.
Ya mere, enyefere m ndị ọchịagha na ndịnsọpụrụ g, aha a bụ ndị gosipụtara ike n'etiti ihe ịmna nsogbu a aka ndị siri ike ",kwuruhotara.
Ebubo nkwado ndị Boko Haram.
Na Ọgụstụ 2014, e boro ya na Ali Modu Sheriff, nke bụbu gọvanọ nd Borno Steeti ebubo na o so na ndị na-akwado ndị ụka Alakụba na-eyi ọha egwu nke Boko Haram.
Onye mere ebubo ahu bụ onye Australia, Dr Stephen Davis, nke ya na ndị Nchekwa Naịjirịa na-arụkọ maka nnapụta Ụmụakwụkwọ nwanyị atọrọ.
Eziokwu dị n'ebubo ahụ butere ọtụtụ mmeghasị omume ma mba ahụ na kwa Mba ndị gbara ya okirikiri.
Ndị ọrụ nchekwa obodo (SSS), N'aka nke ọzọ kwuru na Lt. Gen. Azụbụike Ihejirika abụghị ya na-akwado ndị otu Boko Haram ma wee kwuo n'aka ya dị ọcha na ebubo onye Australia na- ebo ya.
Awọdụ.
Ọ nweela ọtụtụ nturu ugo na nkwanye ugwu n'etiti ndị a,
Njide ala na ụlọ site na ndị na-ahụ maka mpụ Akụnụba na ihe gbasara ego..
Na Jenụwarị 27, 2016, ndị mgbachibido omekome na-ahụ maka mpụ Nchekwa na Akụnụba nke gbasara ego (EFCC) kpochiri ala na ụlọ ya na ụzọ mkpị Jabi Airport dị na Abuja, bụ nke Azụbụike Ihejirika.
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ọtụtụ ndị isi ndị ọchịagha nke metụtara igwu wayo $ 2.1 ijeri nke ngwa agha nke metụtara onye bụbu onye ndụmọdụ n'ihe gbasara nchekwa obodo, Sambo Dasuki .
Cyprian Ekwensi
Amụrụ ya Cyprian Odiatu Duaka Ekwensi
26 Septemba 1921
Minna, Niger Steeti
Nwụrụ 4 Nọvemba 2007 (afọ 86)
Enugwu, Enugwu Steeti
Aka Ọrụ Famasiti, mkpọsa ozi, odee akwụkwọ
Nkenụụdị Obele Akụkọ na akụkọ ifo ụmụaka
Nwunye Eunice Anyiwo, Maria Chime
Ụmụaka Ise
Cyprian Ekwensi MFR (26 Septemba 1921 - 4 Nọvemba 2007) bụ onye Naịjirịa na-ede idụazị, obere akụkọ, na akwụkwọ ụmụaka .
Akụkọ ndụ.
Mbido, agụmakwụkwọ na ezinụlọ.
A mụrụ onye Igbo bụ Cyprian Odiatu Duaka Ekwensi na Minna, Niger Steeti .
Ọ bụ nwaafọ Nkwelle Ezunaka dị na okpuru ọchịchị ime obodo Oyi, Anambra Steeti, Naịjirịa.
Nna ya bụ David Anadumaka, onye na-akọ akụkọ banyere ọchụnta enyí.
Ekwensi gara ụlọ akwụkwọ gọọmentị na Ibadan, Oyo Steeti, Achimota Koleji na Ghana, na "School of Forestry", Ibadan, mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị ọ rụrụ ọrụ afọ abụọ dịka onye ọrụ oke ohia.
Ọ gụkwara akwụkwọ Famasiti na ụlọ akwụkwọ Yaba Teknụzụ , "Lagos School of Pharmacy", ya na Chelsea School of Famasi nke Mahadum London .
Ọ kuziri ihe na kọleji Igbobi .
Ekwensi lụrụ Eunice Anyiwo, ha nwere ụmụ ise.
O nwere ọtụtụ ụmụ nwa, gụnyere nwa ya nwoke bụ Cyprian Ikechi Ekwensi, onye ọ gụrụ aha nna nna ya, na nwa nwa ya bụ Adrianne Tobechi Ekwensi.
Ọrụ gọọmentị.
Ekwensi were n'ọrụ dị ka Isi nke Atụmatụ na "Nigerian Broadcasting Corporation" (NBC) na site na Mịnịstrị nke Ozi n'oge Repobliki mbụ ; o mechara bụrụ Onye isi nke NBC.
Ọ gbara arụkwaghịm n'ọkwa ya n'afọ 1966, tupu a lụwa Agha Bịafra ma soro ezinụlọ ya kwaga Enugwu.
O mechara bụrụ onye isi oche nke Bureau nke mgbasa ozi Biafra, tupu Naijiria eweghachi ya.
Ọrụ edemede.
Ekwensi dere ọtụtụ narị akụkọ ndị dị mkpirikpi, redio na telivishọn skriptụ, na ọtụtụ akwụkwọ akụkọ, gụnyere akụkọ ụmụaka.
akwụkwọ ya 1954 "People of the City" bụ akwụkwọ ya mbụ dọtara mba ọzọ ntị.
Akwụkwọ akụkọ ya bụ "Drummer Boy" (1960), dabere na ndụ Benjamin 'Kokoro' Aderounmu bụ nkọwa nghọta maka nke njegharị, enweghị ebe obibi na ndụ dara ogbenye nke onye na-ese ihe n'okporo ámá.
Ịdụazị kacha ree nke ọma bụ "Jagua Nana" (1961), banyere nwanyi onye Naịjirịa nke hapụrụ di ya na-arụ ọrụ dịka onye akwụna n’obodo ma hu onye nkuzi n’anya.
O dekwara akwụkwọ na-eso nke a, "Jagua Nana's Daughter".
N’afọ 1968, ọ natara nrite mba ụwa nke Dag Hammarskjöld na Agụmagụ.
N’afọ 2001, emere ya MFR.N’afọ 2006, ọ ghọrọ onye otu ndị ‘Nigerian Academy of Letters’.
Ọnwụ.
Ekwensi nwụrụ na 4 Nọvemba 2007 na 'Niger Foundation' na Enugwu, ebe ọ gara ịwa ahụ maka ọrịa na-akọwaghị.
Ndị otu 'Association of Nigerian Authors' (ANA) nwere ebumnuche inye ya onyinye na 16 Nọvemba 2007, wee gbanwee nsọpụrụ ka ọ bụrụ onyinye gafere mmadụ.
Violet Obiamaka Odogwu-Nwajei (amụrụ na May 15, 1942) bụbu onye Naịjirịa na-eme egwuregwu ọsọ na iwuli elu.
Ọ bụ onye bụbu onye isi nke na osote onye isi nke .
Ndụ.
A mụrụ Odogwu na Asaba, Delta State.
Ọ malitere agụmakwụkwọ na obodo ahụ tupu ọ kwaga Lagos ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị.
N’afọ ndị 1950, Violet na nwanne ya nwanyị bụ Juliet gbara ọsọ maka Sports Club.
Na 1958, ọ nọchitere anya Naịjirịa na .
Ọganihu ọ na-aga n'ihu na ihe egwuregwu mere ka ọ nweta onyinye nsọpụrụ nke 'Sports Woman of the Year'.
Mgbe egwuregwu ahụ gasịrị, ọ gara n'ihu na ọmụmụ ya na-agụ akwụkwọ n'ihe ọmụmụ gbasara odeakwụkwọ.
Na 1963, ọ laghachitere n'egwuregwu ma nọchitere anya Naịjirịa n'egwuregwu nke mbụ na-ọsọ ihe mgbochi 80m.
Odogwu bụ onye otu ndị egwuregwu nọchitere Naịjirịa anya na nke emere na Kingston.
Na egwuregwu ahụ, o nwetara ọla nchara mgbe ọ wuliri elu ruo 20feet, 2-1/2inches iji bụrụ nwanyị mbụ merụrụ ọla ahụ n'Afrika na mmemme egwuregwu Commonwealth.
N’afọ 1968, ọ duru ndị otu egwuregwu ụmụnwaanyị Naịjirịa n’egwuregwu Olimpik na 1968.
O riteghi ọla ma ọ bụ onye nke ikpe-azu na egwuregwu nke .
Ọ bụ onye merụrụ ọla nchara na mmemme nke "Little Olympics", emere otu afọ tupu mgbe ahụ maka nkwadebe maka isi mmemme ahụ.
Omoni Oboli ((a mụrụ na 22 Eprel 1978) bụ onye Naịjirịa na-eme ejije, na-ede edemede, na nduzi ihe nkiri, na-emepụta ihe na ihe nkiri dijitalụ.
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na ma dee ọtụtụ ihe ngosi, gụnyere (2009), ' (2010), "Fatal Imagination", ', ' na '.
Na 2018, o soonyere ma duzie ihe nkiri fim na-atọ ọchị a kpọrọ "".
Mmalite ndụ na mmụta.
A mụrụ Oboli na Benin City, Edo State.
O bụ nwa Mosogar na .
Omoni Oboli gụrụ Asụsụ Mba Ọzọ (nke hiwere isi na French) na Mahadum Benin, ebe o nwetara nturu ugo na nsọpụrụ (2nd Class Upper division).
Ọrụ.
Omoni malitere ọrụ ihe nkiri yana fim mbụ ya na "Bitter Encounter" (1996), ebe ọ pụtara dịka odeakwụkwọ.
Ihe nkiri nke na-eso ya bụ "Shame".
Ọ gaziri n'ihu n'ihe nkiri n'ibụ nwanyi nọ na isi n'ihe nkiri atọ buru ibu; "Not My Will, Destined To Die na Another Campus Tale.
" Mgbe o nwetachara ọnụ na obere oge o tinyere na ọrụ fim na 1996, Omoni hapụrụ ọrụ fim iji gụchapụ akwụkwọ mahadum ya.
Ọ lụrụ di ozugbo ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ ma o laghachighi azụ na ọrụ ruo mgbe afọ iri gachara.
Omoni nwere ọtụtụ ihe ngosi na mbọ ọ gbara, tinyere ihe nkiri ya bụ ' yana "The Rivals", ihe nkiri ya na enyi ya mepụtara ma nweta ihe nrite maka ejije kacha mma na mba ofesi na New York International Independent Film na Video Festival.
Ọ bụ ihe nkiri Naịjirịa izizi emere kemgbe emume fetivalu na 2003.
E nyere ihe nkiri ahụ kpakpando-atọ site na aka mmadụ anọ ndi mmemme ikpe.
Omoni pụtara ihe na ọtụtụ fim dika onye ji isi oru nke gunyere ' (2009), ' (2010), ', na "" (2015).
Ọ bụkwa nwanyị mbụ na-eme ihe nkiri siri Nollywood nwetara nturu ugo onye kachasi mma na ejije na emume festivalu mba ụwa abụo, (nke ndị Naijiria ma ọ bụ ndị Africa na-ahazighị), n'otu afọ (2010).
Nke a ka o mere na na fim nturu ugo nke Los Angeles Movie Awards maka onye isi na ihe nkiri ya na "Anchor Baby".
Akara na aha.
Na 2010, o ritere ihe nrite maka onye ejije kacha mma na Best Actress Narrative Feature na Los Angeles Movie Awards, nakwa onyinye maka ọkacha mma na.
A họpụtara Omoni maka onye Kachasị Mma na .
Na 2014, o ritere ọkacha mma na nwanyi na-eme ihe nkiri na afọ nke Big Screen, na 2014 ELOY Awards, maka ihe nkiri ya bụ "Mrs Elliott.
" Na afọ 2015, Omoni ritekwara onyinye ndi Sun Nollywood “Personality of the Year”.
O duziri ọtụtụ ihe nkiri dika "Being Mrs Elliott", "The First Lady", "Wives on Strike", na "".
Na 14 Ọgọstụ 2017, Omoni Oboli wepụtara na ihu ya nkesa okwu ozi gosipụtara ọrụ ọhụrụ ya dika nke LandWey Investment Limited.
Okwu gbasara iwu.
Omoni Oboli pụtara na ihe nkiri "Iwu Okafor," nke bidoro na abali iri na abụọ nke Machị 2017.
Makaosiladi, enweghị ike igosipụta ihe nkiri ahụ ka ọrụ izizi n'ihi na ụlọ ikpe nyere ikike .
E boro Oboli ebibo ida iwu ederede site n'aka onye kwuru na ya dere otu akụkụ akụkọ "Okafor's Law".
E mepụtara fim ahụ na 31 Machị 2017.
Ọrụ ebere.
Omoni Oboli guzobere otu ụlọ ọrụ ebere, "The Omoni Oboli Foundation " iji ọkwá ya dị ka onye a mara ama n'ihe nkiri i wetara enyemaka dị mkpa maka ọnọdụ nke ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụaka ndị ụwa na-atụ n'ọnụ na obodo Nigeria.
Ntọala ahụ a bigidere enweela ike ịmalite ọtụtụ ọrụ nke gụnyere ihe ndị a:
Omotu Bissong (onye amụrụ Cecilia Ohumotu Bissong ) bụ onye ihe nlere anya ndi Naijiria, onye nlere onyonyo, na onye na eme ihe ejije, a kacha mara ya dika Funke Lawal na ndi "".
Oge mmalite.
Ọ bụ nwa afọ Yala, Cross River State.
Bissong malitere ọrụ nlere anya ya mgbe ọ bụ nwata.
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ Nigerian Navy Primary school na Nigerian Navy Secondary school, ha abụọ di na obodo Navy [Navy Town, Lagos], nke ikpeazụ ka ọ gụsịrị mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na anọ.
O mechara debanye aha ya dịka nwa akwụkwọ nke Mahadum Calabar ebe ọ gụrụ 
Peeji.
Na 2003, Bissong - dika e si akpọ ya mgbe ahụ ka Celia Bissong - mere ihe akụkọ site na ịbụ onye mbụ nwetara akara Nwanyị Kachasị Mma na Naijiria siri na South-South (Ọ bụ ezie na Regina Askia nwere aha ahụ na afọ 1989, mana ọnwetachaghi mmeri ahụ n'ezie).
Ihe ikpo okwu ya bụ ime ka amara maka ọria /, na nkwalite njem nleta , ma ọchichi ya buru ya ga asọmpi na na .
Nlereanya.
Bissong rụrụ ọrụ dị ka ihe nlere na Nigeria tupu ọ kwaga America, ebe ọ debanyere aha ya na ụlọ ọrụ ihe atụ ọzọ ka ọ na-agụ Accounting na .
Na ajụjụ ọnụ nke ndi "The Vanguard" na 2008, Bissong katọrọ ịkpa oke megide ndị ojii na arụ ọlụ ihe nlele na ụlọ ọrụ ejiji America, ma kwetakwa na ọ na-echebiri asọmpi siri ike.
Mgbe ọ laghachitere Naịjirịa, ọ mepere ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka ihe nlere iji wee weghachite ọkachamara na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ.
Igwe onyonyo.
Kemgbe ọ laghachiri na obodo ya na 2009, Bissong arụola ọrụ na telivishọn, na-egosi "The Peak Talent Hunt Show", na "Africa Awakes" na DSTV.
Dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri, Bissong nọ na ihe nkiri bụ "Be My Guest ya"na na Chris Attoh, ọ nọkwa ugbu a sonyekwara ejije nke Africa nke "" dị ka nne nọ n'ụlọ na Funke Lawal nke dabere na na usoro mbụ.
Chinko Ekun
Amụrụ Oladipo Olamide Emmanuel
13 Septemba 1993 (afọ 27)
Ikeja, Lagos Steeti, Najirịa
Ebe ọ gụrụ Mahadum nke Obafemi Awolowo 
Aka Ọrụ 
Rapa
OdeeEgwu
Ọrụ egwu
Nkenụụdị Hip hop
Ngwa egwu Olu
Afọ ọ nọ ọrụ 2011–ugbua
Lebeelụ Dek-Niyor Entertainment
Ndị egwu 
Olamide
Lil Kesh
Zlatan
Reminisce
Viktoh
CDQ
Oladipo Olamide Emmanuel (amụrụ ya na 13 septemba1993), onye amaara ama dika Chinko Ekun, bu onye na-eti egwu na onye na ede egwu Naịjirịa .
Mmalite ndụ na agụmakwụkwọ.
A mụrụ Chinko Ekun na Ikeja, Legọọsụ Stee
ti, Naịjirịa, n'ime ezinụlọ dị atọ, ebe ọ bụ nwa nke abụọ.
Ọ bụ nwa afọ Ikare, Ondo Steeti, Naịjirịa.
Chinko Ekun gara Blessing Nọsịrị na Praịmarị Sukulu, Oshodi, Legọọsụ Steeti na Remade Nọsịrị na Praịmarị Sukulu, Igando, Legọọsụ Steeti.
Ọ gara Baptist Model High Sukulu, Ijegun, Legọọsụ Steeti maka ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị.
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na ogo na Mahadum Obafemi Awolowo .
Ọ gara obodo nna ya ozi na Legọọsụ Steeti.
Ọrụ.
2011–2014: Oge mbido ọrụ.
Mgbe Chinko Ekun dị afọ asaa, ọ malitere inwe mmasị n’egwú.
N’afọ mbụ ya na mahadum, o nwere mmasị na azụmahịa na egwu rapụ.
Chinko Ekun ji ikike ya bido ọrụ egwu ya n’afọ 2011, ọ na-egosi vidiyo egwu ya na Instagram .
N’afọ 2013, o weputara “Ekun” dika egwu izizi ya.
N’afọ 2014, Chinko Ekun pụtara na abọm egwu Olamide "Street "OT"", n’ime egwu “100 To Million”, “Bang” na “Usian Bolt” Ọ pụtara na "Olamide Live In Concert"(OLIC) 2014, ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ firistaịlụ.
Chinko Ekun gụrụ egwu na Bekee, Pidgin na Yoruba, na-elekwasị anya na egwu hipu họpụ .
Aha ya "Chinko Ekun" site n'okwu abụọ "Chinko" na "Ekun".
"Chinko", n'ihi na a gwara ya na ọ dị ka onye China n'oge ọ nọ na mahadum na "Ekun", n'ihi na ọ bụ egwu mbụ ya.
2015 – ugbu a: YBNL Nation na Dek-Niyor Entertainment.
N'afọ 2015, Chinko Ekun sonyeere ' YBNL Nation ' nke Olamide .
Ọ wepụtara ọkwa izizi ya nke akpọrọ "Alejo Oran" na "Emi Na Re" site na YBNL Nation na 25 Febuwarị 2015.
Ka otu afọ gachara, ọ hapụrụ aha ndekọ ahụ mgbe nkwekọrịta ya gwụchara, ya na ndị ọrụ ibe ya Adekunle Gold na Viktoh.
Na 2017, o sonyeere Dek-Niyor Entertainment, ndekọ lebeelụ na Dubai .
Na 13 Septemba 2018, ọ wepụtara egwu nke akpọrọ "Able God" nke gosipụtara Zlatan na Lil Kesh .
Egwú ahụ nyere ya ihe nrite Headies mbụ ya dịka "Best Street Hop Artiste" na The "Headies" 2019 .
Egwu a natara nhọpụta nke "Popular Song of the Year" na 2019 "City People Music Awọdụ".
Ọ meriri "Street Song of the Year" na 2019 "City People Music Awọdụ.
Ndụ onwe.
Chinko Ekun alụbeghị nwanyị ma kpughee na ya adịbeghị njikere maka alụmdi na nwunye.
Obiageli Olorunsola (amuru ya na abali iri- na otụ n’onwa ise n'afọ 1962) bu onye n’egwu Naijiria badminton .
O sonyeere na women's singles na mixed doubles nke 1996 Summer Olympics na Atlanta .
Nkechi Mbilitam (amụrụ ya na 5 Eprel n'afọ 1974) bụ nwaafọ Naijiria n'agba bọọlụ dika midfielder nke Naijiria women's national football team .
O so na ndi otu FIFA World Cup nke 1991 ma soro kwa na FIFA World Cup nke 1995 .
Margaret Etim (amụrụ ya na 28 Nọvemba n'afọ 1992) bụ Naijiria n'agba ọsọ onye bụ ọkachamara na 400 mita .
O meriri nrite ọla ọcha n'afọ 2010 World Junior Championship na mgbakwunye na ọtụtụ nrite na Naijiria 4 × 400 mita relay .
Ihe kachasị mma ya na ihe omume ahụ bụ 51.24 sekọnd edobere na Makurdi na 2010.
Lydia Koyonda (amụrụ ya na 29 Mee afọ 1974) bụ onye ọgba bọọlụ Naịjirịa gbara bọọlụ dika onye nche nke otu egwu bọọlụ nke ụmụ nwanyị Naịjirịa .
O so na ndị otu egwuregwu na 1991 FIFA Women's World Cup .
Na ọkwa klọb, ọ na-egwuri egwu maka Ufuoma Babes na Naijiria.
Louisa Akpagu (amụrụ ya na 22 Disemba afọ 1974) bụ onye ọgba bọọlụ Naijiria gbara bọọlụ dika onye nche .
O so na ndị otu egwu bọọlụ ụmụnwaanyị Naịjirịa.
O so na otu nke FIFA Women's World Cup 1995.
Linda Ogugua (amụrụ ya na 12 Eprel afọ 1978) bụ onye Naijiria na atu basketball so na otu ndi Nigerian women's basketball Center .
Ogugua gara Mahadum Biola na California, United Steeti.
O sonyere na ndị otu ụmụ nwanyi basketball mba Naijiria na 2004 Summer Olimpik.
Ndu onwe.
Ndi muru ogugua bụ Caroline Chinwe na John Brown Ogugua na Anambra Steeti,Naijiria na Eprel afọ 1978.
Esther Augustine (amuru 8 julai afọ 1987) bu onye Naijiria judoka nke soro n’olu umu nwanyi.
O ritere nrite ọla ọcha na Egwuregwu Afrịka niile nke 2011 na ihe nchara na 2008 Judo Championship .
O meriri African Open Port Louis U63kg n'af 2013.
Ọrụ egwuregwu.
Na asọmpi African Judo Championship nke afọ 2008 na Agadir, Morocco, Augustine soro asọmpi 63kg wee rite ọla nchara.
Na Egwuregwu Afrịka emere na Maputo,Mozambique .
O ritere nrite ọla ọcha na ihe omume 63kg.
O merikwara African Open nke e mere na Port Louis mgbe o sonyechara n'ihe omume U63kg.
Jennifer madu (amụrụ 23 Septemba afọ 1994 na Garland, Texas ) bụ nwaafọ Naijiria amuru na United Steeti n'agba ọsọ.
Ọ nọchitere anya Naijiria na Rio 2016 Summer Olimpik .
Ọ gbara onye ka ise na Heat 5 nke 100m na oge nke 11.61.
Ọ gbakwara ụkwụ nke atọ maka otu egwuregwu 4 ×100 relay nke Naijiria.
Edith Eluma (amụrụ na 27 Septemba afọ 1958) bụ onye Naijiria n'agba bọọlụ dị ka onye na-agbachitere otu ụmụ nwanyi naijiria.
O s o na ndị otu egwuregwu na 1991 FIFA Women's World Cup .
Na ọkwa klọb, ọ na-egwuru Princess Jegede na Naijiria.
Idia Aisien bụ onye nlere na onye na-egosi TV na Naijiria.
Ndụ mbido.
Aisien bụ onye agbụrụ Naịjirịa na nke Kamerun, amụrụ na Julaị 4, 1991, na Legọs ka onye isi ndọrọndọrọ, Dr. Joe Aisien.
Nna ya bụ onye na-ere mmanya, Dr. Joe Aisien, na nne ya bụ jeweler , Emmanuella Aisien.
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ụma, Aisien gara ụlọ akwụkwọ dị elu nke Atlantic Hall, na Legọs.
Mgbe ahụ ọ kwagara United Steeti, ebe o nwetara BA na oru nta akuko na Mahadum America na Washington, DC, na MS na mmekọrịta ọha na eze ụwa na nkwukọrịta ụlọ ọrụ ụwa niile na Mahadum New York .
Ọrụ.
Aisien n'arụ ọrụ na Fox 5 News, na AARP Foundation, Discovery Communications, Foreign Policy Initiative, United Nations na Atlas Mara.
O mele ihe nlere maka ọtụtụ ika dika BMW , vogue, LAN Airlines, Black Opal, Nivea, Alice + Olivia, J Brand, Cashhimi, Samantha Pleet, Jovani, Evelyn Lambert, Nikki Angelique, An Alili na Sway Hair Ltd. Na Naịjirịa, Idia na -akwado ndị You Got Issues and Style 101 na "Spice TV", ya na Mega Millions Lottery Draw na "Silverbird" 
Idia Aisien kọwara onwe ya dịka " amam ihe,"Ike,na-akpa ọchị","Ihe mgbagwoju anya,miri emi" " Ọ na - arụ ọrụ ugbu a na International News TV Station - Arise News Guardian woman
Viola Adaku Onwuliri (amuru na 18 June 1956) bụ onye prọfesọ mmuta biochemistry na mahadum na onye ndọrọ-ndọrọ ọchịchị jere ozi dika Minista na Naijiria.
Viola Onwuliri bu ada mbu nke ezinụlọ eze nke His Highness Eze Cletus na Ugoeze Dorathy Oparaoji nke Amuzi, LGA, Imo Steeti.
O si na Imo steeti, Nigeria ma a muru ya na Legos na 1956.
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị nke ụmụnwaanyị dị na Owerri tupu ọ gaa Mahadum ebe ọ nwetara nzere na Biochemistry.
Ọ gakwara Mahadum ebe o nwetara , na Applied Organic Chemistry na PhD na Molecular Biochemistry.
O mechara gaa maka asambodo na Mahadum na ụlọ akwụkwọ na USA.
Viola laghachiri Naịjirịa ebe ọ malitere ọrụ dịka onye enyemaka gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 1981.
Na 2004 ọ ghọrọ prọfesọ nke Biochemistry na .
Ya na di ya, , nwere ụmụ ise.
Na 2004 Viola ghọrọ onye Naijiria na nwanyị Afrika mbụ a họpụtara ịbụ onye otu (IAS) nke nọ na Geneva wee bụrụ onye nnọchi anya mpaghara Afrika site na 2004 rua 2008.
A họpụtara ya na 2008 ruo afọ anọ ọzọ.
N’afọ 2011 ọ bụ onye ga-azọ okwa nke osote gọvanọ Imo steeti ya na Gov.
Ikedi Ohakim, mgbe emriri ha, ọ jụrụ onyinye ọkwa nke ije ozi di ka Kọmishọna site n'aka Gọvanọ Rochas Okorocha mana o jiri nwayọ wee kwuo ya.
O mechara bụrụ onye ma mee ihe ama ama na Ọktoba 2013 mgbe ọ duru ndị nnọchi anya Nigeria ka ha merie oche nke (UNSC) na nhoputa ndi ochichi a na-enwetụbeghị ụdị ya.
Ọ nọkwa na okwa ahụ mgbe ọ kpọrọ oku ka onye ọchịchị Libya, , gbaa arụkwaghịm na-ekwu na otu nnupụisi Libya kacha anọchite anya ndị Libya.
N'otu ọnwa ahụ ka Mịnịsta, ọ gara ebe bọmbụ metụtara ala nke bụ nke gburu ihe karịrị mmadụ iri abụọ.
Ọ kwuru na: "Ihe a abụghị ọgụ Naịjirịa mana na ọgụ mba ụwa niile.
" Ihe ojoo dakwasiri ya mgbe ụgbọelu nke si na mbara igwe daa na June 2012 nke gburu di ya na ihe karịrị mmadụ 150 ndị ọzọ.
Di ya bụbu onye isi ọchịchị Federal University of Technology Owerri (FUTO).
Dika nwunye onye isi ọchịchị Mahadum FUTO na onye guzobere ma bụrụ onye isi nzukọ ụmụnwaanyị nke Mahadum FUTO(FUTOWA) (2006-2011), ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị oke mkpa n'ịmepụta ọrụ na mmepe nke FUTO site na FUTOWA gunyere okike ulo oru nlebara umuaka anya maka ndi oru na umu akwukwo, nguzobe ebe nlebara umuaka anya na ibuli onodu ndi nwanyi noo na FUTO.
Ọ kpalitere ọgbaghara na 2013 dị ka Mịnịsta mgbe ọ rịọrọ ka Gọvanọ Imo n'oge ahụ nye akụkọ mmefu nke ego n'ụdị nke ndị gọọmentị etiti ọ natara n'aha Imo Steeti, gunyere ego Sure-P, Ego njikwa ide mmiri, ego ngalaba LGA, ego nkesa NDDC na ego ndị ọzọ nke gọọmentị nyere ya.
Dị ka Mịnịsta na-ahụ maka Ofesi na-arụ ọrụ iji weghachite ma melite mmekọrịta na ndị Naijiria nọ na mba ọzọ, dịka ụzọ mbụ iji mepụta gburugburu ebe obibi dị mma iji dọta ndị Naịjirịa nọ na-esonye na imezu ya Ebumnuche nke Onye isi ala na iji nweta ego ntinye ego nke "Foreign Direct Investment" na "Foreign Direct Remittances" nke ruru 8billion dollars na 21billion dollars n'otu n'otu n'oge ahụ, arụ ọrụ iji kwalite nkwanye ùgwù na ịkwalite ọgwụgwọ nke ndị Najiria nọ na mba ndị ọzọ; ọ ghọrọ onye isi ala Naijiria mbụ ka onye isi obodo ya nabatara na Mahadum .
Dika Mịnịsta Ofesi na Naijiria o jere ozi site na 11 Julaị 2011 ruo 22 Ọktoba 2014 nke gunyere ije ozi dika onye Steetị-1 Minista na mgbe ahụ, Minista na-elekọta ngalaba ọrụ nke ofis ofesi n'etiti 2013 na 2014 tupu akwaga ya na ngalaba agụmakwụkwọ dị ka State-1 Mịnịsta.
N’afọ 2013, ọ meriri ọkwa onye isi oche nke GlobalPOWER Women Network Africa.
Mgbe afọ ahụ gasịrị, ọ natara oninye nsọpụrụ nke 'European Union Honorary Platinum Leadership Award in Politics na 28 November 2013 na Stockholm, Sweden.
Onwuliri bu onye isi oche maka otu nke African continental women's society SWAAN ma na-arụ oru dika onye isi nchoputa na onye ọrụ nduzi na mmekorita nke .
Onye isi ala Goodluck Jonathan kpaliri Onwuliri site na okwa nke Minista maka Mba Abroad ka ọ bụrụ Minista nke steetị maka agụmakwụkwọ na October 2014 mgbe gbara arụkwaghịm.
N’afọ 2015, gọọmentị Naịjirịa họpụtara Onwuliri dịka nke Nigerian Maritime University (NMU) na dịka onye isi oche kansụl ya.
ItKefee Obareki Don Momoh (Febụwarị 5, 1980 ruo Jun 12, 2014), onye eji Kefee mara site n'aha egwu ya, bụ nwanyị Naịjirịa na-abụ abụ ozioma ma na-edekwa abụ.
Mmalite Ndụ.
Amụrụ ya na Sapele, Delta na abalị ise n'ọnwa Febrụwarị , 1980 na ezinụlọ Andrew Obareki ndị bụbu dikin n’ụlọ ụka nke nne na nna onye bụburu di ya bu Alec Godwin hibere.
Kefee gụsịrị akwụkwọ na University of Benin na nzere nchịkwa azụmahịa.
Mgbe ọ n'etolite ihe dịka afọ iri na ụma, ọ na-agbasi mbọ ike abịa n'ihe ụka ọkacha ịbụ abụ ukwe.
Ọrụ.
Ka mkpali ya n’egwú nọ na-ebuwanye ibu, ọ malitere ichepụta na idepụta abụ.
N’afọ 2000, o wepụtara otu ọba egwu akpọrọ “Trip” nke ahụ sụụrụ ya ụzọ ná ngwago egwu Naịjirịa dịka onye na-ahụ abụ ozioma.
N'afọ 2003, ọ bịanyere aka na ihe omume ntụrụndụ Alec, akara ndekọ nke onye bụbu onye isi otu abụ guzobere ma ọ wee wepụta afere egwu studio mbụ ya bụ Branama obere oge mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị.
Efere egwu Branama mere ka ọ chawapụta dị ka onye n'eti egwu Oziọma tinyere ọ̀zụ́zụ́ na ahịa mba na nke mba ụwa.Erere "Branama" "casset" itoolu n'ime izu atọ na ihe karịrị CD / VCDs nde abụọ n'otu ọnwa.
Nke a bụụrụ ya mmalite ọganiihu n'ọrụ ya dịka ọgụ abụ oziọma nke Naijiria.
"Branama" na "Kokoroko"bụ egwu ọgụ abụ a laarala mmụọ ama ama.
Ihe Nrite.
E nyere ya International Young Ambassador for Peace Award na 2009.
Kefee meriri na nturu ugo isi nke 2010 maka mmeko kacha mma ya na Timaya maka "Kokoroko".
Ndụ nkeonwe.
Kefee lụrụ di na nwunye ugboro abụọ.
Ọ lụrụ Alec Godwin afọ atọ ruo 2008.
Ọ lụrụ onye nhazi mkparitakụka redio Teddy Esosa Don-Momoh na abalị atọ n'ime onwa macachị 2013 na Sapele, Delta steeti .
Ọnwụ na olili.
Agbanyeghị na asịrị na ihe kpatara ọnwụ ya bụ prị-kplampsia, Kefee Obareki Don Momoh nwụrụ na ngwụcha ngụgụ na ụlọ ọgwụ dị na Los Angeles, California na June 12, 2014.
Ọ nọ na coma ruo ụbọchị iri na ise.
E liri ya na Fraịde Julaị 11, 2014 n’obodo ya Okpara Inland, Ethiope East Local Government Area nke Delta State, Nigeria .
Nghọta Egwu.
Egwu só ọnwụ ya
Unoma Azuah (onye amụrụ na 23 n’onwa Juun 1969) bu onye ode akwukwo, onye nwere akwụkwọ ebịpụtara, na onye na-agba mbọ banyere ide akụkọ maka ndị LGBT (ndị mmekọahụ pụrụ iche).
O biputala akwụkwọ ato, abuo n’ime ha ritere onyinye nsọpụrụ na mba di iche-iche.
Ọ na-elekwasị anya n'okwu metụtara ndị mmekọahụ pụrụ iche ndị Naijiria, dịka na "Blessed Body: Secret Lives of LGBT Nigerians" (2016).
Mmalite ndụ.
Amụrụ Azuah na Ogwashi-Ukwu na Delta Steetị nke Naijiria na-ezinulo nna ya bụ onye si Ukan na lokal gọọmentị Ushongo nke Benue State na nne ya onye Igbo si Asaba na Delta Steetị .
Dịka nwata onye amụrụ n'oge nwere nne na nna n'akụkụ abụọ nke esemokwu ahụ, a zụlitere ya dịka onye Igbo ma bụrụ onye pụrụ iche na ezinụlọ nna ya n'ihi na onye agha Tiv ns Naijiria ekwesịghị ịgafe ndị iro iji banye na Biafra (Igbo) maka mmekọ nwanyị.
Ọ gara Mahadum ebe, dị ka onye na-agụsibeghị akwụkwọ, ọ dezigharịrị akwụkwọ edemede ngalaba Bekee a na-akpọ "The Muse" wee nata onyinye nsọpụrụ nke nwa akwụkwọ kasị mma na Creative Writing maka afọ abụọ sochiri ya: 1992 na 1993.
O nwetara nzere bachelo na mmuta asụsụ Bekee site na UNN na afọ 1994, nzere mastas na mmuta Bekee site na Mahadum , Ohio na 2001 na nzere mastas ọzọ na Fine Art site na Mahadum , na Richmond na-afọ 2003.
Ikike ndị mmekọahụ pụrụ iche.
Azuah bu onye mbu si Naijiria mere ka amata okwu gbasara LGBTQI ama na Naijiria.
Ọ hapụrụ Naịjirịa na 1999, mgbe ọ natara ọtụtụ ihe iyi egwu ndụ ya n'ihi ọrụ ya, ma ugbu a, o kewara oge ya n'etiti US na Naijiria iji gaa n'ihu na-enyere ndị LGBTQI aka ma na-arụ ọrụ.
Banyere ọrụ ya, Azuah ekwuola "A na m enyocha isiokwu nke mmekọahụ na mgbe m na-ede ihe, karịsịa mgbe m na-ede abu.
"Edible Bones" sitere na ihe mere eme.
Ndụ nke onye bụ isi akụkọ ahụ na-egosipụta na ndụ nke onye si Naijiria ma kwabata mba ọzọ.
Ọ bụ onye mmekọ nwoke na nwoke na-asọ oyi nke ukwuu, mana mgbe ọ gara n'ụlọ mkpọrọ wee bụrụ onye nlebara anya maka ndị ọchọ okwu, otu onye zọpụtara ya bụ onye mmekọ nwoke na nwoke".
Banyere iwu , ọ kwukwara ihe ndị a: "Ọ dị m ka ndị isi Naijiria ji okwu a dịka ihe ndọpụ uche ụmụ Naịjirịa site na itinye nchegbu n'ezie dị ka ụkọ ohere maka ịchọọ akụnụba na akụrụngwa.
Ifufe siri ike nke okpukpere chi ndi Kristian nke juru Naijiria na akpata ndọpụ uche maka isiokwu a nke na-ekwesịgh bụ isiokwu nke esemokwu mba n'ihi na ihe ndi toro eto na-eme na nzuzo nke ime ulo ha agbasaghị onye obula.
Edemede ya nke na-enyocha isiokwu gbasara mmekọ ụdị n'ụdị nwoke idina nwoke ma ọ bụ nwaanyị idina nwaanyị na ịgbachitere mmekọahụ obụna pụrụ iche, maka onye ode akwụkwọ si Naịjirịa gosiri "omume obi siri ike n'ezie" Ugbu a ọ bụzi nwa amaala nke United States, ọ gara n'ihu "na-etinyekarị aka na ala nna ya site na ịkekọrịta akụkọ banyere mmebute nke ndị mmekọahụ pụrụ iche ebe ahụ.
"
Ndụ ya niime.
Azuah na-akuzi ide ihe ugbu a na .
The Remedies
Ebe osi Legọọsụ, Naịjirịa
Nkenụụdị Naija hipụ họpụ
Afọ ọ nọ ọrụ 1997 - mbido 2000
Lebeelụ Kennis Music
Ndị egwu Plantashun Boiz
Ndị otu ya mbụ Eedris Abdulkareem (pụrụ 1999)
Tony Tetuila
Eddie Remedy (aka Eddie Montana)
Remedies bụ ndị bụ ụzọ malite egwu hipụ họpụ na Naịjirịa.
Ọ gụnyere Eedris Abdulkareem, Tony Tetuila na Eddy Remedy (nke a makwaara dị ka Eddy Montana ).
Zulu Sofola (22 Juun 1935 - 5 Septemba 1995) bụ nwaanyị onye edemede ejije mbụ e bịpụtara ọrụ ya na Naijiria.
Sofola bụkwa onye nkụzi mahadum wee bụrụ nwanyị mbụ Prọfesọ nke Theater Arts na Afrika .
Mmalite ndụ.
Amụrụ Nwazuluwa Onuekwuke Sofola na nke ochie na ezinụlọ Nwaugbade Okwumabua na Chief Ogana Okwumabua ndi bu ndi Igbo site na , North Local Government Area, nke di na Delta Steetị .
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị nke Federal Gọọmentị na Asaba na Baptist Girls High School dị na , Delta steetị.
N'ihi ọrụ pụtara ìhè ọ nwere n'ụlọ akwụkwọ, e nyere ya ohere agụmakwụkwọ ka ọ gụchaa akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Nashville, Tennessee, USA  ọ nọrọ oge ya na-eto eto na n'oge agbọghọ ya na US, ebe ọ na-gaa akwụkwọ na , nweta BA na aụsụ bekee na Mahadum dị na Richmond, Virginia na 1959.
Ọ nwetara MA ya na Drama (ide ejije na mbịpụta) site na Mahadum na Washington DC na afọ 1965.
Ọ laghachiri Naịjirịa na 1966, wee bụrụ onye nkuzi na ngalaba Theater Arts na Mahadum , Oyo Steetị, ebe ọ nwetara PhD na Theater Arts (Tragic Theory) na 1977.
Ọrụ.
Ejije ya "sitere na ọdachi mere n'oge gara aga ruo n'ihe ntọchị ma jiri usoro ọdịnala na nke Afrịka oge a" Ọ na - eji "ihe anwansi, akụkọ ifo na emume iji tụlee esemokwu dị n'etiti ọdịnala na ọgbara ọhụrụ ebe oke ịbụ nwoke nọ.
" A na-ewere ya dịka otu n’ime ụmụ nwanyị ndị kacha ama ama n’edemede Naịjirịa.
Ọ ka bụ ihe na-enye ndị ntorobịa n’edemede Afrika ume.
Ụfọdụ ejije Sofola mere a na-egosikarị bụ ' (1972) na "The Sweet Trap" (1977), Ọ nwụrụ na 1995 mgbe ọ dị afọ 60.
Zainab Shamsuna Ahmed (amụrụ 16 Juun 1960) bụ onye na-edekọ ego na Naịjirịa.
Ọ bụ Mịnịsta na-ahụ maka ego, atụmatụ mmefu ego na mba site na 2019 ruo ugbu a. 
Mgbe arụkwaghịm nke onye mịnịsta na-ahụ maka ego na Septemba 14, 2018, a họpụtara Zainab Ahmed ka ọ bụrụ Mịnịsta na-ahụ maka Ego na Septemba 2018.
N’afọ 2015, onye isi ala Muhammadu Buhari họpụtara ya dịka obere Mịnịsta na-ahụ maka atụmatụ mmefu ego na obodo.
Mmalite ndu na mmuta.
Amụrụ Ahmed na Kaduna Steeti .
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Queen Amina College, Kaduna, ma mesịa nwee A'Level na Zaria.
O nwetara nzere mbụ ya na mmuta Akaụntụ na Mahadum na 1981, mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ gara Mahadum maka MBA ya.
Ahmed nwetara MBA ya na August 2004 na Mahadum , Ago Iwoye; na BSc Accounting (1981) site na Mahadum (ABU), Zaria; IJMB 'A' Levels (1979) site na SBS / ABU Zaria; na WASC 'O' Level na 1977 site na Queen Amina College, Kaduna.
Ọrụ.
Zainab Shamsuna bụ Mịnịsta na-ahụ maka ego, atụmatụ mmefu ego na mba nke Naijiria.
Zainab Shamsuna bụbu onye isi odeakwụkwọ gara aga na onye nhazi mba nke Nigeria Extractive Industries Transparency Initiative (NEITI).
O sokwa na otu ndị isi NEITI abuo gara aga, na aru oru na NEITI na global EITI.
Onye na-ahụ maka ego site na ọzụzụ ya ma nwe nzere bachelor na mmuta banyere ego site na ABU Zaria na nzere masta na Business Administration (MBA), Ahmed, na ndekọ ndu ya, kwuru na ya nwere “oke omuma na ahụmahụ di iche iche na nhazi ma nchikwa ọrụ nke ndi obodo.”
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, Ahmed nwetere ọrụ na 1982 dị ka Akaụntụ II na Main Accounts nke Ministri okwu ego na Kaduna steetị ma e bulie ya na Akaụntụ I na March 1984, mana ọ gbara arụkwaghịm na 1985 iji sonyere NITEL.
N'oge gara aga, ọ rụrụ ọrụ National Youth Service na Kaduna steetị na 1981/1982 ebe e zigara ya maka ọrụ mbụ ya na Messrs. Egunjobi Suleiman &amp; Co. Chartered Accountants, ma jekwa ozi dị ka onye ọrụ ọzụzụ.
Ahmed arụọla ọrụ maka ndị Naịjirịa n'ọkwá dị elu dị iche iche, gụnyere onye isi nchịkwa nke ụlọ ọrụ ọchụnta ego nke Kaduna Steetị na Nigeria, yana onye isi ego nke ụlọ ọrụ nkwukọrịta ekwentị mkpanaaka Nigeria.
Ahọpụtara Zainab dịka Mịnịsta na-ahụ maka ego n'ụbọchị 21 nke August 2019 site n'aka onye isi ala.
Kenny Ogunbge
Aha Kehinde Ogungbe
Amaara ya ka Kenny, Keke, Kekeke
Amụrụ 10 Septemba 1970
Nkenụụdị Hip hop, R
Aka ọrụ Mmepụta egwu, onye ozi redio, onyenwe Kennis Music
Afọ ọ nọ ọrụ 1994–ugbua
Lebeelụ Kennis Music
Kehinde "Kenny" Ogungbe, bụ onye Naịjirịa na-eme DJ, onye na-emepụta egwu, onye ozi na televishọn na onye isi egwu.
Ọ bụ ya chọpụtara akara Kennis Music, na ọ bụ onye isi oche n'akụkụ Dayo "D1" Adeneye.
Ọrụ.
Ya na Adeneye kwadoro mmemme egwu "AIT Jamz", nke e mere na AIT na ngwụsị afọ iteghete (emesịa bụrụ PrimeTime Jamz na NTA ).
Ọ rụọla ọrụ, hazie ọrụ ya, ma chọpụta The Remedies (na-ebupụta ọrụ nke Eedris Abdulkareem na Tony Tetuila ), Sound Sultan, 2face Idibia (na -emepụta abọm abụọ izizi ya) na Oritse Femi, na ndị ọzọ.
N’afọ 2012, a họpụtara ya ịbụ Onye Nduzi nke Raypower FM .
Ọ bụkwa onye isi nchịkwa, DAAR Communications Plc .
Lyta
Aha Opeyemi Babatunde Rahim
Amụrụ Ajegunle, Lagos, Nigeria
Nkenụụdị 
Afurobiiti
pọpụ
Aka ọrụ 
Odee egwu
Otii egwu
Ngwa egwu Vocals
Afọ ọ nọ ọrụ 2011–ugbua
Lebeelụ Marlian Records
Ndị egwu 
Davido
Olamide
Zinoleesky
Opeyemi Babatunde Rahim, onye ama ama dịka Lyta (akpọrọ L-Y-T-A), bụ onye Naịjirịa na-eti egwu na onye na-ede egwu.
Ọ bịanyere aka na ndekọ egwu na YBNL Nation na 2018 mana hapụ labeelụ ahụ na Mee 2019 mgbe ya na onyenwe labeelu ahụ nwesịrị esemokwu bụ Olamide .
O wepụtara egwu ise "izizi nke izizi" EP "Id" na 2019.
Mmalite ndụ na ọrụ.
Nwaafọ Kwara Steeti, Lyta tolitere na Ajegunle ma bụrụ onye otu "Ile Kewu", otu egwu na ụlọ egwu alakụba ha.
Ndekọ egwu ya na YBNL Nation pụtara ihe na 3 February 2018.
Ihe ịtunanya nke Lyta na otu YBNL Nation, nke akpọrọ "Time", nke gụnyere Olamide pụtara na 14 Febuwarị 2018.
Na 2019, Lyta hapụrụ YBNL Nation n'ihi nkwekọrịta na nsogbu onwe onye.
Ka ọpụpụsịrị YBNL, ya na Doro Musik Gang bịanyere aka wee wepụta egwu egwu Killer Tunes mepụtara "Monalisa" na 12 Julaị 2019.
Ihe onyonyo a na-egosi maka "Monalisa", nke onye isi nduzi K nyere, chịkọtara ihe karịrị echiche 500,000 n'ime otu ọnwa ewepụtara ya.
Izu ole na ole ha wepụtasịrị "Monalisa", Davido ruru Lyta banyere ịdekọ ngụgharị egwu ya.
Site na nkwekọrịta ha, Davido na Lyta gbagara Dakar maka ngụgharị na imee vidiyo.
Emepụtara ngụgharị egwu nke "Monalisa" na 30 Ọgọstụ 2019.
Akwụkwọ akụkọ "Elias Light of "Rolling Stone"" kọwara egwu a dị ka "mmegwara mara mma, yana okwu iwe na-agụ agụụ".
Egwú vidiyo na-eso ngụharị egwu bụ Director K duziri.
Lyta nwetara ngosipụta nke ọma ya na Davido gụkọrụ egwu ya.
Lyta weputara egwu nke Afurobiiti "Worry" na 6 Disemba 2019; ọ bụ Killer Tunes mepụtara ya.
Ngosipụta maka "Worry" bụ ndị nduzi "Simplicity Visual Studios" na London.
Nwepụ na YBNL.
Akụkọ banyere ọpụpụ Lyta na YBNL pụtara mgbe Olamide kwụsị i so ya na Instagram.
Na Mee 2019, Lyta kwetara ọ na-apụ na "YNBL Nation" na Naijaloaded TV.
O kwuru na agbanyeghị na a na-akwụ ya n’agbata iri puku ise na iri asatọ maka ihe ngosi na o nweghi nkwekọrịta na lebeelụ ahụ.
Olamide nyere nkwupụta na "Guardian Life", na-ekwu YBNL nwere kalenda nkwalite nke Lyta jụrụ ịgbaso.
Lebeelụ ndekọ ọhụrụ.
Lyta nọ n'okpuru ndekọ egwu Marlian nke Naira Marley nwere .
Ọ wepụtara mbụ ya n’okpuru ndekọ a, akpọrọ “Hold me Down (Omo Gidi)”.
Vidio ahụ bụ "Hold Me Down" nke sitere nkwalite mmụọ Kpop Korean boy band GOT7 na BTS duziri TG Omori.
Yvonne Anuli Orji (amụrụ na 2 Disemba 1983) bụ onye Naijiria nke Amerika na ome ọrụ ntọchi.
A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri telivishọn bụ "" (egosiri na-afọ 2016 ruo ugbu a), bụ nke a họpụtara ya maka oniynye nsọpụrụ nke na nke atọ.
Mmalite ndụ ya.
A mụrụ Orji na 2 Disemba 1983, na Port Harcourt, Rivers Steetị, Naijiria, ma ọ tolitere na na mba United States.
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na obere obodo ebe ọ gara .
O nwetara BA na mmuta a na-akpọ Liberal Arts na Mahadum George Washington wee gaa n'ihu na-enweta nzere mastas na mmuta Public Health na Mahadum .
Ndị mụrụ Orji tụrụ anya na ọ ga-abụ dọkịta, ọkàiwu, ọkà mmụta ọgwụ, ma ọ bụ injinia.
Agbanyeghị, a kpaliri mmụọ nsọ ya ime ihe ntọchị mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ.
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, na 2009, Orji kwagara New York City ịchụso ọrụ na ntọchị.
Na 2015, ọ rutere ọrụ dịka Molly na ihe nkiri "" n'enweghị onye ọrụ ma ọ bụ ahụmịhe ọ bụla.
Ndụ ya niime.
Orji bụ Onye Kraịst ji okpukpe kpọrọ ihe ma kwuo na ya ga-anọgide 
Ọ bịara mmemme nke TEDxWilmingtonSalon na 2017, nke akpọrọ "The wait is sexy" na YouTube.
N’okwu a, ọ kọwara ihe ndị mere o ji wezuga mmekọahụ ya na nwoke tupu ya alụọ di.
Ọrụ ebere.
N'èzí ọrụ okike ya, ọ na-eme nyemaka ọrụ ebere.
Na 2008 na 2009 ọ nọrọ ọnwa isii na-arụ ọrụ na esemokwu Liberia, yana (PSI), NGO nke na-eji azụmaahịa mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya eme ihe iji kwado omume ọma.
Mgbe ọ nọ na Liberia, ya na otu ndị ntorobịa nwere ọgụgụ isi rụkọrọ ọrụ iji nyere aka wulite ọtụtụ mmemme maka ịnye ndụmọdụ yana nkwukọrita nke ikuziere ma gbochie mgbasa nke afọ ime ụmụ agbọghọ na ọria bụ .
Ọ na - etinye oge ya na olu ya ugbu a dịka onye nnọchi anya R(ED), onye mmuta na-agụmakwụkwọ maka Jumpstart ma soro na - arụ ọrụ.
Ọgụgụ ọzọ.
Wilson, H. W. (November 2018).
"Yvonne Orji".
Current Biography.
79 (11): 51–55.
ISBN 9781682176412.
OCLC 1005191045.
Noora Salem Jasim (amụrụ na 27 Nọvemba afọ 1996) bụ onye egwuregwu Bahraini na -asọ mpi ọkachasị na gbaa nke shot put.
Ọ nọchitere anya obodo ya na asọmpi mba ụwa 2017 n’enweghị ntozu nke ikpeazu.
Ihe kacha mma.
N'èzí
Ime ụlọ
Wunmi Mosaku (amuru n’afọ 1986) bu onye Naijiria nke Britain ejiri ọrụ ihe nkiri na ịtị egwu wee mara.
A maara ya maka ọrụ ya dị ka Joy na ihe ngosi bụ ' () na Holly Lawson na ihe ngosi bụ ' (2011–12).
O meriri 2017 maka ọrụ ya dịka Gloria Taylor na ihe nkiri TV bụ ' (2016).
Na 2019, ọ putara n'usoro nke ise '.
Ndụ mmalite.
A mụrụ Mosaku na Naijiria, ma o mechara kwaga , , mgbe ọ dị otu afọ.
Ọ gara na .
Ọ gụrụ egwu ruo afọ iri na otu na otu ụmụ egwu nke Manchester Girls Choir.
Ndị mụrụ ya bụ ndị prọfesọ na Naijiria mana ha enweghị ike ịrụ otu ọrụ ahụ na UK.
Nne ya bidoro ọrụ azụmahịa na nna ya mechara laghachi Naịjirịa.
Ọrụ.
Mosaku gụsịrị akwụkwọ na na 2007 wee mee ọrụ ihe nkiri mbụ ya na na mmepụta nke ' '.
Kemgbe ahụ ọ pụtawo na ', nke duziri ma dabere na akwụkwọ na ; ' nke na Truth &amp; Reconciliation, ha abụọ gosiri na ; "Mules" na .
Na 2009, ọ pụtara na "Katrina", ejije nke gosipụtara akụkọ mmadụ isii banyere ọgụ ha maka idị ndụ mgbe mebiri obodo na August 2005.
Mosaku mere dị ka Sophie na ihe ngosi nke ' nke duziri ma gosi na ụlọ ihe nkiri nke .
Na 2008, ọ pụtara na mmepụta izizi nke "UNDEREXPOSED" na , ezubere iji bulie mmata ndị dị ojii a n'asọpụrụ ma na-agbapụta ikike dị n'etiti obodo ndị dị ojii na Britain.
Foto ya pụtara na Commerce Way, Peckham, London.
Na 2009, ọ pụtara na uhe ngosi nke bụ "", nke o meriri "Best Actress in a Miniseries" na mmemme Roma Fiction Festival.
O gosipụtara na mkpuchi ihu akwụkwọ nke ' magazin June – July 2009 dị ka otu n'ime UK Stars of Tomorrow, na 2011 ọ pụtara na mbipụta ' nke afọ 2011.
N’afọ 2010, akpọrọ Wunmi Mosaku otu n’ime ihu ndị ohuru asaa na mmemme , maka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri nke ', Ọ na-mere dịka Malia; nwa agbọghọ a tọọrọ n'obodo ya na Sudan, ma resị ya ịbụ ohu.
Maka ọrụ ya Mosaku nwetara akara ngosi dịka Nwaanyị ọrụ ihe nkiri Kachasị Mma na Birmingham Black Film Festival, Ọrụ ihe nkiri kacha mma na mmemme Cultural Diversity Awards na Okachasi mma nwaanyị ọrụ ihe nkiri na .
Na 2011, Mosaku sonyeere ndị ọrụ maka ihe nkiri ', ebe ọ meere dịka Holly Lawson, mana ọ hapụrụ ihe nkiri ahụ ka otu afọ gachara.
Na 2015, Mosaku gosipụtara na-ọrụ nkiri dika Quentina, onye polis na-ahụ maka okporo ụzọ, ihe ngosipụta nke BBC ' dabere na akwụkwọ akụkọ John Lanchester dere nke otu aha.
Na 2016, ọ pụtara na ', ihe omume nke ngosi bụ ".
"
Mosaku meriri 2017 maka ime ka Gloria Taylor na ihe nkiri onyonyo bụ "" .
Ndụ ya niime.
Mgbe ajụrụ ya ka o depụta ndị ọ na-asọpụrụ, Mosaku gụnyere nne nne ya bụ Anike Adisa, bụ onye ọ kọwara dịka onye "kuziri m ọtụtụ ihe"; onye ọrụ ihe nkiri onye bụ onye gbara ya ume maka ịga ; onye ọrụ ibe ya na onye nkụzi mbụ na RADA, ; , onye ọ masịrị, ọ bụghị naanị maka ime ihe nkiri, kamakwa maka mbọ enyemaka ya site na ; na , onye Mosaku weere dị ka "nwaanyị siri nnukwu ike.
"
Winnie Gofit a makwaara dị ka Winifred Gofit (amụrụ na Mee 22, 1994) bụ onye egwuregwu igba mgba na Naijiria.
Ọ bụ onye nrite ọla edo nke na 2017 na 2018.
O burukwa onye nrite ọla ọcha nke Commonwealth Wrestling Championship.
Aha Winnie sonyere na Nigerian Judo Hall Of Fame dị ka nwanyị kachasị elu na Nigeria Judo Federation.
Ọrụ egwuregwu.
N’afọ 2017, ọ ritere ọla edo n’ihe omume nke n’egwuregwu asọmpi nke emere na , Morocco.
Nakwa na 2017, ọ nọchitere Naijiria anya na asọmpi nke emere na , wee rite ọla ọcha na ihe omume ụmụ nwaanyị nke 72kg.
Na 2018, o ritere nrite ọla edo na mmemme nke ụmụ nwanyị n'arọ 72kg n'asọmpi nke nke emere na Port Harcourt, Naijiria.
Yvonne Losos de Muñiz (amụrụ na 8 Septemba, 1967 na Ịbadan, Naijiria) bụ onye gara Olympik na-eme egwuregwu ịnya ịnyịnya a na-akpọ Grand Prix , ọ na-agbare na-anọchite anya ndị .
O so na ndi egwuregwu a ma ama na otu egwuregwu Dominican Olympik bụ .
O meriri ọla nchara na egwuregwu nke emere na Rio de Janeiro, Brazil ya na ịnyịnya aha ya bụ Bernstein.
Site na nrite ahụ, o megharịrị ihe ọ rụpụtara site na emere na obodo ya, ebe o nwetakwara ọla nchara ya na ịnyịnya aha ya bụ Inatana.
Tupu akara ya Pan Am, Losos de Muñiz nwetakwara ọla edo abụọ na ọla nchara na egwuregwu emere na Central American n'afọ 2002 na .
Na 2010 o tinye ọla ọcha abụọ na nchịkọta ya na Central American na Caribbean Games nke mere na Mayagüez, Puerto Rico.
Na 2010, o jiri ịnyịnya si Austria aha ya bụ Optimus Prime tozuọ maka asọmpi World Equestrian Games (WEG).
Na elu nrite mmeri iri na abụọ ya, o nwetala ọtụtụ mmeri na Grand Prix na Small Tour na mmemme mba ụwa emere na , Sunshine Tour (Spain), France na Germany.
A zụrụ ya azụ na ịnya ịnyịnya n'aka Jean Bemelmans - onye isi na egwuregwu ahụ, onye zụkwara ndị otu egwuregwu Spanish, yana Harry Boldt si Germany, Jeff Ashton Moore si USA, Carl Hester si England, Diederik Wigmans si Netherlands, Ton de Ridder si Germany, Jose Antonio Garcia Mena na Severo Jurado si Spain, Andreas Helgstrand si Denmark na onye kọọchị ya ugbu a bụ Kathy Priest si United States.
Losos de Muñiz Zọrọ mpi na na Rio de Janeiro, na-aghọ onye egwuregwu ịnyịnya mbụ si Dominican Republic sonyere na egwuregwu Olympik.
Mgbe agbasoro mmeri n'ọtụtụ emume mba ụwa na Wellington, Florida n'oge Adequan Global Dressage Festival nke 2018, ọ tozuru oke - ya na ịnyịnya Belgium a na-akpo Foco Loco W - na katigọrị otu onye maka mba ndị na-abụghị njikọ FEI Dressage World cup emere na Paris, France.
Ntinye aka ya na mmemme ahụ gosipụtara oge mbụ onye na-agba ịnyịnya si Central America na Caribbean na-asọmpi na mmemme mba ụwa.
Na July 2018, o ritere ọla edo abụọ na egwuregwu Central American na Caribbean Games nke emere na Colombia, ma ritekwa otu ọla ọcha maka ndị otu ya dị ka onye isi ịnya ịnyịnya maka otu mba Dominican Republic.
Na mmemme a ọ nọkwasịrị n'elu ịnyịnya a na-akpọ Fredensdals Zig Zag si Denmark ma ọ bụ Kathy Priest nwekwa ya.
Agbanyeghị na o jiri ịnyịnya abụọ wee toro asọmpi ịnya ịnyịnya nke 2018, mmerụ ubu gbochiri ya isonye, ma mee ka laa ezumike maka ọnwa abụọ ka ọ ghara ịgba ịnyịnya kpam kpam.
Na 2019, ọ sonyere na asọmpi FEI Dressage World Cup Final nke emere na Gothenburg, Sweden, ma tozuo oke dịka otu onye maka asọmpi Olimpik 2020, nke ewezugara ya ugbu a ga 2021.
Na 2019 ọ sonyekwara na Pan American Games emere na Lima, Peru, ebe ọ gbaara onye nke anọ na nke katigọri nke ikpeazụ.
Ọ gara n'ihu na asọmpi ya n'oge 2020, mgbe ọ meriri ọla ọcha maka katigọri otu onye ịnyịnya ya bụ Aquamarijn na FEI Nations Cup emere na Wellington, Florida.
N'oge oyi, ọ na-azọọ asọmpi dressage a na-eme na .
N'oge ọkọchị ọ na-azọ mpi mgbe niile na European circuit ma na Canada.
A na-ahọrọ ya n'ime mmadu iri kachasị elu na FEI World Dressage Rankings, naanị ya bụ onye Latin Amerika na enweta nke a.
Na Septemba 2020, ọ nwetara ọmarịcha ọla edo nke asọpụrụ sitere na International Equestrian Federation (FEI), dị ka mmata nke ọtụtụ nsonye ya na asọmpi Olympik ndị mere eme, Continental Championship, World Cup Finals na Nations Cup, nke a mere ya-aghọrọ onye egwuregwu a mbụ na Latin Amerika ịnata oke a.
Dị ka onye na-enye ọzụzụ, ọ kụziiri ọtụtụ ndị na-agba ịnyịnya na Latin America na Europe ka ọ bụrụ ihe ngosi kachasị elu na mmemme mba ụwa na asọmpi kọntinent, kita, ụmụ akwụkwọ ya abụọ, Virginia Yarur si Chile na Patricia Ferrando si Venezuela, nọ na ndepụta ndị tozuru maka Egwuregwu Olympik nke 2021 .
Ọ bụ onye otu International Dressage Riders Club, yana onye ritere USDF ọla edo, ọcha na nchara.
Nne na nna Losos de Muñiz si Canada ma na ha nwere mgbọrogwu nke Germany na Poland.
O tolitere na Uganda na Kenya .
Ọ malitere ịnya inyịnya mgbe ọ ka bụ nwa agbọghọ na Germany tupu ọ kwaga Canada.
O bi na Dominican Republic kemgbe 1990 ya na di ya onye amaala Dominican Republic; Ọ na-asụ Bekee, German, Spanish, na Swahili.
Ivory Nwokorie Sọlọmọn bụ onye Naijiria n'ebụ powerlifter,ọ bụ ya ritere nrite ọlaedo na ibu n'arọ iri anọ na anọ nke ụmụ nwanyi n'afọ 2012 Summer Paralympics na London, England.
A machibidoro ya iwu ruo afọ abụọ na 2013, maka o bụtere Furosemide .
Ọrụ.
Ivory Nwokorie zọrọ asọmpi Naịjirịa na 2012 Summer Paralympics na London, England.
Mgbe o bụlichara 109 kilograms (240 lb), o ritere nrite ọla edo.
Nke a bụ ọla edo nke abụọ maka Naịjirịa na egwuregwu, nke gara nke ọma karịa na 2012 Summer Olimpịk .
Mgbe ọ laghachitere Naịjirịa, akpọrọ ya onye otu na Order of the Niger, n'akụkụ nke ọ bụla n'ime ndị ọzọ nwetara nrite ọla edo na Naịjirịa na 2012 Paralympics.
Ha nyekwara ha onye nke ọ bụla nde naịra nde ise nke gọvụmentị, n'ihi ọganiihu ha.
Nwokorie nwetara mmachi afọ abụọ na mma nke € 1,500, mgbe o nyesịrị nlezianya na adịghi mma na 23 Febụwari n'afọ 2013 na 5th Fazaa International Powerlifting Competition.
Ihe nlele gosiputatara na o bụ Furosemide, mmachibido iwu ahụ pụtara na ọ nweghị ike i zọọ mpi n'etiti 19 Eprel 2013 na 18 Eprel 2015.
Isabella Agbor Ayuk bụ onye nlere anya na Naijiria, onye na-eme ihe nkiri na ndị na-enyere ndị mmadụ aka.
Ọ bụ nwanyị mara mma na mbụ na onye mmeri nke Most Beautiful Girl in Nigeria Universe 2012 .
Ndụ mbido.
Amụrụ ya na ezinụlọ ọtụtụ nwanyị, Ayuk bụ nke iri abụọ n'ime ụmụaka iri abụọ na anọ.
Ọ mụrụ Nchịkwa azụmahịa na Mahadum Calabar, na-agụsị akwụkwọ na 2011, ma na-eje ozi ugbu a dị ka onye youth corper.
Tupu o nwee mmeri MBGN, ọ bụbu onye amaala aka na asọmpi nke 2009 na 2010, yana Miss Nigeria 2004, Miss South South 2007, na Miss Global Nigeria 2009.
Dị ka otu n'ime ndị asọmpi ole na ole na-anọchite anya steeti ha si.
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị ole na ole na-abụghị South East nwetere aha ahụ kemgbe Celia Bissong na 2003 na Agbani Darego 2001 ndi niile si South-South.
MGBN.
Ayuk okpueze Onye kacha mara mma na Nigeria na emume emere na Best Western Hotel na Benin City na Mee 2012 Ihe gbadoro ụkwụ ya n’ebe a bụ Ọgwụ Typhoid maka ncheta nwanne ya nwaanyị nwụrụ n’ọrịa ahụ.
Esemokwu.
Ka ọ na-erule na njedebe nke Mee 2012, a kọọrọ na Ayuk ghaghaara afọ ya iji nwee ike ịsọ mpi na asọmpi ahụ (ekwuru na ọ dị afọ iri atọ mgbe o mechara merie aha ahụ mgbe ọ sonyere na mbipụta ndị gara aga), o si otú a na-ewebata nnukwu mpaghara ihere na-ebelata kemgbe 2001 ka achupuru Valerie Peterside dika Miss Nigeria maka ụdị ihe ahụ Ọ bụ ezie na Ayuk n'onwe ya ka na-ekwu okwu, ndị na-ahazi Silverbird abịawo na-agbachitere ya site n'ikwu na n'adịghị ka nkwenkwe ndị mmadụ na-ewu ewu, Ayuk apụtaghị n'ọchịchị ma ga-aga n'ihu na-achị dị ka MBGN 2012.
Ọ nọchiteghi anya Naịjirịa na Miss World, mana onye nọchiri anya MBGN 2012 bụ Damiete Charles-Granville nọchiri ya
Ifunanya Debbie "Ify" Ibekwe (amuru na 5 Oktoba afọ 1989) bu nwaafọ Naijiria amuru ya na amerịka na aturu ndi Virtus Eirene Ragusa na Naijiria D'Tigresss basketball
WNBA.
A họpụtara Ibekwe na agba nke abụọ nke WNBA Draft 2011 (nke iri abụọ na anọ) site na Seattle Storm .
Pheelz
Aha Phillip Kayode Moses
Amaara ya dịka Pheelz Mr. Producer
Amụrụ Juunu 5, 1994 (afọ 26)
Legọọsụ, Naịjirịa
Ebe osi Legọọsụ
Nkenụụdị 
Afuropọpụ
Afurobiiti
Afrịkan hipụ họpụ
Jazị
Hipụ họpụ
Rapụ
RnB
Aka ọrụ Mmepụta ndekọ egwu, Odee egwu 
Ngwa egwu Pịyano, Igba, Jita
Afọ ọ nọ ọrụ 2012–ugbua
Lebeelụ YBNL Nation
Ndị egwu 
Olamide
Lil Kesh
Adekunle Gold
Teni
Fireboy DML
Phillip Kayode Moses (onye amụrụ na Juunu 5, 1994) nke amara nke oma dịka Pheelz, bụ onye na-emepụta ihe na Naịjirịa na onye na-ede egwu ya ọtụtụ ndi na eme ihe egwu na ndi egwu, dịks Olamide, Tiwa Savage na ndi nile no n’etiti.
Amụrụ ma zụlite ya na Legọọsụ, ekwere na Pheelz mepụtara egwu niile nanị otu egwu ka ọ na-ewepụtaghị na abọm Olamide "Baddest Guy Ever Liveth" . . 
Ndụ mbido.
Pheelz bụ onye Ogun steeti mana a mụrụ ya ma tolite na Ojo, okpuru ọchịchị ime obodo dị na Lagos Steeti .
Ọ malitere egwu dị ka onye na-agụ egwú na afọ iri na chọọchị.
Mgbe ọ nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndịrị na ajangbandi afromedia.
Pheelz gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Ideal Comprehensive high school ms mechaa ruo n'okpuru ID Cabassa na Coded Tunes, akara ndekọ ebe ọ zutere Olamide.
N’afọ 2011, o gosipụtara olu n’abụ egwu Olamide "Rapsodi" abọm akpọrọ “I 'm going in".
Ọrụ.
Ọganihu ya dị ka onye na-edekọ ndekọ bịara na 2012, mgbe o mepụtara otu egwu Olamide akpọrọ "First ofAll" na "Fucking with the Devil" site na abọm "YBNL" ya.
Na 2013, Pheelz pụtara na "NotJustOk "' ndị ndekọ egwu iri nọ n'elu na Naịjirịa".
O mepụtara egwu niile naanị ka ọ emepụtaghị na Olamide "Baddest Guy Ever Liveth" abọm, "mmegharị" nke mere ka o kwudosịa ike n'ụlọ ọrụ egwu nke Naịjirịa ma merie na nhọpụta nke The Headies 2013 .
Na 2014, ahọpụtara dịka "onye mmepụta egwu nke Afọ" na 2014 mbipụta nke The Headies na na "2014 Naịjirịa Entertainment Awards" .
Pheelz agafeela wee mepụta ma tinye aha ya na egwu na ọba egwu ama ama gụnyere "The Chairman nke" MI, "Ghetto University" site na Runtown na "Seyi ma ọ bụ Shay" nke Seyi Shay .
Na 2014, Pheelz rụkọrọ ọrụ ya na COPILOT Music and Sound na mkpuchi Carlinhos Brown "Maria Caipirnha (Samba da Bahia)".
Nhazi a
ahụ gosipngwa a eji egwu na ụdịNịjirịaigeria maka Visa "of the Worldae "wa", mkpọsa dijitalụ maka 2014 FIFA World Cup .
Uche Kalu onye amụrụ n'abalị̀ iri na isii n'ime ọnwa Mee n'afọ 1986 bụ nwaafọ Nigeria n'agba bọọlụ, ọ na-agbara ndị Altyn Asyr FK na Turkmenistan Higher League .
Ya na onye buburu onye otu Enyimba bụ Henry Uche ma ọ bụ onye otu egwuregwu Naịjirịa bụ midfilda na-agbara mba ụwa nọ India bụ Kalu Uche abụghị nwanne.
Ọrụ.
N’afọ 2007, akpọrọ ya  dị ka "ọgba bọọlu kachasị dị mkpa na premịa Liigi Naịjirịa dịka o sonyechere Enyimba site na otu ọkwa nke abụọ bụ Bussdor United FC N'afọ ole na ole sochirinụ ọ nọ na-ejikwa mmerụahụ ọ nwere.Ka Mgbalị igafe na otu Botola na Wydad Casablanca na February 2012, ọ laghachiri Enyimba.
Ọ gawara otu Turkish nke abụọ bụ Çaykur Rizespor na August 2012, wee nye goolu ma nye aka na nwulite okwe mbụ ya.
Na Jenụwarị 2014, Uche Kalu sonyeere Adanaspor ná nkwekọrịta mbinye ego.
N'ọnwa Jenụwarị 2015, Kalu gàrà nwale na Kazakhstan Premier League wezugaFC Tobol, Ọ binyere aka nkwekọrịta otu afọ na klọb a n'abalị isii n'ime ọnwa February 2015.
Kalu laghachiri na Adanaspor na Jenụwarị 2016, wee debanye nkwekọrịta otu afọ na ụmia ise.
Na 24 Eprel 2016 Adanaspor wetara ikike isonye na okwe mbụ Turkish ka afọ iri na abụọ gachara.
Kalu Uche sonyere gba nnukwu mbọ na akụkọ ọma a. 
Na August 2019, Uche Kalu nke Niger na Kenya Peter Opiyo binyere aka na nkwekọrịta FC Altyn Asyr si Turkmenistan .
Nke a bụ onye egwuregwu bọọlụ mbụ si mba ofesi na akụkọ gbasara klọb a na 2019 Ýokary Liga .
Ọrụ mba ụwa.
Ọ bụ onye otu B Naịjirịa ndị meriri na WAFU Nations Cup 2010 .
Nkwudosike ya mere ka onye nchịkwa klọb Naịjitịa bụ Stephen Keshi kpọlite ya na 2012.
Ọ gbara okwe mbụ ya na Eagles n'enweghị goolu ọbụla,megide Angola na Jenụwarị 2012.
O nyere goolu nke mbụ ya na egwuregwu enyi na enyi ha gbara n'afọ ahụ megide Egypt .
Yewande Adekoya (amụrụ na 20 Jenuwarị 1984), bụ Nwaanyị Naijiria n'eme ọrụ ihe nkiri, onye n’eduzi ihe nkiri, na onye na-emeputa ihe nkiri.
Mmalite ndu na mmuta.
A mụrụ Yewande na Lagos Steeti mana o si Ososa-Ijebu na Ogun Steetị ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ Naijiria.
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ ọta akara na ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị Bright star, tupu ọ gaa ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Bright Star Comprehensive High School.
O nwetara nzere bachelọ (BA) na site na .
Yewande Adekoya lụrụ di muta ụmụ.
Ọrụ.
Yewande Adekoya bidoro ime ihe nkiri n’afọ 2002 ya na otu ụlọ ihe nkiri bụ Alphabash Music And Theater Group.
Ọ depụtara ma mepụta ọrụ mbụ ya na 2006 akpọrọ “Life Secret”.
O mepụtala, duzie ma gosipụta n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri dịka "", ihe nkiri 2012 nke gosipụtara , na .
Ihe nkiri ahụ natara nhọpụta ise na .
A họpụtakwara ya maka "onye ọhụụ kachasị mma" na ngalaba Yoruba na 2014 .
N'otu afọ ahụ, ọrụ ya na "Kudi Klepto" nwetara ya nhọpụta nke nwaanyị ihe nkiri kachasị mma na mmemme .
N’ọnwa Disemba afọ 2014, o ritere “onye ga-eme ofuma n'oge n'adighi anya” na mmemme nke Yoruba Movie Academy Awards.
Ihe nkiri ya bụ "Kurukuru" nwetara ya onyinye nsọpụrụ onye ihe nkiri kacha mma na mmemme ihe nkiri nke 2016 ACIA.
N’afọ 2017, ihe nkiri ya bụ "Iyawo Adedigba" nwetara ya onyinye nsọpụrụ ọzọ maka “ihe nkiri kacha mma nke afọ ahụ” na 2017 .
Yinka Davies (onye amụrụ na Julaị 16, 1970) bụ nwaafọ Naijirịa nke na-eme ụda olu, na-agba egwu, bụrụ abụ na onye ọka ikpe nke ihe nkiri ".
" Yinka nọrọ na ọrụ ihe nkiri Naịjirịa kemgbe afọ iri abụọ na asatọ.
Nkwụpụta.
"Nkwụpụta – "Time has come to speak up for ourselves""
Ozi ndabere.
Nna ya - si ala Benin Republic/Sierra Leone ezinụlọ Lisabi ma kwagara Lagos n'ihi na ọ bụbụ onye Naijiria.
Nne ya - si Ikorodu, Lagos Steeti.
Nnenne nna ya - sitere na ezinụlọ eze ndị Shagamu
Isi mmalite a metụtara usoro egwu ya.
Ọ na-echeta na nna ya nwere jita.
O tolitere na ụda nke , , na mgbe ọ na-etolite n'ihi na nke a bụ egwu nna ya nwere mmasị ige ntị.
Ka ọ na-etolite na 1970s na 1980s, redio dị na ụlọ nne nne ya na-ege ntị mgbe niile na Radio Lagos nke na-akụ ọtụtụ egwu Afrika site na (Cameroun - Makossa), Mmaman Shatta (onye na-akụ egwu si Ugwu Hausa na Naijria), Dan Maria Jos ( si Ugwu Hausa na Naijria), (si ndida Naijiria - highlife), Hadjia Funtua (si Ugwu Hausa na Naijria), (si ndida Naijiria - Joromi), Fela (si ndida Naijiria - Afrobeat) ma ndị ọzọ.
Ọ echetakwara ilele onye ọrụ televishọn bụ (nna ) onye nwere mmemme onyonyo a ma ama nke akpọrọ Bar Beach Show nke gosipụtara ọtụtụ ndị egwu ma ndị nke ya.
Ọ bịara doo Yinka anya na enwere ụkọ ụmụ nwanyị na-akụ egwu- n’afọ 1980 ka o gere Salawa Abeni (Yoruba) na Dora Ifudu (onye egwu ama ama n’egwu RnB) onye bụ otu n’ime ụmụnwaanyị na-akụ egwu ọrụ ha metutara ya.
Ọrụ ụda olu na iti egwu.
Ihụnanya mbụ ya n’ezie bụ eserese na ịkpụzi; ịbụ onye na-eti egwu abụghị ihe kacha ya mkpa na mbụ.
N eshi Ista Mọnde nke 1987 bụ mbido njem ya na nka mgbe ọ gara na National Theatre nke Lagos ịchọpụta maka ịbụ onye na-ese ihe.
Ọ gara izute Abiodun Olaku, onye ama ama na-ese ihe na Naịjirịa.
Emechara Bassey Effiong (onye isi ihe nkiri) nyere ya ọrụ aka ka ọ mepụta ọtu ihe esese maka mmepụta ya nke akpọọrọ Marriage of Anansewa nke dere.
N'oge nleta ọ gara na ụlọ ihe nkiri nke National Theatre,Yinka jekwutere (onye na-agba egwu si Ghana) bụ onye na akuzi nkuzi maka ịgba egwu - ọ bụ ya gbaara ya ume ka ọ bụrụ onye na-agba egwu.
Elizabeth Hammond na Christie Essien Igbokwe rụkọrọ ọrụ onye nke merịrị ọlaọcha na mmemme 6th Seoul Songs Festival na South Korea na 1983.
Dị ka Yinka si kwuo ya, ọ bụ otú o si "gbawaa door" ụdị nka dị iche iche.
Mmalite iti egwu/abụ.
N'afọ 1992, ndị na-ahazi hụrụ ya dịka onye ọrụ gburugburu ebe ọ nọ na-eme ihe nkiri, ihe nkiri onyonyo, ihe nkiri olu, ụda olu dị iche iche maka ndị egwu Naịjirịa dị iche iche wee họpụta ya ma nye ya onyinye nsọpụrụ mbụ ha nke bụ Upcoming Artist Award.
Ndị nlekọta otu klọb na Lagos, Bread and Butter Jazz club gụnyere ya na ngosi ikpeazụ dị ka klọb na mbọ ịmebata onye egwu ọhụụ akpọrọ , ọ sonyere na mmepụta record mbụ Lagbaja a nke akpọrọ "Side by Side" nke ewepụtara na 1993.
O mechara lekwasị anya na egwu n'ihi na nke a na-eri ya oge.
Ọ bụ n'oge a ka ya na ọtụtụ ndị egwu rụkọrọ ọrụ gunyere Mike Okri (RnB), Shina Peters (Afro juju), Blackky (Reggae) na ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ.
Nnukwu oti-egwu ọzọ ya na ya rụkọrọ ọrụ bụ (nke sitere na Sierra Leone) na Etienne T Boy (Cameroon) onye ya na Pino rụkọrọ ọrụ.
Jenụwarị 21, 1994 ka Yinka nwere ihe mberede nke ụgbọ ala dị ukwuu mgbe ọ na-agafe n'okporo ụzọ.
N'okwu ya, ọ "gafere okporo ụzọ wee kụọ ụgbọ ala".
Nke a kpatara nnukwu ịwa ahụ nke metụtara igba-egwu ya.
Mkpalite ume.
Ezinụlọ siri ike dị ka ọ na-ebu ọrụ ilekọta ụmụnne ya anya mgbe ha ka dị obere.
Nna ya so na ọrụ Nigerian Airforce mere mgbe ọ bụ nwatakịrị ha na-agagharị ọtụtụ ebe nna ya nọ n'arụ ọrụ dị iche iche na Naijiria.
Ọ na-echeta nke ọma ebe akpọrọ 9th Mile nke dị na Enugu ebe ụzọ kewara ụzọ atọ na-eduga na North, South, na East nke obodo Naijiria.
9th Mile dị ka ebe nzukọ, ya mere, ọ bụ ebe dị mkpa nke ọdịbendị niile nke Naijiria na e jekọ.
Ahụmịhe ndị a niile ọ nwetara metụtara usoro iti egwu ya.
WurlD
Aha Sadiq Onifade
Amụrụ Legọọsụ, Naịjirịa

Sarz
Website www.wurldmusic.com
Sadiq Onifade, onye akacha mara dịka WurlD, bụ onye Naijiria na-eti egwu na onye na-ede egwu.
Amụrụ ya na Legọọsụ, Naịjirịa, WurlD kwagara Atlanta, Georgia iji gaa ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ma dekọọ egwu.
Ọ na-akọwa ụdị egwu ya dị ka elektro-fuchọn.
Ọ wepụtara egwu izizi ya "Evolution" na 2013.
Ndụ mbido.
Amụrụ ya na Legọọsụ, Naịjirịa, WurlD kwagara na US dịka onye na-eto eto wee nata agụmakwụkwọ kọleji ya na Mahadum Georgia Steeti, ọ na-agụ kọmputa Sayensị.
Mgbe WurlD nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ, ọ bịara nwee nnukwu mmasị na arụmọrụ egwu.
Ọrụ.
Na ngwụcha 2012, WurlD wepụtara otu egwu nke mbụ ya, "Beyond Our Dreams" site na mbido egwu mbụ ya bụ EP "Evolution", n'oge okpomọkụ 2013.
Na ndakọ na egwu ya ahụ, SESAC mere nnọkọ egem ntị na Atlanta ọfisi maka "Evolution" EP nke WurlD na-abịa.
na mbido 2013, WurlD na Mario nọ na studiyo na-edekọ egwu maka R&amp;B nke na-abịa.
N'oge na-adịghị anya, vidiyo egwu maka "Evolution nke" abụọ, "Alive" ka ebuputara site na MTV : The Wrap Up na 2 Mee 2013.
WurlD jikọtara ya na onye Timbaland, BK Brasco dị ka onye egosipụtara na "Beautiful Girls.
" Ọ pụtara na onyonyo egwu ahụ.
Na Mee 2016 WurlD wepụtara "Show You off" ihe ndekọ Afuro nke mmụọ na-egosipụta Walshy Fire nke Major Lazer na onye mmepụta Afuro-Biiti bụ Shizzi .
Na Juunu 2016 WurlD weputara egwu etikọrịta ọnụ "Better Days Ahead" ya na Sir Felix; ọ ghọrọ ukwe ala maka DelfSail 2016.
WurlD (Sadiq Onifade) dekọrịta egwu a bụ "Blow my mind" nke Davido gosipụtara Chris Brown na 2019.
Emepụtara egwu a site na onye na-eme ihe nkiri Davido ogologo oge Shizzi.
Awọdụ na mmata.
Na 2015 WurlD gara ọla edo kwadoro ya na Sony Music nke egwu a "Follow You" na onye Polish DJ, Gromee na 2017, ọ natara nhọpụta maka ""Best Diaspora Act" na "Nigerian Entertainment Award"" n'akụkụ Rotimi na Wale .
Ọ nwere otu egwu dara ụdaugbu a na-akpọ 'Trobul'
Ihe nkiri.
Ndị egwu.
ịarab
Di'Ja

Lebeelụ Mavin Records
Ndị egwu 
Don Jazzy

Reekado Banks
Korede Bello
D'Prince
Hadiza Blell, onye amara aha ọgbọ ya dịka Di'Ja, bụ onye Naịjirịa na-eti egwu na onye na-ede egwu na Naịjirịa .
Ọ bịanyere aka na "Mavin Records" ugbu a .
Na 2009, ọ wepụtara otu egwu nke mbu ya bu "Rock Steady", nke a hoputara maka "Best Urban / R &amp; B Single" na 2009 Canadian Redio Muziki Awọdụ".
Ọzọkwa, ọ meriri ihe nrite ọkacha ọhụụ onye egwu na 2008 Biiti Muziki Awọdụ.
Ndụ mbido.
Di'Ja ebiela na Naịjirịa, Sierra Leone, United Steeti na Canada .
Nne ya si ugwu Hausa Naịjirịa ma nna ya si Sierra Leone .
Di'Ja nwetara akara ugo mmụta na bayoloji na akparamaagwa .
Ọrụ egwu.
Ọrụ egwu ya malitere na 2008.
Na 2012, Di'Ja weputara ọtụtụ otu egwu, gụnyere "Dan'Iska (Rudebwoy)", "Hold On (Ba Damuwa)" na "How Can We Be Friend".
Na Febuwarị 14, 2014, Di'Ja bịanyere aka na ndekọ egwu nke Don Jazzy "Mavin Records".
"Yaro", otu egwu mbụ ya pụtara n'otu ụbọchị ahụ.
Ọ na-enye olumba Hausa na Krio ịkwanyere Naịjirịa na Sierra Leone ugwu.
Na Mee 2014, e gosipụtara Di'Ja na " Dorobucci " n'akụkụ ndị ọrụ akara ha Don Jazzy, Dr SID, Tiwa Savage, D'Prince, Korede Bello na Reekado Banks .
E gosikwara ya na "Arise", ya na Don Jazzy na Reekado Banks.
Na Disemba 15, 2017, Di'Ja weputara egwu ya "Aphrodija", nke gosipụtara ndị egwu ọzọ bụ Tiwa Savage na Reekado Banks.
Fireboy DML
Fireboy DML na Wazobia Max TV na-akparịta ụka na Machị 2019
Nkọwa Onwe
Aha Adedamola Adefolahan
Amaara ya dịka Fireboy
Amụrụ 1996/1997
Ogun Steeti, Naịjirịa
Nkenụụdị Afurobiiti, R&amp;B
Aka ọrụ 
Otii egwu
Odee egwu
Afọ ọ nọ ọrụ 2012-ugbua
Lebeelụy YBNL Nation, Empire Distribution
Ndi egwu Olamide
Website fireboydml.com
Adedamola Adefolahan (amụrụ n’afọ 1996/1997), amaara nke ọma dịka Fireboy DML, bụ onye na-eti egwu na onye na-ede egwu na Naịjirịa .
O binyere aka na YBNL Nation, ụlọ ndekọ egwu nọrọ onwe ya bụ nke onye na-akụ egwu Naịjirịa bụ Olamide guzobere .
Studio Abọm "izizi ya bụ Laughter, Tears and Goosebumps" pụtara na 2019.
O meriri "Listener's Choice ma họpụta ya maka egwu nke afọ maka "Jealousy" na mmemme 2020 Soundcity MVP .
Ọrụ.
2018–wepụtara: "Jealous" and "Laughter, Tears and Goosebumps".
Fireboy DML toro na Abeokuta ma bụrụkwa onye otu ndị otu ukwe nke ụka ya.
Ọ bịara nwee mmasị na egwu mgbe ọ na-agụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Obafemi Awolowo.
Egwu ya bụ "Jealous" nke buputere ya, pụtara mbụ na YBNL Nation abọm Ntikọ "YBNL Mafia Family" (2018), tupu eweghachi ya na 25 Machị 2019.
E ji ngwa egwu ndịa bụ jita, ịgba ọmenala na ndị mmadụ; ọ na-agwakọta egwu ndị Afrịka na ihe ndị dị na mba na egwu mkpụrụ obi.
Ọ bụ Cracker Mallo mepụtara "Jealous" ma ọ bụ maka ịhụnanya na mmetụta mgbagwoju anya nke ịhụnanya.
Ihe nkiri maka "Jealous" bụ Director K duziri ya.
Na 14 Juunu 2019, Fireboy DML wepụtara egwu ịhụnanya "What if I say". . Ọ bụ pheelz rụpụtara ya Ihe nlere anya nke “What if I say” bụ TG Omori duziri ya.
Na 1 Ọgụstụ 2019, Fireboy DML wepụtara otu egwu "King" n'ime ya, ọ na-ekwupụta uru ọ bara maka mmasị ịhụnanya ya.
VG egwu na-esonye "King" bụ TG Omori duziri ya ; o gosiri na ihe onyonyo Fireboy na mmasi ihunanya ya na Rolls Royce e ji fụlawa dozie, ya na kwa ebe ọ na-eti egwu na ihe ngosi ndị nlereanya na-aga ije.
Fireboy DML wepụtara abọm studio izizi ya "Laughter, Tears and Goosebumps" na 29 Nọvemba 2019.
E bu ụzọ hazie ka e wepụta ya na 25 Nọvemba.
Egwú di na abọm ahụ bụ akara nke R&amp;B na nke ịhụnanya na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya site na ịde egwu .
"LTG" mejupụtara egwu iri na atọ ma ọ nweghị onye omenkà ọbula ya na ya tikọrọ egwu; ọ kpokọtara ihe karịrị nde isii na Spotify ụbọchị nke atọ ka wepụtachara ya.
Ọ natara ntụle dị mma maka egwu ya site na ndị na-akatọ egwu, mana akatọchara ya n'ihi na akpọrọ ya ndekọ "Afuro-Laịf" karịa ọba egwu R&amp;B.
"LTG" bụ ndị egwu ewepụtara bụ ihe kwadoro ya "Jealous" "What if I say" na "King".
Na Ọgụstụ 17, 2020, Fireboy wepụtara usoro egwu abọm ya ọzọ, 'Apollo.
Fireboy DML akpọwo Jon Bellion, Passenger na Wande Coal dị ka ndị ọgbara ọhụrụ ọ na-elegara anya.
Nkà.
Fireboy DML na-akọwa ụda ya dị ka "Afro-Life" wee kwuo na ọ na-ede egwu ndị na-ege ntị nwere ike ịkọ.
Alphonse Pierre nke "Pitchfork" kọwara ụda ya dị ka "egwu nwayọ" wee kwuo na ọ "na-akọ akụkọ banyere ịhụnanya na usoro nhazi nke "Hallmark Christmas romance".
Na omenala.
Na 2020, a gụnyere egwu Fireboy DML na egwu FIFA 21.
Hajiya Turai Umar Musa Yar'Adua (amụrụ ya na 26 Jụlai afọ 1957) bụ nwaanyị di ya nwụrụ nke bubu onye isiala nke Naijiria bubu Katsina Steeti gọvanọ Umaru Musa Yar'Adua .
Ọ bụ Nwanyị mbụ nke Naijiria site na 2007 ruo ọnwụ nke di ya, onye isiala Yar'Adua, na Mee 5, 2010.
Mmụta.
A mụrụ Turai Yar'Adua na mpaghara obodo ukwu nke Katsina nke dị na mgbago ugwu Naịjirịa na Julaị 1957.
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ gọvụmentị ụmụ nwanyị na Kankiya dịka nwatakịrị.
Turai Yar'Adua gara ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị Garama na Katsina na gọvụmentị Secondary School dị na Kankia, ha abụọ dị na steeti Katsina.
O mechara debanye aha na Katsina College of Arts, Science and Technology na Zaria, Kaduna steeti, ebe a na-akọ na a kpọrọ ya "nwa akwụkwọ kachasị mma" n'afọ 1980.
N’afọ 1983, Yar’adua nwetara akara ugo mmụta okokporo na asụsụ ya na Mahadum Ahmadu Bello .
Ndụ onwe.
Turai lụrụ Umaru Yar'Adua n'afọ 1975, ma ha nwere ụmụ nwanyị ise na ụmụ nwoke abụọ.
Ụmụ nwoke abụọ bụ Shehu Umaru Musa Yar'adua na Musa Umar Musa Yar'adua, Shehu bụ aha nwanne ya nwoke nke onye isiala Umaru Musa Yar '.
adua nke nwuru anwu.
Ma onye bụbu osote onyeisiala Naịjirịa.
Otu n’ime ụmụ ha nwaanyị aha ya bụ Zainab lụrụ Usman Saidu Nasamu Dakingari, Gọvanọ nke Steeti Kebbi .
Na Septemba afọ 2007, Turai bụ ọbịa na inye ikike ịnwe ụlọ ọrụ Mobility Aid na Braille Center dị n’Akure, Ondo Steeti .
Ọ bụ otu ụlọ ọrụ na-abụghị nke gọvụmentị ha were ụlọ ọrụ aka ọrụ bụ Handicapped Education Foundation (HANDEF) onye tọrọ ntọala bụ Olufunke Agagu, onye bụzị Nwanyị mbụ nke Ondo Steeti.
Ndị ọzọ sonyere na mmemme ahụ bụ nwunye osote onye isi ala, Patience Jonathan, na ndị nwunye ọtụtụ ndị gọvanọ steeti ndị ọzọ.
A nụrụ asịrị na Turai bụ otu n'ime ndị ndụmọdụ kacha di diya nso n'oge ọ bụ Onye isi ala nke Naijiria.
Ọmụmaatụ, Yar'Adua kwenyere na ọ metụtara nhọrọ Prọfesọ Babatunde Osotimehin, onye bụbu Director General nke National Action Committee on AIDS, dịka Minista Ahụike Naịjirịa n'oge ọchịchị di ya.
Ngozi Rosalin Monu (amụrụ 7 Jenụwarị 1981 na Lagos, Naijiria ) bụ onye Naịjirịa na- egwu mmiri .
Monu bu onye nwanyi na-egwu mmiri nke si Naijiria.
Ọ na-elekwasị anya na ihe omume 50m &amp; 100m freestyle.
Olimpik nke mbido ya bụ na 2000 Sidney Summer Olimpik .
O zoro aka na 2008 Summer Olimpik.
Uche Monu, nwanne ya nwanyị nke ọ tọrọ, bụkwa onye na-egwu mmiri nke na-anọchite anya Naịjirịa na ihe omume Backstroke na freestyle.
2000 Summer Olimpik.
Monu bidoro Olympiad ya na 2000 Summer Olimpik mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na itoolu.
O meriri okpomoku ya na freestyle nke ụmụ nwanyị 50 mita freestyle na oge nke 28.20s, mana ọ nọ n'ọnọdụ 57th n'ime ndị asọmpi nrite 92.
2007 World Aquatics championships.
Na World Aquatics Championship emere na Melbourne, Australia, Monu sonyere na 50m na oge nke 28.89 nọrọ n'ọkwa iri asato na atọ 100m freestyle na oge nke 1.01.88 nọrọ n'ọkwa iri asato na anọ .
Na kwa nọkejere ndi otu Naijiri na 400m freestyle na medley relays.
Egwuregwu Olimpik na 2008.
Na Beijing Monu nọchitere anya Naijiria nke ugboro abụọ isonye na otu mmemme.
Emechara 6th na okpomoọku ya na oge 27.39 nke dị mkpụmkpụ ịgafe na ọkwa ọzọ.
Agbanyeghị ọ bụ otu n'ime oge kachasị ọsọ nke nwanyị Naijiria na mmemme ahụ.
Toyin Enitan Raji (amụrụ n’ihe dị ka n’afọ 1972) bụ nwaafọ Naijiria nke meriri okpueze Kachasị Nwaanyị na Naịjirịa ma nọchitere obodo ya na Miss Universe n'afọ 1995 Miss World .
A zụlitere ya na Lagos.
Miss universe 1995.
Dị ka onye nnọchi anya gọvụmentị nke Naijiria na Miss Universe 1995 ihe ngosi, na-agbasa site na Windhoek, Namibia na Mee 12, n'afọ 1995, Raji tinyere 11th n'ogologo asọmpi mbido, 7th na nyocha mbụ na nke iri na abụọ na igwu mmiri, na-efu efu ọkara ikpeazụ na narị ise nke otu isi.
Augustine Masilela nke South Africa mere ịkpe na 10th ebe, ịgọnahụ Raji ohere nke ịghọ Naijiri mbụ Miss Universe ọkara finalist.
Ka o sina dị, Raji natara Ọchịchị Congeniality, tozuru oke site na ndi ya na ya zọrọ .
Miss World 1995.
Ọnwa ole na ole ka e mesịrị, Raji sonyere na asọmpi Miss World 1995, nke emere na Sun City, South Africa na Nọvemba 18, afọ 1995, bụ ebe ndị ọzọ na-asọmpi votu ya ọzọ dị ka onye kachasị mma, na-enweta akara ngosi Miss Personality Asusu, Otú ọ dị, ghọrọ achagharị mgbe ndi ọchichi South Africa nyere Raji nsogbu ka oji sepu aka maka esemokwu enwere na ndọrọndọrọ ọchichi onye isiala bụ Sani Abacha maka nkpebi owere igbu Mmadụ itoolụ mebiri iwu.
Ndụ onwe.
Mgbe ọ pụtara na ọtụtụ ihe nkiri Nollywood, Raji nwere nwa nwanyị wee hapụ mba ahụ biri na Texas, ebe ọ gụsịrị agụmakwụkwọ ma rụọ ọrụ na IT.
Shizzi
Shizzi na 2020
Nkọwa onwe
Aha Oluwaseyi Akerele
3 Dicemba 1984 (afọ 35)
Ibadan, Oyo Steeti, Naịjirịa
