Illbliss
Nkenụụdị Hipụ họpụ, Rapụ
Aka ọrụ Rapa, Ndekọ egwu, egwu, Azụmaahịa na Omee oyonyo.
Afọ ọ nọ ọrụ 2000–ugbua
Lebeelụ CAPital Hill Music/The Goretti Company
Illbliss, nke akpọrọ iLLBLISS, bụ onye egwu na-ede egwu / ndekọ hipụ-họpụ nke Naịjirịa, onye na -eme ihe nkiri, onye ọchụnta ego na onye nwe ụlọ ọrụ nchịkwa talentị nke akpọrọ " The Goretti Company ', ụlọ ọrụ hụrụ maka ịmalite ọrụ nke Chidinma na Phyno, na ndị ọzọ.
Amaakwara ya dịka "Oga Boss", ọ natara ọtụtụ nhọpụta na nweta akara ugo, nke ọkachamma na vidiyo Hipụ Họpụ (maka egwu ya "U Go Wound O !!
") N'afọ 2008 nke "Soundcity Music Video Awards" .
Onyinye e nyere ya bụ onye Amerịka na-eti egwu bụ Nas .
N’afọ 2019, ọ pụtara mbụ na ime ihe nkiri.
A hụrụ ya na ihe nkiri ndịa:&lt;/br&gt; "King of Boys" dịka Odogwu.
Abọm "izizi ya", ""Dat Ibo Boy"", nke pụtara na 2009, nke nwere, “Aiye Po Gan!
(Enuf Space) ".
Ọ wepụtara abọm ọhụrụ na Julaị 2020, "Illy Chapo X"
Small Doctor
na London
Nkọwa Onwe
Aha Adekunle Temitope
Amụrụ 27 Mee 1996
Legọọsụ, Naịjirịa
Ebe osi Ondo Steeti
Nkenụụdị 
Afurobiiti
afuropọpụ
Fuji
Aka ọrụ Singer and performer
Ngwa egwu 
Olu
Otii egwu
Afọ ọ nọ ọrụ 2012–ugbua
Lebeelụ OIT Dynasty Records
Ndi egwu 
Olamide
Da Emperor
DJ Lambo
ELDee
Adekunle Temitope (amụrụ ya n’abalị iri abụọ na asaa n’ọnwa Mee n’afọ 1996), onye amaara nke ọma dịka aha Small Doctor, bụ onye Naịjirịa na-eti egwu Fuji, afuro-pọpụ.
Small Doctor tiri egwu ọzọ nke: "Penalty" nke turu ugo nke "Ọkacha egwu nke Họpụ" na "The Headies" 2018 .
Egwu ya na-abụkarị na Bekee na Yoruba .
Mmalite ndụ na Agụmakwụkwọ.
A mụrụ Temitope na Dopemu, Legọọsụ mana ọ bụ onye Ondo Steeti .
O nwere mmasị dị ukwuu na egwu mgbe ọ dị obere.
Ọ gara Ain't Orosan Nọzịrị na Praịmarị Sukulu wee gaa Sekọndịrị na Oniwaya Sekọndịrị Sukulu.
N'ihi mmasị ya na egwu, ọ si na Mahadum Legọọsụ pụọ iji lekwasị anya na egwu oge niile.
Ọrụ.
Na 2012, ọrụ egwu ya malitere.
O wepụtara egwu dịka Gbagaun, Anobi, Penalty na Mosquito Killer.
2015 – ugbua: Street Ambassador Abọm.
Na 24 Julaị 2015, Small Doctor wepụtara studiyo abọm izizi ya "Street Ambassador".
Abọm ahụ gosipụtara ndị egwu ọzọ dịka Pasuma, Dre San na Young Legxy.
Nnwuchi.
Na 3 Disemba 2018, E jidere Small Doctor maka ebubo inwe egbe nakwa maka ikwu na ọ ga-agbagbu onye uwe ojii nọ n'ọrụ okporo ụzọ Oshodi, Legọọsụ.
N’ime otu ụbọchị, ụlọ ikpe dị n’Ebute kpochapụrụ ebubo niile e boro ya ma hapụ ya.
Omo Better Tour.
Small Doctor bidoro njem egwu mbụ ya na Naịjirịa akpọrọ "Omo Better Concert" na 9 Disemba 2018.
O gosipụtara nka ya na ámá egwuregwu Agege na Lagos nwere oche 20,000.
O gosipụtara nka egwu ya na London na kọnsatị emere na O2 Academy Islington na 9 Septemba 2018.
Mbianye aka.
Na 6 Epurel 2019, Ndị Winners Golden Bet gosipụtara Small Doctor dịka onye nnọchite anya ha.
Terry G
Aha Gabriel Oche Amanyi
Amaara ya dịka Akpako Master, Ginjah Master, Hitman
Amụrụ ya 17 Machị 1986 (afọ 34)
Benue Steeti
Nkenụụdị Chante-chante, afuro pọpụ dancehall
Aka ọrụ Otii egwu, Odee egwu, ndekọ egwu, mmepụta egwu, ọgbaa egwu.
Ngwa egwu Olu, Kiibọdụ jita piyano ịgba
Years active 2006–present
Lebeelụ TGP Entertainment, Black Wall Street
Ndị egwu D'Money, Jay Pizzle, Indomix, 9ice
Gabriel Oche Amanyi, nke amaara aha ya dịka Terry G, bụ onye egwu na onye na-emepụta egwu na Naịjirịa.
A maara ya nke ọma maka ejiji ndị ara ya, egwu ọgbaghara na njirimara sekeseke.
""The Punch" akọwaala ya" dịka "otu onye kachasị dị njọ anya n'ụwa," ndị "Vanguard" dịka "onye egwu dị njọ anya", ndị Channels TV dịka "onye egwu na-apụkarịsị ara na Naịjirịa".
N’afọ 2012, o wepụtara abọm nke anọ ya akpọrọ "Book of Ginger" .
Ndụ onwe.
Amụrụ Amanyi na Benue Steeti na 17 Maachị 1986, bụkwa ụbọchị ncheta ọmụmụ nke nne ya.
Ọ malitere ịbụ abụ ukwe nke ụka dị n’obodo ya.
Ọrụ.
"Akpako master", ka esi eji obi uto na-akpọ ya, natara otuto dị egwu maka ụdị egwu ya pụrụ iche.
Site na abụ ya, o kwetara iji ọgwụ ọjọọ na mmanya.
Na Septemba 2014, ọ gwara Jane Augoye nke "The Punch" na ya akwụsịla ọgwụ ike.
O kwuola na 2face Idibia dịka onye nkuzi kachasị akpali ya.
TG Omori, onye a makwaara dị ka Boy Director ma aha ọmụmụ ya bụ ( ThankGod Omori Jesam )Ọ bụ nwaafọ Naịjirịa onye ntụzi na ihe nkiri vidiyo egwu .
TG Omori eduzila vidio egwu ndị na-edekọ ihe nkiri gafee ụdị dị iche iche nke ọgbọ ọhụrụ, gụnyere Olamide, Wizkid, Burna Boy, Tekno, Kiss Daniel, Fireboy DML, Falz, Timaya, Naira Marley, na ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ.
Mmalite Ndụ.
ThankGod Omori Jesam, onye si na Steeti Cross-River na Naịjirịa.
Omori toro na Agungi,Steeti Lagos , Naịjirịa site na nzụlite midul klas.
Ọ malitere iduzi na afọ iri na ise mgbe ọ na-elekọta usoro egwuregwu ejije na ụlọ akwụkwọ ya na ụka.
Omori bidoro imepụta vidiyo mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na isii, mana o tinyere ya n'ogo ọkachamara mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asatọ mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'ụlọ Akwụkwọ ihe ngosi bụ pencil ịnstịtut nke mere ka ọ bụrụ onye ọkachamara nta na mmepụta ihe nkiri na Naịjirịa n'oge ahụ.
Ọrụ.
N'afọ 2019, Omori bụ onye rụpụtara ihe ruru ọkara vidiyo na oge ọkọchị 2019 dịka MTV, Soundcity na Trace gụkọrọ ya.
Ọ duziri vidiyo ọtụtụ ndị na-eti egwu nke gụnyere egwu akpụm n'onu nke Naira Marley tiri"Am I a Yahoo boy", "Totori" nke Olamide na Wizkid, na "Soapy" nke Naira Marley nke nwetara mmeri na mmasị ndị na-ekiri ya na Soundcity MVP Awards festival.
Na 2019 o nwetara mmeri onye nduzi vidio nke afọ na City People Entertainment Awards ma o duziri vidiyo abụọ n'ime iri akacha ekiri na vidio egwu Naịjirịa nke afọ 2019.
Ihe Nrite na Nhọrọ.
Ọ natala ọtụtụ otito jisie ike na mmata nke gụnyere;
2019 City People Entertainment Awards for Music Video Director of the year
Jaywon
Aha Iledare Oluwajuwonlon
Amaara ya dịka Oba Orin
Amụrụ 6 Juunu 1986 (afọ 34)
Egbe, Kogi Steeti, Naịjirịa
Nkenụụdị Afuropọpụ
Aka ọrụ Otii egwu, Odee egwu, Omee egwu
Afọ ọ nọ ọrụ 2005–ugbua
Lebeelụ Next World Music
Ndị egwu 
Don Jazzy
Reminisce
D'Banj
Tonto Dikeh
Olamide
Dr SID
Davido
Iledare Oluwajuwonlo (amụrụ ya na abalị isii na Juunu 1986), nke amara aha ya dịka Jaywon, bu onye na-eti egwu na Naịjirịa, onye n’ede egwu, na eme ihe oyonyo, na emeputa ihe.
Ọ malitere akara ndekọ egwu ya aha ya bụ Next World Music na 2013 mgbe ọpụsịrị na Kennis Music .
A kwanyere Jaywon ugwu site na onyinye nturu ugo ọkacha mma onye egwu na Naịjirịa Muziki Vidiyo Awọdụ na 2009.
Ọ natakwara onyinye ọkacha mma na ndekọ egwu na Headies 2013 nakwa Tush Awọdụ maka egwu 'This Year'.
Ndụ na ọrụ.
Jaywon gụsịrị ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị ya na ECWA Praịmarị Sukulu wee gaa n'ihu iji mezuo ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndịrị ya na "Government Sekọndịrị Sukulu na Kogi Steeti, tupu ọ gụsịa akwụkwọ HND na Akaụntụ na Federal Politeknik, Bida.
[ "see okwu dị mkpa" ]
Onye Otii egwu a kwagara Legọọsụ na 2005 ka otu n’afọ gachara, ọ nwetara nkwado ntikọta egwu nke ya na Ray G, Sound Sultan, W4, Slizzy E na 2face.
[ "see okwu dị mkpa" ]
Na 2009, Jaywon nwetara ohere ịmepụta egwu ya na "Kennis Muziki Ista Fiyesta, o mere nnukwu ọfụma nke mere ndị na-ahazi ihe omume ahụ nwere mmasị ozugbo na ya.
Mgbe e mesịrị n'otu afọ ahụ, Jaywon bịanyere aka na ndekọ egwu na "Kennis Music Record Label".. N’ọnwa Disemba afọ 2012, o wepụtara ‘Odun Yi (This Year)’ nke pụrụ iche na nke otuto na 2013.
O mechara bịanye aka na PZ Cusson  nke mere ka ụlọ ọrụ ahụ jiri egwu ya, 'This Year' maka ịkwado ahịa ha.
Next World Music na abọm 'Oba Orin'.
Mgbe ọ gachara indie, ọ wepụtara abọm ya a na-atụ anya ya na nke atọ akpọrọ 'Oba Orin' mgbe anọ gachara nke gosipụtara Vector, Reminisce na Reekado Banks .
Nke a bụ ihe na-esote abọm abụọ ahụ ọ wepụtara na Kennis Music .
360nobs dere akwụkwọ egwu ahụ: 'Oba Orin bụ ezigbo nchịkọta ụda nke gosipụtara talentị Jaywon kachasị mma na egwu pọpụ ya.
Ọ dị ọgaranya, dị ndụ, na-enye ume ọhụrụ mgbe niile.
Jaywon nwere ike ikwuwa ọnụ mana onweghị onye ga-asị na ọ naghị arụ ọrụ maka ya oge ọbụla.
Naanị oge ga-egosi ma ọ nwetala aha ahụ.
PulseNG na-atụle ya 3/5 wee dee: 'Na njedebe nke abọm ahụ, ị ga-enwe mmetụta na Jaywon awụpụọla mkpụrụ obi ya, na-ejikọ mmetụta ya na inwe oke okike nka ya na gị.
Ọ dị ka Jaywon a na-eme egwu maka gị, n'ebe ọgbakọ mmadụ juru.
' 
'Oba Orin' nke pụtara 'King of Songs' n'asụsụ Yoruba bụ ọba egwu nwere egwu 21 nke mmepụta ya sitere n'aka Mr Ejor, Benjaminossy, Blaq Jerzey na Young Jonn.
Jaywon nyere ego izizi izu abụọ nke abọm 'Oba Orin' ya na Ụmụ Mgbei.
Onye egwu a gara 2016 ACIA Awọdụ na Atlanta, United Steeti ma nweta ihe nrite "Best Indigenous Act".
2014 – ugbu a: Egwu ya ndị edere n'okpuru Next World Music.
Jaywon bidoro remix maka "Madantin" na 2014 nke gosipụtara Phyno, Olamide na May D n'okpuru akara Next World Music nke soro 'Tanawole' gosipụtara Reminisce izu ole na ole gachara.
Ọ rụkọrọ ọrụ ys na rapa Vector tha Viper na Back to Sender
Solid Star
Background information
Aha Joshua Iniyezo
Amụrụ Nọvemba 8, 1988 (afọ 32)
Delta Steeti, Naịjirịa
Ebe osi Isoko South, Aviara
Nkenụụdị 
Afurobiiti
R&amp;B
Aka Ọrụ 
Otii egwu
Odee egwu
Mmepụta ndekọ egwu
Omee ihe nkiri
Afọ ọ nọ ọrụ 2010 –ugbua
Lebeelụ Shaba Entertainment
Ndị egwu Tiwa Savage, Korrekt, 2face Idibia, Flavour N'abania
Website achievasng.com
Joshua Iniyezo (amụrụ ya na Nọvemba 8, 1988), nke amara nke ọma na aha ya bụ SolidStar Isoko maọbụ naanị SolidStar, bụ onye Naịjirịa onye na-agụ egwu, onye na-ede egwu.
Ọ malitere ọrụ egwu ya dịka ịkụ ịgba maka otu ụka dị na obodo ya bụ Delta Steeti .
A maara SolidStar nke ọma n'ofe Naịjirịa na Afrịka maka egwu ya "One in a Million".
Ọ bịanyere aka na Ossy Achievas
Ossy Achievas bịanyere aka na ya.
Na 2010, o weputara abọm izizi ya "One in a Million" nke mechara bụrụ nnukwu egwu wuru ewu.
The rimisi nke egwu a "One in a Million" gosipụtara 2face Idibia .
Ọ gbasoro ihe ngosi a na ọtụtụ ndị egwu ya ọzọ wuru ewu.
Ndụ mbido.
SolidStar, onye a maara nke ọma maka ikike ya igụ egwu werewere n'asụsụ Bekee , asụsụ Isoko na asụsụ Igbo, a mụrụ ya na Delta Steeti, Naịjirịa na nke Mr. na Mrs Iniyezo.
Ezinụlọ ya sitere na obodo Aviara .
SolidStar bidoro ọrụ egwu ya mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na anọ mgbe ọ malitere ịkpọ ụbọ akwara maka ikwe ukwe ụka ya na Aviara .
Achọpụtara ya afọ ole na ole ka e mere ihe ngosi nka egwu na mpaghara Ajegunle nke Legọọsụ Steeti ebe akọwara ya na ebe Paul Cole onye ndekọ lebeelụ.
Na 2010, SolidStar debanyere aha na Achievas Record ebe ewepụtara abọm mbụ ya n'okpuru akara ahụ.
Ọrụ egwu.
2010: "One in a Million".
Na 2010, SolidStar wepụtara abọm mbụ ya bụ "One in a Million" site na Achievas Muziki.
Abọm ya bụ egwu a "One in a Million" egwu buputere ya, bụ nke ya na 2face Idibia tikọrọ ọnụ.
Tony Tetuila
Aha Anthony Olanrewaju Awotoye
Ebe osi Oro, Kwara, Nigeria
Nkenụụdị Afrịkan hipụ họpụ
Aka ọrụ Otii egwu, rapa
Afọ ọ nọ ọrụ 1995–2007
Anthony Olanrewaju Awotoye, onye amara nke ọma dika Tony Tetuila, bụ onye egwu Afuro hipụ họpụ si Naịjirịa .
Aha ya, Olanrewaju, pụtara " "Akụ m na-aba ụba" ".
N'oge gara aga, o so otu The Remedies (tinyere Eedris Abdulkareem na Eddy Montana ), ọ kewaa na otu ahụ na-eme nke ọma dịka onye egwu nọrọ onwe ya.
A maara ya nke ọma maka egwu ya 'My Car'.
Ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị.
N’afọ 2014, Tony Tetuilaran zọrọ ọkwa ọchịchị na ụlọ mmebe iwu nke Kwara Steeti n'okpuru pati All Progressive Congress .
O mechara kwuo na a gọnahụ ya ọchịchị ahụ.
Ọgbaaghara.
N’ọnwa Disemba 2019, Tony gbara Wizkid akwụkwọ , ọ boro ebubo na Wizkid emebiela egwu ya, nke ya na onye egwu Gana bụ Tic Tac maka nwa ha nwoke bụ "Fefe N'efe.
" E kwuru na ikpe a ruru nde naịra iri atọ. &lt;/br&gt;
Hafsat Olaronke Abiola (onye amuru n'afọ 1974, na Legọs ) bu onye oruuru mmadu nke obodo Naijiria, oke ruru mmadu na onye ochichi onye kwuo uche ya, onye guzobere Kudirat Initiative for Democracy (KIND), nke n’enye aka iwusi obodo elu ma kwalite ochichi onye kwuo uche ya na Naijiria .
Ndụ.
Hafsat Olaronke Abiola bụ nke asatọ nwa Moshood Abiola onye họputara ka ọ buru onye isiala mana etinye ya na mkpọrọ site akaike Gen. Sani Abacha maka ịgba mgba okpuru mgbe ọ kwuchara na ya bụ onye isi ala. Okenye Abiola mechara nwụọ mgbe ọ nọ n'ụlọ mkpọrọ na 1998.
Egburu nne Hafsat, Alhaja Kudirat Abiola n'oge ngagharị iwe maka ịhapụ di ya na 1996.
Abiola gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Phillips Academy, Andover, n'afọ 1992 na Harvard College n' 1996.
Ọ natara ihe nsọpụrụ doctorate na Haverford College .
Abiola bụ onye guzobere China-Afrịka Bridge na China Africa Forum, nke na-akwalite mmekọrịta ọdịnala bara uru n'etiti China na Afrịka, na-elekwasị anya na onyinye ụmụ nwanyị na akụ na ụba.
N’afọ 2000, Abiola asọpụrụ dịka Global Leader of Tomorrow na World Economic Forum dị na Davos, Switzerland.
N'afọ 2003, a hoputara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye otu Ashoka: iji gosipụta ọkwa ya dị ka onye ọchụnta ego na-elekọta mmadụ .
Na 2006 a hoputara ya dika onye nchoputa nke nzuko na World Future Council .
N'afọ 2006 ọ bulitere ego site na ịhazi mmemme nke "The Vagina Monologues" na Naijiria.
Kemgbe Mee 2008, o bukwa onye ndụmọdụ na World Future Council n'etiti ndi mmadu iri anọ na itoolụ amaara ama.
Abiola bụ onye otu ndụmọdụ na Fetzer Institute yana Nuclear Age Peace Foundation .
Na 2015 a hoputara ya ịbụ otu n’ime ụmụnwaanyị iri abụọ na otu ndị zukọtara maka ọgbakọ na Mahadum Harvard University Kennedy School of Government nke Hunt Alternatives kwadoro.
Otu a gụnyere Judy Thongori si Kenya, Fauzia Nasreen si Pakistan na Olufunke Baruwa, Esther Ibanga na Ayisha Osori sikwa Naịjirịa.
Lovelyn Orji-Ben (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 3 ,na Disemba afọ 1979) bụ onye Naijirịa na-eme egwuregwu judo n'asọmpi ụmụ nwanyị nke kilogram 48.
O ritere nrite ọla nchara na 1999 Pan African Games na ọla nchara abụọ na African Judo Championship n'afọ 1997 na 2000.
Ọrụ egwuregwu.
Na African Judo Championship, Lovelyn e nwetala medalụ abụọ.
Nke mbụ bụ 1997 Judo Championship nke e mere na Kasabulanka, Moroko .
Lovelyn sonyere ihe omume kilogram 48 ebe o ritere ọla nchara .
Nke abụọ bụ na 2000 Judo Championship nke e mere na Ọljies, Ọljiria ebe o ritere nrite ọla ọcha na mmemme kilogram 48.
Na 1999 All-Africa Games e mere na Johanesbọg, Saụt Afrịka, o ritere nrite ọla nchara mgbe ọ sonyere na mmemme 48kg.
Lawretta Ozoh (amụrụ ya na 5 Septemba afọ 1990) bụ onye Naijiria amara amara ọkachamara n'egwuregwu nke ọsọ 
Ozoh bụ onye ritere ọla ọcha na 200 mita ma bụrụkwa onye otu nrite ọla edo ahụ emeriri na 4 x 100 mita relay na asọmpi egwuregwu mba Afrịka nke afọ 2012 .
Mmachibido iwu.
N'afọ 2012 O ziri na Ozoh bụụ steroid anabolic Stanozolol ma mechaa nye ya iwu mgbochi afọ abụọ na egwuregwu.
Mactabene Amachree (onye amuru na abali iri-ato na onwa mbu n’afọ 1978 na Port Harcourt ) bubu onye na atụ basket boolụ na Naijiria.
N’afọ 2001, ọ ghọrọ onye mbụ onye Naịjirịa nke gbara bọọlụ na WNBA.
Amachree gbara n’egwuregwu basketball nke ụmụ nwanyị Naịjirịa na 2004 Summer Olimpik.
O burukwa nwa ada Ojuka Clan nke ndi Kalabari na Naijiria..
Erigga
Nkọwa Onwe
Aha Erhiga Agarivbie
Amaara PaperBoi, 2 seconds, Eribaba, New Money
Amụrụ 30 Machị 1987 (afọ 33)
Warri, Delta Steeti, Naịjirịa
Ebe osi Warri, Delta Steeti
Genres Hip hop
Aka ọrụ Rapa
Afọ ọ nọ ọrụ 2008–ugbua
Lebeelụ Emirate Empire 
Ndị egwu Olamide, Duncan Mighty, Orezi, Harrysong, Skales, KUDiE, Brymo, Yung6ix, Victor AD, King perry, M.I Abaga, Ice Prince
Erhiga Agarivbie (amụrụ ya 30 Machị 1987), amaara ya site na aha ọgbọ ya bụ Erigga.
Ọ bụ onye Naịjirịa na-eti egwu hipụ họpụ.
Akụkọ Ndụ.
Amụrụ Erhiga Agarivbie na Warri, Delta Steeti, ebe ya na ezinaulo ya toro.
Ọ bụ nwa mbụ n’ime ụmụ ise.
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ "Standard International" na ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị na nke sekọndrị.
Erigga malitere ọrụ egwu ya na mbido 2010.
Ya na ọtụtụ ndị na-emepụta egwu arụọla ọrụ, nkeg ụnyere PFizzy, Snow Man na Phizy Joe.
Mbupute egwu izizi Erigga bụ "Mo Street Gan".
E mere vidio egwu ahụ na Nea, nke AKIN Alabi duziri.
Egwu a ghọrọ abụ isiokwu nke Rdio Continental.
Na 2013, Erigga wepụtara "Coupé Décalé ft Shuun Bebe".
Vidiyo egwu a nwetara kwado TV na Naịjirịa.
Na mbido 2014, o weputara egwu ọzọ akpọrọ "Love No Be Garri", nke gosipụtara Jimoh Waxiu.
Na 17 Julaị 2017 Erigga wepụtara abọm ya "A Trip to the South" nke gụnyere Orezi, Skales, Duncan Mighty na ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ.
Na 2018, Erigga weputara egwu ọzọ akpọrọ "Motivation" nke gosipụtara Victor AD .
Egwu a enwetala ihe karịrị otu nde nkiri mmadụ na YouTube.
Nsidee.
11.
^"Best Of Erigga mixtape | August mix 2018" - TGtrends.com.ng
12 nest social media website Tochid
Onyeka Nwelue onye amụrụ na abalị iri-atọ na otu n’ọnwa mbụ n'afọ 1988, bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye edemede nke Naijiria, onye akwụkwọ ya bụ "Hip-Hop bu nani maka umuaka,ma turu ugo" dịka ode akụkọ mere eme na 2015 nke Nigerian Writers ’Awards.
Ọ gbanwere akwụkwọ akụkọ ya, "Island of Happiness" dịka ihe nkiri n’asụsụ Igbo, dịka "Agwaetiti Obiụtọ" wee merie Best Feature Film site n’aka onye ntụzịaka na 2018 Newark International Film Festival , a gakwara n'ihu ịhọpụta ya maka Best First Feature film nke Onye ntuziaka ya na nrite Ousmane Sembene maka Ihe Nkiri Kachasị Mma n'Asụsụ Afrika na 2018 Africa Movie Academy Awards .
Ihe nkiri Island of Happiness bụ mkpali mmụọ gbasara ezi ihe mere na Oguta ".
" .
Ọ bụ ya guzobere La Cave Musik, aha ndekọ, nke dị na Paris .
Nwelue gụrụ Sociology &amp; Anthropology na Mahadum nke Naịjirịa, Nsukka wee nweta onyinye ọzụzụ mmụta ịgụmaka ntuziaka na Prague Film School na Czech Republic .
Ugbu a ọ bụ osote prọfesọ na- eleta na Onye Nleta Ọmụma nke Africa literature na ọmụmụ ihe na Ngalaba Asụsụ Bekee nke Ngalaba nke humanities, Mahadum Manipur na Imphal, India .
Ọ bụ onye nleta nyocha na Center for International Studies, Mahadum Ohio , ebe ọ gburu oge na Atens, Ohio.
A hopụtara akwụkwọ akụkọ ya nke abụọ, maka akara ANA Prose Fiction Prize na 2018 ya na nchịkọta abụ ya, "The Lagos Cuban Jazz Club", bụ ndị edepụtara aha maka ANA Poetry Prize n'otu afọ ahụ .
Mmalite Ndụ.
A mụrụ Onyeka Nwelue na Ezeoke Nsu na Ehime Mbano na Imo State, Naịjirịa nye Honorable Sam Nwelue, onye ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị na Knight nke St. Christopher na Lady Catherine Nwelue, onye nkuzi na Lay Reader.
Ndụ onwe.
A mụrụ ya n'ime ezinụlọ nke nọ na ogo dị elu, ọ bụ nwa nke anọ n'ime ụmụ isii nne na nna ya.
Nne ya, onye a zụlitere n'ezina ụlọ ndị ama ama n'ọchịchị nke Obua Ajukwu (Ndanike), nke Oguta, bụ nwa nwanne nna Flora Nwapa, nke a na-ahụkarì dịka nwanyị Africa mbụ dere akwụkwọ nke ebipụtara na mba ụwa.
Ndị nne na nna ya ochie bụ Origbudu SBC Obiora na Ogbuefi Odiso Obiora (née Nwakuche na nwanne nwanyị nke okenye bụ Maazị Gogo Nwakuche , di Nwapa nke abụọ .Nwanne mama ya nke nwanyị, Prọfesọ Leslye Obiora, bụbu oṅye minista Naịjirịa n'ihe gbasara steel na mines 
Nwelu gara Lagos mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na isii ịga Ememe Wole Soyinka , emesịa akowaara Noble laureate bụ Soyinka onye ọ bụ.
Afọ ole na ole ka nke ahụ gasịrị, Nwelue gara India maka emume nke abụọ maka International Writers festival ’,site n'ọkpụkpọ òkù nke India Cultural Association.
Nobel Laureate, Wole Soyinka ka bụ otu n'ime ndị onye nkwalite Nwelue dịka Nwelue kwuru,"Ọ gụọla ihe niile m bipụtara," .
O haziela nyocha nkeonwe nke ihe nkiri ya maka Nobel Laureate.
A kowara ya dịka onye nkwado ụmụ nwanyị N'okwụ gbasara nkwuchite ọnụ ụmụ nwanyị.
N'ajụjụ ọnụ, mgbe emechara "The house of Nwapa", ọ sịrị: "Emere' The house of "Nwapa"', n'ihi na abụ m onye nkwuchite ọnụ Ụmụ nwanyị.
Ekwenyere m na anyị niile hà nhata.
" 
Ọrụ.
Na mbido ọrụ ya, Nwelue dere maka The Guardian na Naịjirịa, ohere ndapụta nke Jahman Anikulapo nyere ya , onye nchịkọta/nhazi akụkọ nke Sunday Edition nke a maara dịka "The Guardian na Sọnde" .
Nwelue na-anọchi anya onye na- ede akwụkwọ ọgụgụ, Priya Doraswamy nke Lotus Lane Literary Agency, nke dị na New Jersey .
N’afọ 2012, Debbie Edwards nke Debbie Edwards Talent Management, bụ onye njikwa ya.
The Abyssinian Boy.
Nwelue bidoro ide edemede mbụ ya, The "Abyssinian Boy" mgbe ọ nọ n’India.
Akwụkwọ ahụ kọwaturu ihe ọ hụrụ na India dị ka onye ojii, mbipụta ya gosipụtara Nwelue dịka onye ama ama na mba ụwa.
"The Abyssinia Boy" nwetara ntụle dị egwu na isi akwụkwọ akụkọ Naịjirịa na India dịka ("akụkọ Greek") na Hindu ("the Indian ethos are original").
Burnt.
Akwụkwọ nke abụọ ya bụ akụkọ n'amaokwu ma onye ọdee abụ Britain-Hungaria bụ George Szirtes kọwara ya dịka "breathless".Nwelue gazuru ala iri-abuo n’ise na Europe n’afo 2014, n’ịkwalite akwụkwọ a, asụgharịrị ya n’asusu Italia, Spanish, Igbo na Yoruba.
Nsụgharị a bụ site n'aka onye edemede Venezuelan bụ Alberto Quero, e bipụtara ya na Peru, ebe ọ malitere ọrụ ya na Cusco Book Fair na 2015.
"Hip-Họp bụ naanị maka ụmụaka".
Nwelue sooro ndị egwu na-arụ ọrụ n'okpuru La Cave Musik wee gaa mba dị iche iche iji zute ndị egwu dị iche iche ma wepụta akwụkwọ ḿgbaha kowara ọtụtụ ihe, nke na-akọwapụta nzụkọ ya onye na ndị egwu na ndị na-akwalite egwu.
E wepụtara ya na Jenụwarị 2015 ka ọtụtụ kwadoro ya.
E kwupụtara n'erelari otu nde.
"The House of Nwapa".
O weputara otu ihe omuma nke kowara ndụ Flora Nwapa, nwanyị Afrịka mbụ dere akwụkwọ n’olu bekee.
A họpụtara ya dịka akwụkwọ ederede ihe ọmụma kachasi nke 2017 Africa Movie Academy Awards .
"Island of Happiness".
Na ngwụcha ọnwa Ọgọstụ, afọ 2017, Nwelue kwuputara site na edemede na o kechiri ihe nkiri nke ọhụụ ya, "Island of Happiness, nke sitere na obere akụkọ n'ewepụtabeghi .
The Beginning of Everything Colourful.
Ka afọ asaa nke DADA Books bipụtara "The Boy Abyssinian", Nwelue bipụtara akwụkwọ akụkọ ọhụụ bụ'The Beginning of Everything Colourful. .
Mmụta na nkuzi.
Mgbe ọ laghachiri India, Nwelue debara na Mahadum nke Naịjirịa, Nsukka, iji mụọ Sociology &amp; Anthropology.
Ọ gara n'ihu na-amụ Akwụkwọ maka edemede akụkọ na Asia School of Media Studies na Noida, India, mgbe nke a gasịrị, ọ kuziri Ntuziaka Ihe nkiri na Center for Research in Art of Film &amp; TV (CRAFT).
O lekọtara Sandwich Class nke English Language Department nke Mahadum Lagos dịka ọ na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke "FilmAfrique", ihe mmalite nke ihe nkiri Afrika, nke Africa Film Academy bipụtara, ndị na-elekọta Africa Movie Academy Awards .
E nyere ya ohere ịgụ akwụkwọ onye ntuziaka n'efu na Prague Film School na Czech Republic .
Ọrụ ya ka Emechara.
Kemgbe ọganihu nke akwụkwọ akụkọ ya ,Nwelue sonyere dee ihe nkiri "Namaste Naija", nke Teco Benson duziri wee mee ya na Hyderabad na Lagos ma bụrụ nke Lilian Bach mepụtara .
O sokwa chepụta echiche obere ihe nkiri, "The Beginning of Everything Colourful" ya na onye omee Britain na onye nlere anya ejiji Dudley O'Shaughnessy .
Na mbido afọ 2012, e debanyere Nwelue na Pontas Agency na Spain.
Ọ tọrọ ntọala Blue &amp; Hills Consultancy, nke ọ na-elekọta La Cave Musik.
Site na Blue &amp; Hills, egosipụtara ya na MTV Meets MTN ya na Ben Mụrray Bruce .Ndị ọrụ Nwelue haziri Bayelsa Book &amp; Craft Fair nke mbụ na mbụ ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ntụzi.
Ọ malitekwara idezi na ibipụta "FilmAfrique", bụ ihe nkiri mbụ na sinima Afrika, nke ndị nyere Nkwado ego bụ Africa Film Academy, ndị na-ahụ maka nhazi ihe nkiri Africa Movie Academy (AMAA).
N’ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2016, ihe nkiri Nwelue dere maka Flora Nwapa, "nke akpọrọ The House of Nwapa", bidoro na Harare, Zimbabwe .
Ọgbaghara.
Kemgbe o biputere "The Abyssinian Boy" na 2009, Nwelue jiiri otutu oge ya kwuo okwu na mmemme, emume na ọgbakọ dị iche iche.
Ka a kpọchara ya na emume agụmagụ nke Man Hong Kong, a jụrụ ịnye Nwelue visa na Hong Kong, nke butere itimkpu ndị mgbasa ozi, ihe kpatara nke bụ ikpaoke ọdịdị anụahụ ya.
Agbanwere mkpebi ahụ ma ọ nwetara visa ịga ememme ahụ.
N’afọ 2017, ụmụ nwoke ndị agha mekpara Nwelue ahu n’ihi na ọ chọrọ igbochi ha idina onye ji ahụ ya achụnta ego n'ike .
Otu afọ mgbe nke a gasịrị, e jidere Nwelue n'ụlọ ezumike nke Onomo Hotel na Kigali wee tụọ ya mkpọrọ ụbọchị asatọ, maka ebubo 'na-okparịrị Onye isi ala Rwandan, Paul Kagame na Twita na RwandAir .
A tọhapụrụ ya site na ntinye ọnụ nke onye isi ala Naịjirịa, Olusegun Obasanjo .
Tupu e jide ya, ọ bụ onye nkuzi afọ ofufo na Kwetu Film Instịtut, nke onye na-emepụtai ihe nkiri, Eric Kabera hiwere.
Ihe Mberede.
N'ọnwa mbụ nke February 2018, ka oji otu ụbọchị gafee ụbọchị ncheta ọmụmụ ya nke afọ iri atọ ya , Onyeka nwere ihe mberede okporo ụzọ, nke o nwetara ọtụtụ mmerụ ahụ na mgbara azụ ya.
Ọ nọ na oche ọlụsị ọnwa abụọ,tupu ojiri ihe eji enyere njem aka eme njem.
Idris Abdul Karim (onye amụrụ n'abalị̀ iri abụọ na itoolu n'ime ọnwa Nọvemba afọ1976) bụ onye egwuregwu bọọlu Malaysia, na-arụ ọrụ ugbu a dịka onye scout maka Johor Darul Takzim na Malaysia Super League .
Johor - onye na-agbachite ndị ọnọ n'etiti n'egwu ball ya na Johor na-egwuri egwu oge atọ tupu ọ kwaga Pahang FA .
O mechara laghachi n’obodo ya wee sonyere otu egwuregwu Johor FC .
O mechara sonyere Negeri Sembilan FA wee bụrụ onye ama ama maka otu "Hoben Jang Hoben" kemgbe ahụ.
O tinyere ezi mgbalị maka mmekorita ya na onye ọnọ n'etiti bu Rizal Sukiman na afọ amara ha tinyekwa mgbalị mmekọrịta nke ya na Johor FA wee nwekwazie ezi mmekorita ya na onye bụburu onye otu ya, Rezal Zambery Yahya na onye isi egwuregwu ala ha Muhammad Shukor Adan, onye laghachiri na Negeri Sembilan FA .
Idris nọchitekwara anya Malaysia na 1995 ruo 2000.
Ọ gbara egwuregwu enyi na enyi megide Arsenal na 1999.
Emem Isong bụ onye na-ede, na-emeputa ma na-edozi ihe nkiri na Naijiria.
A maara ya nke ọma maka oru ya gbasara ihe nkiri na asụsụ bekee.
Ihe ọrụ ndozi ya nke abuo, "", nke gbasara ndina n'ike umu nwaanyi na Nigeria, wepụtara na 2015.
Mmalite ndu na mmuta.
Emem, onye si Ikono Lokal Gọọmentị na amụrụ na 5 Septemba, bụ nwa mbụ na ezinụlọ ma nwee ụmụ anọ nke omuru amu.
O natara asambodo ogo ọmụmụ nke ihe nkiri na Mahadum ma nakotara diplọma na sayensị kọmputa site na (NCR).
Ọrụ.
Na-afọ 1994 ka Emem bidoro ọrụ nke ihe nkiri.
Mgbe ahụ ka o dere ma nyere aka meputa ihe nkiri nke Jezebel.
Na-afo 1996 ka naanị ya meputara Breaking point.
Na-esote ọnwa asato, ya na Remmy Jez rụgidere orụ dịka onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri na oru ya.
mgbe ọ kpebiri ịkwụsị mmekọrịta ha na 2008 ka ọ na-ewepụta ihe nkiri nke Reloaded.
Odeela ma ọ bụ mepụta ihe nkiri dịka "", "Breaking Point", "She Devil", A "Minute To Midnight", "Play Boy", "Sin Sin", "Master Stroke", "Rumors", "Shattered Illusion", na"Promise Me Forever" na "Emotional Crack" (2003), nke ikpeazụ ya ka egosiri na mmemme na New York City.
A makwaara ya nke ọma maka mmepụta ihe nkiri n'asụsụ Yoruba ma bụrụkwa onye kachasị ewu ewu na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ.
Ihe nkiri ọbụla Emem Isong tinyere aka bukwara ama ama maka ịnye ohere ma ịbụputa ndị ọrụ ihe nkiri ohụụ gunyere Stephanie Okereke, Dakore Egbuson na ndị ọzọ.
Na 2014 Isong duziri ihe nkiri mbụ ya bụ ', nke mere ngosi nke mbụ na na .
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ 2015, ọ wepụtara ihe nkiri ', ihe nkiri ya nke abụọ ahaziri nke ọ rụpụtara, na mmekọrita ọrụ ya na Royal Arts Academy na Nollywood Workshop, otu NGO mba ụwa na-achọ ịgba ume mgbanwe n'etiti ọha mmadụ site na iji ihe nkiri.
Ihe nkiri a, nke metụtara ịdina nwaanyị n'ike na Naijira, gosiri ndị ọrụ ihe nkiri dika Makida Moka, Patience Ozokwor, , na Omoni Oboli.
Amamịghe Emem Isong nwere na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri enyekwara ya ohere ka a họrọ ya dịka onye ga-ekwuchitere ha na usoro Afrinolly masterclass ma bụrụkwa ọkaikpe maka ihe nkiri MTN Afrinolly na 2013.
Na fim ya Emem Isong na-agbasi mbọ ike ime ka ndị na-ege ntị nwee obi ụtọ 
Ihe Nlekọta.
E depụtakwala aha Emem dị ka onye na-eme ihe na nke ndị na-eme fim na-abụghị naani i nwe mmasị na-emepụta fim, ma na-emepụta fim ndị a pụrụ iche ndị nke baara ụba na nkà.
Ọ bụghịzi maka nrụpụta maka mmepụta sọsọ, kama ọ bụ maka mmepụta maka nka.
Ntughari a site na imepụta vidio a na-elele na-ụlọ na ikiri ya na sinima bụkwa ụdị nke usoro "Ne Nollywood" a. 
Amakwaara Emem Isong maka ọrụ ya na iguzọbe Royal Arts Academy na 2010 yana ọrụ ya dị ka onye isi ụlọ ọrụ ahụ.
Royal Arts Academy nke ọ malitere yana Uduak Oguamanam, Anietie Isong, na Monalisa Chinda, dị na Surulere, Legos steetị, Naijria.
Ulo akwukwo a raara onwe ya maka imeputa umu akwukwo ndi na-aghaghi ime mpi na okacha amara na ụlọ oru ihe nkiri Naijiria, kamakwa n’ime ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri mba ndị ọzọ.
Ewezuga ịkụziri ụmụ akwụkwọ ihe ha kwesịrị ima maka ịmalite ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri, ụlọ ha na-enyekwa ụmụ akwụkwọ ohere iji nweta ego iji nyere ha aka ịmalite ọrụ ha site na imepụta fim ndị ọha na eze nwere ike ịhụ.
Ndụ ya niime.
A maara Emem Isong dị ka onye zoro ezo ma na-ahọrọ ịnọkarị na anya ọha, ọ naghị enyekarị ajụjụ ọnụ.
Nke a, dị ka ya si kwuo, ọ bụ n'ihi na ọ chọrọ ka ọrụ ya rie uru naanị ya na-enweghị okwu gbasara ndụ ya na-emetụta ndị na-ekiri ya.
Kaosinadị, Isong lụrụ Misodi Akama onye ọ mụrụ ejima na 2016.
O nwekwara nwa nwoke site na nmekorita ya na onye ọzọ na-mbu.
Ndetu ihe nkiri.
Ihe nkiri ihe nkiri Emem Isong gụnyere: 
Onyinye na nhoputa.
Onyinye nsọpụrụ nke Emem Isong nwetara gụnyere:

Nguveren Iyorhe (amụrụ na 9 June 1981) bụ onye egwuregwu basketbọọlụ si Naijiria ma zọọ mpi na .
Adewale Mayowa Emmanuel Onye amụrụ na abali iri-abuo n’ato n’onwa atọ, afọ 1994, bụ onye amaara nke oma dịka Mayorkun, ma bụrụ nwaafọ Naịjịrịa na-agu egwu, na-ede egwu mana apịkwa pịano.
O weputara nkpuchi egwu nke Davido bụ "The Money" ma onye na-agụ egwu chọpụtara ya na Twitter.
Mayorkun bịanyere aka n'akwụkwọ ndekọ aha Davido Music Worldwide (DMW) n'afọ 2016; ewepụtara otu mpụta mbụ ya "Eleko" n'okpuru labeelu a. Mayorkunkun wepụtara albọm studịo mbụ ya "Onye isi obodo Lagos" na Nọvemba 2018.
Mmalite Ndụ.
A mụrụ Mayorkun n'abalị̀ iri abụọ na atọ n'afọ, 1994 na Osun State .
Ọ bụ nwa mbụ n’ime mmadụ atọ, amụrụ n’ezinụlọ nke ndị na-eme egwuregwu ntụrụndụ.
Nne ya bụ onye na- eme ihe nkiri Nollywood ma nna ya, onye na-ese ihe na onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri.
Mayorkun so na ndị ukwe mgbe ọ dị obere ebe ọ, dịka o siri kwuo, "mụtara mbupute egwu".
Ọ nwere asambodo na ngalaba na-ahụ maka ngụkọta ego na University of Lagos, ọ nọkwa n ’ụlọ akụ (bank) tupu a chọpụta ya n’afọ 2016.
Ọrụ egwu.
Mayorkun kpebiri ịhapụ ọrụ ụlọ akụ ya chọọ ọzọ n'ihi ụgwọ ebughi ibu,mgbe Davido hụrụ vidiyo mkpuchi ya na February 2016.
Davido sooro ya na Twitta na Instagram, mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị Davido jụrụ ya ma ọ ga - emeli ihe karịrị ikpọ pịano.
O nwetara oku ekwentị Davido n’otu ụbọchị ahụ o dere akwụkwọ arụkwaghịm wee zigara Davido ụfọdụ n’ime egwu ndị o degoro.
Davido kpebiri ịdebananye aha ya na Davido Music Worldwide.
Mayorkun wepụtara otu mkpụrụ egwu mbụ ya n’okpuru akara akpọrọ “Eleko” n’afọ 2016.
Vidio nke abụ a chịkọtara ndị nkiri nde mmadụ na ụbọchị iri mbụ.
N'aha ya, Mayorkun nwere ọtụtụ egwu n'abụghị albọm nke gụnyere Yawa, Sade, Che Che na Mama.
N'ọnwa Ọktọba 2018, ọ wepụtara ndị abụghị albọm bụ "Posh" na "Fantasy" nke na-egosi Olu Maintain na atụmanya nke albọm Studịo mbụ ya nke akpọrọ "The Mayor of Lagos".
Emepụtara The Mayor of Lagos Lagos n'abalị na isii nke ọnwa Nọvemba 2018.
N'abalị̀ mbụ nke ọnwa Disemba 2018, ọ pụtara na eserese Billboard albọm nke ụwa ,nke ọ nọ n'ogo ọnụ ọgụgụ iri na ise.
Ngosi Egwu The Mayor of Lagos.
Mayorkun malitere njem na mba niile na 2017 nke o mere ihe ngosi egwu n'ihe karịrị ụlọ akwụkwọ iri atọ na ise.
O mechiri afọ 2017 site n'iji isi egwu ya nke mbụ na Lagos akpọrọ "The Mayor of Lagos ".
The Mayor of Lagos na-aga n'ihu na 2018 site na ihe ngosi na obodo Ibadan na isi obodo, Abuja .
Ọzọkwa, a mara ọkwa ụbọchị maka mbipụta nke Lagos .
N’afọ 2018, Mayorkun mere njem ga UK tinyere onye otu labeelụ yabú Dremo, ebe ọ mmere ngosi ihe dị ka obodo isii.
Ọ rụkwara n'akụkụ onye isi labeelụ Davido na wireless festival .
Ngozi Nwokocha (amụrụ na 28 Septemba 1986) bụ nwaanyi Naijiria amaara maka egwuregwu ịgba ọsọ.
Ọ gbara ọsọ ụmụ nwaanyị nke na .
Nkolika "Nicky" Nonyelum Anosike (amuru na Febuwari 27, 1986) bu onye na-agba basketbọọlụ maka otu dị na mba Amerika maka .
Ndụ ya niime.
A mụrụ Anosike na , New York ma o tolitere na ebe ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị nke .
Enyere Anosike nsọpụrụ dika onye " All-American".
O sonyeere na egwuregwu nke 2004 , ebe o meriri otu akara.
Nwanne ya nwoke, , na-agba egwuregwu basketbọọlụ maka na mba Italy.
Kọleji.
Anosike gara mahadum na ma gụọ akwụkwọ n'afọ 2008.
Mgbe ọ nọ na Tennessee, Anosike meriri asọmpi egwuregwu nke National Champions na 2007 ma na 2008. , , na bụ ndị otu ya.
Bọọlụ Nkata USA.
A kpọrọ Anosike na ndị otu nke nọchitere anya USA na asọmpi U19 nke 2005 emere na , , na July na August 2007.
Anosike gbara akara 11.4 site n’egwuregwu ọbụla nyere ndị otu ya aka n’ihe ndekọ 7-0 na ihe nrite ọla edo.
Anosike gbara ndị otu USA bọọlụ na egwuregwu na Rio de Janeiro, Brazil.
Ndị otu ahụ meriri egwuregwu ise niile, ma nweta nrite ọla edo maka ihe omume ahụ.
Ọrụ WNBA.
N mbido egwuregwu ya na kọleji, ọ kwupụtara maka ndị otu .
A họpụtara Anosike na agba nke abụọ maka egwuregwu nke nke haziri.
A họpụtara ya ozugbo onye otu ya na kọleji sonyere otu ndi ebe onye otu ya bụ ga-agba.
Na Minnesota ọ malitere egwuregwu niile maka Lynx.
A họọrọ Anosike na otu nke 2009 West All Star Team dịka onye nnọchite, ya na onye otu ya na .
Akpọrọ Anosike na na Eprel 9, 2011.
Na Febrụwarị 23, 2012, Anosike sonyere otu klọb ndị .
Lisa Folawiyo bụ onye nrụpụta ejiji na Naijiria bụ onye amaara nke ọma maka ijikọ ọdịnala ọdịda anyanwụ nke Afrịka na textile yana usoro ịkwa akwa ọgbara ọhụrụ na-ekwusi ike na beading na sequin trim.
Bayografi.
Lisa Folawiyo nwere nzụlite iwu, nke ọ mụtara na Mahadum Lagos .
Lisa Folawiyo bidoro akara ya "Jewel by Lisa" n'afọ 2005 site n'ụlọ ya.
Ihe omume ejiji.
Lisa Folawiyo nwere ụlọ ngosi na Naịjirịa yana New York.
Ndị ama ama dịka Issa Rae eyiela efe ya.
Rae  yiri uwe cummerbund na "BET Presents American Black Film Festival Honors" .
A na-egosiputa nchịkọta ya na US, UK, Naijiria na South Afrịka.
N'afọ 2012 O so na atụmatụ nke Vogue Italia .
Ndụ onwe.
Folawiyo lụrụ di na nwunye ruo afọ iri na anọ.
Ọ bụ nne nke ụmụ abụọ.
Ọgọ nna ya bụ onye nrụpụta ihe Wahab Iyanda Folawiyo .
Njikọ dị na mpụga.
Official website
Omolade Akinremi (onye amuru na abali iri-na ato n’ime onwa itolu afọ 1974) bu onye lara ezumike nká na eme ọsọ egwuregwu na Naijiria.
O sonyere na nfanye 400 mita nke ụmụ nwanyị na 1996 Summer Olimpik.
Chiamaka Cynthia Nnadozie bụ onye ọgba bọọlụ Naịjirịa na-agbara bọọlụ na ngalaba egwuregwu nke French league.
Ọrụ klọb.
Nnadozie binyere aka maka klọb na mbido afọ 2016.
N’afọ 2019 Nnadozie rụụrụ nnukwu ọrụ mere ka merie NWPL nke bụ asọmpi league ha.
Na Jenụwarị 22, 2020 o soonyere otu klọb na French aha ya bụ na nkwekọrịta ọnwa iri na asatọ.
Ọrụ mba ụwa.
N’oge asọmpi Nnadozie gbara ụgbọrọ anọ.
Mgbe a gbaara Haiti, o nwetara aha nsọpụrụ nke "Dare to Shine" maka ezigbo arụmọrụ ya.
N'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe asọmpi U-20 gasịrị, ahọpụtakwara ya maka asọmpi nke afọ 2018 ebe ọ nọdụrụ n'oche maka egwuregwu ise niile, na asọmpi Iko WAFU nke 2019 ọ nọ na goolu maka arụmọrụ Super Falcons dị egwu, wee nweta ọkwa dịka otu n'ime ndị nche atọ na-anọchite anya Super Falcons nke Naijiria na emere na France.
Ọ bụkwa mmemme izizi Nnadozie ghọrọ onye nche bọọlụ nwere ndekọ maka enyeghị gọọlụ na egwuregwu iko mba ụwa mgbe Naịjirịa jiri gọọlụ abụọ merie Korea.
Ka egwuregwu iko mba ụwa mechara, Nnadozie nyekwara ndị Falconets aka rite ọla edo na egwuruegwu mba Afrịka na Morocco mgbe o chekwara penariti atọ n'ịgba bọọlụ ha na Cameroon.
Nicole Asinugo bụ onye nduzi akụkọ, si Naijiria.
Ọ bụ onye na-akọ akụkọ, onye na-emepụta ihe na onye ederede ihe ngosi.
Ọ bụ onye mmeri (ya na ) na mmemme nke maka onye edemede ihe ngosi kachasị mma na ngalaba ihe nkiri fim ma ọ bụ Televishion na 2020 maka nyocha mbụ ya; "".
Ọ bụkwa onye dere ihe ngosi nke ihe nkiri bụ 'Rattlesnake'.
Ọ bụ onye na-akọ akụkọ na onye na-ahazi ọdịnaya maka mmemme na , mgbe ọ rụchara ọrụ ya dị ka onyeisi ndị editọ na onye na-emepụta ọdịnaya na Ndani TV.
Mmalite ndu na mmuta.
A mụrụ Asinugo na United Kingdom.
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na , ebe o nwetara nzere bachlọ maka (LLB) na 2010.
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, ọ nwetara asambodo Barrister na Iwu (BL) site na nke Naijiria na 2011.
Mgbe ahụ ọ gara na 2012 ebe ọ nwetara (PGD) na mmuta nchikota ma mgbasa ozi akpọọrọ Journalism na-asụsụ bekee.
Ọrụ.
Asinugo bụ onye nchịkọta akụkọ na "In and out magazine" na 2010 nke bụ akwụkwọ gbasara njem nke Niajiria.
Na 2012, ọ gara na dị ka onye edemede akụkọ, maka akụkọ banyere , na .
Na 2013, ọrụrụ ọrụ na ụlọ akpọrọ na Lagos ruo afọ atọ bụrụ nnukwu onye ode akwụkwọ.
O mepere ụfọdụ ụlọ ọrụ akwụkwọ gunyere Diageo, Pernod Ricard, Unilever, na yana ịmepụta ihe ọhụụ maka ngosiputa na igbasa ozi.
Na 2016 Asinugo sonyeere Ndani TV na Lagos, dịka onyeisi ndi nduzi na onye na-emepụta ihe.
Ọrụ Asinugo dịka onyeisi ndi nduzi akụkọ mere Ndani lifestyle boro ya ebubo maka okike, ịmalite na ijikwa Ndani lifestyle.
O bu onye na emeputa ma na-akwado ihe ngosi Ndani TV nke bụ "Real Talk".
Ọ hapụrụ ọrụ ya na Ndani TV maka "World Epo 2020" emere na dị ka onye na-akọ akụkọ na onye na-emepụta ihe ọgụgụ na 2020, ebe ọ na-ahazi akụkọ maka obodo.
Na 2019, o mepụtara ihe ngosi izizi ya "" nke so merie onyinye na mmemme nke Africa Magic viewers' choice awards (AMVCA) ya na CJ Obasi na February 6, 2020, na na , Lagos.
Na Eprel 2020, o mechara ihe nkiri ya nke abụọ bụ ‘‘Rattle Snake’’.
O nwere blọgụ akpọọrọ "2 scoops of life and style", ebe o na-akọrọ ahụmịhe ya na ọdịbendị ndị Naijiria na ịba ọgaranya maka mmadu ịbi naanị ya na Lagos.
Blọọgụ ahụ nwere ngalaba , ebe ọ na-ezute ya na ndị na-agụ akwụkwọ ma tụlee akwụkwọ mmasi.
Onyinye na nhọpụta.
Asinugo natara onyinye maka ọrụ ya dịka onye mmeri nke onye edemede ihe ngosi kacha mma na fim ma ọ bụ usoro TV na mmemme nke asaa maka Africa Magic viewers 'Choice Awards (AMVCA).
Nike Oshinowo (onye amụrụ Adenike Asabi Oshinowo na 1966) bụ onye si Naijiria na-eme ekwurekwu na igwe onyoyo, onye ọchụnta ego na onye na-ahazi (mgbe ochie) asọmpi nwaanyị mara mma karia.
Mmalite ndụ.
A zulitere Oshinowo na Ibadan na , ebe ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ obibi.
Agbanyeghị na ọ bubu n'uche ịbụ onye ma ọ bụ , ọ gụrụ mmuta na Mahadum .
Ka o nwetara akara ugo mmụta, onye bụbu Miss Nigeria, , zulitere Oshinowo, maka inọchite anya ndị Rivers na asọmpi wee bụrụ onye mbụ Yoruba meriri ya.
(ọ chịrị site na 1990 ruo 1991) Mmeri ya dọtara esemokwu sitere na ndị na-enene na ndị nta akụkọ na-eso asịrị na a rụrụ asọmpi ahụ arụ maka ya.
Ka ọ na-erule n’ọgwụgwụ ọchịchị ya, Oshinowo, na mkparịta ụka ya na magazin, gbara mbọ imeju asịrị ahụ site n’ikwu na Perst-Davies enweghị aka na mmeri MBGN ya.
Ọrụ.
Mgbe ọ chịchara ọchịchị ya nke mere ya zọọ asọmpi na , Oshinowo pụtara na azụmahịa maka ndị mmeputa ude; Venus de Milo, ma kwado ngosipụta ejiji na ịma mma na telivishọn Naijiria.
Azumahịa ya gụnyere ụlọ oriri nri Afrika, ụlọ ahụike na ịchọọ mma nke o lekọtara ruo afọ asaa tupu eresị ya mgbe ọ kpebiri ịmepụta ọtụtụ ngwaahịa mma maka ahịa Naijiria.
Na Januwarị 17, 2010, e wepụtara ihe ngosi maka mmega ahụ bụ "Nike Oshinowo: Fit, Forty and Fabulous".
Na 2010, na mbọ nke ụgbọrụ isii, Oshinowo zụtara wee bụrụ onyeisi mmemme nke n'aka ndị mbụ na-ahazi ya bụ "Daily Times," mechara ghọrọ onyeisi ihe nduzi nke mmemme ahụ.
Ka ọ na-erule afọ 2012, ọ nọzịghịzi na-ọkwa ahụ, mana ọ na-arụ ọrụ ugbu a na asọmpi ọzọ nke onye mmeri ga-achị ruo otu narị afọ.
N’afọ 2014, Oshinowo malitere oru ya na "Late Night ya na Nike Oshinowo" na .
Ndụ onwe.
Oshinowo, onye maara asụ asusu ise (, , , , na ) luru onye dibia bekee aha ya bụ Tunde Soleye n’afọ 2006, mana ugbua ha gbara alukwaghim.
N’afọ 2009, nwunye ochie Tunde, Funmilayo, gbara Tunde na nwunye ya akwụkwọ ikpe nke kwuru na Oshinowo enweghi ntụkwasị obi ebe Tunde nọ n'ihi omume wawawa n’oge alụm di na nwunye ha.
Mgbe ọ rụtere afọ 47, ọ ghọrọ nne ejima site na usoro nke a na-akpọ na mba Amerika.
Helen Prest-Ajayi, nke bụbu Prest-Davies, ( née Prest, a mụrụ 17 Septemba 1959) bụ onye ọka iwu Naịjirịa, onye edemede ma bụbu onye meriri okpueze na asọmpi nwanyị mara mma.
Helen toro na .
Ọ gara ma nweta asambodo A-Levels na Mahadum .
Mgbe e nyechara ya okpueze mgbe ọ dị afọ 19 na 1979, ọ nọchitere anya Naijiria na asọmpi ma kwalite agụmakwụkwọ ya na , nweta LLM.
Ọ na-arụsi ọrụ ike dị ka onye na-ede akụkọ na 1990s.
Ugbu a ọ bụ onye isi nke Media Business Company.
Ọ bụ nwa nwa nke onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Naijiria bụ na ada nke onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị bụ Chief Michael Godwin Prest.
Ọ mụrụ ụmụ nwanyị atọ.
Ọ lụrụ di ya mbu, onye ọchụnta ego; Jimmy Davies, mgbe alụm di na nwunye ahụ mechara, o ya lụọ Dr Tosin Ajayi.
Nkechi Akashili (amụrụ na 22 Febrụwarị 1990) bụ onye na-agba si Naijiria maka otu klọb ndị na ndị n'egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwaanyị.
Ọrụ mba ụwa.
O sonyere na egwuregwu asọmpi nke .
Ayoleyi Hanniel Solomon onye amụrụ n'abalị isii n'ime ọnwa Disemba ,1993, nke amara aha ya dịka Reekado Banks, bụ onye Naịjirịa onye ọbụ abụ na onye na-ede abụ.
Ọ bịanyere aka na Mavin Records na 2014 wee hapụ labeelụ ahụ na 2018.
Ọ ụbụrụ etiti aha Spicy tupu ya edekọ ihe ndekọ Mavin.
Akpọrọ Reekado Banks onye mmalite nke afọ na The Headed 2014, wee merie ihe Nrite mgbaha bu Next Rated na isi The Headed 2015 .
Ewepụtara albọm studịo mbụ ya bụ Spotlight na n'abalị̀ mbụ n'ime ọnwa Septemba 2016; ọ pụtara dịka onye nke ise n'ọnụ ọgụgụ na "Billboard" na albọm chaat nke ụwa.
Ndụ na ọrụ.
Reekado Banks bụ nwa ikpeazụ nke ezinụlọ hụrụ egwu n'anya.
Nna ya bụ pastọ si Ondo Steeti ma nne ya bụ onye na-esi nri.
Ọzọkwa, nwanne ya nwoke nke okenye bụ onye na-emepụta ihe na nwanne ya nwanyị nke okenye bụ onye na-agụ abụ ozioma.
O tolitere site iji ọzụzụ aka ike n'ihi na nne na nna ya bụ ndị ozuzu aturu.
Ọ gụsịrị ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na anọ, wee malite ịdekọ abụ mbụ ya na 2008.
Nwanne ya nwoke mepụtara abụ mbụ ya niile ma kụziere ya ntọala egwu, ide na ịmepụta.
O nwetara aha ogbo Reekado Banks site na ijikọta ihe aha abụọ ahụ pụtara; akụkụ mbụ nke aha ogbo ya sụgharịrị ịbụ "onye ọchịchị siri ike", ebe akụkụ nke ikpeazụ sụgharịrị ya "akụnụba".
N’afọ 2014, Reekado Banks gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum nke Lagos na asambodo nke mmụta Hịstrị na Strategik Stọdị O hotara Don Jazzy, 2face Idibia, DJ Jimmy Jatt, Olamide na ￼￼M.I￼￼ dị ka ndị egwu n'enye ya mkpali mmụọ.
Ihe Ndekọ na Nka Mavin.
Ihe ndekọ ya na ihe ndekọ Mavin sitere na nwanne ya nwoke inyefe ụfọdụ abụ ya na labeelụ na nyocha ngosi akara aka n'ịntanetị.
Reekado Banks bịanyere aka na Mavin Records mgbe ahọpụtara ntinye ya site na ntinye puku ise.
N'ajụjụ ọnụ nke "National Mirror", ọ sịrị na nwanne ya nwoke nyefere abụ ya ma so kpakọrita na ajụghi nkwenye mbụ ya.
Reekado Banks gwakwara "National Mirror" na ọ bụ onye omenkà na-eme egwu site n'echiche na mmadụ dị iche ma nwee uto dị iche.
Afọ 2014 ruo ugbu a:nhapụ ọ hapụrụ Otu Ndekọ Mavin na sịngụl ya.
Reekado Banks bidoro otu "Turn It Up" na 21 Febrụwarị 2014, nke dabara n'otu ụbọchị ọ bịanyere aka na otu ndekọ Mavin.
Egwu a gosipụtara Tiwa Savage, ma e wepụtara ya dịka egwu sịngụl mbụ ya pụtara ìhè n'okpuru ndekọ Mavin.
Reekado Banks gosipụtara na egwu kpụ ọkụ n'ọnụ bụ " Dorobucci ", tinyere Don Jazzy, Korede Bello, Tiwa Savage, Di'Ja, Dr SID na D'Prince .
Reekado Banks sokwa ụfọdụ ndị Omenka a akpọrọ aha rụọ ọrụ ma wepụta Egwu Sịngụl atọ emekọrọ ọnụ bụ: "Adaobi", "Arise" na "Looku Looku" Na 13 February 2015, ọ wepụtara egwu Don Jazzy nke arụpụtara bụ"Katapot".
E boro ebubo sị na ọ bụ usoro ntụgharị dị iche na nke D'banj na Wande Coal .
Na February 2015, Don Jazzy kwupụtara ebubo ahụ na ọtụtụ twiit.
Mgbe ọ na-agwa akwụkwọ akụkọ "Vanguard", Reekado Banks kwuru na ya kụpụtars"Katapot" maka ndị na-akwado ya.
Na ọnwa Julaị 2015, ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi nke Nigeria bụ Globacom bịanyere aka na Reekado Banks maka nkwekọrịta nkwado.
Abalị asaa n'onwa Disemba 7, 2018, o kwuputara ọpụpụ ya na otu Ndekọ́ Mavin mgbe afọ ise gachara.
O kwupụtakwara mmalite nke ụlọ ọrụ ya Banks Music.
Dr SID
Aha Sidney Onoriode Esiri
Amaara ya dịka Dr SID
Amụrụ 1 Mee 1980 (afọ 40)
Ikeja, Legọọsụ Steeti, Naịjirịa
Nkenụụdị Afurobiiti
Aka ọrụ Otii-so egwu na odee egwu
Afọ ọ nọ ọrụ 2002–ugbua
Lebeelụ Trybe Records, Mo' Hits Records, Mavin Records
Ndị egwu D'banj, Mo' Hits Allstars, Don Jazzy, Wande Coal, Tiwa Savage, Lynxxx
Website iamdrsid.com
Sidney Onoriode Esiri (amụrụ na 1 Mee 1980 na Ikeja, Legọọsụ Steeti, Naịjirịa ), amakarị ya dịka, Dr SID.
O si na Delta Steeti mana amụrụ ya na Legọọsụ .
Nne ya bụ onye nrụpụta ejiji ebe nna ya bụ onye omee akụkọ amaara Justus Esiri onye so na "Member Order of the Niger" (MON), ma bụrụ onye ama ama maka ọrụ ya dị ka Onyeisi ụlọ akwụkwọ Obodo na ihe oyonyo ọchị na Naijiria na 1980. . Nwa nke abụọ nke ụmụ anọ.
Site na nwata o bu n'obi ka ọ bụrụ onye na-eme egwuregwu.
Otu o sila dị ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Naịjirịa Air Force Sekọndịrị Sukulu ikeja, SID gara Mahadum nke Ibadan, Ibadan (UI) iji mụọ Eze na Dọkịta eze .
N'oge agụmakwụkwọ ya, ezoghị ezo maka ntụrụndụ ya ọ na-esonye n'egwuregwu ụlọ akwụkwọ, asọmpi ịgba egwu na egwuregwu, na-emeri ọtụtụ onyinye.
Ọrụ.
Dr SID bịanyere aka na aha ọhụụ ọhụrụ akpọrọ "Trybe Records" (onye wepụtara ndị otu hipụ họpụ otu Trybesmen ) dịka onye na-edekọ akụkọ.
Ọ ga-anọ afọ atọ na-agagharị dị ka ndị na-agba egwu maka ndị Trybesmen .
[ "see okwu dị mkpa" ]
2002.
Dr SID nwetara ohere ya n'ihu igwe okwu, mgbe emere ya onye otu Da Trybe, ma nye ya ohere na egwu nke butere ngagharị iwe na Naịjirịa Hipụ-họpụ, "OYA" na 2002 n'akụkụ Sasha, 2-Shotz, Timi, DEL, na ndị Trybesmen (Eldee, Kb na Freestyle).
N'ime afọ na-esote SID dere ndekọ egwu mbido ya "Don't Stop" ma nwee vidiyo ahụ na nke mbụ na MBI kachasị iri na izu asatọ,o jidere ọrụ egwu ya ka ọ were otu afọ iji gụchaa nzere mahadum ya.
[ "see okwu dị mkpa" ]
2004.
Dr SID ghọrọ dọkịta eze ruru eru.
Ọ kwagara UK na-arụ ọrụ ya na ndị dịka JJC &amp; ndị otu 419, Felix Duke, KAS, R70 na D'Banj .
Mgbe ọ laghachiri Naịjirịa, ọ nọrọ otu afọ na-arụ ọrụ n'ụlọ ọgwụ "Legọọsụ University Teaching Hospital", wee gawa ọrụ mba ya na Yola na steeti Adamawa Ọ rụkwara ọrụ n’ụlọ ọgwụ eze dị iche iche, na-ejikọ ezé na egwu.
2005.
Ọ malitere idekọ studiyo abọm nke akpọrọ "Prognosis" nke gosipụtara egwu "Raise da roof".
A hoputara ya na ụdị ọrụ ọhụrụ kacha mma na 2005 Amen Awọdụ.
Ọ hapụrụ abọm ahụ na 2006.
[ "see okwu dị mkpa" ]
2007.
Dr SID mgbe afọ atọ gachara kpebiri siri ịkwụsị ịbụ onye dọkịta eze wee lekwasị anya na ọrụ egwu ya ebe ọ bianye aka na ndekọ egwu Don Jazzy "Mo 'Hits Records" ma dekọọ egwu Mo' Hits nke ndị egwu niile akpọkọtara ọnụ na abọm "Curriculum Vitae (CV)" nke ewepụtara na Disemba 2007.
Ọ gosipụtara na asaa nke egwu iri na ise ewepụtara na abọm ahụ, nke gụnyere "Booty Call" na "Close to You".
[ "see okwu dị mkpa" ]
2008.
Dr SID nọrọ ọtụtụ n'ime 2008 na Mo Hits ndị egwu niile na-agagharị, ma na-eme ụfọdụ egwu, gụnyere "Thisday Music Festival" na "Star Mega Jam" .
[ "see okwu dị mkpa" ]
2009.
Dr SID malitere ịdekọ ihe nkiri studiyo izizi ya dịka onye egwu n'okpuru 'Mo' Hits Records ya na onye nrụpụta Don Jazzy .
egwu mbụ nke abọm "Turning Point" bụ nke akpọrọ "Something About You" nke ewepụtara na Septemba 2009 ma ugbua nke na-agbago chaatị Afrịka ya na egwu abụọ Winchi Winchi ft Wande Coal na Pop Something ft D'banj .
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ na "MTV Afrịka Muziki Awọdụ" na Kenya dịka onye otu Mo 'Hits na-eti egwu n'akụkụ D'banj, Wande Coal na onye egwu Kenyan bụ STL.
2010–2011.
"Mo 'Hits Records" wepụtara abọm mbụ Dr SID "Turning Point" na 11 Epurel Egwu Dr SID nke abụghị "Turning Point", "Over the Moon", gbara nke mbụ na Naijiria nke egwu iri kacha elu.
2012.
Dịka ndị enyi ha sere okwu na Mo 'Hits Records nke D'banj na Don Jazzy, Dr SID abanyela aka na nke Don Jazzy Mavin Records .
Ọ nwekwara egwu atọ site na ọba egwu ya na-abịa na Mavin Records mkpokọta abọm akpọrọ: Solar Plexus .
2013.
Dr Sid wepụtara abọm abụọ ya nke akpọrọ Siduction
2014.
Dr. Sid gosipụtara na ihe nkiri Moses Inwang "Last 3 Digits".
O gosipụtara dịka onye NYSC kọpa na enyi nonso Diobi na ihe nkiri a. Ọ meriri ihe Nkiri Kasị Mma nke Ndị Mmadụ na Paris, France.
Dr SId mepụtara otu egwu ya na ọgbọSurulere nke MTV Afrịka Muziki awọdụ na Durban.
Nneka Colleen Egbujiobi bụ onye ọkaiwu si obodo Naijiria.
Ọ bụ onye , onye amaara nke ọma dịka onye guzọbere Hello Africa ma bụrụ onye isi oche ya.
Mmụta na ọrụ.
Egbujiobi gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum nke nweta asambodo maka asụsụ Bekee na akwụkwọ ọgụgụ, tupu ya agaa Mahadum mmuta iwu nke ebe ọ natara akara ugo mmụta na iwu na 2012 wee bụrụ onye ọkaiwu, na-arụ ọrụ na , California.
N’oge ya na Mahadum Michigan, ọ bụ onye nta akụkọ mahadum nke .
Mgbe ọ na-arụ dika okaiwu maka afọ ole na ole, ọ guzọbere Hello Africa, ngwa mkpakọrịta nwoke na nwaanyị n'ịntanetị.
Egbujiobi rụrụ ọrụ dịka onye ntaakụkọ maka .
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ mgbe ọ bụbụ onye isi ndị ụlọ nnọchite anya nke .
Ndụ ya niime.
A mụrụ Egbujiobi na , Massachusetts ma o tolitere na Wisconsin.
O si , na .
Nna ya bụ Leo Egbujiobi, onye dọkịta na-ahụ maka ọrịa gbasara obi na onye ọrụ ebere.
Nne ya bụ Bridget Egbujiobi.
N’afọ 1979, nne na nna ya si Naịjirịa kwaga Amerịka.
Chicmah Obodo bụ Naijiria judoka onye zọrọ mpi nke ụmụ nwanyị na udi.
O ritere nrite ọla nchara n'afọ 1999 n'egwuregwu nke nile Afrịka na otu arọ iri asaa.
N'afọ 1999, o sonyere na egwuregwu niile nke Afrịka nke emere na Johannesburg, South Afrịka .
O nwetara ọla nchara n’ihe omume ụmụ nwanyị nke arọ iri asaa.
Gladys akpa (amụrụ ya na 1 Jenụwari afọ 1986) bụ onye Naijiria n'agba bọọlụ dika onye na-agbachitere maka otu mba umu nwanyi na naijiria .
O so na ndi otu egwuregwu n'afọ 2010 African Women's Championship na 2012 African Championship .
Na ọkwa klọb, ọ na-egwuri egwu maka Sunshine Queens na Naijiria.

Ntụrụndụ
Afọ ọ nọ ọrụ 2015—ugbua
Lebeelụ Fly Boy Inc
Ndịegwu 
Wizkid,
Nasty C, Tiwa Savage, Davido
Oluwatobiloba Daniel Anidugbe, onye akpọrọ Kizz Daniel, bụ onye Naịjirịa na-eti egwu na onye na-ede egwu.
A maara ya nke ọma maka egwu " Woju " na "Yeba".
Ọ gara na aha ọgbọ ya bụ Kiss Daniel tupu ọ gbanwee ya na Mee 2018.
Ọ bịanyere aka na ndekọ egwu "G-Worldwide Entertainment" na 2013, ma hapụ lebeelụ ahụ maka esemokwu nkwekọrịta ọha na eze na ụlọ ikpe.
O guzobere akara ndekọ ndekọ "Fly Boy Inc" na Nọvemba 2017.
Ndụ mbido.
A mụrụ Kizz Daniel na Abeokuta, Ogun steeti, Naịjirịa.
O si na okpuru ọchịchị obodo Ugwu Abeokuta.
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ Abeokuta Grammar ma gụsịa akwụkwọ na Mahadum Federal nke Ọrụ Ugbo, Abeokuta, na 2013, na ogo mmụta na "Water Resources Management" na "Agrometeorology" (Water Engineering).
Mgbe ọ nọ na mahadum, o kpebiri ịchụ egwu dị ka ọrụ n'akụkụ ọmụmụ ihe ya.
Ọrụ egwu.
Na Mee 2015, Daniel wepụtara egwu nke atọ na-agbaso, “Laye,” na ụbọchị ncheta ọmụmụ ya, ya na vidiyo mgbe izu abụọ gachara nke emere n’ebe dị iche iche na mpaghara ọwụwa anyanwụ Afrịka na nke AJE FILMS duziri.
Kizz Daniel wepụtara studiyo abọm izizi ya akpọrọ New Era na Mee 14, 2016.
Mgbe ọpụsịrị na lebeelụ mbụ ya G-WorldWide ọ gara mepee lebeelụ nke aka ya FLYBOY INC nke ha bịanyere aka ndị ọrụ egwu ọhụrụ abụọ Demmie Vee na Philkeyz.
Mgbe nke a gasịrị, Kizz Daniel gosipụtara na egwu Demmie Vee aha ya bụ "You Go Wait?".
2018 bụ ezigbo afọ maka onye egwu WOJU, ọ na-egosipụta Wizkid (onye na-eti egwu) na egwu "FOR YOU" na onye isi DMW, Davido na egwu "One Ticket" nke na-ewu ewu n'ime awa iri abụọ na anọ nke mwepụta ya.
Na 30 Disemba 2018, Kizz Daniel wepụtara Studiyo abọm abụọ na nke mbụ ya n'okpuru FlyBoy Inc nke akpọrọ " No Bad Songz ".
Abọm ahụ nwere egwu iri abụọ tinyere nke ewepụtara One Ticket nke egosipụtara onyeisi DMW, Davido.
Akụkụ ndị ọzọ gosipụtara na Abọm ahụ gụnyere Nasty C, Diamond Platiumz, Philkeys, Demmie Vee, Dj Xclusive, Wretch 32, Diplo na Sarkodie.
Ndekọ ahụ nwetara nyocha dị mma site n'aka ndị hụrụ egwu n'anya, ọ pụtara na nke 55 na US iTunes Chaatị wee bụrụ nọmba 1 na chaatị mba ụwa n'ime awa iri abụọ na anọ mgbe ewepụtara ya.
Na 25 Juunu 2020, ọ wepụtara abọm nke atọ nke ‘King of Love’ 
Esemokwu ndekọ labeelụ na mgbanwe aha.
Na Nọvemba 2017, Kizz Daniel kwupụtara nkewa ya na aha ndekọ ya, G-Worldwide ma mepụta akara nke aka ya nke a na-akpọ FLYBOY INC Ndị ndekọ egwu mbụ gbara ya akwụkwọ mana ikpe amaghị ya ikpe maka ebubo eboro ya.
Na Mee 2018, Kizz Daniel kwupụtara na ya agbanweela aha ọgbọ ya site na Kiss Daniel gaa Kizz Daniel, aha nke gosipụtara ozugbo na akaụntụ mgbasa ozi ya.
ọ debara Akantụ ọhụrụ ozugbo na Spotify na Apple Music na aha Kizz Daniel, ya na egwu ọhụrụ ya.
Na Juunu 2018, Kizz Daniel bụ onye na-edekọ aha na G-Worldwide mere njem iji nweta ikike aha "Kizz Daniel" dịka nke ya ma nyekwa onye egwu ahụ ndụmọdụ ka ọ kwụsị iji aha ahụ ma ọ bụ chee nsonaazụ iwu na akwụkwọ akụkọ nke ezipụrụ n'ụlọ mgbasa ozi.
Onyinye Showemimo (amụrụ ya na 24 Mee afọ 1974) bụ onye Naijiria n'agba bọọlụ dika onye n'agaa n'ihu maka otu mba umu nwanyi na naijiria .
O so na otu ndi FIFA World Cup 1991 .
Na ọkwa klọb, ọ na-egwuri egwu maka Kakanfo Babes na Naijiria.
Onyinye Ele Otuwe (amụrụ na 15 Julaị afọ 1984) bụ onye Naijiria n'agba bọọlụ dika onye etiti.
Ọ gbara maka 1207 Antalya Spor na ụmụ nwanyi Turkish n'agba bọọlụ nke mbụ.
Obu onye otu ndi Naijiria, na-ekere òkè na 2004 Summer Olimpik na 2007 World Cup .
Ọ na-egwuri egwu maka FC Minsk na Belarus na-etinye oge iri itoolụ na asas ma na-atụle ihe mgbaru ọsọ iri atọ na anọ tupu ọ kwaga Turkey na Machị afọ 2017.
Kehinde Vaughan (amụrụ na 19 Disemba afọ 1961) bụ nwaafọ Naijirịa n'agba ọsọ.
O sonyeere na mita 400 nke ụmụ nwanyị n'afọ 1980 Summer Olympics.
Fatima Bashir (amụrụ na 8 Jenụwari, afọ 1995) bụ Naijiria judoka onye zọrọ mpi nke ụmụ nwanyị na udi.
O ritere ọla nchara n’egwuregwu mba Afrịka nke 2015 n’arọ iri anọ na asatọ.
Ọrụ egwuregwu.
Fatima Bashir nwetara ọla nchara n’ihe omume ụmụ nwanyị arọ iri anọ na asatọ na Egwuregwu Afrịka 2015 niile emere na Brazzaville, Republic of the Congo .
Dayo Oyewusi (amụrụ afọ 1966) bụ onyeNaijiria n'atu badminton.
Ọ zọrọ asọmpi Egwuregwu Commonwealth na 1994 na Victoria, Canada.
O meriri na asọmpi mba Kenya nke 1991 na mmemme ụmụ nwanyị abụọ jikọrọ Obiageli Olorunsola .
Mmezu.
Mba IBF.
"Umu nwanyi otu"
"ụmụ nwanyị abụọ"
"Ngwakọta abụọ"
Osita Iheme, (amuru ya na izu iri-abuo n'onwa abụọ n’afọ 1982) bu onye amara aha ya na- eme ihe nkiri na Naijiri rụrụ Pawpaw na ihe nkiri "" sonyere n'ịrụ ihe nkiri a. Ọ bụ onye chọpụtara Inspired Movement Africa nke ọ chọpụtara iji kpalie, na-akpali ma na-akpali uche nke ndị na-eto eto Naijiria na Africa.
N’afọ 2007, Iheme natara akara ugo mmụta ihe eji enyere "ndụ aka" na .
E were ya dịka otu n’ime ndị na-eme ihe nkiri ama ama n’obodo Naijiria.
N’afọ 2011, Onye isi ala Goodluck Jonathan kwanyere ya ugwu dịka onye otu (MFR)
Mbido Ndụ ya.
Ọ bụ onye , Naijiria.
Iheme toro na Abia State ma nwee nzere nke Sayensị na Kọmputa Sayensị na Mahadum Lagos steeti 
Ọrụ.
Ná mmalite ọrụ ya Osita Iheme rụrụ ọrụ na ihe nkiri ole na ole dịka nwatakịrị.
N'afọ 2003 ọ bụrụ onye ama ama mgbe ya na rụrụ ihe nkiri ọchị "" nke ọ rụrụ dịka Pawpaw na ihe nkiri ahụ.
Ọ rụọla ọrụ ihe nkiri dịka nwatakịrị n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri ya mana o mechara na-arụ dịka onye tozuru oke.
Mmadụ abụọ mechara bụrụ otu n'ime ndị kachasị atọ ọchị na Nollywood site na mgbe o bidoro ruo ugbu a
Ọ bụ onye nnọchi anya ọgbara ọhụụ na Rotary International District 9110 buru kwa onye ode akwụkwọ "INSPIRED 101" .
Iheme enwetala ihe nkiri karịrị otu narị ma bụrụkwa otu n’ime ihu ndị ama ama na Nollywood.
Dika onye so ya eme ihe nkiri bụ , Iheme nwere obere ahụ.
Ụdi ahụ Iheme nwere nyere ya uru nke ịdị iche na ndị ọzọ na-eme ihe nkiri na .
O gbanweela n'ọrụ ya site na onye na-eme ihe nkiri ọchi baa onye omee ihe nkiri egwuregwu dị iche iche gbara ezigbo mgbọrọgwụ.
Nke a emeela ka a na a kwanyere ya ùgwù na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri Naijiria niile nakwa ndị niile na-akwado ya.
Nsọpụrụ.
Iji kwụọ ya ụgwọ ọrụ maka enyemaka ya maka uto nke ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri Naịjirịa, n'afọ 2011 e nyere ya nsọpụrụ mba Naịjirịa nke onye otu Order of the Federal Republic (MFR) site n’aka onye isi ala Goodluck Jonathan .
Mmetụta.
Arụmọrụ ya na onye ome ihe nkiri obere dịka ya bụ Chinedu Ikedieze na ihe nkiri n'afọ 2002 bụ "Aki na Ukwa" ka a na-ekwukarị ebe niile na mmadụ abụọ a ọ kachasi omume Osita na-agagharị site na foto kemgbe 2019 na Twitter nakwa usoro intanetị mgbasa ozi ndị ọzọ di n'ụwa niile.
Nke a mechara nwetara ya nkwado bur ezigbo ibu n'ụwa niile.
Charles Inojie bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na Nigeria, onye na-akpa ọchị, onye nduzi ihe nkiri na onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri.
A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ egwuregwu ya.
Mmalite ndụ ya na mmụta.
Charles si n’ezinụlọ ndị eze.
O tolitere n'ụlọ nne nne ya, o siri ya ike icheta nne ya n'ihi na mgbe ọ dị na nwata, e zigara ya na mpaghara ọzọ maka ebumnuche nke ịchekwa nne nne ya merela agadi.
Ọchịchọ obi ya bụ ịbụ onye ọka iwu, mana ọ gbanwere obi ya mgbe ọ gara ebe ndị ode akwụkwọ Bode Osoyin nọ, ebe ọ kpebiri inweta asambodo na nka.
dị ịrịba ama n'afọ 1993, o mezuru ebumnuche a ma mesịa gụọ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Port Harcourt n'afọ 1999.
Ọrụ.
Mgbe o kpebiri ime ihe nkiri, ọ sonyeere otu dị iche iche na ihe nkiri na obodo ya wee malite ịme ihe nkiri.
O mechara kpebie ịmatakwu ihe omuma banyere ịme ihe nkiri mgbe ọ debanyere aha maka mmemme otu afọ na Bode Osoyin's Writers Resort, bụ ebe ọ nwetara akwụkwọ asambodo na Dramatic Arts mgbe ọ mechara mmemme ahụ na 1993.
Inojie sonyeere otu n'eme ihe nkiri na Naijiria akpọrọ Nollywood na-afọ.
Ọ malitere ọrụ ya na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye nchịkwa ihe nkiri na-enyere ya aka tupu ọ banye n'ime ihe nkiri oge niile na iduzi ihe nkiri.
A maara ya dịka onye na-eme ihe nkiri na-atọ ọchị mgbe niile ma kpọọ ya dịka otu n'ime ndị ahịa kachasị mma nke Naijiria.
Na mkparịta ụka ya na onye na-eme ihe ọchị na nso nso a, o mere ka a mata na mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Port Harcourt na-afo 1999, ọ kwagara na Lagos Steeti.
Ọ ghọrọ onye osote onye ntụzi aka na ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe nke Lancelot Oduwa Imasuen.
N’afọ 2016, ndị otu Screen Writers Guild nke Naijiria (SWGN) jiri otu olu họpụta Inojie dịka onye isi oche otu ndị ọrụ ha.
Mmetụta.
N’afọ 2016, ndị otu si na Screen Writers Guild of Nigeria (SWGN) jiri otu olu họpụta Inojie ịbụ onye isi otu ọrụ ha.
Inojie lụrụ Obehi Obhiseh, ma nwee ụmụ abụọ.
Njikọ dị na mpụga.
Ikike njikwa
Nneka Abulokwe, OBE ( / ŋneka ˈabuːlɔːkwei / ) bụ amaara maka ọrụ ya dịka onye ochụnta ego banyere ọrụ nchịkwa dijitalụ.
Ọ bụ onye gụzọbere na onye isi ụlọ ọrụ nke MicroMax Consulting, yana otu n'ime ndị ọkachamara Afro-Caribbean nọ na UK sonyere na kọmitii nke nzukọ dijitalụ kachasị elu.
Na 2019, onye isi ya bụ kwanyeere ya ugwu dịka onye ọrụ nke Alaeze Ukwu Britain (Officer of the British Empire (OBE)) maka ọrụ ya banyere azụmahia. .
Mmalite ndu na mmuta.
A mụrụ ya na London.
Nna nna ya si Naijiria na nne ya si Jamaica ma o tolitere n'obodo Port Harcourt, Nigeria.
Na 1991, o nwetara nzere bachelọ na mmuta ihe mere eme site na Mahadum .
O mechara nweta nzere mastas na Mahadum ya na asambodo maka mmuta ọrụ ndụzi na azụmahia na .
Ọrụ.
Abulokwe bu onye okike ihe ọhụrụ teknuzu, onye ochụnta ego banyere ọrụ nchịkwa dijitalụ na onye isi oche.
O nwere ihe karịrị afọ iri abụọ na ise na ahụmịhe na ọrụ oyibo.
Ọ bụ onye guzọbere na onye isi, MicroMax Consulting.
Na 2013, o sonyere na kọmitii/ndị isi oche nke dị ka onye isi oche ha.
N’afọ 2017, Nneka ghọrọ onye isi oche, Board Nomination Committee (ISACA).
Dika onye isi oche nke ndi otu ahụ, o webatara usoro nhoputa ndi oru site na oru ndi ochichi.
Ọ kwalitere ndị-iche na itinye oganihu n'etiti njikwa nke nzukọ a. Na 2020 a họpụtara ya dịka onye isi, Mahadum .
Onyinye.
Na 2019, a kwanyere ya ugwu dị ka onye isi nke site n'aka onye isi mba Britain; maka ọrụ Azụmaahịa ya.
Na 2018, a họọrọ ya onye nke anọ na Financial Times Top 100 (BAME) Tech Leaders.
Ọ sokwa na ndepụta ikpeazụ nke Governance Professional of the Year 2018 Award site n'aka Governance Institute.
Na 2019, e gosipụtara Abulokwe na Power-list 100 dịka otu n'ime ndị isi ahịa azụmaahịa di ojii kachasị emetụta ọha, tinyekwa ya n'etiti ndị isi ojii 100 kachasị nwee mmetụta na UK.
Edepụtara Abulokwe n'ime mmadụ 100 kachasị si Afrika na Caribbean nke dị na UK.
Nneka Obiamaka Onyejekwe (a mụrụ 18 August, 1989 na ) bụ ọkaibe n’egwuregwu si na-agbaara otu ndị na .
A mụrụ ya na Hațeg na nne si Romania na nna si Naijiria, ha bụ ndị ọgụgụ isi, o tolitere na .
Otu n’ime ụmụnne ya nwoke, , na-agba egwuregwu handbọọlụ.
Olawunmi Okerayi, ónyé eji aha nkwago bụ DJ Lambo mara, bụ nwaafọ Naịjịrịa nwere nka n'ịkpọ egwu diski .
Egwu ya bu "Drank" bụ nke Reinhard mepụtara ,nke emere ezi nnyocha gbakwunyere ọkpụkpọ egwu ogologo oge .
A bịanyere aha ya na otu egwu Loopy na 2013 tupu ya na Chocolate City emekọ bụrụ otu na 2015.
O meriri DJ nwanyị nke Afọ na 2016 City People Entertainment Awards .
"Nigerian Entertainment Today" (NET) depụtara ya dị ka otu n'ime DJ Naịjirịa ise bụ ísí ahụrụ kwawa okpu ndị a ga atụ anya ha na 2015.
Na 2017, DJ Lambo so na DJ ole na ole ahọpụtara ịkpọ egwu na Big Brother Nigeria ’agba nke abụọ na emume Satọdee nke ihe ngosi "Big Brother Naija" .
Mmalite ndụ na ọrụ egwu.
Mmalite Ndụ.
DJ Lambo toro n'etiti ụmụnne nwoke ano na Nigeria .
Nna ya, DJ Tony Lewis metụtara ọrụ ya dị ka diski jockey .
Ọ malitere ọrụ aka ya na 2008–2009 dịka onye ama ama na Redio bụ Redio personality ((OAP) na ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi redio bụ Raypower 100.5 FM, Rhythm FM 94.7 Abuja, na Love 104.5 FM Abuja.
Nkà.
DJ Lambo na-akọwa ụda egwu ya dị ka njikọta nke egwu ụlọ,techno, afropop na hip hop .
abụ ya bụ "Drank" bụ nke Reinhard mepụtara ma mee ya ezi nnyocha tinyere ohere ọkpụkpọ ogologo oge.
Edebanyere aha ya na otu egwu Loopy na 2013 tupu ya na Chocolate City emekọnụ bụrụ otu na 2015.
N'ọnwa Maachị, 2017, ụlọ ọrụ Smirnoff hiwere ọgbakọ ime nhatanha nhọrọ egwu na nnọchite nke International Women's Day ,iji too umu nwanyị n'akpò egwu na gburugburu ụwa.
DJ Lambo bụ onye nke iri na asatọ n'ọnụ ọgụgụ ahọpụtara ,nke gbasara ụmụ nwanyị bụ ísí ahụrụ kwawa okpu na nhọrọ" Smirnoff Top Women Electronic Artists playlist" nke eji egwu"Motion" ya.
N'abalị̀ iri abụọ n'ọnwa Maachị, 2017, Smirnoff Nigeria mekwara emume nke Ụbọchị ncheta Ụmụ nwa na mba ụwa na ụlọ ezumike Crest dị na Jos ,nke ndị ahọpụtara ka ndị isi mmeri atọ ikpeazụ sokwa nọrọ na asọmpi nke Smirnoff X1 gbasara ụmụ nwaanyị n'akpọpụta egwu, ndị gụnyere DJ Lambo na DJ Spinall na mmemme ahụ.
Onye isi Choc Boi Nation.
N'abalị̀ iri na otu n'ọnwa Jun, 2017, e mere ya onye isi na onye isi oche nke Choc Boi Nation (CBN), akara ndekọ pụrụ iche nke Chocolate City Music .
Site na ọkwa a ọ ghọrọ otu n'ime nwanyị gbara mgbọrọgwụ na-ahụ maka ndekọ egwu na ụlọ ọrụ egwu na Nigeria .
Nzuko ndị ọrụ nta akuko a, nke emere na Lagoosụ, nke MI Abaga, Dice Ailed,joker na Loose kaynon, ndị otu ya na ndekọ labeelụ bịara.
Mmụta.
DJ Lambo nwere akara nzere na English and Literature na University of Abuja .
Ọrụ ndị ama ama.
Ọ gosipụtala n'ọtụtụ ihe omume na ihe ngosi na-ewu ewu kemgbe ogbakotere n'ọkwa, gụnyere:
Egwu.
Nke sịngụl
Tiwa Salvage
Albọm Studịo: atọ
Albọm ekpokọtara onu:otuIhe ngosi egwu bụ discography nke Tiwa Savage, onye Naịjịrịa na-agu egwu ,nwere, albọm studịo atọ, otu Albọm ekpokọtara, Sịngụl iri abụọ na atọ(tinyere asaa dị ka ndị omenkà egosipụtara,egwu emere Vidio iri, egwu ewere ndị nkwado dị anọ, egwu were ndị ọbịa dị ise na egwu emere ya obere ngosi.
Egwu Vidio.
Dịka isi Omenka
Dumebi Andrea Iyamah onye amụrụ n’afọ 1993, bụ onye Naịjirịa na Canada n'eme ihe gbasara Ejiji amụrụ ma zụlite na Lagos, Nigeria .
Ọ bụ onye isi oche na onye guzobere aha labeelụ ejiji bụ Andrea Iyamah nke na-ahụ maka ejiji agbamakwụkwọ, uwe eji egwu mmiri wdg.
A maara ya maka ejiji ụmụ nwanyị na uwe eji egwu mmiri, nke ndị ama ama dịka Gabrielle Union, Ciara na Issa Rae .
Mmalite Ndụ na mmụta.
Amụrụ Iyamah na Lagos, nye nne na nna bụ Andrew na Onyi Iyamah bu ndị si Ika na(Agbor ) dịka onye nke ano n'ime ụmụ anọ.
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ Grange na Lagos .
O nwere nzere bachelọ na Nkwukọrịta na Mọltịmidịa na McMaster University .
Ọ malitere akara ejiji ya bụ Ontario Canada n'oge ọ na-amụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum McMaster mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asaa, o wepụtara ntọala ụdị ejiji site na enyemaka na nkwado nke ezinụlọ ya na ndị enyi ya.
Ọrụ.
Iyamah malitere iwu akara ejiji ya bụ "Andrea Iyamah" mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asaa.
Isi ụlọ ọrụ "Andrea Iyamah" dị na Toronto, yana ụlọ ngosi ahịa ama ama na Lagos nke ebidoro n'afọ 2017 N'oge ọ malitere ịde blọgụ, ọ kesara ọrụ ya nke nka gụnyere eserese ejiji., ihe eserese, na foto ya na ndị na-ege ntị dijitalụ.
E gosipụtara otu n'ime atụmatụ ya na blọgú na-ewu ewu na 2011 nke kpalitere okike nke "Andrea Iyamah.
" Ọ tinyere ichụ na azụmaahịa ya ka ọ na-achụso mmụta mahadum,Ọ malitere site na ịkepụta akwa emume sitere n'aka ndị ahịa.
Ọ nụchahariri akara ahụ ka ọ gbasaa gaa na ngalaba ejiji atọ nke gunyere ejiji agbamakwụkwọ, akwa eji egwu mmiri ma ọ bụ akwa ọpụpụ.
Na nwebata ọzụzụ oke akwa eji egwụ mmiri na 2013, ọrụ ya enwetala nlebara anya site na ndị nrupụta akwa dịka Vogue, Elle, Essence, Refinery29, HuffPost, Cosmopolitan na ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ.
O meela ọtụtụ ihe ngosi ejiji n’Afrika, Europe, France, na United States ya na ndị ama ama dịka Ciara, Gabrielle Union, Genevieve Nnaji na ndị ọzọ yi ekike ya.
O gosiputara akara ngosi 2020 nke oge sọma nke izu ngosi Ejiji 2019 na Lagos.
Ndụ onwe.
Iyamah bụ nwa ikpeazụ n’ime ụmụaka anọ Andrew na Onyi Iyamah mụrụ.
Nna ya bụ ịnjịnịa site na agụmakwụkwọ ma nne ya bụ onye ọrụ nkà ịchọ mma nwere ogige ana eme isi na ebe a n'ere ákwà.
N'oge amụrụ ya, nne na nna ahụ bụ ndị ọchụnta ego, nwere azụmaahịa ha.
Mgbe ọ dị nanị afọ asaa, nna ya nwụrụ, ma ọ bụ nne ya zụlitere ya.
Nwanne ya nwanyị, onye na-eme ihe nkiri bụ Somkele Iyamah, bụ onye nduzi nke akara ejiji "Andrea Iyamah" .
R.A Thorburn onye amụrụ na Jenụwarị 10, 1974,eji aha nkwago bụ R.A the Rugged Man mara ya.
Ọ bụ onye Amerịka na- agụ egwu rap ma n'arụpụtakwa egwu.
Ọ malitere ọrụ egwu ya mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na abụọ,site n'iwuli nka ọ nwere n'egwu na mpaghara ụlọ.
Thorburn bịanyere aka na aJive Records bụ egwu nke gbagotara mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asatọ mana ewepụtaghị efere egwu ya nke mbụ bụ "Night of the Bloody Apes" .
Kemgbe ahụ ọ rụrụ na nkwado nke Mobb Deep, Wu-Tang Clan, Kool G Rap, and Notorious B.I.G., gbakwunyere ndị mmepụta egwu dị ka Erick Sermon, Trackmasters, DJ Quik, The Alchemist, J-Zone, and Ayatollah.
Ọ pụtara na albọm atọ niile kpụ ọkụ n'ọnụ nke Rawkus gbakwunyere nrepu otu ma ọ bụ abụọ nke albọm WWF Aggression .Ka otuCapitol Records weturu obere ezumike( nke ọ nwere ohere ya dekọ albọm n'ewepụtaghị bụ, "American Lowlife"), Thorburn bịanyere aka nkwekọrị́ta na labeelụ nọọrọ onwe ya bụ Nature Sounds ma wepụta ọrụ mbụ ya bụ, "Die, Rugged Man, Die".
Na 2013, Thorburn wepụtara albọm nke abụọ bụ, "Legends Never Die", site n'aka ọrụ Nature Sounds.
Na mgbakwunye na ọrụ hip họp ya, Thorburn nọ na-arụsi ọrụ ike dị ka onye na-ekwu okwu njikwa egwuregwu ịkụ ọkpọ na onye na-enyocha ihe nkiri.
O nyela aka na Vibe, King, Complex, "Rides", "XXL", "The Source," "The Ring" na ndị ọzọ.
O dere ma mepụta ihe nkiri otu nzuzo "Bad Biology", ma na-akwadokwa websaịtị "Film School" na MTV 's Film.com.
Ọrụ.
1992 ruo 2003: Mmalite.
N’afọ 1992, Thorburn sonyere Jive Records, n’ime etiti afọ ndị 1990,O binyere aka na priority Records / EMI .
Omechara nwee nkwekọrịta njikọ ya na Capitol Records mana ọ malitere ndekọ onwe ya na mmalite 2000.
Ya na ndị MC rụkọrọ ọrụ bụ ndị dịka The Notorious B.I.G￼￼, Mobb Deep, na Chuck D.  Ọ pụtara na albọm atọ niile kpụ ọkụ n'ọnụ nke Rawkus, gbakwunyere nrepu otu nde ma ọ bụ abụọ nke "WWF Aggression,n'emere" Chris Jericho isi egwu.
N'egwuEgo Trip olu nke mbụ,Ishu nke atọ, The Notorious B.I.G kwuru na-asị, "Echere m na m bụ onye ka ịdị njọ," mgbe ọ na-ekwu maka Thorburn.
2004–2012: Egwu "Rugged man Nwụ anwụ", n'egosipụta n'obere ihe nkiri na ederede magazin.
na 2004, Thorburn wepụtara albọm mbụ ya bụ "Die, Rugged Man, Die" site na akara ngosi sitere na Brooklyn Nature Sounds .
O nweela ọtụtụ vidiyo vgụnyere Havoc si Mobb Deep I am the Boss, Sadat X ' Throw the "Ball" na Masta Killa ' "Old Man na-" egosi RZA na Ol' Dirty Bastard .
Íshuu Ọktoba 2006 nke "The Source"gosipụtara amaokwu Thorburn naUncommon Valor: A Vietnam Story dị ka "Hịp-họp ọ kwoturu" nke ọnwa ahụ  na HipHopDX agụrụ aha dị ka "Amaokwu nke Afọ".
AllHipHop.com na-ekwu na "A ga-echeta ndekọ a maka akparamagwa robot nke R.A na-akọ akụkọ nna ya n'agha mgbe ọ n'akụpụ nkwa.
"  Mgbe a na-enyocha egwu ya "On the Block", Vibe Magazine kwuru, "Ahụrụ m egwu a n'anya.
Ọ na-awụm akpatoyi.
Ọ bụ nnọọ nchepụte echepụtara nke ọma " 
[ "see okwu dị mkpa" ][ "see okwu dị mkpa" ][ "see okwu dị mkpa" ][ "see okwu dị mkpa" ]
N'ịgbakwunye na ọrụ hip hop ya, Thorburn dere otu kọlụm ihe nkiri kwa ọnwa maka akwụkwọ "Mass Apppeal Magazine" , bụ onye na-enye aka na akwụkwọ ndétu rap Ego Trip na(N'ụlọ mbipụta akwụkwọ akụkọ St Martin ) na akwụkwọ gbasara ikpaoke agbụrụ nke Ego Trip nke(HarperCollins), ma dee ọtụtụ isiokwu maka akwụkwọ akụkọ ndị ọzọ gụnyere Vibe, King, Complex, "Rides", XXL na "The Source" .
[ "see okwu dị mkpa" ]
Dị ka onye ihe nkiri na-atụ ụjọ masiri, Thorburn edeela ihe ngosi atọ gbakwunyere onye nduzi ihe nkiri Frank Henenlotter bụ odee na onye mmepụta ihe nkiri Henenlotter "Bad Biology" .
Ihe nkiri a nwere akara mbụ site n'aka Josh Glazer(J.Glaze )tinyere mmepụta nke Prince Paul, na obere ihe ngosi nke onye ejiji nlereanya Playboy bụ Jelena Jensen na Pentihaụs peetibụ Krista Ayne.
Thorburn na-arụ ọrụ ntuziaka mbụ ya, ihe nkiri sitere gbasatara ezinụlọ ya, "Chineke Were, Chineke Nye" .
2013 – ugbu a: Asị dike "anaghị anwụ anwụ" ma ndị bụ "dikem niile anwụchala".
Ewepụtara albọm studịo nke abụọ nke Thorburn bụ "Legends Never Die" n'abalị iri atọ n'ọnwa Eprel,2013  Ndị ọbịa gosipụtara na ya bụ Brother Ali, Masta Ace, Tech N9ne, Talib Kweli, Hopsin, Eamon, and Krizz Kaliko.
Sịngụl ya nke mbụ na albọm a bụ"The Peoples Champ", nke abụọ bụ "Learn Truth" feat.
Talib Kweli.
Upon release the album debuted at number 1 on the US Billboard Ka ewepụtara albọm a, ọ gbara dịka nke mbụ n'ọnụ ọgụgụ na igbe ịma ọkwa nke US nke Heatseekers Albums chart, ma bụrụ nke iri na asaa na isi igbe ịma ọkwa nke Top R&amp;B/Hip-Hop Albums chart, ma nọrọ na nke otu narị na iri atọ na otu na Billboard 200.
N'afọ 2016, onye rap German bụ Kool Saves gosipụtara Thornburg na albọm studịo bụ n'egwu akpọrọ "Wahre Liebe".
Ewepụtara albọm nke atọ nkeThorbun, "All My Heroes Are Dead", na Eprel 17, 2020.
O gosipụtara ndị nka dịka Ghostface Killah, Eamon, Atmosphere, Ice-T, Vinnie Paz, Brand Nubian, Chino XL, MOP na Onyx .
Ndụ onwe.
Nna Thorburn, Staff Sgt.
John A. Thorburn, bụ onye agha Vietnam nke Agent Orange metụtara.
nne-ya nwoke Maxx mụrụ nwere nkwarụ ma kpuo ìsì, ma nwụọ mgbe ọ dị afọ iri.Nwanne Thorburn nke nwanyị, Dee Ann, nwụrụ n'afọ 2007 mgbe ọ dị afọ iri abụọ na isii.
Thorburn kọrọ akụkọ nna ya na " Uncommon Valor: A Vietnam Story ," site na albọm Jedi Mind Tricks :Servants in Heaven, Kings in Hell .
John A. Thorburn nwụrụ na Jenụwarị 7 2010 maka ọrịa kansa.
Thorburn sitere na German, Scottish na agbụrụ Sicilian.
Thorburn nwere ụmụ abụọ: Ella (amụrụ na 2016) na John A. Thorburn (amụrụ na 2017).
Uzoma Asagwara bụ onye ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị nke Canada ahọpụtara na Mgbakọ omebe iwu nke Manitoba na nhọpụta inke oha Manitoba na 2019 .
Ha na-anọchite mpaghara ntuli aka nke Union Station dị ka onye otu Manitoba New Democratic Party .
Tupu ntuli aka ha, Asagwara rụrụ ọrụ dịka nọọsụ na-agwọ ọrịa uche nke ọ gbakwasara ụkwụ n'ihe banyere ahụike ọgụgụ isi nke ndị okenye na ndị ntorobịa.
O nwere ọtụtụ akụkọ ihe mere eme dị ka Onye na-akwado obodo, onye nkuzi,onye nwere nka eji achụnta ego na onye na-akwado ahụike ọgụgụ isi ma na-eje ozi ugbu a dịka onye otu ndị isi ntuzi aka ụlọ ọgwụ na Ahụike ụmụ nwanyị.
Asagwara so kwa na basketball nke ụmụ nwanyị mba Canada nodị ka onye ndụmọdụ maka ndị ntorobịa na-eme egwuregwu na obodo Winnipeg.
N'afọ 2014, Asagwara guzobere otu gbanwere okike ahụ ha akpọrọ 'Queer People of Color' nke Winnipeg, atụmatụ sitere na Winnipeg nke na -emepụta oghere dị nchebe maka nnọchite nke ndị queer na ndị transgender nwere akpụkpa ahụ dị iche.
Asagwara, tinyere Jamie Moses na Audrey Gordon bụ ndị isi oji mbụ akpọrọ Black Canadian MLA họpụtara na Manitoba.
Ha bụ ndị isi oji queer mbụ nwetara ọchịchị na ndị MLA Manitoba mbụ meghariri okike ahụ ha.
Hauwa Ali (nwụrụ na afọ 1995) bụ onye ode akwụkwọ Naijiria a ma ama maka akwụkwọ akụkọ ya na-enyocha ndụ ụmụ nwanyị ndị Alakụba ma na-ewelite ajụjụ gbasara ụkpụrụ ndị Alakụba na nnwere onwe ụmụ nwanyị.
Akwụkwọ ọgụgụ ya a kacha mara amara, bụ "Destiny", nwetara ihe nrite Delta maka akụkọ ifo.
Ndụ.
Amuru ya na Gusau na ugwu hausa Naijiria .
Ọ kuziri ihe na Mahadum Maiduguri , e bipụtara akwụkwọ akụkọ ya na ngwụcha 1980.
N’afọ 1995 ọ nwụrụ site n’ọrịa ara ure.
Ide ihe.
Edere akụkọ ifo ya site na echiche nke otu nwa agbọghọ na-alụbeghị di ma gosipụta agụmakwụkwọ dịka "ọnụ ụzọ maka ọdịnihu".
Onye bụ isi n’etiti akwụkwọ ọgụgụ mbụ ya bụ "Destiny" (Enugu, 1988) bụ Farida dị afọ iri na isii.
Akụkọ a na - ebute esemokwu n'etiti, n'otu aka, agụmakwụkwọ, ọrụ, nnwere onwe na di nke nhọrọ Farida na, nke ọzọ, di nke na - eme ka ndị ikwu ya kwenye na ọ na - enye nchekwa ego, mana ọ na - anwa ịmanye ya ka ọ rubere ma kwenye nye nhọrọ ya niile.
Akwụkwọ nke abụọ ya,Victory (Enugu, 1989), na-aga n'ihu na ụfọdụ isiokwu ndị a ma na-ebutakwa ajụjụ gbasara alụm di na nwunye.
Otu onye nkatọ na-eme njikọ n'etiti nsogbu Farida na Islam, na-atụ aro na ọ na-egosi "nnabata ido onwe ya n'okpuru akara aka".
Onye ọzọ na-arụ ụka megide nke a ma na-ekwusi ike na "ọ chọghị ịda mbà" na ntinye aka ya n'ekpere, na-ahụ okwukwe ya dịka ike dị mma.
"Destiny" e kwuru na ọ bụ nke a "ọdịnala nke Islam MMALITEGHACHI, mgbe ijikwa ka iju ajuju ahụ n'ihi ya isiike ngwa".
A kọwawo Ali dị ka otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị na-ede akwụkwọ na 1990s ugwu hausa nke naijiria "na-enye olu maka ikike okike ha" n'ime "mgbidi nke okpukpe na ọdịbendị".
"Destiny" meriri ihe nrite Delta maka akụkọ ifo.

Website www.altarplate.ng
Harrison Tare Okiri, onye amaara aha ya dịka Harrysong, bụ onye Naịjirịa bụ onye na-eti egwu, onye na-ede egwu na onye na-emepụta ngwa egwu nke bụ onye ama ama maka abụ ụtụ ya nye Nelson Mandela nke meriri "Most Downloaded Callertune Award " na The Headies 2013 .
A mụrụ Harrysong na Warri, Delta Steeti, Naịjirịa nke nne na nna ya bụ ndịIjaw mana ọ kwagara Legọọsụ na 2007 mana ntolite nwata ya bụ na Port Harcourt .
Tupu obanye na "QuestionMark Entertainment", Harrysong na-agụ egwu na klọb abalị ruo mgbe ọ zutere Kcee bụ onye mere ka ọ mata ndị egwu kachasị elu.
N’afọ 2014, a họpụtara Harrysong na “Best Pop / R &amp; B Onye egwu nke afọ” na nke Ntụrụndụ Naịjirịa nke afọ 2014 ka ewepụtara egwu ya na'elu chaatị “Beta Pikin”.
Mmalite ndụ na Agụmakwụkwọ.
A mụrụ Harrysong dịka naanị nwa, nne na nna ya bụ ndị Ijaw bi na Warri, Delta Steeti mụrụ.
Mgbe nne ya nwụsịrị, mmekọrịta dị nro dị n'etiti ya na nwunye nna ya mere ya ka ọkwụsị akwụkwọ.
Itinye aka na egwu toro mgbe ọ kwagara Port Harcourt.
Ọrụ.
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na otu, ọrụ egwu Harrysong malitere dị ka onye na-eti egwu kọnga n'ụlọ uka ahụ nne ya jere ozi dị ka onye ntụzi egwu tupu ọ gawa n'ihu ịmụ egwu ozioma ọgbara ọhụrụ.
Na 2007, ọ kwagara Legọọsụ dịka onye na-agụ egwú nke otu gbalaga na-eme egwu na klọb abalị ruo mgbe ọ zutere Kcee nke dugara ya ịbanye akara "Five Star Music".
ọmụma ya malitere mgbe ọ wepụtara egwu "I'm in Love" na vidiyo egwu "Taiye &amp; Kehinde" nọ na elu vidiyo egwu ndị Trace TV .
Ọ gara n’ihu ịwepụta abọm "izizi ya Testify" site na "QuestionMark Entertainment" na 2012.
Mana, tupu coronavirus abanye Naịjirịa ọ wepụtara egwu ọhụrụ akpọrọ "Bumbumbum" nke ya na Davido jikọrọ ọnụ.

M-Josh
Okechukwu Edwards Ukeje, onye amaara nke ọma na aha ya bụ Mr Raw (nke a na-akpọbu Dat NIGGA Raw ), bụ onye na-agụ egwu si Abia Steeti na Ndịda Ọwụwa Anyanwụ Naịjirịa .
Ọ bụ onye ọsụ ụzọ na Igbo rapụ, bụ ụdị nke na-amasịkarị ndị na-ege egwu.
Amụrụ ya ma otolite n’Enugwu, ọ bụ onye ama ama n’afọ 2000 maka ịrapụ n'asụsụ Igbo na asụsụ Pidgin.
Mmepụta Raw studiyo abọm izizi, nke ""Right &amp; wrong" pụtara na" 7 Ọgụstụ 2005.
Abọmnke abụọ "Everything Remains Raw" sochiri na 2007.
Studiyo abọm nke atọ ""End of Discussion" pụtara" na Ọktoba 2010.
Abọm ahụ gụnyere egwu a bụ “O!
Chukwu” nke vidio egwu ya meriri Okaibe egwu Afuro Hipụ Họpụ Vidiyo na NMVA Awọdụ n’afọ ahụ.
Raw arụkọtara ọnụ ya na ọtụtụ ndị egwu ndị ọzọ gụnyere Flavour N'abania, Duncan Mighty, Phyno, Illbliss, 2Face, M-Josh, Hype MC, BosaLin na Slowdog .

Berry's Room
Ndị egwu
