Banky W
Website maleekberry.com
Maleek Shoyebi (amụrụ na 11 Ọgụstụ 1987), nke amaara dị ka Maleek Berry, bụ onye British na Naịjirịa na-emeputa ndekọ egwu na onye egwu.
Mgbe o mechara ezumike ya na 2012, a họpụtara Maleek Berry dị ka "Onye na-emepụta egwu nke Afọ" na 2014 "Nigeria Entertainment Awards" .
Maleek Berry arụkọla ya na ndị egwu ama ama dịka Wizkid, Davido, Wale, Fuse ODG, Runtown na Iyanya .
N’afọ 2017 ka ahọpụtara ya n’otu kacha mma nke onyinye MOBO kwa afọ.
Ihe nkiri.
Egwu ya ezughị ezu.
Emechaa ewepụta ya
Hadiza Aliyu amaara dị ka Hadiza Gabon bụ onye amụrụ na abalị mbụ nke ọnwa Jun ma bụrụ Omee na onye mmepụta ihe nkiri nke Naịjirịa.
Ọ na-emeihe nkiri ma na Awusa ma na nke English .
Hadiza na-eje ozi dị ka onye nnọchi anya ụlọ ọrụ MTN Naịjirịa na ụlọ ọrụ Indomie noodles, a kpọrọ Hadiza aha nwanyị kachasị mma na 2013 Best of Nollywood Awards, ọ meriela akara ngosi abụọ nke Kannywood / MTN n'afọ 2014.
Ọ na-eje ozi ugbu a dị ka onye guzobere HAG Foundation.
Mmalite ya na ezinụlọ ya.
Amụrụ ya na Libreville, Republic of Gabon, Hadiza Aliyu bụ nwa nwanyị Malam Aliyu onye bụ onye okenye steeti.
N’akụkụ nna ya, Hadiza bụ onye agbụrụ Gabon, n’akụkụ nne ya, ọ bụ onye agbụrụ Fulani sitere na Steeti Adamawa, Nigeria .
Hadiza Aliyu gara ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na obodo amụrụ ya ebe ọ dere nyocha A-Level ya na ebumnuche ịbụ onye ọka iwu ma mesịa họrọ Iwu dị ka usoro mmụta kachasị amasị ya.
Ọ malitere afọ mahadum dị ka nwa akwụkwọ, mana ọ kwụsịrị ịga akwụkwọ n'ihi nsogbu ụfọdụ na-esochi ọmụmụ ya.
Emechiri agụmakwụkwọ ya mgbe ahụ ma nke ahụ nyere ya ohere ịga mmemme diplọma n'asụsụ French ma mesịa bụrụ onye nkuzi asụsụ French na ụlọ akwụkwọ nzuzo.
Hadiza Aliyu sonyeere Kannywood n’oge na-adịghị anya ọ si Gabon bata Adamawa State, Nigeria .
O si Adamawa ba na Kaduna kwalite inwe mmasi sonye na ulo oru ihe nkiri nke kannywood na nwanne nna ya.
O nwere ohere izute Ali Nuhu wee chọọ enyemaka ya iji bido ya dịka onye na-eme ihe nkiri.
Hadiza bidoro pụta na 2009, ebe a tụbara ya na Artabu, ọ banyere n'ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri nke kannywood dịka otu n'ime ụmụnwaanyị ndị na-eduga site na enyemaka na ntuziaka nke Ali Nuhu na Aminu Shariff .
Hadiza kpebiri isonyere Nollywood na 2017, na-agbaso nzọụkwụ Ali Nuhu, Sani Musa Danja, Yakubu Muhammed, Maryam Booth na Rahama Sadau .
E gosipụtara ya na ihe nkiri Nollywood mbụ ya tinyere Mike Ezuruonye, Mike Angel na Emmanuella n’ime ihe nkiri akpọrọ "Lagos Real Fake Life .
" 
Ihe nkiri ọ no.
Ndepụta ihe nkiri nke Hadiza Aliyu 
Ùgwù na Ihe nrite.
Hadiza Aliyu natara ọtụtụ onyinye na nkwanye ugwu gụnyere 2013 Best of Nollywood Awards na 2nd Kannywood / MTN Awards na 2014.
N’ịkwanyere ya ugwu dị egwu dịka onye na-eme ihe nkiri, Hadiza nwetara ihe nrite nkwanye ùgwù na 2013 site n’aka onye bụbu Gọvanọ Kano Steeti, Dr Rabiu Musa Kwankwaso.Enyekwara ya ihe nrite site na African Hollywood Awards dị ka Nwanyị Kachasị Mma 
Ndepụta nturu ugo nke Hadiza Aliyu nwetara 
Nkwanye ùgwù.
Ndepụta nkwanye ugwu nke Hadiza Aliyu natara
Onye nnọchiteanya.
N’ọnwa Disemba nke afọ 2018, ụlọ nrụpụta NASCON Allied Plc kpolitere Hadiza Aliyu, onye enyemaka nke otu Dangote Group dịka onye nnọchi anya Dangote Classic Seasoning n’oge ọrụ mmalite nke ngwaahịa a na Kano 
Ọrụ ebere.
Na 2016, Hadiza guzobere otu ọrụ ebere nke akpọrọ HAG Foundation Nke Ebumnuche ya bụ iji meziwanye ndụ ndị mmadụ site n'inye enyemaka na ngalaba agụmakwụkwọ na ahụike yana nchekwa nri.
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị na-eme ihe nkiri mbụ n'akụkọ gbasara Kannywood nyere ụdị enyemaka ahụ.
N’ọnwa Machị 2016, ọ gara n’ogige ndị gbara ọsọ ndụ n’obodo Kano Steeti ebe o nyere onyinye nri, akwa na ihe ndị ọzọ a na-ahụ anya nke ndị bi n’ogige ahụ bụ ndị gbasara site na ogbugbu ndị mmadụ na mgbago ugwu Naịjirịa.
Peace Anyiam-Osigwe, onye bụbu Peace Anyiam-Fiberesima MFR amụrụ n'abalị iri atọ n'ọnwa Maachi bụ onye Naịjirịa na-eme ihe nkiri na Onye isi ntụrụndụ nke akpọrọ "eze nwanyị nke ihe nkiri Nollywood".
O bu onye hiwere emume ihe nkiri n’uwa niile bụ, Africa Movie Academy Awards .
"Akwụkwọ akụkọ The Guardian" dere na ọ bụ ọsụ ụzọ na-egosi ihe nkiri Nollywood na mmemme ihe nkiri mba ụwa.
Ọ duziri vidiyo egwu mbụ nke mmetụtara hip-hop bụ, P-Square .
N’afọ 2012, gọọmentị Naịjirịa mere ya onye otu ‘Federal Republic ’ maka mgbalị ya na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri/ntụrụndụ.
Ọ bụ onye otu TED .
Mmalite Ndụ.
Anyiam-Osigwe amụrụ na abalị iri-ato nke onwa Maachi O sitere na ezi ama ama bụ ezi Osigwe Anyiam-Osigwe dị na Nkwerre, Imo Steeti .
Ọ bụ naanị nwa nwanyị n'ime ezinụlọ nwere ụmụaka asatọ.
O nwere asambodo Iwu na politikal sayensị na Mahadum Oxford Brookes .
Ọrụ.
Awọdụ nke Afrika Moovi Akademi.
Anyiam-Osigwe guzobere Africa Film Academy, otu na-achịkwa emume ihe nkiri kemgbe afọ 2005.
Emere nturu ugo a ka ọ bụrụ otu n’ime onyinye kacha nwee ùgwù nye ndị Afrika nọ n’ememe ihe nkiri.
Na mbipụta nke iri, ọ rịturu dị ka onye isi nke AMAAs.
Na 2015, ọ malitere atumatu AfricaOne iji cheta ndị Afrika ngalaba ọrụ ntụrụndụ.
Odide Ọrụ.
Anyiam-Osigwe bụ odee nke abụ ederede.
O nwere akwụkwọ ato nyere ya nkwalite.
N'ajụjụ ọnụ Alana Herro, ọ kọwara uri dịka otu n'ime ụzọ iji gosipụta nghọta ya na nghọta nke ihe gbara ya gburugburu.
Tupu ọ banye mahadum, o bipụtara otu magazin akpọrọ, "Clicks", nke edepụtara iji kwado ndị ojii na England.
Ọrụ ya gbadoro ụkwụ na nkwado/nkwuchitere ọnụ.
onye nduzi ihe nkiri/TV.
Ọrụ Anyiam-Osigwe na telivishọn malitere site na ihe omume mkparịta ụka bụ, "Piece off my mind", nke na-elekwasị anya na mmeghachi omume ndị mmadụ na nsogbu obodo nke anaghị ahụkarị na mgbasa ozi.
Okwu ngosi ya gbadoro ụkwụ n'okwu gbasara ịkwuchitere ndị mmadụ n'otu n'otu ndị bụ ndị obodo anaghị elebakarị anya.
O rụrụ aka n'usoro ihe nkiri Afrika, ịzụ ụmụaka na ịha nhatanha ụmụ nwanyị dịka mpaghara na-amasị ya na ihe nkiri na telivishọn.
Na mbido egwu abụọ, ọrụ P-Square, Anyiam-Osigwe bụ onye lekọtara ha.
Na 2016, o kwuru na ya na-anọchite Somkele Inyamah.
Ndụ onwe.
Nwanne ya nwoke bụ, Michael, onye e gburu na 2014 bụ onye nhazi nchịkọta nke Osigwe Anyiam-Osigwe Foundation, otu na-anaghị achọ uru na-enyeghachi ndị Naijiria.
Ọ bụkwa onye nduzi, "Afrika Institute for Leadership Research and Development” na kansul jeneral nke Malawi na Naịjirịa.
Nne ya, Dorothy Chinyere Anyiam-Osigwe bụ onye nnata nke Office of the Order of the Niger site n’aka onye isi ala n’oge ahụ bụ, Olusegun Obasanjo maka ọrụ ebere ya na Naịjirịa.
Ya na di ya kewapụrụ
Nduka Onwuegbute Onye amụrụ n'abalị iri abụọ na abụọ nke ọnwa Mee ,1969 bu ode akwụkwọ na Ode ejije nke Naịjirịa na British bụ ode akwụkwọ na ode ejije.
Ọ bụ nwa nke ise n'ime ụmụ iri na isii ma amụrụ ya na Manchester n'agbanyeghị na ọ tolitere Naịjirịa.
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum nke Ibadan na Mahadum Jos, ha abụọ dị na Naịjirịa.
Mgbe ọ nọ na Naịjirịa, ọ dere soap opera Riddles "Hopes" .
Ọrụ ya gụnyere ejije, obere akụkọ, na akwụkwọ agụmakwụkwọ maka ụmụaka.
Ọ bi ugbu a na United Kingdom .
Runtown
Runtown nke FV magazine.
Nkọwa Onwe
Aha Douglas Jack Agu
Amụrụ ya 19 Ọgụstụ 1989 (afọ 31)
Ebe osi Enugwu Steeti, Naịjirịa
Nkenụụdị R&amp;B, Afuro-fuchọnụ, hipụ họpụ, rege
Akaọrụ Otii egwu, odee egwu, nrụpụta
Ngwa egwu Olu
Afọ ọ nọ ọrụ 2010–ugbua
Lebeelụ Soundgod Music Group
Ndị egwu Davido, Nasty C, phyno
Douglas Jack Agu (amụrụ ya na 19 Ọgụstụ 1989), nke amara aha ya dịka Runtown, bụ onye Naịjirịa na-agụ egwu, onye na-ede egwu na onye na-emepụta ihe.
Gbasara ya.
Amụrụ Runtown na abalị iri-na iteghete nke ọnwa itolu nke 1989 n’Enugwu mana o tolitere na abuja na Legọọsụ, ebe ya guru praịmarị.
Mgbe nna ya nwụsịrị, ya na nne ya kwagara Abuja, onye na-arụ ọrụ na ụlọ ozi ahuike.
Na 2014 o weputara " Gallardo ", egwu nke gosiputara olu Davido ma puta dika egwu mbụ na abọm "Ghetto University" nke izizi ya.
Gallardo gara n'ihu merie "Mmekọrịta Kacha Mma nke Afọ" na mbipụta 2014 nke Nigeria Entertainment Awards .
Na 23 November 2015, Runtown wepụtara studiyo abọm izizi ya akpọrọ University "Ghetto" site na MTN Music Plus ya na Eric Many Entertainment.
Abọm a nwetara ihe karịrị nde iri atọ na ise na ọnụ ụzọ egwu wee si otú a nweta ya na ndepụta nke "Top 5 Most Streamed Artist".
Na 4 Nọvemba 2016, Runtown wepụtara "Mad Over You", nke edepụtara na nọmba 38 na "chaatị" Twitter nke egwu ọkaibe.
Joey Akan si "Pulse Nigeria" kọwara egwu a dịka "egwu emere onwe ya nke na - adọta ihe sitere na ụda ndị Ghana bụ kay Alkayida".
Runtown gwara "The Fader" magazine na egwu a sitere na mma nke Afrịka.
Ọgbaghaara.
Onye nwe "Aye".
Na 2014, e nwere akụkọ na mgbasa ozi na Runtown dere " Aye ".
Na mkparịta ụka ya na "Nigerian Tribune", Runtown kwuru, "Ọtụtụ ndị mmadụ na-ajụ m ajụjụ a. Davido enweela ọtụtụ ajụjụ ọnụ ebe o kwuru etu egwu a siri bido.
Yabụ ọ bụrụ n'ịchọrọ ịmatakwu gbasara Aye jụọ David ma ọ bụ gụọ ajụjụ ọnụ ya ".
Mbupute nke Kini Issue.
N’ọnwa Septemba nke afọ 2020, O wepụtara egwu nke abụọ ya kemgbe ọrịa na-efe efe nke “Kini Issue” .
Egwu a sitere na ọba egwu ya na-abịanụ akpọghị aha ugbu a. 
Ọpụpụ na Eric Manny Entertainment.
Nkwekorita Runtown na Eric Manny Entertainment gwụchara na Juunu 2018.
O mechara malite lebeelụ ya bụ, "Soundgod Music Group".
Ngagharị iwe #EndSars 
N'ọnwa Ọktọba 2020, Runtown na otu ndị ọzọ ama ama bu ụzọ na ngagharị iwe #Endsars na Legọọsụ, ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ Naịjirịa, ka gọọmentị kwụsị njedebe obi ọjọọ ndị uwe ojii.
Uzo Egonu (25 December 1931 ruo 14 August 1996) bụ nwaafọ Nigerian na-ésè ihe òsìsè ,onye biri na Britain na afọ 1940 gụrụ gawa, naanị otu ugboro ka ọ laghachitere n'ala nna ya n'ihi nọ ụbọchị abụọ na 1970, ọ bụ ezie na ọ nọgidere na-enwe nchegbu banyere ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Afrịka Dị ka Rasheed Araeen si kwuo, Egonu bụ "ikekwe onye mbụ si Africa, Eshia ma ọ bụ Caribbean bịara Britain mgbe Agha gachara iji bụrụu onye nka.
" Dị ka onye nyocha Molara Wood si kwuo, "Ọrụ Egonu jikọtara ọdịnala ndị Europe na nke Igbo mana nke pụtara ìhè bụ, o dowere Afrịka dị ka ihe ngosipụta nke ọgbara ọhụrụ.
Na ijikọta asụsụ a na-ahụ anya nke nka Western na Afrika, o nyeere aka ịkọwapụta ókè nke oge a, wee si otú a na-agbagha akụkọ ọdịbendị na-adịghị mma nke Europe, na nke onye omenkà Africa oge gboo.
" 
Akụkọ Ndu.
Amụrụ ya na Onitsha, Naịjirịa, Egonu dị na mmalite afọ iri na ụma ya na 1945 nke bụ mbụ ya ịga England.
Obidola ise ihe tupu ọmalite Sacred Heart College, Calabar tupu ọ gawa UK, ọ mechara gụọ Fine Arts na Taipografi na Camberwell School of Arts and Crafts, London, site na 1949 ruo 1952, o wee gaa isonye n'ọtụtụ ngosi.
Na 1977, o so na ndi ojii ndi n’ese ihe na ndi n’ese foto ndị ọrụ ha nochitere anya UK na Emume Second World Festival of Black Arts and African culture (Festac ’77) na Lagos, Nigeria (ndi ozo bu ndi Winston Branchn,Ronald Moody, Mercian Carrena, Armet Francis, Emmanuel Taiwo Jegede, Neil Kenlock, Donald Locke, Cyprian Mandala, Ossie Murray, Sue Smock, Lance Watson na Aubrey Williams ).
Na 1983 otu International Association of Art kpọrọ ya ka ọ nye ya ugwu maka oge ndụ ya niile, nsọpụrụ nke ya na ndị na-ese ihe na ndị opịpị dịka Henry Moore, Joan Miró na Louise Nevelson.
E tinyekwara Egonu na ngosi abụọ bụ isi nke centuri iri abụọ nke gosipụtara ndị isi ojii bụ Omenka nke British: na 1989 ihe ngosi dị ịrịba ama egosipụtara na ụlọ ngosi bụ Hayward Gallery, dị na London na ihe ngosi bụ "The other Story", na afọ asaa ka nke ahụ gasịrị "Transforming the Crown", nke Caribbean Cultural Center na New York City chịkọtara.
Ọ bụ onye otu egwurugwu nka Rainbow Art group, atụmatụ e hiwere na 1978, nke ghotara isi nsogbu dị na njikọ gbasara ọrụ na ebumnuche agbụrụ nta niile gbasara nka , tinyere nke ha.
N'afọ ndị sochirinụ ọ nwere nkụchi obi na , nsogbu anya,na abalị iri na anọ n'ọnwa ògọstụ,1996 ọ nwụrụ na London.
Nhọrọ odide na Ntọala ahapụrụ.
Isiokwu nke ọmụmụ ihe nke Olu Oguibe dere nke a kpọrọ "Uzo Egonu: Onye Omenka nke Africa na West" (1995), akọwakwala Egonu dịka " onye kachasị ukwuu n'ise ihe n'oge a nke Afrika".
Eddie Chambers ekwunyela gbasara"ike dị ịtụnanya nke Egonu iji ọdịdị ala na ụlọ dị na obodo dị iche iche mere nhazi usoro geometrik na-akpali ma na-enye mmasị, ma nke ọ bụla dị iche na nnọchi anya ya.
" E gosipụtara ọrụ ya na ngosi ihe ngosi 2015–16 "No Colour Bar: Black British Art in Action 1960–1990" na Guildhall Art Gallery, Obodo London .
YCee
Ycee na Flytime Promotions na Disemba 2017
Nkọwa Onwe
Aha Oludemilade Martin Alejo
Amaara ya dịka Zaheer
Amụrụ ya na Jenuwarị 29, 1993 (afọ 27)
Legọọs Steeti, Naịjirịa
Nkenụụdị 
Afuropọpụ
hipụ-họpụ
Akaọrụ 
Rapa
otii egwu
odee egwu
Ngwa egwu 
Olu
rapụ
Afọ ọ nọ ọrụ 2012–ugbua
Lebeelụ 
ANBT (kịta)
Tinny (mbụ)
Sony (mbụ)
Ndị egwu 
Olamide
Bella Alubo
Oludemilade Martin Alejo (amụrụ ya na Jenụwarị 29, 1993), onye ama ama dịka Ycee (nke akpọkwara aha ya YCee ), bụ onye egwu Naịjirịa, onye otii egwu na onye na-ede egwu.
Ọ wubelụ ewu mgbe o tisiri "Condo", nke gosipụtara Patoranking, nke mere ka ọ nwee nhọpụta abụọ na 2015 "Nigeria Entertainment Awards" .
A họpụtakwara ya maka Onye egwu kachasị mma na Afrịka Pọpụ na 2015 "All Africa Music Awards" na nke "Next Rated" na "The Headies" 2016 .
Ycee bịanyere aka na ndekọ na Sony Music na Ọktoba 2016, mana ọ kwụsịrị nkwekọrịta ya na akara ahụ na Febuwarị 2018.
Mmalite ndụ na Agụmakwụkọ.
A mụrụ Ycee na Festac Town, ụlọ obibi na Legọọsụ Steeti, Naịjirịa.
Ọ gụsịrị praịmarị ya na Dr. Soyemi Memorial Nọzịrị na Praịmarị Sukulu.
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ Sekọdịrị ndị Navy nke Nigeria na Ojo maka agụmakwụkwọ sekọndrị ya.
Ycee gụrụ akwụkwọ banyere bayọlọjị mmiri na Mahadum Legọọsụ .
Ọrụ.
Ycee malitere ọrụ egwu ya na 2012 dị ka onye na-agụ egwu.
Ọ bịanyere aka na ndekọ na Tinny Entertainment.
N'ihi ọrụ agụmakwụkwọ ya, ọ kwụsịrị obere oge na egwu mgbe ọ natara ohere ịbanye na Mahadum Legọọsụ .
Ycee wepụtara egwu a kpọrọ "Condo" na Mee 2015; a họpụtara ya maka Mmekọrịta Kacha Mma nke Afọ na Egwu Vidiyo kacha mma nke Afọ na 2015 "Nigeria Entertainment Awards" .
Na 20 Julaị 2015, ọ wepụtara otu egwu "Jagaban".
Olamide onye na-eti egwu Naịjirịa gwara ya ka o gosipụta ya na rimisi.
Ọ nwetakwara n'ihu n'ihu mgbe ọ natara nhọpụta maka Mkpughe nke Afọ na 2015 "MTV Africa Music Awards" .
Ọzọkwa, a họpụtara ya maka Onye egwu ọhụrụ nke Afrịka Pọpụ na 2015 "All Africa Music Awards" .
Ycee rere nnukwu egwu na O2 Academy Islington na 12 Jenụwarị 2018.
Egwu ahụ gosipụtara arụmọrụ ndị ọzọ site n'aka ndị ọchụnta ego ya Bella Alubo, Sona, Eugy, Ms. Banks na Flosha.
Na 15 Jenụwarị 2019, ọ kwupụtara na Instagram na ọ hapụgo Tinny Entertainment.
O kwupụtakwara mwepụta nke ndekọ lebelụ ya bụ ANBT, nke mkpọru aha ya bụ Ain't Nobody Badder Than.
Ycee wepụtara studio abọm mbụ ya "Ycee vs Zaheer" na 8 Nọvemba 2019.
Ọ bụ ngwakọta nke hipụ-họpụ, ọnyà, Afurobiiti, Afuro-haọsụ, haịphi, R&amp;B na alte.
Abọm ahụ sochiri egwu 8 mpụta mbụ EP "First Wave" (2017) na ya ntikọta EP nke Bella Alubo, akpọrọ "Late Night Vibrations" (2018).
Onye mepụtara abọm ahụ bụ Adey, Jay Bidz, Ballertosh, Fanatix, BeatsbyKarma, Syn X, Krizbeatz, Jay Popping, Buzzin Producer, AP Da Don, Abụọ asaa, Elmore, Willis Nye Dem na KO Ọ na-egosipụta mmekorita ya na Davido, Niniola, Phyno, Ms. Banks na Dapo Tuburna.
N'ime oge ọrụ ya na kemgbe ọ ghọrọ onye ama ama, Ycee gosipụtara na ọmarịcha ihe ndekọ iji gbakepụ dịka ndị egwu na-amalite ọhụrụ.
O gosipụtara na ihe ndekọ iji mepụta aha onye lebeelụ ya bụ Dapo Turbuna " Nothing " Rimisi na 2016 , otu lebeelụ ya Bella na Redio na 2017 tupu ịga n'ihu ịmepụta nkwonkwo EP ya na ya (Late Night Vibrations ) .
Ycee gosipụtara na Big Man Doingz nke Arosino n'akụkụ Dapo Tuburna na Karma.
Ụfọdụ na-ekwu na ọ bụ ụzọ ya isi nyeghachi ndị omenkà ọhụrụ n'ihi mgbe ọ natara njedebe mmetụta dị otu a site n'aka Olamide na rimisi ya na Jagaban, ihe ịga nke ọma ya na egwu buputere ya n'ụwa.
Onwuka Kalu (Mee 24, 1954 na Abiriba, Abia State, Naijiria ruo 23 Febrụwarị 2015 na Edgware, London, England) bụ onye ọchụnta ego si Naịjirịa hibere Onwuka Hi-Tek bụ ebe gbasara nrụpụta n'Aba nke e mechara kwuo na Nigeria Stock Exchang mechara dala azụ mgbe Kalu na gọọmentị Naịjirịa were nghọtaghị.
Ọ bụ onye nkwalite ihe arụpụtara na Naịjirịa ma na akwado ngwaahịa arụpụtara na Aba ma bụrụkwa onye so na n'iwu ngalaba Fidelity Union Merchant Bank .
Ndụ.
A mụrụ Kalu na Abiriba, Abia State nye nne na nna nwere ezigbo ego.
Ọ malitere ọrụ na otu Chika Group nke West Africa na Togo na Benin Republic o sitere na ebe a mepụta nkà Azụmahịa ya.
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ bụ ebumnuche ahịa na-elekwasị anya na mbubata ngwaahịa dịka uwe eyierala ma Kalu malitere dị ka nwa ụlọ tupu ọ ghọọ odeakwụkwọ ma mesịa na-achịkwa nkewa mbubata.
O hiwekwara ụlọ ọrụ nke ya, bụ Onwuka Interbiz site na obere mkpachata ego si na n'ọrụ ya iji zụọ ahịa textiles ndị Japan.
N’afọ 1977, ọ laghachiri Naịjirịa hiwe ụlọ ọrụ, Nails na General Steel Manufacturing Industry Ltd iji mepụta ntu.
Ọ gbakwunyere mmepụta skriu, bolt na babụ waya na ndepụta njirimara nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ.
Mgbe ike gwuwara igwe ọrụ eji arụpụta ntụ, ọ tụgharịrị wee bàa nrụpụta ngwa "auto spare parts yiri ngwaahịa ndị dịlarị n'ahịa.
Iji kwalite ngwaahịa ụlọ ọrụ ahụ ma gbaa ụlọ ọrụ obodo ume, ọ haziri ngosi azụmahịa/ngwaahịa emepụtara na Naijirịa n'Aba na 1982 nke Onye isi ala oge ahụ bụ Shehu Shagari meghere.
O hiwere usoro maka ịkwado ngwaahịa ndị a na-emepụta n'obodo ma mesịa bipụta akwụkwọ na 1986 nke akpọrọ "The Challenge of Industrialization in Nigeria" .
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ malitere mmekọrịta azụmahịa na ụlọ ọrụ mba dị iche iche dị ka Lever Brothers, UAC na Peugoet na ụfọdụ ụlọ ọrụ nọ n'ala anyị.
Na 1991, e debara aha Onwuka Hi-Tek n’ihu ọha nke stok eschenj.
Ọrụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị.
Kalu bụ onye otu nnọkọ omebe iwu nke 1988 nke tụlere banyere usoro gọọmentị nke Third Republic .
Mgbe ahụ ọ bụrụ onye ndu ndị otu Liberal Convention mana Onye isi ala Babangida machibidoro mkpakọrịta ahụ na 1990.
Kalu mechara hapụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị.
N'oge na-adịghị anya, Kalu malitere ntọala ụmụaka iji metuta nsogbu nke ọtụtụ ụmụaka ndị nsogbu na ọrịa enwere ike igbochi metụtara.
Ntọala ahụ haziri ihe nkiri ebere ụmụaka Afrika nke nwere ndị na-eme egwuregwu dịka Dionne Warwick, Kool na Gang, Ọnwụnwa na Miriam Makeba na- eme.
Emere emume a ka ọ bụrụ mmemme ụbọchị atọ ma ndị ọbịa gụnyere Augustus Aikhomu na General Ibrahim Babangida.
Agbanyeghị, mmemmé ahụ enwetaghị ego zuru oke nke mmachi ngagharị maka usoro ngụkọta ọnụ mba metụtara, tiketi ịdị oke ọnụ mekwara ka ọtụtụ ndị hapụ ịbịa ,ebe ndị n'eme ihe ngosi mere ngosi n'ọgbọ egwuregwu nke ọkara jupụtara.
Ka emechara nkagbu nke ntuli aka June 12 na Naijiria, site n’ọrụ ya na National Democratic Coalition (NADECO), Kalu laghachiri n’ime èbùmnúchè ọha dika onye na-akwado nlaghachi ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya n’oge ọchịchị nke Sani Abacha .
E jidere ya na Olu Falae wee tụọ ya mkpọrọ otu afọ tupu ọ gbalaga biri na mba ọzọ, n'agbanyeghị na anya ya adịghị.
Na mba ọzọ, ọ nwetara nzere iwu.
Kalu laghachiri Naịjirịa n'oge nke anọ nke Republic, na 2003, ma zọọ ọkwa gọvanọ Abia Steeti n'otu ndọrọ ndọrọ APGA.
Ọnwụ.
Kalu nwụrụ site na acute myeloid leukemia n'abalị iri abụọ na atọ nke ọnwa Febụwaarị , 2015 na ụlọ ọgwụ dị na Edgware, London.
Nkem Nwankwo (12 June 1936 ruo 12 June 2001) bụ onye ode akwụkwọ na onye ode abụ nke Naijiria .
Akụkọ Ndụ..
A mụrụ ya na Nawfia-Awka, obodo dị nso na obodo Igbo bụ Onitsha na Naịjịrịa, Nwankwo gara University College na Ịbadan, nweta akara nzere BA n'afọ 1962.
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ ọ nwetara ọrụ nkuzi na Ibadan Grammar School, tupu ọ gaa n'ihu ide akwụkwọ akụkọ magazin, gụnyere "Drum" na-arụ ọrụ na Nigerian Broadcasting Corporation .
O dere ọtụtụ akụkọ maka ụmụaka bụ nke ebipụtara na 1963 dị ka "Tales Out of School.
" O derekwara Tales out of School ọzọkwa na 1965.
Dịka Onye edemede obere akụkọ na uri, Nwankwo nwetara nlenyere anya na akwụkwọ mbụ ya bụ "Danda na" (1964), bụ nke e mere dịka egwu nke etinyere na 1966 World Festival of Negro Arts na Dakar, Senegal .
N’oge agha obodo Nigeria Civil war Nwankwo rụrụ ọrụ na Biafra’s Arts Council.
Na 1968, site na njiko aka nke ya na Samuel X. Ifekjika, o dere "Biafra: The Making of a Nation" .
Mgbe agha obodo gasịrị, ọ laghachiri Lagos wee rụọ ọrụ na akwụkwọ akụkọ mba, "Daily Times" .
Ọrụ ndị sochirinụ gụnyere satire "My Mercedes Is Bigger than Yours" .
N’afọ 1970 gawa, Nwankwo nwetara akara ugo mmụta Master na Ph.D. na Mahadum Indiana .
O dekwara gbasara nrụrụ aka na Naịjirịa .
Ọ nọrọ njedebe nke ndụ ya na United States wee kuzie na Mahadum Michigan State na Tennessee State University .
Ọ nwụrụ n'ụra ya na Tennessee, site na nsogbu sitere na ọrịa obi nke ọ na-arịa kemgbe ọtụtụ afọ.
Nkem Okocha bụ onye nwere nka ịchụnta ego na Naijiria bụ onye guzobere Mamamoni, ụlọ ọrụ mmekọrịta FinTech na-enye ụmụ nwanyị dara ogbenye n'ime obodo na obodo mepere emepe ikike aka ọrụ na mbinye ego.
Ọ bụ onye mmeri na 2016 nke LEAP Africa Social Innovators Program (SIP) nke Union bank .
Mmalite Ndụ na Mmụta.
Ọmụmụ na ntolite Okocha bụchaa na Lagos, Naịjirịa.
Ọ malitere ụlọ akwụkwọ ogo dị elu na Auchi Polytechnic ma mesịa gaa Lagos State University ebe ọ nwetara akara mmụta bachelo na Bankin na Finans wee nata asambodo nka ichụnta ego na Tony Elumelu Entrepreneurship Program, o nwekwara asambodo azụmaahịa na nka ịchụnta ego si mahadum dị na Northwest .
Ọrụ.
Site na mgbalị nwanyị isi mkpe bụ nne ya iji zuo ezinụlọ ya, ọ tọrọ ntọala Mamamoni, ụlọ ọrụ na-elekọta mmadụ nke na-ekwu okwu banyere mgbanwe obodo site n'inye ụmụ nwanyị nkwado ka ha nwee obere azụmahịa.
O nwere oke mmasị banyere iwepu ụmụ nwanyị na ogbenye ma ulo ọrụ ya choro ịbelata nsogbu nke ịda ogbenye na Naijịrịa.
Kemgbe afọ 2013, ọ metụtala ma nye nkwado ihe karịrị ụmụnwaanyị puku anọ na ọtụtụ ime obodo na obodo mepere emepe ma-nyefee ihe karịrị otu narị obere ego mbinye.
".
" Tupu ọ malite ụlọ ọrụ ya, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nnọchi anya ndị ahịa n'ụlọ ọbá ego mgbe ahụ bụ Intercontinental Bank nke bụ Access Bank plc ugbu a. Ọ gara n'ihu ịghọ onye isi nchịkwa na Novine Koncept Ventures tupu ịmalite Mamamoni.
Iheanacho Obioma bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Nigeria so na National Assembly nke anọ ,na-anọchite anya ngalaba Ikwuano / Ụmụahịa North / Ụmụahịa South nke Abia State n'okpuru nke People's Democratic Party n'agbata 1999 na 2003.
O mechara gaa zoo ọkwa na Senate nke Naijiria ka ọ nọchite anya Abia Central Senatorial district n'okpuru ọkọlọtọ nke ndị All Progressive Congress megide gọvanọ na-achị mgbe ahụ bụ Theodore Orji .
Miesinnei Mercy Genesis (a mụrụ n'ubọchị nke 20 n'ọnwa Septemba afọ 1997) bụ onye Naijirịa na-eme egwuregwu ịgba mgba.
N’egwuregwu 2016 Summer Olypics ọ sọrọ mpi na Women's freestyle -48.
N'afọ 2019, ọ ritere ọla ọcha n'ihe omume women's 50 kg beach wrestling nke 2019 World Beach Games e mere na Doha, Katie.
A napụrụ ya ọla ya, n'ọnwa febụwarị afọ 2021, n'ihi iwu ị gba ọgwụ ike ọ dara.
N’afọ 2020, ọ ritere ọla edo n'ihe omume women's 50 kg nke 2020 African Wrestling Championships.
Wande Coal
